Summary: My wife and I celebrated our 10 year wedding anniversary and our experience went above and beyond our expectations. Jess, the front desk concierge was absolutely fabulous. Not only was she helpful but she was very thoughtful and considerate. She brought up champagne to our room shortly after we checked in and when she found out we didn't drink alcohol, she asked what we did drink and we said "water" with a chuckle. 5 minutes later to our surprise she had brought us two ice cold "fancy" waters. It was the best water i have ever tasted. It was special for my wife and I to get to cheers each other in honor of one another. Thank you Jess! This hotel was amazing to say the least. Waking up to the sound and view of the ocean was paradise. The hotel was clean and spelt amazing. Plus
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Amazing stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach
Summary: Hotel had all the beach toys you could want to borrow.   Chairs, sand toys, boogie boards. Amazing beds, soft sheets.  Heated pool and hot tub for cool nights. Fabulous location.  They had a rooftop wine happy hour in the evening, followed by a milk and cookie hour for the kids. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear ElizabethA103,  Thank you so much for the nice recommendation! We are thrilled to read that you had a great visit with us. We hope that you will plan a return trip soon! Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: The location is great!  Staff is friendly. Beds are comfortable.  In room fridge was great to have.  Beach access and walking paths are right outside your door. Views couldn’t be better. We will be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is my absolute favorite place to stay in Laguna Beach.  The Inn's location is fantastic for walking the park & beach, shops and restaurants.  The rooms are CLEAN and the staff is attentive.  It is close to everything, too.
Manager Response: Dear AnnSellsFinerHomes,  Wow! Thank you very much for the great recommendation! We look forward to your next visit. Thanks again for staying with us.  All the best,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: A few days in Laguana Beach
Summary: We booked a few days away to Laguna Beach in late Feb. The hotel was great although a little tired in places.   Our room was clean and welcoming and the view from our balcony was stunning - even when the winds and rain picked up!  Wine happy hour was a hit despite the weather, all thanks to Joaquin who looked after us all.
Manager Response: Dear Roving141249,  Thank you very much for your post. It is wonderful to know that our Joaquin helped to make your stay fun and memorable. It is always our goal to provide guests with a relaxing time in spite of the recent weather. We are glad to know that you were not disappointed. Thank you so much for staying with us.  Cheers!  Judi Z., Front office

Summary: Perfect location to everything in Laguna! Just off the trails in Heisler Park & steps to the beach. Daily complimentary wine/milk & cookies & robes are such a nice touch! Joaquin was very outgoing and friendly even while outside in the wind and rain the night we had drinks. Small rooms but very clean, comfortable beds & even though we had a room off the highway, noise wasn’t a problem. Nice little hot tub and tons of ocean views around the hotel.
Manager Response: Hi tbraz3,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a detailed review, we appreciate the kind words. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We cannot wait to welcome you back the next time you are in Laguna.  Best, Izabella P.

Summary: Decided on a last minute, Valentine’s Day getaway/staycation, could not resist value compared to regular rates. Oceanview room was amazing, staff very welcoming & lovely. Some of the public areas were a little worn and could be more updated, but did not take away from the overall experience.
Manager Response: Dear x0v1pueuv2,  We love last minute getaways! Especially fun to take them at the beach. We are thrilled that you chose our hotel. We hope to have you visit again soon!  Warm regards, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Hotel overlooks the ocean and is within easy walking distance of the village. I imagine that ocean-facing rooms are wonderful. We stayed in a "village view" room on the 4th floor, which looks over a parking lot and a busy road. The street noise was not too bad. The room itself was clean and well-appointed; not luxurious but nice. There is morning coffee, a nightly happy hour with full bar and free wine, and milk-n-cookies in the evenings. Be aware that there is no other food service, but restaurants are close by. Overall, a good value and a very pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Dear Connector415789,  Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate that you took the time to post. We are happy to know that you enjoyed our nightly wine hour, bar with spectacular views and the yummy cookies each evening. We hope that you will plan to visit us again soon.  All the best,  Judi Z. Front Office

Summary: I've always wanted to stay here. Booked a birthday trip months in advance, they gave us the room next to the main beach bathrooms.  Booking direct entitles you to 2 welcome drinks. None were offered, I had to ask. The room smelled musty, probably from the carpets that turned my feet black. The wood between the door and closet was rotted, there were dust bunnies on the walls, cobwebs in the corner and splatter up on the crown moulding. We took it upon ourselves to replace the dirty, flat, worn cushions on the balcony with new ones we found up on the roof top. The rooftop is nice, great view, seating with heaters. The bar itself is very small, like a back yard set up. Wine hour is just that, wine. Beer and liquor is available for purchase. No food. Cookies and cold milk at 6 is
Room tip: The location and view is not worth it without total room refurbishment and staff training
Manager Response: Dear Sightsee568315,  Thank you for taking the time to post your valuable feedback. We are very sorry to hear that you did not have a great experience during your recent stay with us. Our mission is to provide relaxing, memorable and fun stays for all of our guests, so we are sorry that you were not happy. Thank you for your positive notes on our staff and the comfort of the beds. We will make sure to pass this post along to the proper teams as we strive to make improvements. Thank you again for staying with us, we hope that you might give us another chance in the future.  Warm regards,   Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: We love the Inn at Laguna Beach. The Staff is very friendly and make you feel welcomed! The location is excellent with easy walking distance into downtown Laguna. We can park our car and walk every where. Our suite was fabulous. We will always use this hotel when visiting Laguna!
Manager Response: Hi carolfF8827DF,   Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review, we appreciate your feedback. We love having you stay with us. We are so happy to hear that you felt so welcome at our property and that you enjoyed interactions with our staff. We cannot wait to welcome you back soon.   - Izabella

Summary Heading: Joaquin the Bartender at The Inn at Laguna Beach
Summary: The bartender Joaquin was amazing 5 Stars! Such great service he was so helpful and helped make our trip visiting from Texas so great. Would highly recommend the 5pm sunset happpy hour. Just a great experience!
Manager Response: Hi JohnH6468,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a great review, we appreciate your feedback. We couldn't agree more, we love Joaquin and are so grateful to have him apart of our team. We cannot wait to welcome you back to our property the next time you are in town.

Summary: My sister and I stayed 2 nights at The Inn at Laguna while visiting family. The location was perfect, the hotel is right on main beach and a short walk to Laguna town center where there are restaurants, shops and even a Whole Foods. We had an ocean front room with a balcony and 2 queen beds and the views were amazing. The room was spacious, comes with a mini fridge and 2 robes. The beds and sheets are comfortable. We enjoyed the rooftop happy hour where the bartender, Joaquin, did a great job with our drinks and shared advice on Laguna restaurants. We would highly recommend staying at the Inn and plan to return next year.
Manager Response: Dear Exploration669186,  Thank you very much for the nice review. We are always happy to hear from our guests and are pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable time with us at the beach! We are happy to know that you will plan to stay again next year, if not before!  Thank you again for staying.  Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Walking distance to everything, great views, clean and friendly staff. Free wine every night on the terrace overlooking the sunset. All you can ask for during a vacation. I would highly recommend to anyone staying in Laguna beach.
Manager Response: Hi Mattskelly4,  Thank you so much for the kind words, I appreciate it. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed our stay with us, we cannot wait to welcome you back soon.

Summary: This was such a lovely hotel and it is in a great location. It is so close to Santa Ana airport and right on the beach. Plus there are so many shops, restaurants etc in walking distance. It made everything so convenient. Will return.
Manager Response: Dear X5851OAalicias,   We agree that our guests love our location; so close to  Main Beach and all the yummy eateries in the quaint village. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope that you will plan a return trip soon.  Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: Busy walkway in front of ocean view balconies.
Summary: There is a busy public walkway that gives pedestrians a clear view into the balconies and guest rooms of all the ocean view rooms. We constantly had to close the shutters. In other words we had to decide between the ocean view and our privacy!
Manager Response: Dear dlevin407037,  Thank you for your feedback. Our hotel is located on the coast above the bluffs, along Heisler Park which features breathtaking views of the Pacific and access to four Laguna beaches. Our guestrooms are placed some several yards back from the pathway. We offer our apologies that you were not happy with the location of your room during your stay. Thanks so much for staying with us. We hope that you might stay with us again, we do have many room location and view choices available.  Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Ideal location with views of Main Beach and down the coast, beautiful sunsets, close to oceanfront dining and the artsy vibe of Laguna. I ran on the beach and hilly trails above town for more incomparable views. Easy parking, sunset wine hour on the 4th floor deck, clean, bright, comfortable rooms. A 40 minute drive from home without any airports, but a world away!
Manager Response: Dear Skidoc2023,   Thank you very much for the wonderful review. We are thrilled to hear when our guests have had a fun time exploring all that Laguna Beach and our hotel has to offer. We are glad that you enjoyed our sunset wine hour on the Terrace. We look forward to your next visit!  Cheers!  Judi Z Front Office

Summary: Very disappointing. The websites presented this beautiful luxury place and it was definitely not that. It is extremely outdated. I paid for the pool room expecting to be able to walk out to the ocean and then they lock you in. I had to call down for them to unlock it in the morning. Couldn’t watch the run rise. The tv was terrible. It was just very disappointing and nothing like the website presented.
Manager Response: Dear abigailgarner26,  We are very sorry to hear that your stay did not go as expected. We hope that your guest room issue was resolved quickly. We apologize that our beach access gate was locked when you tried to exit the hotel there. Beach access is always available to all of our guests at the lobby level. Thank you for your review, we really appreciate your feedback.  Thank you again for staying with us.  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Very nice hotel. Right next to the main beach and has easy access from the hotel to the beach. Parking was paid but well worth it - convenient and easy in and out. The room was clean and the housekeeping staff was excellent. Check-in and out were fast and trouble-free. Loved having coffee available in the entry each morning.
Manager Response: Dear  L8471SUjayh,  Thank you for posting your wonderful review. Our staff are  happy to hear that your stay was enjoyable. We hope that you will plan to stay again the next time you are in Laguna Beach.   Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Nice property, great views from rooms. Located very close to restaurants and main beach. Wonderful for relaxing beach vacation. Excellent beds. Three star hotel because of minimal facilities (no food at all). Expensive because of location.
Manager Response: Dear Tim D,  Thank you for providing your wonderful review.  We are happy to know that you enjoyed our beautiful sea views and location. We hope that you are already planning a return visit!  See you soon at the beach!  All the best,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Gorgeous ocean view and friendly staff, but a bit pricey . The room rate does not include breakfast, but there’s lots of restaurants nearby, easy to find Italian cuisine or Japanese sushi. Really enjoy the sunset view.
Manager Response: Dear peterjshej,  Thank you very much! We are glad that you enjoyed the amazing sunset views from our hotel and the many tasty restaurant choices in Laguna Beach. We hope to welcome you back again soon!  Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: Views are spectacular, but not worth the money.
Summary: Great views, but this property is very outdated and run down. Front desk/lobby area is very small and dingy looking. Rooms are run down and the refrigerator smelled badly. View from the room was spectacular, but definitely not worth $500 per night. I feel like I got ripped off!
Manager Response: Dear  Doug D,  Thank you for taking the time to post your review. We are terribly sorry to hear that your stay did not go as expected. Guest feedback is very important to us as we move forward to improve our guests experience. We hope that you might give us another chance for a future visit.   Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: People upstairs were stomping and loud all night. Alarms went off in the room at 5am. Phone was broken. Sliding windows were broken. Shower was not cleaned. Was not granted a hour late checkout. Overall a bit disappointing for the price we paid.
Manager Response: Dear  Annac0lleen08389,  We apologize for the service you received during your stay with us. We hope that you have a chance to stay with us another time. We are sure that we can provide you with a more relaxing and fun visit. We will be sure to pass this post along to the proper teams for review.   Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: No place for a large group
Summary: For couples or groups of 4 this is a nice place if you do not use the beach. Not enough chairs in back or at the pool for 9 people.  The terrace was very nice. Rooms are small. The coffee in the morning needs cookies or something that goes well with coffee.
Manager Response: Dear johnturilli,  Thank you for posting your review. We appreciate your feedback and your point of view.  We are glad that you enjoyed our Terrace and views there. We will be sure to share your thoughts with our management teams. We hope that you will plan to stay with us again soon.  Cheers,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: I won’t stay anywhere else as long as I can afford it once a year. Location location location . Barely have to drive anywhere. Good for walking. Great restaurants nearby. Go to top of the world if you like to hike. Many trails at each end of Alta laguna
Manager Response: Dear Lizawhitaker,  Thank you so much for the nice review. It is nice to hear that you had fun discovering the trails at Top of the World park and exploring Laguna Beach. Thank you for staying with us, we hope that you plan to stay with us again soon.  All the best,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Came there because my husband passed away one year ago and one of our pleasures was sitting on a balcony and watching the ocean on either the Pacific Ocean or the Atlantic Ocean. (Called the Jersey shore)
Manager Response: Dear Jhutvhinson,  Thank you for spending some some time with us and sharing your story. We hope that your stay was relaxing. Thank you for choosing our hotel for your ocean trip. We look forward to your next visit.   Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: Central location with incredible ocean views
Summary: We highly recommend this hotel due to its location, ocean views, and overall ambience. We were allowed an early check-in which was much appreciated. We had a double queen room with balcony which was a plus.
Manager Response: Dear Paul S  Thanks so much for staying with us, we appreciate it very much. We look forward to providing you with another pleasant stay soon.  Cheers!  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: The location and room were were right on the ocean.  The staff were friendly and always ready to answer questions or help.  There is no breakfast service however, there is a breakfast spot right across the street.  Thank you for a wonderful 4 days!
Manager Response: Dear jarchibald7,  Thanks so much for your nice review! We are glad that you stayed with us, we hope you will plan to return again soon!  Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front office

Summary: This hotel is dirty and run-down. The staff is not helpful or friendly. Stay elsewhere if you plan to go to Orange County. I was extremely disappointed with nearly every aspect of this hotel. They are not able to honor simple requests or offer any reasonable alternatives. I was sort of shocked that this hotel had received positive reviews in the past.
Manager Response: Dear  jeffdoane,  We are terribly sorry to hear that your recent stay with us was not as you expected. It is our goal to accommodate and assist our guests to our best abilities ensuring  that they have a relaxing and pleasurable visit. We are saddened to hear that we had missed that mark with you. We hope that you might stay again another time.  Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: Wonderful place in the most wonderful city in the World
Summary: The location is the best and the staff is better. The ocean view is priceless. You cannot go wrong staying at the Inn at Laguna. This is our most favorite destination. We have been there many times in January and We definitely plan to be back again
Manager Response: Dear kmartguy,  Many thanks for your glowing review of our hotel. We are pleased to know that you plan to return again to enjoy our amazing ocean views and quaint hotel. Our staff really appreciate your kind words. We can't wait to have you visit again! Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front office

Summary: We had a great stay at this hotel despite the rainy weather. The rooms are very clean and have all the amenities you need. The staff is friendly and helpful.  But the location may be the best thing about this hotel. It’s located right on the ocean and next to a gorgeous path that goes through a lovely city park. Plus you can walk to all the good shops and restaurants in Laguna. There’s also a phenomenal sushi restaurant across the street.  We left a shopping bag in our closet and were so impressed that the staff immediately found it and sent us a link to Ileftmystuff.com. We easily filled out the form and our package arrived at home within days.  Overall, we were quite impressed with everything related to this hotel and want to return when it’s sunny!
Manager Response: Dear MelissaInPdx,  Thank you Melissa! We are thrilled to hear that we were able to provide a great stay and wonderful service. We agree that our hotel location on Main Beach in Laguna Beach has stunning views of the ocean and coastline. Our guest love to walk into town for shopping and great eats. Thank you for your great review and for staying with us.  See you soon at the beach!  Judi Z. Front Office

Summary: Quick easy check in, room was ready a bit early. Partial ocean view room had a way better view than I thought it would. Had a nice table and chairs in front of the room. Wine on the Terrace at 5pm was lovely. Room is small and dated. The hotel is in an amazing location. Room cost over $600 (CAD) for one night, due $30 resort fee which we didn't use any of the amenities, as it was too cold, and parking was $40. But the location is hard to beat.
Manager Response: Dear FunVacay1  Thank you for your detailed review of our hotel during your recent visit. We are happy to note that you enjoyed our location as well as the hotel amenities, such as wine hour with a sunset view, coffee and tea in the morning and in room Nespresso. We agree that our location is really beautiful and so close to shops and great restaurants. Thank you very much for staying with us. We hope that you will plan to visit again.  All the best!  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: You MUST stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach!
Summary: The best location, amazing amenities, and incredibly kind and helpful staff! The Inn is where you must stay in Laguna Beach! I will be planning future trips just to stay here again and experience all the Inn has to offer!
Manager Response: Dear rachaelvernon,  Wow! We are so pleased to hear that you were delighted with your stay. Our friendly, knowledgeable staff are always happy to assist our guests in having a fun and relaxing stay. We can't wait to have you visit again! Thank you for staying with us.  Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Would not stay here again...For what we paid, it was extremely lacking. Furthermore, the description of partial ocean view is misleading. They actually only have 3x rooms 101, 102 and 301 that fit this bill. Floor 1 feels like a basement - definitely request 301 or upgrade to full ocean view (for additional $$$) - better yet, don't stay here - other options for similar price are much nicer.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is the perfect beachfront hotel. Its location is unlike any property in the area. The staff were very helpful. The happy hour on the roof was wonderful. We were able to walk to many stores and restaurants as well. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear Traveler4Lyfe91,  Thank you very much for your awesome review of our hotel. We are thrilled to know that your time with us was pleasant and fun. Thank you for planning to stay with us again!  Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: The service at the Inn was great and the location was perfect. They offer wine in the lobby and the location is very close to all of the restaurant options in Laguna Beach. I would recommend it to anybody looking to stay in Laguna.
Manager Response: Dear Traveling_Gnome1979,  Thank you for the recommendation! We are glad to know that you had an enjoyable stay. Please visit again the next time you are in Laguna Beach. Thank you for staying with us.  All the best,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: Do not stay in village rooms - the road noise and room qualities are not worth the price.
Summary: I stayed in the village room (not ocean view room) and the price that is advertised is just the lowest base price before all of the extra fees.  Definitely not worth it. The room had super old and dirty bathmat and towels and the road noise was bad.  If staying here - only stay in the ocean view rooms so you're not facing the highway.  My room price was listed (winter mid week "special" rate) at $111/night but with fees was $272 a night.  Parking is not included - that is an additional $40 per night.
Manager Response: Dear worldover777  Thank you for your review. We have looked into your reservation to clarify the room rates you have posted here. Please reach out to the hotel directly so that we may gather more details. We hope that any other issues you may have experienced were addressed by our staff to your satisfaction.   Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Nice location, clean. I will extend jacuzzi and have view of ocean from pool.Nice acces to Beach. Easy parking with acces to rooms through elevator.Nice internet and option to chromecast our favorite show.
Manager Response: Dear gplj9lfc06,  Thanks so much for the nice review. We hope that you will plan to stay again the next time you are in Laguna Beach!  Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: The Inn at Laguna was a perfect place to stay at for an 80 degrees Christmas Eve. :) check in was a breeze. Parking was easy. The room was nice, but not luxurious by any means. The bed comfy.   The best part of the stay was the proximity to the beach. Quick minute walk and there is the beach. Beautiful view from our room. We left balcony doors open and slept to sounds of the crashing waves.   The rooftop bar is not technically a bar, but there is drink service. Great place to chill and watch the amazing sunset.
Manager Response: Dear kcollett67,  Thanks so much for your great review! We are thrilled to know that you had an amazing stay. The warm weather was enjoyable that day! We hope that you will plan to stay again another time.  All the best,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: We booked a room for six nights well in advance, and although everyone probably requests this, we asked for a quiet room.  Our room had rooms perpendicular to it, so we could see and hear other loud guests.  One guest left their dog alone, howling, two days in a row.  The view is spectacular though, it is close to a beautiful park and near everything, and the housekeepers were kind and did a great job.  It just felt over-priced.
Manager Response: Dear  barbaramcp2,  We apologize that you experienced this during your stay with us. Noises that may disturb our guests are addressed as quickly as possible. It is our wish that every guest has an enjoyable and relaxing time with us. We are thrilled to hear that you really enjoyed our amazing views and location! Thank you for your kind words regarding our wonderful staff.  All the best,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: We came here on Christmas Day for the ocean view and the hot tub. The weather was perfect and we loved our stay. I was parked literally 30 feet from the room, which was super convenient for me, and my teenage son was obsessed with the fluffy robes!
Manager Response: Dear Lesstn63,  Thank you for staying with us. We are truly glad that your family had a great time, enjoying the nice weather and the fluffy robes! It is great to hear that your day was so much fun.   Cheers!  Judi Z., Front office

Summary Heading: Beautiful Small Hotel on the Beach
Summary: Beautiful Mediterranean style hotel with wonderful views of the ocean and great service.  Pool and rooftop happy hour every evening.  The employees are very courteous and helpful.  Near downtown Laguna Beach, restaurants and beaches.  Beautiful walking trail that passes on the beachside of the hotel. We'll be back.
Manager Response: Dear faustin0garza,  Thanks so much for your nice review! We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed our rooftop area, wine and our friendly staff. Heisler park has one of the most amazing views of any beach along the California Coast. We are glad to know that you are planning to stay  with us the next time you visit Laguna beach!  Thank you again for staying with us.  All the best,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: I had a wonderful stay! The view from my room was amazing. The staff was super friendly and my room was cleaned well daily. I do feel that for the price, the interior needs a renovation. I also don’t think you should have to pay for parking. It was nice that they served wine and cookies and milk every evening. For me, the only thing missing from the hotel was an on site restaurant. However, there are many restaurants within walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear Safari829248,  We are glad to know that you had a great time with us! Thank you for your review. We always like to hear from our guests, your opinion is very important. We hope that you will plan to visit again soon.  Warm regards,  Judi Z .,  Front Office

Summary: The hotel is nice in many ways. The views are great, staff was good and lobby was nice. They give you Binoculars which is a nice touch. Stayed in the top floor ocean view which was pricey with everything. They tack on an amenity fee and parking which was $70 total which seems steep. The room was dated and there was just a tiny balcony you could barely stand on. I would stay again but I would only stay if I got a better deal and had a larger balcony. The south parking garage entrance it pitched and steep so scraped my car on it pretty badly.
Manager Response: Dear primisagod,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post your review. The top floor ocean view rooms have a step out balcony.  We do have ocean view rooms with full size balconies that you can book with us if available. We are happy to hear that our staff were helpful and that you enjoyed the views from your guest room. We hope that you will plan to visit again.  All the best,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Room had beautiful view overlooking Main Beach, very clean room, but it had major issues. The entry door had extreme large cracks around the door letting freezing air blow in, extremely loud HVAC system made it hard to have a conversation and interrupted sleep when it went on, and no in-room microwave.
Manager Response: Dear bcame59810,  Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback, thanks for letting us know. We are glad to know that you enjoyed the view from your guest room. Our knowledgeable staff are always happy to assist!  Thank you for staying with us  Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Beautiful hotel located in the heart of Laguna Beach. When we checked into our room we were left a pair of binoculars. Almost immediately we were able to see a dolphin from our room, which was very cool. The hotel is of the older variety and in need of updating, but the cleaning staff kept it clean and tidy so that was not an issue. Overall, the staff and service was good.
Manager Response: Dear 5ryuyrwd09,  Wow! So amazing to see dolphin on your first day. That is so much fun! Thank you for your nice review. We are glad to know that you had an enjoyable stay.  Cheers,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: Great Location but you are paying 5 star prices for 2 star quality
Summary: Rooms are outdated - there is no restaurant on site. Great location but not really worth the price. Double check your bill upon checkout - I was charged a pet fee for every single night rather than once. This was corrected when I spoke up about it.
Manager Response: Dear brithemming,  Thank you very much for your review, we value your feedback. We have looked into your reservation and apologize for the clerical error that occurred. We are glad to know that you enjoyed our great spot on the beach. Thank you again for staying with us,  Sincerely, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Best views in the city. Walkable. Clean, bright, and overall lovely. Splurge for the rooms with a view and enjoy the sunset and crashing waves. This visit, we stayed on the south most part of the hotel, but the northern part is much better in the winter for sunsets.
Manager Response: Dear  lmas14,  Thank you for the 5 stars! We agree that our sunsets in winter can be spectacular! We are happy to know that you enjoyed your vacation with us. Thank you for staying with us multiple times, we look forward to your next visit.  Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Outstanding reception staff- very willing to be helpful and assist with requests.  Outstanding location.  Rooms a little dated and cost is high due to convenience of location - so just need to accept that there are a lot of additional chargers (amenities, parking)
Manager Response: Dear 509amy,  Thank you very much for the nice review! We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed our great location and that staff provided exceptional service during your stay. We hope that you will plan to holiday with us the next time you are in Laguna Beach! We thank you for staying with us!  Warm regards from all of us here at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  Judi Z., Front office

Summary: I did a wide search for hotels in Laguna Beach with the intention of finding a hotel with direct beach access. The Inn At Laguna Beach could not have been more perfect for our girls weekend away. Not only was there direct beach access, but the surrounding area is full of wonderful things to do.
Manager Response: Dear JuliaDlovestravel,  Thank you very much for your nice review. We are thrilled to hear that you had fun exploring the village of Laguna Beach, the shops, art and eateries. It is a unique and quaint town with a beautiful beach. It sounds like you had a great girls getaway weekend, we are glad that you chose our hotel. We look forward to your next visit!  Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: The Inn at Laguna is a gorgeous hotel in a prime location. We really enjoyed our stay mainly because of the proximity to the beach and local shops/restaurants. I felt like the front desk customer service could be a lot better as it was an awkward experience checking in. Which really is your first impression of a hotel. There was a guy working there that wouldn’t even make eye contact with us or help us, and clearly did not want to be bothered. There seemed to be a lot of confusion with checking in early. Our room was itty bitty and had a ton of road noise, and the pool and hot tub were closed for the duration of our stay. The staff member that really made our experience there much better was Joaquin, the bartender at the rooftop bar. He was friendly, gave us great tips on local
Manager Response: Dear HHawklet1,  We are sorry to hear about the actions of our staff during your recent stay with us, this is not indicative of the level of service we offer our guests. We have shared your post with management and staff. Thank you for your review and feedback, we greatly appreciate it. It is wonderful to hear that Joaquin was helpful and kind, helping to make your say memorable and fun. We do hope that you will plan to visit again we are confidant that we can offer a better check in experience! Thank you again for staying with us.  All the best,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: For starters the photos of this hotel are completely deceiving and total BS. The hotel's stratagy is a Bait & Switch.  We booked a "Village View" room, which in actuality was a parking lot view, as it was literally IN the parking lot. The room had one window that was only a sidewalk length away from someones vehicle. You could not even open the blinds in the tiny dark room without having every car that pulled in looking directly into your room as our particular room was on the first floor directly facing the only driveway into the hotel.   Our "parking lot view room" was $371.  We were offered upgrade to  an ocean facing room for an additional $500, that they were "willing" to discount  to "only" $250, because...here's the kicker, the Rooftop Deck which is the only worthwhile
Manager Response: Dear Khara S, Thank you for taking the time post your review of our hotel. We are taking steps to assure our guests have a wonderful experience with us and wish to return for another visit. We apologize that you were not satisfied with the location of your room and that your experience with us was not as you had envisioned. Thank you again for sharing your point of view, guest feedback is very important to us. We wish to always provide a relaxing and fun atmosphere for our guests.  Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Turns out VILLAGE rooms mean being in a room you feel is like a closet as windows are to the street and parking lot.  You could not have drapes open.  Fortunately I was able to upgrade for a pool view room .  Also there is NO restaurant... Las Brisas next door is excellent.   Amenity fee in winter is 30 dollars per night and parking is 40 per night.
Manager Response: Dear Linda P.  We are sorry to hear that things did not go as expected during your recent stay with us, but that you enjoyed your room  upgrade. We appreciate your feedback and point of view, it is very helpful. We are glad that you enjoyed Las Brisas and we hope that you had fun exploring the cute town of Laguna Beach.  Thanks again for staying with us.  Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: We live in the area and always visit Heisler park. My husband and I decided to have our wedding at the hotel and we loved the friendly staff and our stay. Our wedding went perfectly and was beautifully executed by Elisa and Ari, they were a pleasure to work with. We will always have fond memories of planning our wedding with Elisa, she is the best.   We look forward to visiting in the future for special occasions.   Thanks,  Arlene & Christ
Manager Response: Dear arlenedshak,  Thank you so much for choosing our hotel for your wedding! Our amazing team are always happy to provide the best experiences for all of our guests, we are thrilled that your special day was memorable and wonderful! All of us here at the Inn will look forward to your next visit.  Congratulations!   Judi Z., Front Office and The Inn Team

Summary: A very enjoyable stay at a fantastic location. The staff were very friendly and helpful and we hope to return next year. Happy hour at the terrace bar overlooking the beach was also a nice addition to our stay.
Manager Response: Dear Lagunaholiday2022,  Thanks so much! We look forward to your return! It is our pleasure to host wine hour nightly for our guests, we are glad that you enjoyed it. Thanks again for staying with us.  Cheers!   Judi Z. Front Office

Summary: Magical location, right on the ocean.  And so handy to Laguna Beach proper.  We loved falling asleep with the door ajar, to hear the waves breaking on the shore.  Blissful!  I cannot wait to see the renovations that are scheduled.  Hope to return then!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: We opened the door to hear the waves all night long!
Summary: This destination is about proximity to the water for me.  We literally were able to leave our sliding door open at night and hear the ocean.  It and the sunsets were amazing!   The rooms were very clean and the beds were comfortable.  The structure of the hotel...carpets, hallways, elevators, stairways...were older but that did not detract from the beauty of the location, or the comfort of our stay.  The staff were kind and helpful and treated us like long lost relatives.  We met several couples and a family there that are repeat visitors.  One of them had been coming back for 20 years!
Manager Response: Dear wendyc926,  We are thrilled to read your review. Our staff are always happy to know that our guests have had an amazing experience with us. We hope that you will become one of the guests that will visit with us often too! Thank you again for staying with us.  Warm regards,  Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary Heading: Best location best staff best hotel
Summary: This is the most wonderful hotel in Laguna Beach!  Great friendly helpful staff. Fantastic views from the rooftop terrace!  Always fun to meet other guests at the complimentary wine hour. Wonderful ocean front balcony rooms with the perfect table and chairs to enjoy your morning breakfast from one of the local restaurants that are in walking distance from this centrally located hotel.
Manager Response: Dear MikeModelS,  Thank you so much for the glowing review of our hotel. We are thrilled that we could provide you with a great experience. Our team are always happy to assist! Thanks for staying, we hope to have you visit again soon.  Warm regards,  Judi Z.

Summary Heading: Gorgeous little boutique hotel on the beach
Summary: We stayed here for the last two nights of a 12 day California trip and it was heavenly! Cozy hotel, friendly staff, incredible sunsets enjoyed from either the rooftop patio with complimentary glass of wine in hand or from our own private deck. I'm already planning my return trip here!
Manager Response: Dear amandaP696CG,  Thank you for your glowing review!. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our location, staff, and wonderful rooftop terrace at wine hour. We can't wait to have you back! Thank you again for taking the time to write your review and for choosing to stay with us.  Best, Tim

Summary: Great Location!!! Nice Hotel. Right at the heart of the main beach. Some staff could be a little more friendly and hospitable. Walking distance to restaurants and shops. Great place for couples who just want to chill by the beach. Good beach vibes.
Manager Response: Dear MikeF882022,  Thanks so much for your post. We appreciate your feedback as we take steps to ensure that our guests have an amazing and relaxing time while staying with us. Thank you very much for choosing our hotel, we hope to have you visit again sometime soon!  Warm regards, Judi Z.

Summary: Great location, safe, beautiful, amazing staff!  The AC/plumbing is loud, but that is the only "complaint".  We will definitely be back.  Did not need a rental car, close to everything you would need! Loved it!
Manager Response: Dear gp5pxpt4y2,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our location, safety, beautiful views, and amazing staff. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again in the future!   Best,  Tim

Summary: We enjoyed our stay. The location is prime and that is mostly what you are paying for. When we arrived, no one even opened the door for us with all of our luggage. There were not waters or snacks for purchase in the room. That is inconvenient in my opinion. All of the staff were very kind otherwise and I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Sdunnam,  We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed our wonderful location - the heart of downtown and main beach are always just steps away!   I am sad to hear that we were not able to meet your expectations upon arrival. I will speak with our leadership and team members about taking those meaningful steps in enhancing the stay of our guests.  Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback with us, and we hope to see you again in the future.  Best, Tim

Summary Heading: Great quaint location close to shops
Summary: I will definitely return to this area because there are tons of shops, restaurants and boutiques just steps away from the hotel. The parking is very tight, which may be normal for the area, but my Uber had to back out on the busy street to leave. There should be either a circular drive or a horseshoe in/out. The hotel is dated; however, I wasn't in the room much since I was on a business trip. Beware if you stay in room 315 which is where I stayed, you may be awaken by constant banging at 3a which I'm guessing is someone lifting weights in the workout room above. The walls are extremely thin which is great to hear the ocean waves if your room faces the beach.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Not worth going if only staying for 1 night
Summary: Rooms are not available until 4 pm and checkout is 11am next day. Purpose of booking this hotel is to enjoy beach but by the time the room is available, you get an hour max of sun time. Next morning, you can enjoy 1-2 more hours of the beach before needing to check out.
Manager Response: Dear daisies49,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your valued feedback. We are sorry to hear that our check-in and check-out hours did not meet the needs of your travel. We have developed a system at the hotel in hopes to solve this issue: when arriving early at the hotel, guests can pre-check in at the front desk which gives them access to our beach amenities and pool. Thank you again for choosing to stay with us, and we hope you give us another try in the future.   Best,  Tim

Summary Heading: Great get-a-way October vacation at the Inn at Laguna Beach
Summary: The Inn at Laguna Beach is by far the best location in Laguna Beach. High up on a cliff overlooking the beautiful beach, it is in an ideal location for shopping, restaurants, and taking in the many, many activities Laguna Beach has to offer. The Inn staff were very friendly and will help you in any way to make sure our stay was nothing but excellent. The cleaning staff is also so very friendly whenever you see them. We have been coming to the "INN" over the past 10 years, and plan on coming in the years ahead.  Thank You so very much,  Nick
Manager Response: Dear ncirilli,  Thank you Nick, for staying with us all these years, we really appreciate you! Our staff are thrilled to hear your kinds words. We are committed to ensuring each and every guest are able to have a relaxing and memorable time with us. We look forward to your next visit!  Warm regards,  Judi Z.

Summary Heading: It’s all about the location here
Summary: The location is wonderful! Great restaurants are all walking distance and the beach is literally just steps away. That being said, the place looks run down inside. The carpet in the public areas look old and dirty. Even their elevator has a directory that looks tattered and faded. How hard would it be for them to replace something that small?? I don’t understand. Do the owners not care at all how this place looks?? I was so scared to look at our room next, but thankfully our room looked better than the public areas and was very clean. We could here the neighbors upstairs walking, but besides that the noise level was not bad. Not sure if I would stay here again. If they did a renovation than I definitely would!
Manager Response: Dear StirrcrazyGal,  We are happy to hear you loved our location and took advantage of all the great shopping and restaurants in walking distance! I will be passing your feedback along to our team to lay a better foundation for the upkeep of our public areas. I am confident we will provide you with a much better stay should you choose to stay with us again in the future. Thank you for much for your time and feedback.  Best, Tim

Summary: What a delightful spot.  Right on the beach, clean with a great staff. The Inn is also very close to town, literally across the street and convenient to many great places to eat. the provided towels, chairs and umbrella we great for the beach and we simply held on to them until we checked out.  Everyone to whom we said hello seemed to have a smile on their face.  Definitely recommend an ocean view or partial ocean view room. We were on the first floor which is perfect for going to the beach.
Manager Response: Dear Jim H,  We are pleased to know that you had a wonderful time. Our truly friendly staff are always happy to assist! Thank you for staying with us. We look forward to seeing you soon here at the beach!  Warm regards,  Judi Z.

Summary: Visiting from Arizona for our fall break, we loved our ocean view room, just steps from Main Beach and all of our favorite shops and restaurants in Laguna. The beds are super cozy, the cookies each night are delicious and we love that we can bounce between pool/hot tub and beach in minutes.
Manager Response: Dear ADtheAD,  So much fun! We are glad that you had a great fall break. Please come to stay again the next time you are in Laguna Beach. Thank you for staying with us!  Sincerely,  Judi Z.

Summary: This is a lovely property and they seem to care about their guests.  Location, location, location:  the property is ON THE BEACH (one of the loveliest beaches on the west coast).  The pool is quiet, they provide beach accessories and they have a roof top bar in the evenings (1 pm to 7 pm in Sept 2022) for hotel guests only.  It is not the Montage or the Ritz, but it is a fraction of the cost of those places and you still have toes in the sand.  Property is clean and staff is friendly.  I have been going to Laguna beach for 30 years and this is now my go-to place for a get away on the beach at a reasonable cost (we used to stay at Hotel Laguna before it closed).  Not only is the Inn on the beach (did I already say that), but it is VERY close (like a block away) to MANY wonderful
Manager Response: none

Summary: Location couldn’t be better. Right on the beach, right in the heart of Laguna. Fantastic restaurants all within walking distance. Staff was extremely friendly and accommodating, including helping us move/upgrade rooms twice!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Would you like to pay this amount for your stay? Although it is an ocean front, there are many dog walks and tourists coming and going from early morning to late at night, so you cannot relax on the balcony. location fee only
Manager Response: Dear masahirohatanaka,  Thank you you for your valued feedback, glad to know you enjoyed the beautiful view from your room. We are sorry to hear that you were bothered by the street traffic of Laguna Beach. We hope you will come stay with us again, perhaps in the slower months of Laguna--around October or November,  Best,  Tim

Summary Heading: I was verbally abused by their front desk staff
Summary: Problems at checkin; we didn't get the room we booked. I had to almost walk out of the hotel until a nice man that was clearly a manager of some kind took over and and resolved the issue but we still didn't get the room that we booked.  First night were we there, our upstairs neighbors partied hard until 1:53am. I called the front desk three times, no answer, no calls back. Went to the front desk the next morning to ask if they could contact our neighbors above and maybe keep it down if they were going to do a repeat of the night before, but was verbally assaulted by their night person.  I was traumatized by the incident for the remained of our time there.  I asked for the manager to contact me, never received a call.  I went down to the front desk again and spoke to the shift
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Beeman,  Thank you for taking the time to post your review. We are sorry that your expectations were not met during your recent stay with us. We have had a manager address you directly. We hope this was to your satisfaction. We hope that you might give us another chance in the future. Thank you again for your feedback as we strive to delight our guests each time they visit.  Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: We were supposed to be going on a cruise to Cabo, however, the cruise was cancelled and we had to think of an alternative quickly. We hit the jackpot with this place!! It is truly a one stop vacation spot! The hotel is on the beach, and they supply everything you’ll need for the beach. The rooms are clean and air conditioned. There is guest parking on the premises. The employees have brought customer service to a new level and we appreciated all of it. We will definitely be coming back!!
Manager Response: Dear K4407CQtim,  We are thrilled to hear about your experience. It was our pleasure to have you stay with us. We are happy to know that your vacation was fun and relaxing. Thank you for staying with us for your special anniversary. We hope to see you again next year, if not before!  Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Best location in Laguna Beach, easy access to and from the beach, to walking, parking, shopping, eating, sightseeing.Nice rooftop bar area; coffee in lobby in the mornings; cookies and milk in the afternoons; fresh cold water available in the lobby.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here September 8 until September 11. The staff was amazingly accommodating. A special shout-out to Tim at the front desk. Kind and accommodating to ensure our visit was everything it could be. Great location for walking to everything. We will be back.
Manager Response: Dear reviewhelper1, Thank you for your kind review. We appreciate that you took the time to comment. Our beachfront location is amazing with beautiful views of Main Beach and Heisler Park, the tide pools and natural coastline. We are glad you enjoyed our amenities, such as wine hour, fresh cookies in the evenings and complimentary coffee in the rooms as well as coffee and tea service every morning, beach amenities are available  of our guests, sand chairs, umbrellas, towels. We look forward to having you stay again soon! Thank you again for staying with us.   Sincerely, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: The rooms are lovely and comfortable with beautiful ocean views and sounds of  the waves crashing all night long lulling you too sleep. It is easy to walk everywhere and enjoy Laguna! Wonderful front desk personnel!
Manager Response: Dear wendi a,  We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our beautiful ocean views and all of their lovely comforts. We thank you for you positive feedback and hope to see you some time in the future.  Cheers, Tim

Summary: It was a great stay! A beautiful view and friendly staff made for a great stay. They had everything we needed for the beach. Milk and cookies in the lobby in the afternoon was an added bonus.  It was also very clean!
Manager Response: Dear jmknowles212,  It is always a delight to hear that the mixture of ocean views and friendly staff made your stay exceptional. We appreciate that you took advantage of all the amenities that we offer as well! Thank you for feedback, and we hope to see you again in the future.  Best, Tim

Summary: We traveled from the Uk and had to move Hotels due to a bad choice! I found this beautiful hotel after a stroll on the beach and we stayed for 4 nights. The hotel smells gorgeous. We had a sea view room with balcony which was gorgeous. The hotel offers free wine on the roof terrace between 5&6 and cookies and milk in reception for the children early evening & coffee in the morning. The pool is small but gorgeous. Loved every minute!
Manager Response: Dear Phiuth,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel. We are thrilled to hear of your positive experience during your recent visit with us. Please plan to visit again the next time you are in Laguna Beach! Thank you for staying with us.  All the best,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: The hotel needs to update a lot of things: no place to buy water or a drink; no breakfast; the entrance needs to have a way in and out. not just in and turn around to go out. they have a beautiful view and a nice roof top. the roof top could serve drinks and not just wine in the evening. They need to make sure the water faucets are not leaking, and all other fixtures are working good. No MW  for the rooms. Pool looks good. They had a sun tan lotion but it was empty.   We had the bathroom faucet leak and was checked by their maintenance man but couldn't find the leak. then the shower nob was loose, but did get a shower. Our refrigerate was a wine cooler and after a day leaked and had to be replaced. At least the A/C worked during the hot days we were there.   Bed were very
Manager Response: Dear 970jdh,  Thank you very much for your feedback. We appreciate insight from our guests, it is very important to us. We are sorry to hear that your experience wasn't as you had expected this time. We hope that any issues that you had were met and resolved in a timely manner. Our Pacific Terrace bar features a wine hour for all of our guests, and during normal bar hours we do also serve cocktails, sodas and fruit juice. We are happy to know that you enjoyed our pool area on the sea side of our hotel. Thanks for staying with us, we hope that you might give us another chance in the future. Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: We loved staying at this hotel. The location was ideal for the beach and everything was within easy walking distance.  The room was spacious and we enjoyed being right by the swimming pool.  On the day of checkout, we were still watching the beach volleyball tournament. We were allowed to stay parked in the hotel garage which was wonderful!!  And we were allowed to use the swimming pool as well.  Great weekend trip!  We will go back!!
Manager Response: Dear SanDiegoTahoe,  Thank you very much! It was our pleasure to have you stay with us. We are glad that you were able to enjoy the volleyball and our pool area. We hope that you will plan to stay again soon.  All the best,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Great Place - have been there many times - Ron was standout employee on this trip - he is at the front and is extraordinarily helpful.  Wonderful location right on the water - getting more expensive though so we only  come about once/year.
Manager Response: Dear Charles U,  Thank you so much!! We will make sure to let him know your appreciation, he is a valuable, very thoughtful and kind member of our team. We are lucky to have him on our staff. We are happy to know that you enjoyed our beachfront location. We hope to see you soon!  All the best.  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: I love Inn at Laguna Beach!
Summary: Inn at Laguna is my top choice hotel in Laguna Beach. I've been staying here for my essential ocean getaway for 25 + years. It's perfect for getaways with my love and comfortable solo with my pup. I love the location, cleanliness and friendliness of the staff. and while prices have gone up everywhere this one is still manageable. I will be back!
Manager Response: Dear jamitaguchi,  Wow! Thank you for your glowing review, we appreciate it very much. We are ecstatic to know that we are your favorite go to hotel in Laguna Beach! We love our loyal return guests. Thank you again for staying with us over the years.  We'll be seeing you soon!  Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Nice boutique-style hotel right on the water in Laguna.  Nice dining within walking distance.   Do not get a room on the 3rd floor on the pool.  Too loud. Dogs are welcomed in the hotel and most places.  :)
Manager Response: Dear wewalkers4,  Thanks so much for taking the time to post your review. We hope that you enjoyed your stay and are planning to return soon.   Best regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: Great location and nice play to stay!
Summary: The Inn at Laguna Beach is a great place to stay.  The most important feature is the location.  You will be in the center of all there is to do in LB.  We stayed in a ground floor room with two beds and it was perfect for two friends visiting family.  The bathroom was laid out well.  It is not a large bathroom but it is perfectly good for what you need on vacation.  It is a clean, well run inn with nice touches like coffee, cookies and wine in the lobby at different times in the day.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  They offer towels and beach chairs and you can walk right down the stairs to the beach.  My only suggestion would be that they offer water bottles daily in the rooms.  That would have been great.  There is water in the lobby but only after 10:00 am.  This
Manager Response: Dear Explorer32656830708  Thank you for your informative and nice review. We are glad that you enjoyed your guest room as well and the amenities we offer at the hotel. Laguna Beach is a great place to explore and relax. We appreciate your suggestions and will make sure to let management know your thoughts. Thanks for staying with us.  Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: The location is outstanding. The staff was friendly and helpful. I will absolutely stay there again on my next trip to Laguna Beach. Beware of the local cab driver (Kareem). Without any forewarning he charged me $425 for transporting me from the hotel to LA International airport.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Best place to stay in Laguna Beach. great staff, location and positive vibes! Went to Pageant of the master's and we will be coming back next year for this spectacular event. Will always remember our patio and pool. So nice, R + K
Manager Response: Dear rmorga168391,  Thankyou! We are thrilled to know that you were delighted with our location and staff. We are looking forward to your visit next year (if not before!) for the art festivals. Thank you very much for staying with us.  Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Great location right on the beach but overpriced if you're expecting a luxury room - felt like a $300/night room instead of a $700 luxury room..... but you can't beat the location. Rooms/bathrooms are a bit outdated and could use a remodel/upgrade.  Shower curtain was stained like crazy, comforter had holes and rips in it and phone in room didn't even work.....But it was clean and staff is friendly!
Manager Response: Dear polishprincess25,  Thank you for your review. We apologize for the issues you experienced during your recent visit. This is not how we like to present our guest rooms. We hope that we were able to resolve these while you were here with us. Our friendly and knowledgeable staff are always happy to assist! Thank you for staying with us.  Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front office

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, but items went missing
Summary: Lovely hotel in a great location. We enjoyed the room, the town and the beach. The views of the Pacific Coast from the room terrace were spectacular. Sadly our experience was tarnished because items when missing from our childrens' room during our stay, we had to request extra bedding for the sofa bed and we were told we had to make it up ourselves.
Manager Response: Dear  JamesTaylorChesvegas,  We want to apologize for the service you had received regarding your sofa bed. We have brought this to staff's attention so that we may correct course. We had reached out to you personally regarding your lost and found item and how that may be shipped back to you. Please do not hesitate to reach out if we can assist further. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your guest room and our beach location. Thank you for staying with us.  Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front office.

Summary Heading: Great location, clean and safe property
Summary: We’ll definitely stay here again.  Room rates seem high but I’m Sure it’s just the area. Location is prime and so many great restaurants within walking distance as well as shopping ocean views and more
Manager Response: Dear sherrid05,  Thank you very much for the nice 5 star review of our hotel during your recent stay with us. We are super happy to know that you will plan another visit! Our guests really love that we are so close to town and located right on Main Beach. We hope to have you visit again soon!  Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Nice big guest room.  Large shower, separate sink.  Nicely decorated.  Beautiful plants and flowers decorate the grounds.  Terrific location right on the beach.  Friendly staff.  Underground parking for hotel guests.
Manager Response: Dear Jacquie N,  Thanks so much for your great review! We hope that you are already planning another trip to Laguna Beach. We hope that you will stay with us again.   All the best,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: The only problem we had was our room wasn't ready at the arrival time of 4pm even though we got there at 230 and checkout was supposed to be at 11 which is a very short time to spend in an expensive room, that's the only reason I rated this a 4 star instead of 5. The hotel is right in the middle of downtown and great access to everything. We had the best views, the room was clean and the bed very comfortable. The staff was friendly and accommodating. It was very worth it to stay here although there is no food at the hotel restaurants are close by and there is delivery.
Manager Response: Dear Nola A,  Thank you so much for your nice review of our hotel. We apologize that your guest room was not quite ready at 4 pm, sometimes there are unforeseen circumstanced that may cause a delay. We are happy to know that you enjoyed our location and friendly staff. We hope that you will stay with us again soon!  Warm  regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: I sprained my foot our first day. The Staff went way beyond good service to make sure I was taken care of. They also comped our 2nd night, which is basically unheard of.  This Inn is in a great location and would have been great I am sure of.
Manager Response: Dear Curious36116374485,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review of the Inn at Laguna Beach. We agree that our friendly staff are superb at their position, they will be happy to hear your kind words. We ae always happy to assist. Thank you again for staying with us, we are looking forward to your next visit.  Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: Beautiful location and comfortable room design. Neat and clean.
Summary: Very neat and clean, breath taking view. Ideal location. Friendly staff. Beautiful room design. I’m definitely recommend this hotel. The balcony is overlooking the ocean. Wonderful experience. Must go.
Manager Response: Dear yey717171,  Thanks so much for taking the time to post your review. We appreciate your kind words and are so glad to hear that you had a relaxing time with us. We hope to see you again soon at the beach! Thanks for staying!   All the best,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: We enjoyed every minute of our stay here. Friendly, helpful staff...quiet room...a lovely patio overlooking the water...walking-distance proximity to everything we wanted to do. We look forward to a return visit.
Manager Response: Dear stevenss919qe2022,  Thank you for your kind review. We appreciate that you took the time to comment. Our beachfront location is amazing with beautiful views of Main Beach and Heisler Park, the tide pools and natural coastline. We are glad you enjoyed the great eats in town and our amenities, such as wine hour, fresh cookies in the evenings and complimentary coffee in the rooms as well as coffee and tea service every morning. We look forward to having you stay again soon! Thank you again for staying with us.  Warm regards,  Jud Z., Front Office

Summary: This was our third stay at the Inn. We’ve tried other places but none compare when looking at location and amenities.  The staff is friendly and the accommodations are clean and well maintained. Will never go elsewhere again when visiting Laguna Beach!!
Manager Response: Dear kkelle882132, Thank you very much for your kind review. It is always wonderful to hear from our guests and we are beyond thrilled that we are your new go to beach destination. Our genuinely friendly staff are always happy to assist you. We cannot wait to have you visit with again!  Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Great hotel, location, and ambiance.  Security was a concern as we needed assistance in middle of night and had a strange man outside our door and no one at front desk.  The hotel was beautiful, clean, perfect location and a great rooftop happy hour for sure!  But the facility needs to staff better at night or at least close the front doors or require key access to hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have been coming to this hotel for nearly 20 years.  I even booked my daughter's wedding party which consisted of 5 rooms in 2016.  The last few years have been a major disappointment.  The prices continue to escalate and the so-called amenities decline every year.  The two things the hotel has to offer that are important to us are A/C and location, but we will probably look into booking elsewhere next year.  Both our television and phone were inoperable the first day and night.  A very nice and competent repairman was sent to us and he was able to fix both problems,  The luggage rack in the room collapsed completely as soon as I put my suitcase on it.  They did replace it.  There was apparently construction going on in the room over ours so we were awakened at 6 am to what
Manager Response: Dear Nomad29891  Thank you so much for taking the time to post your review. We appreciate your point of view and feedback. We are happy to know that we were able to solve the issues you experienced during your stay. Laguna Beach is a popular and beautiful destination in general prices are different than they were some years ago. We appreciate our return guests and it is our pleasure to have you and your family visit often. Our hotel staff thoroughly cleans and services each and every room daily when they are vacated and for our guests who are staying multiple nights. Thank you again for staying with us.   Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Excellent location, great views, cozy rooms. Just don't get anything on the 5th floor, the A/C units on the roof have terrible noise and vibrations through the night. The A/C inside the room is quite strong but in short bursts. These might be bearable for a cheap $50 motel but for the price of this room it is unacceptable.
Manager Response: Dear K0stasT2022,  We are sorry to hear that your stay was not as you expected this time. Thanks for letting us know. We will share your review and feedback with the correct teams to resolve. It is our goal  to provide a relaxing and comfortable stay for all of our guests. We hope that you might stay with us again in the future.   Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Our experience at the Inn at Laguna Beach was fantastic. The location can't be beat. We had an Oceanview room with a balcony and it was so nice sitting outside listening to the waves. The hotel is up on a cliff and you have to go down a few steps to get to the beach area but this was not an issue at all! The rooms are nothing special and I would say a little outdated. You are definitely paying for the hotels location here but it is so worth it. You can walk right out of the hotel and down the block to the main shops, restaurants and beach area. The hotel is smaller, about 70 rooms which also makes this property unique and special.  I wouldn't consider staying anywhere else if travelling to Laguna Beach!
Manager Response: Dear StacyPer,  We are more than thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our hotel and amazing location. Our staff are looking forward to your next visit. We are happy to know that you had a relaxing and fun time with us in Laguna Beach. Thank you again for staying with us.  Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Nothing wrong with the property other than the rates.  Location is incredible. Staff was pleasant. Rooms are in need of updates.  Amenities are negligible.  It’s a basic property. Felt gouged paying luxury rates for what it is.
Manager Response: Dear joberl304444,   Thanks so much for your post. We agree that our location is one of our guests favorite. The shops and restaurants just steps away and beautiful Main Beach and Heisler Park views from our hotel. We appreciate your feedback as we take steps to delight our guests with memorable and relaxing stays.   Thank you for staying with us,  All the best,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: Not what it used to be
Summary: I've stayed at this property for years. This will be my last. It has lost it's attention to detail that once set it apart. The rooms were outdated and smelly. The checkin experience was mediocre (staff on their phone etc) ... and although the view and location is hard to beat ... for $500+ a night, we expected a spectacular experience. Go for the location but don't expect a 4 start experience.
Manager Response: Dear spencer111111jack100,  We are terribly sorry to hear that you were disappointed in your recent stay with us. This is not indicative of our usually professional, friendly and knowledgeable staff. We appreciate your feedback and have passed this review on to the correct teams for review. We do have some exciting plans for our hotel in the works! We hope that you might give us another chance in the future.  All the best,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: Great location but property is worn!
Summary: Nice location, close to town within walking distance.  BUT or the price, I expected the room to be in better condition , paint, and property to be in better shape.  It is well worn and in need of a facelift. The price is more in line with higher end luxury resort properties nearby. Reality is the chipped paint on the balcony, and inside the room was a disappointment. Amenities charge at the end of the stay for amenities that were were told were complementary when there was a charge ($30. Per day) at the end of our stay.
Manager Response: Dear Gloria W,   We are sorry to hear that we had not met your expectations during your recent visit with us. We take guest feedback seriously and thank you for taking the time to post your review. We are making improvements so that we may delight each guest with a memorable and relaxing stay. Thank you again for staying with us.  Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front office

Summary Heading: All your paying for is location
Summary: The only good thing about this hotel is the location and the views. The rooms are very dated (mine even came with bugs) and the rooftop terrace wine hour is not as luxurious as it sounds (the terrace is small and crowded by so much furniture, the whole thing reads as very cheap).
Manager Response: Dear  KLLGGG,  We are sorry to hear that we had not met your expectations during your recent visit with us. We take guest feedback seriously and thank you for taking the time to post your review. We are making improvements so that we may delight each guest with a memorable and relaxing stay. Thank you again for staying with us.  Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: Memorable Hotel in Memorable Beach City
Summary: Wonderful, relaxing stay for a much-needed rest. Great location, pro staff, killer views! Lacks on-site dining and established bar but not an issue with so much so close for drinking and dining. Covered parking on-site at $40/night.  $30/day amenity fee required.
Manager Response: Dear wsk2715,   It is our goal to meet or exceed our guests expectations, providing then with a great stay. We are thrilled to know that we have met that mark with you during your recent visit with us. Thank you so much for staying with us.  Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Great location - with exits right to the beach and to the coastal walk, many restaurants and shops within 5 min walk. Pool and hot tub were nice. Staff was very friendly. Room was tiny with very low ceiling, lack of sound insulation (our teen had to listen to all the adult romantic stuff happening next door)  - definitely felt overpriced. Robes and binocular were nice touches though.  There was very strong rotten egg smell coming from the ocean in the mornings on 3 our of 4 nights we were there, - we didn't want to open the balcony. Hotel staff said it's from seaweeds, but it was definitely not from seaweeds. Later I found on the internet that it's happening on this particular stretch of the coast for several years already, and they don't know the source for sure. Tons of
Manager Response: Dear katie3105,  Thank you for posting your review. We are glad to know that you enjoyed our location and the quaint town of Laguna Beach. We have noticed some odor on a few days recently. We are sorry to hear that you experienced that during your stay with us. We have been told that it is related to the seaweed here on Main Beach which is a natural reserve, and at other places around the globe. Heisler Park is a beautiful walk and great place to view some amazing sunsets. Thank you again for your feedback, we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: There was old furniture with chunks of wood out of dresser.   The Towels were threadbare and thin The sliding screen did not work and  There was standing water on balcony The toilets need to be flushed several times to be effective
Manager Response: Dear  pepecoit,  We are sorry to hear that you were disappointed in your stay with us this time. We appreciate your feedback as we strive to provide an exceptional experience for each guest. Thank you for taking the time to post. We hope that you might give us another chance in the future.   Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front office

Summary: View and accommodations are very good. Price a little high but overall worth it. Within walking distance to most restaurants and shops. I would recommend the INN to others. And the chocolate cookies in the evening are great.
Manager Response: Dear 1ralphv,  Thank you so much for the nice recommendation. We look forward to your return soon!  Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: This hotel is in a great location but that is where the great ends. There is a horrible septic smell in hotel and in our room. And there was a group of people partying and were very loud at midnight. Called the front desk and was no answer had to leave message. Between the smell and noise we did not sleep! This is an expensive hotel and to be charged a resort fee is just irritating!
Manager Response: Dear barbaradR217TM,  We are very sorry to hear that your visit did not meet  expectations. We also noticed an odor for a brief time. We are located near Heisler Park, which is an Ecological Reserve where you can see the tidepools that have amazing sea life. Laguna Beach recently had some heavy surf churn up the seaweed all along the coast causing that event. We are sorry that was happening while you were here with us. Thank you for staying with us, we hope that you might plan another visit.  Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: Well Maintained, Updated, Beautiful Beach Hotel
Summary: Beautiful and fun!  Awesome location.  Well-maintained.  Friendly staff.  Nice pool.  Town close.  On the beach.  Interior corridors.  Safe.  Good sized room.  Easy parking.  Comfortable bed with adequate a/c.  Love this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear RBuky,  Thanks so much for the nice review. We are pleased to have had you visit the Inn at Laguna Beach. We hope that you will plan another stay sometime soon.  Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Easily the best location to stay when attending the Pageant of the Masters as it is an easy 11 minute walk from the hotel to the Pageant.  Hotel was very clean and staff were very friendly and helpful.  Amenities are nice and the room (ocean view) was clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Y6069MSedwards,  Thank you very much for staying with us! We hope that you will plan to visit for the art festivals next year, if not sooner! All the best,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: The location is amazing and the staff is friendly, but for over 3k a night a partial ocean view, a broken toilet, and a squealing refrigerator, as well as 2 fire alarms waking us and our 2 small children up after midnight forcing us to evacuate in the cold outside, was not worth it.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Best location in Laguna Beach! Very close to fabulous restaurants and great shopping. The street car is very convenient to get around Laguna.  Hotel is very clean and comfortable bed. It is time for an update as Decor needs a refresh.
Manager Response: Dear Nanathree,  Thank you for your nice review of the Inn at Laguna Beach! We are happy to know that you enjoyed the yummy eateries and quaint shops in town. We do have exciting plans underway for our hotel in the near future. We hope that you will plan to stay with  us again soon!  Sincerely,  Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: Loved location and proximity to festivals and restaurants.  Reviews online & being so close to the beach was a selling point. We plan to return. Celebrating our 53rd wedding anniversary! Staff was friendly & helpful. We enjoyed our room & the beautiful view ftom the bar.
Manager Response: Dear OLL63,  Thank you very much for allowing us to be a special part of your anniversary celebration.
