On behalf of all the staff here at the Inn at Laguna Beach, we hope to welcome you back soon. See you for your 54th!!   All the best!  Judi Z., Front Office and the Inn at Laguna Beach Team

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for a romantic weekend!
Summary: We stayed in an ocean view room for 2 nights. The room was spotless and well appointed, super comfortable. Easy to operate TV with good channel selection and lots of fluffy towels in the bathroom. Balcony felt very private. The ocean sounds were awesome!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Roof Top Bar Makes this place!
Summary: Joaquin was an outstanding bartender! He was welcoming, gave great suggestions for night life, and enhanced our experience! So grateful. The view is spectacular and  elevates the vibe of downtown Laguna!
Manager Response: Dear AG83travels,  Thank you so much for your recognition of our friendly and knowledgeable bartender Joaquin! We love to hear when our guests have had a fun and memorable time with us. We are thrilled to know that your experience was everything you expected and more! Thank you for staying with us.  Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: When booking make sure you are clear on exactly what type of room/view you are getting. Do not expect a boutique room. They are average rooms at the most.  Great location to the beach and dining. You are paying for location at this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear suntine22,  Thank you for posting your review. We appreciate your point of view. We are glad to know that you enjoyed our beach location and the great dining choices in the quaint town of Laguna Beach.    Best regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: We came early and asked for early checked in. We got a room early. All the staffs were very friendly and kind. Location was great. We could go anywhere by walking. Room was very clean.  Pool was very clean and big enough. It was perfect family vacation.
Manager Response: Dear 9fkt365ntc,  Thank you for the nice 5 star review. Our team strives to delight our guests every day. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your family vacation with us. We look forward to your return! Thank you again for staying with us.  Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Perfect Beachfront Stay in Laguna Beach. Gorgeous ocean views and nice ocean-side pool…all steps from Starbucks and the fun town. Also an easy walk to the gorgeous oceanfront path. Feels like a quaint boutique hotel.
Manager Response: Dear joneseve,  Thank you for taking the time to post your review. Our guests love walking along the sand at Main Beach and beautiful Heisler Park. We are glad that you took advantage of the cute town and yummy eateries there. Thank you again for staying with  us. We would love to have you visit again soon!  Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Beautiful views and rooms.  Great location.  But room rates are way too high for a facility with no restaurant, no room service and no exercise triality.  Have stayed at this property for twenty plus years, but am unlikely to do so in the future at these rates.
Manager Response: Dear Joseph K,  Thank you so much for your feedback. We will make sure to let management know your thoughts. We apologize that you were disappointed in your stay with us this time. We do have some exciting plans for our hotel in the near future that we think you will enjoy. We appreciate your loyalty through the years and are hoping you might come to see what we have in store. Thank you for staying with us.  Warm regards,  Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: ***Room #305 was Magnificent. It was a spacious room with amazing views in every coastal direction. We could see and hear the ocean. Great sunbathing from the deck.  Great location, Sushi and Starbucks across the street. Royal Hawaiian restaurant up the hill.
Manager Response: Dear OneDrChris,  Wow! Thank you for your wonderful review. We are ecstatic to know that you enjoyed your special celebration. Thank you for letting us help to make your day memorable. We look forward to many happy anniversary visits in the future.  All the best,  Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary Heading: great location but small incidents marred my stay
Summary: I booked a full ocean view room but the view was obstructed.  I was charged for my beer at the evening wine reception.  That was disappointing.  The water was shut off one afternoon during our stay and of course that was the afternoon we spent mostly at the hotel.  Sure these are all little things but my enjoyment was diminished
Manager Response: Dear 7ede1l4oys,  We are saddened to hear that things did not go as you had hoped during your stay with us this time. Your feedback is important to us, as we strive to improve guest experience moving forward. We hope that you might give us another chance in the future. Thank you for staying with us.  Sincerely,  Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary Heading: Great place to enjoy and delicious dinner
Summary: A great place of a live band internationally music, you chill, have dinner and listen to music while enjoying the weather. Thanks to Fatma and Eric.  Recommended to a couple and family.  We had grilled prawns and fried calamri.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was a perfect location close to everything and with awesome views. My family loves the whole experience definitely coming back. They have cookies and milk in the afternoon and located close to shops restaurants and most important the beach.
Manager Response: Dear blujul89,  It is wonderful to know that  you and your family enjoyed our location at the beach and fun amenities. It is our goal to provide guests with an amazing stay, we are glad that we met that expectation with you.  We hope that you will plan another visit soon.  All the best,  Judi Z. ,Front office

Summary: This was my second time staying at this hotel but the first time enjoying the rooftop bar and all the FUN! I had the best time because of Joaquin, the service he provided and the way he went above and beyond to make sure we were having fun! The hotel has fabulous water views and is a great location! But I would specifically just come back to sit at the rooftop bar and enjoy Joaquin's handcrafted cocktails!!
Manager Response: Dear ashleylX2395WM,  This is such a nice review, thank you for taking the time to post. We have let Joaquin know that he helped to make your 4th of July time with us so much fun! He is a great part of our team. On behalf of all of us here at the Inn at Laguna beach, we hope that you will stay with us again soon!  Sincerely,  Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: stayed for a night during a business trip.  Great room.  Sights and sounds of the beach and happenings down there were great.  Would stay again.  Free internet service worked fine for remote work.  I was able to pull video from work security system over the internet service with no problems.  Nice place to work for a day.
Manager Response: Dear  jofoobg,   Thanks for the nice 5 stars! We are glad that you had a chance to stay with us during your business trip. Great day at the office! We would love to have you come to visit again.  All the best,  Jud Z. ,Front Office

Summary Heading: Stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach
Summary: The location is great.  The road was noisy. The staff was very friendly, and helpful.  They put us on the 1st floor, which was too close to the walkways, and road.  We did ask to move and they moved us one floor up, which was a little better, but the front road was terrible.  We have never stayed in Laguna Beach, and probably would have paid more for a more quiet room.  But overall the stay was good. I would come back, just request a room 3rd floor or higher.
Manager Response: Dear  Michele N,  Thank you for reviewing the Inn at Laguna beach during your recent visit. We appreciate your point of view and are happy that we were able to accommodate your request for room location. We are happy to know that you are planning to return for another visit. We hope that you had fun in Laguna Beach. Thanks for staying with us!  Warm regards,   Judi Z., Front office

Summary: The staff at The Inn at Laguna Beach are to be commended for their exceptional customer service!  Whenever we needed something (fan not working, more coffee, water, connect to Netflix)  - it was taken care of within minutes.    The location is fabulous!  Right in the heart of Laguna Beach, next to the main beach.  Fun rooftop bar for wave watching.    Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear MARYFAYP,  Our team members are thrilled to see your post. We truly love our location at the beach and the opportunity to delight our guests every day. Thank you so much for staying with us. We appreciate your high recommendation!  Warm regards,   Judi Z. , Front Office

Summary: Perfect for families and romance - I parked my car and never got in it again until we checked out. We got to adjacent rooms facing the ocean. My daughter loved it my mother loved it and even our nanny said it was great. They let us check in early which was super helpful when my daughter was tired. I will return in a heartbeat
Manager Response: Dear alexasmithmd,  We really appreciate your nice review. We are thrilled to know that our location and team helped to make your stay amazing. Thank you for staying with us, we will see you soon at the beach! Warm regards,  Judi Z. Front Office

Summary Heading: Hotel did not honor the room I booked
Summary: We booked a poolside room and were given another room that was not poolside. It was not what we booked and they overbooked with other guest. I tried to ask them if they can at least upgrade me to something else and they said they had nothing left. I'm just disappointed they didn't at least offer a partial refund or give me another other options :(
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Top notch view and location, but overall lacking for the price.
Summary: Arrived early and was granted an early check in which I really appreciated. Staff was very kind and attentive for my arrival.   For the price of the room and the junk fees added this place simply doesn’t measure up.    These are prices I’ve paid with the Roman Colosseum out my window, or the Tower of London. On top of that there is no restaurant, not even a simple breakfast. There are restaurants within walking distance and Las Brisas was recommended by the front desk.  That turned out to be terrible food frankly.   We had room 305, one of the two large corner rooms.  I was disappointed that there was a small table and two chairs on the balcony. A lounge chair would seem to make sense, and I could see them on other balconies.    The room was fine, clean, and the bed was great.
Manager Response: Dear SherriR242,  We are sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your stay. We are appreciate your candid review and are actively making changes to ensure our guests have a delightful stay. Thank you again for your feedback.  Sincerely,   Judi Z.

Summary Heading: Great Location but when I was checked into the wrong room they staff wasn’t helpful.
Summary: Checked in and got checked into an already vacant room staff Upgrades only for one night and didn’t give us anything to help. It was very unfortunate as I loved the location. Also the bar was closed for a private even our whole stay.
Manager Response: Dear 13qeid16cd,  Thank you for taking the time to post your review. We are sad to hear that things did not go as you planned during your recent visit. We hope that you might reconsider us for a future stay.   Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Amazing hotel, incredible location and a very helpful staff! Close to town, Main Beach and Heisler Park. Lovely wine reception on the Pacific Terrace every evening. Umbrellas, chairs and towels available every day.
Manager Response: Dear donnakl2022,  Thank you very much for reviewing our hotel during your recent stay with us. This really says it all! Guests love our great location, conveniently just steps to all the shops and great eateries of Laguna and our beautiful beach. Thank you again for staying with us, we are glad you had a great time!  Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: My family home was damaged in a fire and we had to relocate for a bit. We had a great stay at the Inn, they were super accommodating. The front desk staff is super kind, and Joaquin the bartender was very friendly when I was by myself at the resort. I felt very welcome when I was worried about feeling awkward at wine hour by myself. The rooms are very clean, great view, great pool, all around a very positive experience!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Joaquin made our stay so mellow and great on the rooftop bar during the afternoon. Perfect atmosphere! Try his lemon drop martini. We arrived sooner than our room was ready,  so we decided to spend the time on the 4th floor patio.  Best views,  and best drinks!
Manager Response: Dear Expedition299818,  Thank you for your recognition of Joaquin's efforts and friendly demeanor at the Terrace Bar. We are delighted to know that he helped to make your stay memorable and relaxing. Thank you staying with us, we hope to have you stay again soon!  Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: This was my first experience with the Inn and I must say that it was delightful.  Cozy room with a gorgeous view.  Nice, friendly employees.  Many places to shop and dine.  Clean, clean, clean!  What more could one ask for?
Manager Response: Dear Barbara K,   We are pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay, the lovely view and our friendly staff. Thank you for staying with us. We hope that we may provide another wonderful experience the next time you visit!   All the best!  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: This hotel's online presence does not reflect what it offers in reality. Overpriced and shabby is the best way to describe this hotel. The location is the only thing it has going for itself. We had a 'pool room' which was more like a box by the pool. The room had a shabby carpet, the lowest toilet we had ever seen and was in bad need of a paint job. For $775 a night, it was a sham.
Manager Response: Dear fsterlacci,  Thank you for taking the time to post. We appreciate your point of view. We are sorry to hear that your experience was not what you expected this time. We hope that you might reconsider us for a future visit. Thank you very much for staying with us.  Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Lots of cute things about this hotel- good coffee, close to beach and easily accessible beach needs.  Very noisy though if not in beach view room. Staff was not very knowledgeable about some things- but reasonably helpful about dining.
Manager Response: Dear h9yms6jxb4  Thanks so much for your review. It was our pleasure to have you as our guest and on behalf of all of us at the Inn at Laguna Beach we hope to welcome you back soon. Thank you for staying with us.  Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front office

Summary: This place is old and sad. Don't expect anything other than the beach, not even a soda machine! If you want ANYTHING more than the beach, keep looking. Bring your won beach chairs and umbrella, their's are wanting. As for food and snacks, there are none.
Manager Response: Dear tucs0njp,  We are terribly sorry that you were disappointed in your stay with us. We are saddened to hear that you were not able to enjoy our amenities such as morning coffee and tea, fresh cookies in the evening and wine hour on the terrace. We apologize that you may not have known that we do have sodas and snacks available for our guests at our lobby front desk. Thank you for bringing the beach chairs to our attention. We appreciate your feedback. We hope that you might give us another chance in the future.   Sincerely,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: I can’t express enough how much I loved the location. Right on the beach and an easy walk to restaurants and stores. Some of the best things were the free beach towels, chairs, and umbrellas. Conveniently placed at the bottom of the stairs. Also the free wine hour was amazing. Perfect on the deck to enjoy the ocean view. The staff went over and above with any requests I had. The hotel is perfectly placed right by restaurants and stores so we didn’t have to drive the entire trip.  Absolutely loved this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Samantha54550,   We are ecstatic to know that your stay was so enjoyable, that our staff met or exceeded your expectations. Our location is one of our guests favorites, with the quaint village of Laguna Beach just steps away. The ocean waves and breeze are so relaxing. We hope that you are already planning another visit with us!  Warm regards,  Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary Heading: Unbeatable location.  Nice hotel - simply perfect
Summary: Everything magnificent.  Location, amenities for the beach, the pool, parking - everything.    We will be back.  Everything was clean, spacious, the staff was courteous …. Just a great couple days.   You can’t beat the location - you are RIGHT on the beach.
Manager Response: Dear Mikemobius,   Thank you very much for your wonderful review of our hotel. We are thrilled to know that you had a fun and remarkable vacation. Laguna Beach is a beautiful place, we couldn't agree more! Thank you for staying with us.  See you soon at the beach!  Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: The location is spectacular. The balcony view we had of the beach was incredible. Walking distance to almost everything we needed. We could walk right out of the hotel and to the scenic pathway and walk along the beach.
Manager Response: Dear Snsbrooks,  Thank you for your positive review of The Inn at Laguna Beach. Our hotel is located in the most ideal location - steps away from downtown Laguna Beach with the best bars, restaurants and endless shopping; and of course, right on Main Beach. We hope to welcome you back again soon!  Warm regards,  Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: it was a business trip. Very nice staff and clean room. The hotel is right on the beach front and the view on the ocean is beautiful .  The hotel is closed from Laguna Beach downtown where there are many restaurants and stores.
Manager Response: Dear valeriescotto,  Thank you very much for taking the time to post your nice 5 star review. We are happy to know that you enjoyed our beach location and friendly , knowledgeable team. We hope that your business trip went well and look forward to your return. Thank you for staying with us.  Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: The price was too high for the room that we got. A big disappointment was the room was advertised as a full of the ocean, yet the room view is sadly obstructed on one side and does not provide a full ocean view. Change the label to say 3/3 ocean view room, Full view label is misleading.
Manager Response: Dear asifmajeedk2022,  Thank you for your post. We value your point of view and apologize that you were disappointed with the view from your guest room. We will share your review with management. We hope that you enjoyed our rooftop terrace as well as our other amenities during you stay.  Thank you for staying with us.  Sincerely,  Judi Z. Front Office

Summary Heading: Great location, very expensive for an older property
Summary: I''ve stayed here before. Great location though overpriced. Older property with difficult parking. Chainsaws outside my oceanfront balcony in the early morning ruined it. For that price, an unusable balcony with noise and tree debris is unacceptable.
Manager Response: Dear 947fred,  We are sorry to hear that your stay was not as you expected this time. We hope that we were able to resolve the issue that you experienced during your stay. Please reach out to us directly and we will be more than happy to assist. We are glad that you enjoyed our pretty location. Thank you for staying with us!  Sincerely,  Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: Recently traveled to the Laguna Beach area for a wedding. I must say the location of the Inn at Laguna Beach is in a wonderful spot. Just a short walk to shops, restaurants & the beach. Check in was quick and easy, the beds were extremely comfortable and everyone at the front desk was extremely nice and helpful. Overall we had a very enjoyable stay.  The only two negatives I have were 1.) the $40/night parking charge seems a bit steep. It would be nice if it were included seeing as a standard room went for $375 per night. And 2.) on the same note regarding the $375/night price I really shouldn't have seen two tears in the carpet and a crack in the sink. For that money the rooms should be spotless. Certain parts of the hotel definitely could use some updating. Our room being one
Manager Response: Dear Zez25,  Thank you for your review of the Inn at Laguna Beach. We are very happy to hear that your stay was an enjoyable one. We apologize that your guest room was not as it should have been, Thank you for bringing that to our attention. We hope that you will plan to visit again in the future. Thank you for staying with us.  Sincerely,  Judi Z. ,Front office

Summary: Small rooms. Did I say small rooms. Expensive. No gym. Nice wine happy hour on the roof top deck. Staff were wonderful. Terrific location. Just overpriced. I guess that's Laguna Beach for you. Beware. Management sells the roof top bar to events so it may not be available for you yet they still charge $30 "amenity fee". Just the usual hotel rip off.
Manager Response: Dear Codmug,   Thank you for reviewing the Inn at Laguna Beach. Your point of view is important to us. We are a boutique hotel perched above Main Beach. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our location and staff friendliness. While the Pacific Terrace and Room are sometimes available for private events, our amenities, such as the wine hour, beach chairs, umbrellas and toys plus cookies and milk in the evening, coffee available in room and lobby every morning are available for all guests. We hope that you were able to enjoy the cocktail bar on lobby level during your stay. We apologize that the rooftop area was closed during your visit with us. We hope that you might stay again another time.  Sincerely,  Judi Z.

Summary: We came here for one night and had so much fun. Our bartender Joaquin was super friendly and helpful. He was like our secret cheat code to having the most fun possible. Find him and protect him at all costs.
Manager Response: Dear HolyTaylorBreezy,  Thank you very much for the nice review. We are thrilled that we were able to be a part of your amazing stay! On behalf of all of us here at the Inn, we hope that you will plan another visit soon!  All the best,  Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: Had a great time over the weekend celebrating a beautiful couples wedding. From the property to the gorgeous view over looking Main Beach and the coastline, hard to find a better back drop for tying the knot. The staff was great and wanted to give a shout out to Elisa and the bar tender Joaquin, who kept the drinks coming. Great hospitality all around!
Manager Response: Dear rvph949,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review of the Inn at Laguna Beach. We are always happy to hear when our guests have had an amazing time with us. The views from our beachfront hotel are beautiful. We agree that our friendly staff are superb at their position, they will be happy to hear your kind words. We hope that you will have a chance to sty with us again soon!  Warm regards  Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: This hotel is in a great location.  It is a bit pricey.  It does not have a restaurant, though there are many great restaurants within walking distance.  My only complaint is the lack of a destination charge port for an electric vehicle
Manager Response: Dear SanDiegotraveler_8,  Thanks so much for posting your review. We appreciate your feedback and will let our team know. We hope that you had a relaxing time here in Laguna Beach and will plan to stay again soon. All the best,  Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: My husband and I just stayed for 4 nights and loved loved the location and views from the Inn at Laguna! The rooms could be updated and are a bit small but we spent so much time on the patio or around the hotel (beach, terrace, etc.) that it didn’t make that much of a difference for us. We wish we would have stayed in one of the beach side rooms bc the views from the hotel are amazing!
Manager Response: Dear mlninemire,  Thanks so much for staying with us. Laguna Beach is a beautiful place to relax and explore. We hope that you are already planning a return trip!  Warm regards,   Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary Heading: February stay is not as quiet or less crowed as you would expect
Summary: It’s been a while so we decided to make a quick trip to Inn at Laguna Beach hotel. Having received a rather good price for an “Ocean View” room, we decided to go ahead and upgrade. We also went with the two queen beds just for a little different perspective. Just for information, our reservation (made months in advance) were for Monday through Wednesday checking out Thursday in February 2022.  Check-in was typical for this hotel, attempting to check-in at 2PM, finally getting assigned a room closer to 3PM (official check-in time is 4PM).  Parking was rather crowded for a Mon-Wed stay so our concerns started in our minds quickly. This hotel has 3 entrances to the parking with the first being open air with just a few spots and a couple of handicapped spots. The 2nd and 3rd are
Manager Response: Dear Nativecal,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that your stay was not as expected this time. Our Pacific View Terrace area is available for events although we do not offer it for private events every day. We apologize that it was not available for you those evenings. You are correct in that Laguna Beach is a lively  place year round. We hope that you might plan another stay with us.  Sincerely,  Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: We spent our 42nd wedding anniversary at The Inn At Laguna and it was absolutely fabulous. Our room was an ocean view top floor and with the perfect weather we could clearly see Catalina and San Clemente Islands. We had a fantastic experience watching the sunset at the Rooftop Terrace Happy Hour, with our host 'Joaquin', who made us feel warmly welcomed and kept our wine glasses full.....as we watched the incredible sunset. 'Joaquin' loves his job and it shows, it was a highlight of our experience in Laguna Beach!
Manager Response: Dear LegacyPilot  It is great to hear that our Bar Host, Joaquin helped to make your stay so memorable and fun. Sounds like the weather was wonderful for your anniversary celebration. Our Laguna Beach sunsets can be amazing! We look forward to your next visit!  All the best, Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: my stay at the inn laguna was great overall, and i loved coming back here due to my previous visit. i had a great ocean view my first time, but sadly my second time around was not so lucky. the partial ocean view room i booked had no view at all unless i stuck my head out the balcony and made a 90 degree turn for a far away mostly blocked ocean view. hotel was clean, and i love the location. easy walk to everywhere and to the beach!
Manager Response: Dear ll120694,  Thank you for staying! We are glad that you had a great stay with us. We are sorry that you were not as pleased with the partial view room this time. We hope that you will plan a return visit. See you soon at the beach!  Best regards,  Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: Excellent location. Walkable to town, dining, beach, shopping, coffee. Easy access to beach and Park walkway connects from hotel. Do not miss the overlooks on the paved walkway- we wish we would have found it sooner in our stay and visited the tide pools at low tide. We had a king ocean view room with a great view, comfortable bed, and could hear the waves crashing through the screened French doors from inside of the room. While areas of the property are "dated" they are well kept and the rooms are updated. We are still talking about the great time we had and would absolutely stay here again if in the area. The only down fall is the parking fee of $40/night - but It seems this is typical to the area, and having covered garage Parking in a busy area is a plus.
Manager Response: Dear Patrick H,  We really appreciate your amazing review of our hotel. It is so amazing to hear that you enjoyed our great location, and taking in all the beautiful sights and sounds of Laguna Beach. We always love to hear from our guests and appreciate your point of view regarding parking. It is true that parking in Laguna Beach is a bit of a premium and we are glad that you found our parking areas ample and convenient. Please plan to visit again soon!  All the best,  Judi Z. Front Office

Summary: The view was great the rest of the hotel was OK nothing special.  We were with another couple both of us were disapointed in our rooms. This was our first trip since Covid 19 and we were a little disappointed. The hotel is average.
Manager Response: Dear 566benjamind,  Thank you for taking the time to post your review. We are sad to hear that you were disappointed with your rooms this time. We have many different room types and locations at our hotel. Please reach out to us directly, if we may assist you further or help with your next stay with us. We are glad to know that you enjoyed our amazing views and location.  Thank you again for staying with us. Sincerely,  Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: Everything was great! The only thing I would change would be to stay in a waterfront room with more natural light in a more private location. Other than that everything was great! The room was nice and clean, and the service was great! The location is absolutely spectacular. We would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Dear alexchoffman,  Thanks so much for posting your nice review. We are thrilled to hear that you found our professional and friendly staff awesome. It is good to know that you will be planning a return trip soon! Thank you for staying with us.  All the best,  Jud Zavala, Front Office

Summary Heading: Nice place, ask for Ocean View
Summary: Great location, clean, nice rooms, definitely worth getting ocean view.   Rating down mainly because 1)  cancellation fee timeframe wasn't as flexible as most bookings & checkout at 11 with no bathroom/shower facilities at pool was a bummer.
Manager Response: Dear girossma,  Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your guest room and our beach front location. Thanks so much for staying with us. Please visit again soon!  Warm regards,  Jud Zavala, Front Office

Summary: What a magical day, night, and morning - we stayed for a day as we were passing through driving the Pacific Coast Hwy.  It was so worth the splurge of funds to enjoy this time at the Inn at Laguna Beach!
Manager Response: Dear jimweaver2020,  Thank you so much for your nice words. We agree that Laguna Beach is a gem along the California coast. We are so glad to know that your time with us was special. We hope to have you visit again soon. Warm regards, Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: Nice hotel. A bit noisy depending on where your room is located. There was a balcony outside our door but when we asked for a couple of chairs, they said no. Our cable was out for 2 days off and on. They gave us 2 comp drink cards for our trouble. I did not feel that was adequate. The location at main beach is absolutely wonderful! It'd be nice if they offered some sort of breakfast besides just coffee.
Manager Response: Dear Deb99203,  Thank you vey much for posting your review. We apologize for the cable outage and hope you enjoyed the TV once the work was completed. We were able to return two nights amenity fee as a way to apologize. The balcony reserved for our Sunset Vista Suite was right next to your guest room, we are sorry that we were not able to offer you seating there. We hope that you will plan to stay the next time you are in Laguna Beach. Thank you again for staying with us.  Warm regards,  Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: Spent the weekend here on a girls trip. It was AMAZING! We loved every second of it. We had a poolside room, which was very nice! This hotel is in an amazing location and has the most amazing views from the rooftop terrace! I will for sure be coming back.
Manager Response: Dear kendriedominguez,   We are so thrilled to hear about the wonderful time you had with us on your girls getaway. Thank you very much for staying with us. We can't wait to welcome you back for another fun trip.  Warm regards,  Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary Heading: Stay Here to get Ripped Off
Summary: After renting out a large sun of rooms for the hotel, we were told the only way to get an early check in for ONE ROOM was to pay a $200 upgrade. We asked the front desk if they had water and they gave us three without telling us we’d be charged an additional $38.79 for the 3 bottles of water. Would never recommend. Rooms are tiny and the elevator was being worked on the entire time.
Manager Response: Dear  Guest9999999,  Thank you for taking the time to post. We apologize any failure to mention our mini bar waters pricing during your recent say with us. As a courtesy we were able to refund that to you. The wedding block planner had allocated a prioritized list of early arrivals with your group, to which we were able to accommodate as many as we could. We only wanted to offer an upgrade option from village view to an ocean view room as that was the only room type option available for check-in at that time. We try to do our best to honor early check-in requests and apologize that with such a large group all needing to get in their rooms early for the wedding that it was a challenge to get you in the room at the time you were hoping for. Thank you again for staying with us. Sincerely,  Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: Location on main beach a plus, but the pool deck is not inviting, nor the 5th floor deck accessible the entire time we were there. So given the resort & parking fees which are steep, this is not a good value.
Manager Response: Dear Desert-2-Coast,  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our beautiful location. We appreciate your feedback as we move to improve guests experience.  It is our goal that all guests have a relaxing and memorable stay. We apologize that the Pacific Terrace area was booked for a private event during your time with us. We hope that you might reserve a stay with us again. Thanks so much for taking the time to post. Sincerely,  Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary Heading: Most convenient location in Laguna Beach
Summary: Have stayed here multiple times I’ve the past 20 years and you can’t beat the walking convenience to all Laguna Beach has to offer. The staff is friendly and helpful but the facility is getting a little worn / tired. All in all a decent value given today’s prices for a Laguna Beach getaway.
Manager Response: Dear 530markd,   We love to hear from our return guests. Thank you for your kind words and helpful feedback. We do have some exciting plans for our hotel in the future. We hope that you will continue to visit often and see what is in store! See you soon at the beach.  Best regards,  Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: Nice place overall but it would be better if they didn’t charge such a steep parking rate and amenities fee which together add up to nearly half of the one night rate we paid. I would consider this place again because of the location but will definitely look at other places with equally good locations next time
Manager Response: Dear  richcesarini,  We appreciate your feedback. Our amenity and parking fees are posted on each website where you can book a reservation to stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach. Our guests can enjoy amenities such as nightly wine hour cookies and milk in the evenings and fresh coffee and tea in the mornings. We are happy to know that you enjoyed our great location and hope that you will plan to visit again. Thanks again for staying with us. Warm regards,  Judi Zavala, Front Office  .

Summary: We stayed here for a few nights in Feb 2022. First time exploring this coast and Laguna looked like a good spot to camp out for a bit. The Inn here is gorgeous and the views from the outside bar area on the 4th floor are stunning. The beach is literally steps away and there are two basketball courts and a boardwalk right here also. This was our favorite place we stayed on this trip and I seriously did not want to leave. The hotel staff was great and handled a minor issue with our room with speed and class. Highly recommended, hope to return here someday.
Manager Response: Dear  kevinwM7388AF,  We are very happy to hear about your wonderful stay with us. Thank you so much for your great review of our hotel. We are always happy to hear when our guests have had an amazing time. We agree that our friendly staff are superb at their position, they will be happy to hear your kind words. Thank you again for staying with us, we are looking forward to your next visit. Warm regards,  Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary Heading: great location, tired property, very expensive
Summary: its a great location, easy walking distance to a number of restaurants and shops. however, the physical condition of the property is tired; clearly hasnt been renovated for years. they used to provide a basket of breakfast items with coffee delivered to the rooom.  thats gone. With all of the extra charges like 'resort  fee' (really?) and parking fees,  its very expensive.
Manager Response: Dear bruceseattle,   Thank you very much for your post. We appreciate your point of view. At this time our breakfast services are still temporarily suspended. We do however offer amenities for our guests such as the lovely wine hour on our beautiful view terrace, fresh baked cookies in the evening, coffee and tea in the morning along with beach chairs, towels and umbrellas. There are some exiting plans in future for our hotel. We are glad to know that you enjoyed our amazing location. Thank you for staying with us.  Sincerely,  Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: This was a quick 2 day trip to the beach!  Beautiful location!  Quick access to beach , places to dine and shop!  Main beach is next to hotel!  So much happiness!  Great for families!  I would highly recommend this hotel !    We were very satisfied overall!!
Manager Response: Dear aguillory2007,  We are pleased to know that you and your family had a wonderful experience with us. Thank you for your nice review. We will see you again soon at the beach! Warm regards,  Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: Beautiful accommodations, wonderful staff, great views.  In walking distance of many restaurants and shops.  Also within driving distance of many popular hot spots, shopping and dining.  The view from the ocean front are spectacular!
Manager Response: Dear mlobel568932,  Thank you so much for your glowing review of our hotel during your recent stay with us. Our friendly staff are always happy to know that our guests have had a memorable and relaxing stay. We are glad that you enjoyed our beautiful views. We hope that you are planning to visit again soon.  See you soon at the beach! Best regards,  Judi Z.

Summary: Stayed here last weekend. Nice location but way over-priced. Bathroom was small, outdated, with a big scratch mark on the door. The AC was so loud we felt like we were sleeping aboard a jet liner. The balcony in our room was a narrow strip of concrete wide enough to stand on. It felt precarious. The bed was comfortable and view was beautiful though. No restaurant on site. Free wine bar but server was surly and unfriendly. The best thing about this hotel is the location but it’s way too expensive for what you get. We had to pay an additional $80 for parking for 2 nights. We won’t be booking this place again.
Manager Response: Dear bayareac0uple,  Thank you for posting your review. We are sorry to hear about the concerns you had during your stay at our hotel. We have shared your post with our teams. The Top Floor ocean view king bed rooms feature a step out Juliette style balcony with amazing views, while the guest rooms described as Ocean View Balcony do feature a larger balcony plus table and two chairs. We hope that you might consider another stay in the future. Thank you again for staying with us.  Sincerely, Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: With the seaside right out the door, the cleanliness, the staff helpfulness, this is the place to stay. The wine hour on the terrace was fantastic.  The cookies and milk an added bonus.  The staff accommodated our every request.
Manager Response: Dear stephtrefzger,  Wow! We are ecstatic to hear that we delighted you at every level during your say with us! Thank you very much for staying with us. See you soon at the beach! Warm regards, Jud Z. ,Front Office

Summary: I had a memorable time staying at the Inn at Laguna Beach. I came for a wedding and enjoyed the hotel facilities, the room and venue on the 4rth floor (the view was spectacular). Thank you for a wonderful stay!
Manager Response: Dear Vina_805,   Thank you for your nice review. We are thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed our rooftop terrace and views there. We will look forward to having you visit again soon.  All the best  Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: The hotel parking fee was a surprise after booking… The room itself was just a bit average for its price.  The hotel was in a fantastic location and had multiple places to dine at within walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear Getaway515467,  Thanks for taking the time to post! Parking is a bit of a premium in all of Laguna Beach. We have that information listed on all of the websites where you can reserve a room with us. Guests agree that our amazing location is great for finding yummy eateries and shops in town and of course walking on the beach! We hope you will plan another visit with us soon.  All the best, Judi Z.

Summary Heading: I didn’t hate it, but I certainly didn’t love it
Summary: It’s basically an extremely overpriced motel 6 with comfy  beds and a decent ocean view. The balcony, carpet and the bathrooms need some love and care. They are very run down.    The bar experience was wonderful, the staff was fantastic and helpful and the cookies and lemon water were a great touch. The common areas are also gorgeous.
Manager Response: Dear LoveTravel366710,  Thanks so much for your review. We do have some exciting plans for our hotel in the near future. We are thrilled to hear that you found our staff, amenities and bar outstanding. We hope that you are already planning a return visit. Thank you again for staying with us. Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: Inn at Laguna is the hidden gem of Laguna Beach
Summary: My family trip  was very last minute and much needed after lock downs and Covid restrictions. My 16-year-old son and I needed to get away from Los Angeles and Laguna Beach has always been a favorite destination of mine. I decided to surprise him for a week right before the Fourth of July to get away and feel normal again, and the Inn at  Laguna Beach was the absolute best choice ever. He loves basketball and I actually had no idea we were right next to the infamous basketball courts on the beach. Our stay started with the most amazing service from the moment we checked in… to the moment we left.  The hotel has a boutique vibe with so much charm  even as you’re staring at the ocean all day long. The staff and the nightly home baked cookies made us feel like we’re were right at
Manager Response: Dear stephnidess, Thank you so much for your wonderful review of the Inn at Laguna Beach. We are always happy to hear when our guests have had an amazing time with us. We are glad to hear that your son was super thrilled with the basketball courts. What an amazing place to shoot some hoops! The views from our beachfront hotel are beautiful. We agree that our friendly staff are superb at their position, they will be happy to hear your kind words. Thank you again for staying with us, we are looking forward to your next visit.   See you soon at the beach, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Excellent location.  Beautiful views of the ocean. Loved the walkway that started from the hotel.  It really was well maintained and it gave a wonderful view of beautiful Laguna Beach.  The coffee and cucumber water in the lobby was very much appreciated.
Manager Response: Dear evadempster,   Thank you for reviewing our hotel. We agree that our location is one of the prettiest in Laguna Beach. Heisler Park views are stunning, especially the sunsets. We are happy to hear that you had a relaxing and  enjoyable time with us. Thanks for staying, we hope to see you again soon.  Warm regards,  Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: I had a horrible stay at this hotel.  I knew it would be bad the moment I arrived and the rude front desk guy lied to me and told me my room was not ready yet, even thought it was 345!  check in is at 4pm and you are telling me houskeeping is still cleaning a room that is supposed to be ready? Then when I got to room it was outdated, old, dingy and looked like 1970s.  Then I went outside and there was a homeless man sleeping in front of the door to the hotel  i had to step over to enter the hotel.  the front desk are rude and offer to help at all.  plus thin walls...you can hear eveyrthing
Manager Response: Dear I4446KYjonb,  We are sorry to hear that your experience was not what you expected this time. Our check in time is 4 pm. Our cleaning staff are very thorough as we follow protocols in place for cleanliness, guest safety and comfort, this does take time, they work throughout the hotel until later in the evening. We had looked over our security cameras and not seen what you had described at the front door of our hotel at any time.  We apologize if our usually friendly and helpful staff were not on point with you during your stay. Please reach out if you wish to provide more details regarding your stay. Sincerely,  Judi Z.

Summary: Excellent location and lovely staff. Would not recommend staying on 1st floor. Would go back but would ask for a room higher up. Very noisy both in the corridor outside (due to tiled floors) and from the rooms upstairs. Also felt the bathroom facilities were not great. Toilet and shower crowded into a very small space together.
Manager Response: Dear Ms07Pod,  Thank you for reviewing our hotel during your recent stay with us. We appreciate all guest feedback as we move forward. We are always looking for ways we may help our guests to have an even better experience.  We are happy to hear that our staff and location were awesome. We hope you will plan a return trip to Laguna Beach and stay with us again soon. Warm regards, Judi Z.

Summary: Upon checking in the staff member would not give me the room key because it wasn’t 4:00, instead suggesting I come back at 4:00 to retrieve the room key. When I came back at 4:00 there was several other guests in the lobby, trying to get their room keys as well.  In addition to this issue, she charged my card $266, when your own website emailed me the confirmation cost of $184. When I asked about the discrepancy she showed me a form listing charges like towels and parking for the extra fees. I agreed to it to avoid any further conflict. Once I obtained the room key and proceeded to my room I realized it was a very small room in the parking lot. A room of this size facing cars should not cost $226! After going to bed the guests in the room above me were walking back and forth, it
Manager Response: Dear kittycat508,  We are terribly sorry to hear that your stay with us was not as you expected this time. Check in at our hotel is 4pm. We do provide our guests their room keys as soon as the room is available for them. The amenity fee information is posted on each web site, where you can book a room at The Inn at Laguna Beach, to make sure our guests have right rate information. The amenity fee includes tea and coffee to start your day, complimentary wine hour, fresh baked cookies before bedtime, all kinds of beach amenities such as beach towels, chairs, umbrellas, body boards, kid’s toys and volleyballs.  We were able to accommodate a new room for you. We apologize for the disruption.  We hope you might plan another visit in the future. Sincerely, Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: A very clean and comfortable room in a premium location.  Park your car when you arrive and walk everywhere.  There was free wine on the terrace at sunset and free cookies at night. We will definitely stay here again.  PS. there is a special promotion for California Residents if you book on their website.
Manager Response: Dear  Y7203GLnancyk,  Thank you for the very nice review.  Our friendly staff really enjoy providing the wine hour and fresh baked cookies for our guests as well as the coffee and tea set up in the lobby every morning. It is great to know that you will plan another trip to our hotel soon! Thanks again for staying with us. Best regards, Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: The Inn at Laguna Beach was amazing! It was everything and more than I could not have asked for in every aspect. The location, room, and view were incredible. Amazing restaurants in walking distance. Beautiful walkway along the coast right out your door. Truly can not wait to return!
Manager Response: Dear Susan M,  Thank you very much for staying with us. We are always happy to hear when our guests have had a delightful time and thrilled that your stay with us was amazing. We cant wait to welcome you back again soon! Warm regards  Judi Z. , Front Office

Summary: Inn at Laguna is a cute little California hotel with wonderful views and beach access.  It's centrally located in Laguna with an easy walk to most shops and retaurants.  Love the location for sure and will make this a regular place that I stay when in Laguna.
Manager Response: Dear BLS2022,  We are so happy to hear that you had an enjoyable time with us and also exploring beautiful Laguna Beach. We look forward to your next visit. All the best, Judi Z. Front Office

Summary Heading: Not as good as last year
Summary: Lots of noise from upstairs patio. Hotel room door didn’t close properly. Too noisy for our anniversary. In formed management who offered us an upgrade to a suite for an additional charge of $200 per night.  We stayed for 6 nights.  Very disappointed!
Manager Response: Dear  Lisa P,  We are saddened to hear that your stay with us this time was not as you had expected.  Thank you posting your review. We hope that you will plan another visit in the future.  Sincerely, Judi Z. Front Office

Summary: This hotel is conveniently located steps from the ocean and has a warm boutique style that makes you feel at home.  I enjoyed the nearby dining options including Las Brisas Restaurant with exceptional customer service, foods and drinks.
Manager Response: Dear monicael2022,  Thank you for the nice review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Please plan to return soon! Warm regards, Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: We used to live in Laguna so we'd see this hotel walking all of the time. The location is incredible. Walking out the door onto Heisler Park was amazing! Also right by the beach, starbucks and all of our favorite restaurants. It'll be hard to stay anywhere else after our experience.  We did not book an ocean view room and honestly, we didn't need to because we spent every second outside. We loved that the hotel provides beach umbrellas and beach chairs. Did not expect this! The room is basic but we didn't need anything more and the staff was always so kind.
Manager Response: Dear JessLarsen,  Thank you very much for staying with us. We agree that our location and views are truly beautiful. We are glad to hear that your Laguna Beach experience was all that you had hoped for! See you soon again, at the beach! Sincerely,  Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: great location, easy access, had a nice room with sea view. Lacking water bottles, shower head so low you can't rinse your hair out, toilet seat loose ... these are small things that should be fixed at that price you pay.
Manager Response: Dear bbugge852039,  Thank you so much for sharing your thoughts. We are happy to hear guest feedback and have made sure to let our teams know so that we may correct course. We strive to delight our guests and to provide a fun and relaxing time while visiting our hotel. We are glad to know you enjoyed your room view. Please visit again soon.  All the best, Judi Z.

Summary: Laguna beach is wonderful and Inn at Laguna Beach has amazing views, perfect location to walk to the beach, restaurants, cafes and shops. The staff is super friendly and go above and beyond. I highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear beatrizpompe,  We really appreciate your wonderful review! Thanks for posting. On behalf of our entire staff, we hope that you will plan to return soon! Thanks again for staying with us. All the best, Judi Zavala, Front  Office

Summary: The room was not as advertised on the hotel website. The website shows pictures of a large room (Ocean View King Balcony) with a sofa and large balcony with a glass railing that doesn’t obstruct the ocean view. The small room given to us had no sofa, the balcony was so narrow we couldn’t move our feet while sitting, and the ocean view was obstructed by a balustrade with thick bars. I called the front desk but was unable to change to a better room. After further complaining I was offered a discount on my stay. It appears that there are several versions of each room and what they advertise on the website is the best version. If you want a nicer version you need to call the hotel and specifically ask for it. That’s ridiculous! Giving two stars only because the location is awesome.
Manager Response: Dear mathiasbeggar,  We are sorry to hear that your stay with us was not what you had hoped for this time. We have reached out to you directly to resolve the issue you had experienced. Our boutique hotel is uniquely perched atop the cliffs at Main Beach offering many different views and room types. We hope that you will plan to visit again the next time you are in Laguna Beach. Thank you for your valued feedback. Sincerely, Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: You can’t beat this location. Walking distance to great restaurants. The ocean view was amazing from our room. You can hear the waves while lying in bed. Team member, Cat was very helpful and accommodating.
Manager Response: Dear JHedland,  Thank you for your kind words.  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the great view from your guest room and our truly friendly staff. We look forward to your return! Sincerely, Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary Heading: Great, if you want to get COVID
Summary: I stayed here for one night on 12/25 while visiting family in the area.  They did not enforce the mask mandate, and guests were constantly wandering in and out of the lobby without masks.  I asked three times for the front desk staff to enforce their mask guidance, but to no avail.  I returned home and three days later, I tested positive for COVID.
Manager Response: Dear 210marshalm,   Thank you for submitting your review. We are sorry to hear of your disappointment with our services at this time. Our entire hotel staff are well trained and as the processes in hospitality have changed due to covid and other variants we are keeping up with the recommended protocol to create the safest environment for our guest and staff.  We verbally let every guest know of these rules at check in. We value all of our guests and thank you again for your feedback.   Sincerely,  Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary Heading: Nice place but I had a bad experience.
Summary: Beautiful place but if you are going to stay here get a top floor room. The guests above me had kids and were constantly running and wouldn't let me sleep. It was awful. Killed the whole experience for me.
Manager Response: Dear directedbysmitty2021,  Thank you for your post. We are terribly sorry to hear that noisy guests had made your experience with us less that you had expected. Our team members are always ready to assist our guests and we are hoping that you had reached out to staff so that we may have resolved the problem. We look forward to delighting you with a relaxing visit next time! Sincerely, Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary Heading: Excellent service from Joaquin Garcia at the Inn at Laguna Beach
Summary: Thank you Joaquin for the friendly and very helpful service during Happy Hour at the Inn at Laguna Beach! Joaquin was very informative and kind during our stay. He offered great suggestions for places to dine and enjoy the nightlife in town all with a wonderful attitude and smile on his face! Thank you Joaquin for the hospitality - we’ll be back, thanks to YOU!
Manager Response: Dear RobinG2587,  Thank you for taking the time to post. We are thrilled to hear that Joaquin has helped to make your stay so enjoyable. Our friendly and helpful team are always thinking of new ways to delight our guests. We are happy to hear that you will plan another visit. Thanks again. Warm regards, Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary Heading: Wish we could live at this place!
Summary: Beds and pillows are soooo comfortable!  The Inn at Laguna Beach is a very nice beach hotel. It's not a foo-foo, high-end place with marble bathrooms. It's an upper end of middle class, nicely decorated, well run, very clean, hotel with super comfy beds and a view that will knock your socks off!
Manager Response: Dear S2883AYwendyc,  Wow! Thanks so much for your glowing review. We are thrilled to hear that you were delighted with your stay. We hope that you are already planning a return visit.   All the best, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: We loved views and ocean sound! Wonderful walking trails above and below beach. Helpful suggestions and great drinks at the roof top bar with Joaquin G. Great restaurant  short distance above Inn., great views and seafood.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Love, Love, Love this bouquet hotel
Summary: The best part is that it is on the beach side of the 101 and right in the heart of town.  Views are great from just about every room.  Staff was wonderful and responded fast to our one request. They called to let us know our room we originally book had a maintenance issue and switched us to another room that worked for us....good news was our original room was fixed and they put us back into it! We will definitely be staying there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We are staying here now. Our wifi doesn't work in our room. We called to hotel lobby twice for assistance, but no one answered. Not sure why we are paying a $35 resort fee for wifi when the wifi doesn't work and there's no one to help us. Pretty unfortunate.
Manager Response: Dear ayjj04,  Thank you for posting. We had sent staff to assist with your internet and followed up to your satisfaction. Thank you for staying with us, we hope you will plan another visit soon! Sincerely, Jud Zavala, Front Office

Summary: Incredible location right on Laguna Beach. But beware of a property that is showing its age. If you book via a third party you'll get the worst room. Also, $70/night additional fees if you park on site.
Manager Response: none

Summary: this place was just amazing. I will stay there again next time I am in town. The views from the room were breath taking. you could just sit on the patio and watch the ocean all day. The roof top lounge was great to sit and watch the sunset.
Manager Response: Dear shawnhansen1,  Thanks so much for the great review! We love to hear from our guests and are thrilled to know that you enjoy our views as much as we do. Thank you for staying with us, we will see you next time! Sincerely,  Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: We chose this hotel for its location. Right next to the beach. Easy walking to shopping, restaurants, etc. staff kind and accommodating. Rooms were spacious enough but could use a bit of updating/sprucing. Only disappointment was the rooftop “bar.”
Manager Response: Dear  NKeesee,  Thank you very much for your post. We appreciate your point of view and will pass your review on to management for review. We are glad to know that you enjoyed our amazing location. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon. Warm regards, Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: Love the location and the view--the room we had reserved on the 3rd floor was unavailable when we checked in.  We were a little cramped with our all weekend but it worked out. Staff was friendly but unable to accommodate our requests.
Manager Response: Dear hlorey,  Thank you for choosing the Inn at Laguna Beach for your extended holiday weekend. We are sorry to hear that you were disappointed with the location of your room during your recent stay with us.  Our guests are able to secure floor location by booking room types such as our ocean view corner deluxe or top floor ocean view king rooms. We hope you will plan to visit again soon. All the best, Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: Location was perfect the Staff was super friendly and helpfu. The price was affordable. The beach was a little bit covered with seaweed but they were cleaning it every morning. Only bad thing is that you have to pY for parking $40 per night
Manager Response: Dear klimus85,  Thank you for your post. We are happy to know that you enjoyed our location at the beach as much as we do! On behalf of all of us here at the Inn at Laguna Beach we hope that you will plan to visit us again soon. Warm regards, Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary Heading: Great location, terrible accommodations. You can find much better…
Summary: Great location in Laguna Beach, but there are other well located accommodations that are in much better condition.  Our room had a broken ceiling fan, broken bathroom pocket door (meaning no privacy for toilet), a broken fridge that literally sounded like a train (yet couldn’t be turned off or unplugged), and dirty/stained sheets. When paying $500+ a night, one should expect much better even in a prime location. I’m a Diamond Elite member of Marriott’s and could’ve stayed for free at Newport Coast, but unfortunately we opted for this place. Now the ordinary response one expects from the host on TripAdvisor is “why didn’t you let us fix the problems?” (The place was full per Front Desk otherwise we would’ve asked for a different room),  but any seasoned weekend traveler knows
Manager Response: Dear EastsideSantaCruz,  We are sorry to hear that we had not met your expectations during this stay with us. We hope that you gave our staff the opportunity to address any issues you may have had while you were here, we would have been happy to assist. Thank you for your candid post, we appreciate all guests response. Sincerely, Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: My son and I stayed two nights here and it was great. Perfect location. Right on the beach and close to restaurants, shops. We had never been to Laguna Beach before and the recommendations we got from bartender, Joaquin were perfect. The restaurants he recommended were spot on. We definitely feel like we need to return with the whole family.
Manager Response: Dear Ray C.  Thank you for your positive review of our hotel. We are happy to hear that our great bartender Joaquin was so helpful and friendly. We are thrilled to know that you will be bringing your family back to relax with us here at the beach! Thank you for staying with us! Best regards, Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: I wasn't sure what to expect -- this was for a special treat for my adult daughter and to be honest, more costly than I would normally want to pay.  Over the years, we have travelled a fair amount and, on those trips, we usually stay with friends, more of a discount hotel and/or camp.   Having said that, we had a terrific time and felt we got our monies worth.  The staff was unpretentious, delightful and warm -- it was really a magical experience.  Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear lynneJ8923KW,  Thank you for your nice post. It is wonderful to hear that you and your daughter truly had a fun and relaxing time with us. We will let staff know of your kind words, we all appreciate it very much! We hope to see you soon again at the beach. All the best, Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: Do not stay here. This hotel is dirty in the rooms, hallways, and in the shared spaces. The only good thing about this hotel is the proximity of the hotel to beach & town and the rooftop 'lounge.' Toilet was broken, TV didn't work, carpet was coming up on all edges, air conditioning vents were leaking, and doors didn't fully separate the room from hallways (could hear everything and see through big gaps between the door and door frame). Do not waste your money. This place is too expensive for what you get.
Manager Response: Dear Grace W,  We are sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations during your stay with us.  The hotel staff did reach out to you to address any issues you may have had at that time, changing rooms for you immediately. Its nice to hear that you enjoyed our location on the beach. Thank you for taking the time to post your review.   Sincerely, Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: There are only so many chances you have to upgrade in the years of ownership before returning guests like us decide that you are too cheap tp do it.  At the very least buy 20.00 paint and make sure that your rooms are fresh. Upon booking I asked for the 5th floor - which was not available- which was okay since it was last minute- mentioned  my husbands birthday.  She said she would put the request in for the 4th floor since we were returning guests.  The day after, my husband was called by the hotel and they said "they would put us on the 4th floor" for an extra 50.00 per night....my husband agreed without checking with me.  I wasn't too happy but did not want to ruin the trip over 100.00, so I did not say anything.  However, upon arriving in room- it was a complete
Manager Response: Dear  Likestobeclean,  Thank you for taking the time to post. We appreciate your candid point of view. Our maintenance team has resolved the issue you experienced during your stay. Upper floor window maintenance is scheduled often at our hotel, so that we may provide an enjoyable experience for our guests. We apologize that you were not thrilled with your visit with us this time. We hope that you may plan to stay again in the future.   Sincerely,  Judi Zavala,  Front Office

Summary: Such a great location with amazing views and in walking distance to just about anything you’d need! The rooftop bar was small but gorgeous and with well made drinks. I would stay here again but would definitely spring for an ocean view room!
Manager Response: Dear alexhZ8104HA,  Thank you very much for the nice review. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. The view for our roof top bar is truly one of the most beautiful locations in Laguna Beach. We hope you are planning to return soon!  Warm regards,  Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: Best location, quiet, neat and friendly. Clean rooms, well equipped and maintained seamlessly. Nice touch of serving wine in the afternoon and fresh made cookies and milk in the evening. Friendly staff with now request too big to solve.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Five day romantic birthday escape.  Being unfamiliar with the area, I painstakingly considered where to stay.  I'm sure I chose correctly. The best part: location (especially when I realized it compared to others).  It's a bummer that I had car.  I paid to park it at the hotel, but needed it only once in 5 days.  Everything/where was a walk.  Others have described the Inn as worn out.  I choose "classic."  Although, a bit more elegance for the $$$ would have been appreciated.  The evening wine reception is a nice touch.  But, if it's nice outside, the space it's crowded.  Many folks the night we were there chose something other than the complimentary wine, which wasn't that good.  Some opted to use complimentary drink coupons, leaving me to wonder what they did to earn those
Manager Response: Dear Ted G.  Thank you so much for the kind words. We appreciate your candor and feedback, it is always nice to hear from our guests. Thank you for choosing our hotel for your special birthday. On behalf of all of us at the Inn, we hope to welcome you back again soon. Sincerely, Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: We very much enjoyed our stay at Inn at Laguna Beach.  It's the perfect location for beach and town access, and has amazing views! Staff was very friendly and helpful, and we enjoyed the cookies each evening!  The rooms (or at least our room) could use some updating, but the location and everything else was wonderful!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Wonderful coastline views from our balcony. We stayed in a ocean view room with a balcony and I highly recommend this. Location with proximity to downtown Laguna was perfect. Everything is walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear Lily37621,  Thank you for the recommendation! We are happy to know that you had a relaxing and enjoyable time with us. We hope you will plan a return visit soon. Thanks for staying with us. All the best, Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary Heading: Great location, rooms need an update
Summary: We spent one night inn at Laguna Beach. You can't beat the location to the beach and town, However the rooms need an update. Our pillow cases had holes, the window screen was broken, the pillows were small and the furniture was Ikea from the 70's.The rooms are expensive plus they add a $30 resort fee and $40 for parking. There is good coffee in the lobby in the am and tasty cookies after 6:00pm. They also have free wine at 5;00pm on the terrace. The staff are nice and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear WCKL,  Thank you for taking the time to write your review. We apologize for the pillowcases and hope that you had contacted staff for replacements. We are glad that you enjoyed our amenities and the beautiful views from our hotel. Our team will be glad to know that you found them attentive and friendly. Thanks for staying with us. Warm regards, Judi Zavala Front Office

Summary Heading: This place couldn't be more overrated
Summary: What a waste of money. You pay for literally everything. Our rates were higher than the posted rates while we were there. The employees couldn't care less. The main access to the beach goes right by the room balconies. $2k for three nights. Will not be back.
Manager Response: Dear sweener24,  We are so sorry that our hotel did not meet your expectations this stay. We appreciate all guest feedback and will be sharing your review with our team. Thank you for taking the time to write.  Sincerely, Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary Heading: Steff chase me off the property without giving me a reason why make me feel scared for my own well-being
Summary: Steff chase me off the property without giving me a reason why make me feel scared for my own well-being. They wouldn't even give me a reason why they were chasing me around the property I told him that I was staying there they didn't believe me I'll be humiliated completely dissatisfied with nice day I can't believe it paid thousand dollars not even the status please
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I stayed 2 nights on our Anniversary trip to California. The hotel was beautiful, perfectly located within walking distance of main beach Laguna. Even with its central location, it still was pretty quiet at night. Would definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Dear Magan K,  We are thrilled that you chose our hotel to celebrate your anniversary. It is delightful to know that you enjoyed our amazing location on the beach. We look forward to your next arrival. Thank you again for staying with us. See you soon!  Judi Z. , Front Office

Summary Heading: Lovely Hotel with Amazing Views of the Beach/Ocean
Summary: We had an ocean view double Queen room with a balcony. Totally worth the money. The view of the ocean and beach and the pool from our room was amazingly beautiful. I couldn't have asked for a better room and view. If you are worried about spending the extra money, DO IT! Made our vacation. We had a great time. We really didn't have time to spend at the beach but being able to see it from our room made all the difference. I 100% recommend the hotel. It's a very quaint hotel. The staff are so friendly. Not stuffy at all. A great time was had.
Manager Response: Dear ytoland,   Thank you very much for the nice review of our hotel. We are thrilled to have your recommendation.  It sounds as though you really had a relaxing and memorable time with us and we cant wait to welcome you back. Thanks again for staying with us. Warm regards, Judi Z. , Front Office

Summary: Clean and spacious room with unobstructed view of the ocean from the fifth floor and with all the amenities needed including a Nespresso machine. Beach gear (umbrella, chairs, towels) available. Internet fast and reliable. Friendly staff.
Manager Response: Dear Trek153944,  Thank you very much for your review of our hotel during your recent stay with us. We hope you will plan a return visit soon!  Warm regards,  Judi Z, Front Office

Summary: It was easy and simple for check in and check out. The staff was friendly. We were able to upgrade to an ocean view which was great. The only issue we had was there was water leaking from the AC unit . It wasn’t a big deal which is why I’ve didn’t notify the staff but maybe something to look into.
Manager Response: Dear marilynmonroy81,    Thank you very much for reviewing our hotel during your recent stay with us. We apologize regarding your AC and have addressed that with our crew. Thank you for letting us know. We will look forward to your next visit. See you soon at the beach! Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: This is the perfect location.  You can hear the waves crashing and the view is beautiful.  It is quiet and peaceful.  The room was perfectly clean and spacious.  It is a great location near shops and restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear 25julies,    Thanks so much for taking the time to review our hotel. We are glad to hear that you had an enjoyable time listening to the waves and seeing the beautiful view from your guest room. Please come to visit again soon! Sincerely, Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: We had a fabulous time while getting away for a long weekend to celebrate. The Inn at Laguna Beach was the perfect place for us to enjoy all that Laguna Beach has to offer. Our time both inside and outside our room was perfect. Can't wait to head back there again for another fantastic getaway.
Manager Response: Dear TonyDilo,  Thank you very much for the nice review. We are thrilled to hear that you had an enjoyable time with us.    See you soon! Warm regards, Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: This is an excellent hotel. The people are very friendly and helpful and the property is very well kept. My only complaint is the low quality of the wine(CK Mondavi) they served at the free cocktail hour.
Manager Response: Dear LakeCountyCouple,  Thanks so much for your kind review. We appreciate your comments and are always happy to hear from our guests.  We hope you will visit again soon! Warm regards, Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: Stayed here last minute through a 3rd party.  Hotel location was nice but that was it.  The main problem were hidden fees.  They ended up charging $100 over the original booking bride, so no deal after all.
Manager Response: Dear 34TripCritic, Thank you for staying with us. The amenity fee and parking fee information is posted on each web site, where you can book a room at The Inn at Laguna Beach, to make sure our guests have right rate information. The amenity fee includes tea and coffee to start your day, complimentary wine hour, fresh baked cookies before bedtime, all kinds of beach amenities such as beach towels, chairs, umbrellas, body boards, kid’s toys and volleyballs.   We hope you will visit again next time you are in Laguna Beach. Sincerely, Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: Very disappointed! The beds are uncomfortable, the air conditioning is extremely loud and wakes you during the night. Carpet flooring. Shower has no vents and stuffy.  The inn is very dated and definitely not worth the cost. Sorry folks, I know there isn’t a vast amount choices in Laguna. However, we will not be going back to the Inn
Manager Response: Dear K4421XOarmandof,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel during your recent stay with us. We appreciate all guest feedback as we move forward to improve guest experience.  We are very sorry that your visit was not as you expected.   Sincerely, Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: Stayed here for the weekend and had a great time!  Steps down to the beach and very close (5 minute walk) to all of the shops and restaurants across from the beach.  La Brisas was a great option for food and drinks overlooking the ocean right next door.  Very easy and fast for Uber/Lyft if needed but you can jump around the quaint downtown area without the need.  Only negative is the towels are fine for the pool (which was also great) but a bit small for the beach and no umbrellas or chairs.  You can rent them on the beach down away from the property but would be more convenient to be closer to the hotel or have the hotel have them available.  We will go back next year,
Manager Response: Dear DaveWags11,  Thanks so much for your nice review ! Actually, we do have towels, chairs and umbrellas available for guests to borrow as part of our amenities and we are sorry that you missed out on that. We agree that Las Brisas is a great spot to eat with amazing views. We love to hear that our guests  have had a fun time in town, with lots to see and do there, enjoying the great eateries and art galleries. We will see you next year at the beach! All the best, Jud Zavala, Front Office

Summary: The hotel property is equivalent to a 2 star hotel such as a Comfort Inn or Best Western. We stayed in a beach front room on the 5th floor for 4 nights. Our lamp shad had a hole in it, the door frame had rotted wood and we had to almost beg to get our room cleaned when someone came by at 5:30pm each night, even with the sign on the door requesting cleaning service. .It is not at all what we expected for $550 per night. The rooms are small for the price. There's no security, so daily we saw people from the beach with their dogs come in from free coffee and such. There were swarms of bugs on the front steps to the hotel every day. There was a expreso machine in the room but it didn't work. Would have preferred a basic regular $20 coffee pot. Even their pens don't work. The view is
Manager Response: Dear  Trek751156,  We are terribly sorry to hear of your disappointment during your recent stay with us. We really appreciate your comments as we move forward to meet or exceed our guests expectations daily. We hope that you let staff know about your coffee pot, so that we could resolve any issues right away.  We do allow dogs to stay with guests in the hotel and our lobby and Terrace bar are private for guests only, with staff members on task at all times. We hope that you were able to enjoy the ocean breeze and views from your guest room. Thanks again for staying with us.  Warm regards,  Jud Zavala, Front Office

Summary: I paid a 4.5-star rate for a no frills hotel. Honestly wouldn't pay more than $350/night to stay there again....and only then would I be paying for the location on the main beach.
