Prices were inflated to more than twice that for Ohana Fest. I've never felt like I was ripped off by a hotel before this stay at this property, and I have stayed in everything from bed-bug infested dumps to the finest hotels in the world! Even the staff seemed "blah".....like they couldn't have cared less to be there.
Manager Response: Dear davidF8251VA,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear your thoughts and saddened that you were disappointed in your stay. This is not indicative of our usually friendly and attentive staff.  We hope you might give us another chance in the future.  Sincerely, Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: The hotel was very clean and the staff service was excellent. The low rating is because there are simply no amenities. The internet did not work. They don’t have a gym or restaurant, though there are several nearby. We stayed here for the view. We paid for an ocean view. Instead, our room looked at a stairwell. We could see the ocean but this was a partial view at best and we paid the premium price. It’s an ok hotel. But it is far too expensive for what you get.
Manager Response: Dear  vanessaadavis,  Thank you for your candid thoughts regarding our hotel. We are sorry to hear that you did not enjoy the location of your room. We hope that you were able to contact the front desk to have your internet questions resolved quickly. Thank you for your kind comments about our staff, they are truly an amazing team. Our location atop a small cliff at Main Beach and Heisler Park in Laguna Beach offers guests views of the ocean, poolside and village as well.  We hope that you will plan to visit again soon! Sincerely, Jud Zavala, Front Office

Summary: This is really a review of Joaquin.  He is the bartender on the terrace in the afternoons.  He is helpful, personable, and fun.  But ask him about restaurants - he provides spot-on recommendations.  Take his advice.  Beyond that, we have stayed at the Inn many times over the past 20 years or so.  We have always liked it, particularly for its proximity to downtown Laguna Beach and the beach itself.  Will stay there again in the future, but hopefully it will be updated by our next visit.  It has gotten a bit tired.
Manager Response: Dear C7739EOdonaldd,  Thank you for your candid review. We thank you very much on behalf of Joaquin, he is an amazing and valuable member of our team. It is wonderful to hear that he helped to make your stay more enjoyable! Thanks so much for staying with us, we hope to see you again soon. Warm regards, Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: I was excited to stay in this lovely hotel so close to all the action in Laguna Beach.  Upon arrival, we requested a room upgrade and were given room 306 which was a corner room right next to the swimming pool and a public walkway which was a high traffic space late into the night.  It was noisy and disappointing.
Manager Response: Dear  Kendra M,  We are very sorry that you were disappointed in the location of your room. Laguna beach is a popular coast destination and the shore is bustling with activity  especially during nice weather. We hope you might plan a return visit. We will be happy to assist you. Thank you for staying with us. Sincerely, Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: Older hotel. The rooms kinda on the small side for the premium price. What your paying for is the location. The staff is helpful and friendly. The 4 pm check in time not desirable for the weary traveler.
Manager Response: Dear 3ju9p6h00r,  Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to know that our staff was attentive and you enjoyed our amazing views. We hope that you will plan a return visit with us soon.  Sincerely, Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: Always wanted to stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach. Great staff! The was always available to help out. Easy check in and check out. The fact that the hotel is located on Main beach is great. Close to restaurants in Laguna Beach. Will go again.
Manager Response: Dear clydedone,  Thanks so much for staying with us. Our staff are always glad to hear when they have helped to make a guest stay memorable.  We look forward to your return soon! All the best, Judi Zavala, Front Desk

Summary: Breathtaking views & exceptional service!  Highly recommend this hotel for fun or work gatherings.  The location is very central - close to good restaurants and right on the beach. Also close to parks & outdoor areas to be in nature!
Manager Response: Dear dkirksey2021,  Thanks so much for the nice recommendation! Our well trained staff love to provide fantastic service for all of our guests. We are thrilled to hear that you were able to enjoy the many great eateries in town as well as beautiful Main Beach and Heisler Park. It will be our pleasure to welcome you back soon. Thank you again for staying with us. Sincerely , Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: This hotel has great views, and is an easy walk to the center of town, or down to the beach. They provide many extras with your stay; wine, cookies, coffee, beach gear, which makes a stay more fun. The street side room we had was quiet enough, but a room on the beach side would be worth it for the view. We have stayed here before, and would return
Manager Response: Dear john g,  Thank you very much for your kind words. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our wine hour and cookies.  Our guests enjoy being able to grab beach chairs, towels umbrellas and toys to take down to the sand. Thank you for staying with us, we hope that you visit again soon! Warm regards, Judi Zavala, Front Office

Summary: I initially chose this hotel because of it’s proximity to the beach and the downtown area. What I found while far beyond my expectations and the staff who was friendly accommodating and always went the extra mile combined with the accoutrements an extra touches like high-end linens and a heavenly bed, a wonderfully decorated an updated room, oh and beautiful meeting rooms I rented for the day was nice for some board meetings I had planned with my management team who needed a change of scenery to get inspired to do some year end planning for our corporate staff.  Ari the group reservation coordinator really made our stay awesome. I’m coming back in November!
Manager Response: Dear vtanon,  Thank you very much for choosing the Inn at Laguna beach. We are thrilled to hear that we excelled as staff and location. It will be our pleasure to welcome you and your group back anytime! See you soon! Warm regards, Jud Zavala

Summary: We were in town for a charity golf event.  The room rates at the hotel sponsoring the event were over thirteen hundred per night.  A friend recommended we check out The Inn.  So glad we did.  For less than half the price, we stayed right on the ocean, walking distance to great restaurants and, of course, the beach!  We'll be back.
Manager Response: Dear thanson2021,  Thanks so much for the nice review. We are glad to know that you enjoyed the beautiful beaches of Laguna and all that our hotel has to offer. We look forward to welcoming you again soon.  Best regards, Jud Zavala

Summary: Beautiful location. Very close to restaurants and shops. Great views of the amazing beach and town. Nice, clean and spacious room. No restaurant on property. Prices for the weekend a bit too expensive.
Manager Response: Dear CarlaB1964,  Thank you for your feedback and review of our hotel during your recent stay with us. We agree that our location on the beach is stunning. We are glad to know you found our guest room enjoyable. Thank you for choosing us for your anniversary celebration. We look forward to your next visit. Best regards, Judi Zavala

Summary: We stay here everytime we come to Laguna Beach. It’s our families favorite spot. The staff are always so friendly, the resort so clean and the heated pool/jacuzzi are always the highlight. Can’t beat the location either!
Manager Response: Dear dianapoulos,   We are thrilled to know that we are your favorite beach hotel! Thank you for staying with us. See you soon at the beach! Sincerely, Judi Zavala

Summary: Most beautiful place I have ever been to!  Laguna Beach is exquisite and the Inn at Laguna Beach was perfect. From the beach front location to the clean and comfortable rooms- it was a dream vacation.  Cutest little hotel with outstanding views from our ocean front room- definitely worth the splurge!
Manager Response: Dear nancybrown421,  Thank you very much for taking the time to post your review. We love to hear from our guests and are truly thrilled to hear that you enjoy our hotel and views as much as we do. We hope you are already planning a return visit. Warm regards, Judi Zavala

Summary: This could quite possibly be the WORST hotel I have ever stayed at. I’ve been to Laguna many times. Stayed at the Capri which is average, the Surf and Sand, which is spectacular, and this dump. We had 2 rooms, cost almost 3k, and the photos are complete BS.   I got my parents an ocean view, and my husband and I had a pool view. For this hotel, ocean view for almost $900 a night ACTUALLY means a completely obstructed partial view, with most of your view being communal stairs with bushes. Everyone walked by all day and night. We heard steps and voices more so than the ocean. When we first got this room, I asked the front desk to change it because that is NOT an ocean view. He said ok, and sent me downstairs to almost the same exact room with the same exact view. Hilarious. We kept
Manager Response: Dear violettaa642, We are terribly sorry to hear that your stay with us was disappointing. This is not indicative of our friendly and helpful staff. We appreciate your feedback. We hope you give us another chance in the future.  Warm regards, Judi  Zavala

Summary Heading: Only good thing is the view
Summary: Definitely not worth the price. The view is great and so is the beach access but that’s where the positives end. Very disappointed with the overall experience of this  hotel. We will not be returning. Stay somewhere else if visiting Laguna beach.
Manager Response: Dear Brenton416,  Thank you for your candid feedback of your recent stay with us. We are very sorry to hear that you were disappointed. We hope that you might stay with us again in the future. Sincerely, Judi Zavala

Summary Heading: The Inn at Laguna Beach is a great experience
Summary: The location is fantastic. You can't beat being up on a bluff overlooking Laguna's Main Beach. You are within easy walking distance to the beach, shops, and restaurants. The staff is very nice. The property has some fine tuning maintenance issues, but overall delivers a wonderful get-away experience.
Manager Response: Dear dbutle190103,   We are glad to know that you enjoyed your beach get-away. Your feedback is greatly appreciated. Thank you for staying wit us. All the best, Judi Zavala

Summary Heading: Comfortable rooms, perfect location, excellent experience, and the ocean.
Summary: My family and I stayed here for 3 nights in August and loved it.  The views from our rooms were amazing; the hotel occupies the prime spot of land on the site of the former Victor Hugo Inn, on a cliff overlooking the ocean,  surrounded by gorgeous gardens. The rooms themselves are comfortable and well-appointed (good desk for husband who insisted on working; sensible bedside lighting, etc.). Cleaning staff respected covid protocols; reception staff helpful and polite. The hotel does not have a restaurant or room service, but has a roof deck with a sunset happy hour, coffee in the lobby, cookies and milk in the evening, and excellent restaurants and cafes a stone's throw away. Stair-free access to Main Beach;  beach towels, umbrellas, toys, and simple water-sport equipment
Manager Response: none

Summary: Highly recommend. Great for families. You can rent everything you would need for the beach. The pool has an entrance from the walkway that leads to the beach. The cookies at 6 are yummy and the wine social hour is a nice treat! The Nespresso machine was a nice touch in the room. Staff is incredibly nice. We REALLY enjoyed our stay and will be back for a little longer next time.
Manager Response: Dear mgarci771141,  Thank you for the recommendation! We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our location, amenities and friendly staff! We look forward to seeing you again very soon. All the best, Judi Zavala

Summary: We had tickets to The Pageant of the Masters, so decided to stay the night at The Inn at Laguna Beach, which is an easy 10 minute walk away...and right on the beach! Our room was lovely, with a partial ocean view that was mostly ocean. Nice furniture and decor, feather pillows, comfy mattress and very nice staff. They even have complimentary beach chairs, umbrellas, boogie boards & sand toys, plus a wine hour on the terrace.  A perfect Laguna Beach retreat, if only for a night!
Manager Response: Dear Susan R,  It is fabulous to hear that we met the mark during your recent stay with us! We hope you will return again very soon. All the best, Judi Zavala

Summary: Stayed here the weekend before I started chemo for a peaceful respit.  Rob helped us on checkin and was so kind and helpful.  He even sent us a bottle of wine to enjoy on our balcony.  It was pricey, but I would definitely return.
Manager Response: Dear  heather11223344,  Thank you for taking the time to post your review. We think Rob is a pretty great guy and a valuable member of our team. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your time with us!  Sincerely, Judi Zavala

Summary: Staff in the middle of night removed the smoke alarm. Never came back to replace it and left us with 2 kid to take all the risk of smoke death in the room. No care.   Ceiling fan dirty and all night I worried about some dirt falling on us over the bed. Could not sleep all  night. after smoke alarm went off.
Manager Response: Dear Rajesh M,  We sincerely apologize for the treatment you  had received during your recent stay with us. We have reached out to you via email to resolve this matter personally.  We hope you might stay with us again in the future. Best regards, Judi Zavala

Summary Heading: Do NOT stay here if you understand the value of a dollar
Summary: This hotel is NOT worth the price. Not even close. The room was musty, the towels were thin and scratchy, I almost got into an accident squeezing my car into the the parking lot (for $30 a night), the pool is dated and wasn’t and there are basically no amenities. This is NOT an $800/night experience.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is in a perfect location and within easy walking distance of restaurants, shopping, and the beach. There is a great elevated walking path alongside the beach with unparalleled scenic views of the ocean. The daily happy hour on the rooftop bar is a great feature!
Manager Response: Dear sherrymH4187FM, Thanks very much for your nice review. We agree that our location on Heisler Park makes for some amazing views. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our roof top and wine hour. We are looking forward to your return soon! Best regards, Judi Zavala

Summary: Beautiful place...on the beach....in the heart of Laguna Beach....upscale yet relaximg.  Pricey, yet worth it.  Quiet pool area.  Having some wine on the balcony in the evening is hard to beat.  Unlimited restaurants to choose from.  Wonderfil get away!!
Manager Response: Dear Rancho_Carlos,  We thank you very much for the nice review. We couldn't agree more and are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing stay with us. See you again soon at the beach! Warm regards, Judi Z.

Summary: The location of the Inn is perfect.  The price, once all the extras (i.e. parking, amenities) are added is high.  The bed was hard and uncomfortable, the pillows were flat and hard and I woke up with a stiff neck.  A 3" memory foam mattress topper would help your guests have a better nights sleep along with new pillows.
Manager Response: Dear Cappie G,  Thank you very much for your review. Our location, close to the beach, shops and restaurants is a favorite here in Laguna.  We are sorry to hear that your night's sleep was not as you expected. Our rooms feature down pillows which we think are pretty thick and puffy. Your input is very important to us as we strive to improve our guests experience and we will let the appropriate team know your thoughts. Thanks so much for staying with us. Sincerely, Judi Z.

Summary Heading: Great view and not much else
Summary: First the positives - views from the rooftop and ocean views are lovely.  The rooftop bartender, Joaquin, gets a special shout out for being thoughtful and attentive and ensuring guests had a great stay (he gave me more recommendations than I've ever received from a high end concierge).  That said, for the price this doesn't hit the mark. Service is highly lacking - check in was late (they said they would call when it was ready but I had to call after 4:00pm when I hadn't heard from anyone). The phone in the room has a direct line to guest services which was busy the entirety of the stay.  Furnishings in the room are dated and the walls could use some TLC.  For the ocean view room - while there is a beautiful view of the ocean it's also directly in front of the public walk way
Manager Response: Dear Jenni W. Thank you for your candid review of your recent stay with us. Thanks for the shout out to Joaquin, he is a very valued part of our team. We would like to apologize for your check in experience. Our hotel is a popular destination. Our location right on Main beach and Heisler park makes for amazing views and summer certainly can be lively here in Laguna Beach. To be honest, we are not sure what that briny odor was  along the coast. It is not a normal occurrence and has since dissipated.  We hope you might stay with us again the next time you are in Laguna. Sincerely, Judi Z.

Summary: Really nice stay. I realize it's an expensive town and for that location the resort is probably priced accordingly but I thought they missed the boat on a few details.  Patio furniture lacked.  Carpet and walls in rough shape around the place.  Rooms were kind of small.  Service was average at best.
Manager Response: Dear Mark J. Thanks so much for your feedback, we appreciate your point of view as we move forward to improve our guests' experience.  sincerely, Judi Z.

Summary: A very clean friendly hotel centrally located right next to Las Brisas.  Access to main beach and the central shops in Laguna. Staff is very attentive to their guests' needs.  A very enjoyable stay.  I wish wee had stayed longer, and plan to come back as soon as we can.  Plus the rooftop bar and must-do.
Manager Response: Dear Ann H,  We appreciate your review  and will let staff know that you found them friendly and attentive. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the beach and great shops in beautiful Laguna. Thanks for staying with us. Warm regards,  Judi Z.

Summary: Stayed here as part of our 10th anniversary SoCal road trip.  You can walk to everything from this location. The views from this hotel are breathtaking and our room was very clean.  Laguna is a stunning place in terms of natural beauty. I’d highly recommend this hotel if you are looking for place to stay in town.
Manager Response: Dear brianr323232,  Thanks so much for the recommendation! We are happy to have been included in your special road trip. We hope you are planning to have us on your itinerary in the future!  Warm regards, Judi Z.

Summary: I used bookings.com to get a room for 4 nights, they showed a ocean view room when i bought the room , and i also placed an ocean view room request on my order as recommended from the reviews i read.  I was given room 418 road view, horrible , and Saturday night i was charged 750 USD for a 3 star room (at best ) ,  The staff are very nice but the owners of this place must have no concern for repeat visitors given their location. They will just fleece customers . Be very careful to know the room you get  When i complained they asked for an additional 150 USD a night… that would have made my Saturday night room 900USD a night…
Manager Response: Dear Tony A.,  We are sorry that you were disappointed with the room type that you had booked. The rate that we had quoted you for the ocean view was correct for that weekend day. We are glad to hear that you found our staff friendly and accommodating and hope that you enjoyed the beach and great restaurants in Laguna. It is always a good idea to check your reservation as we do have many different room types at our hotel, from Village View, to Pool and Ocean View rooms to name a few, plus several Suites. We hope you might stay with us again. Sincerely, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: Great Location but Value not so good
Summary: The hotel needs serious updating, is understaffed and the value was not there for us.  The pool was dominated by kids with their toys and several playing in the Jacuzzi.  The room was not ready at check-in time and was an hour late before we could move-in.  They were supposed to call when the room was ready but we went to the front desk at 5 and had to ask what was up.  The floor was wet from the leaking A/C unit and when we put a towel down to soak up the water the towel was nearly black when we lifted it.  The hotel has a great location though.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It’s our “sister vacation “ , we come from Chicago, Colorado and San Francisco and we have stayed here for 30 years and we love The Inn at Laguna. It’s always clean, great staff and absolutely love the umbrellas, chairs and towels provided for the beach ❤️
Manager Response: Dear kristinaajames,  Thanks so much for your wonderful review. We really love to hear from our return guests. We are thrilled that your sister vacation was a success! On behalf of all of us here at the Inn at Laguna Beach we look forward to your next visit. All the best, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Great location right on the beach, Staff is open and friendly. We arrived early and were able to check in without issue. It was a quick overnight stay so did not partake in any of the amenities they offer so cannot speak to any of it. The bed was comfortable and air temp as great. Lobby has fresh coffee in the morning and nice cold refreshing cucumber water during the day. All staff we dwelt with  we open, friendly and seemed genuinely happy to assist.
Manager Response: Dear Suzanne B,  We are ecstatic to hear that our outstanding staff helped to make your stay with us fun and memorable. We hope you are already planning to return soon!  Warm regards, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Great location and hotel.  Has a wonderful view and location. Just next to main beach.  The staff were very helpful, and accommodating.  There are towels and chairs for your use on the beach.   Your close to lots of shopping and restaurants
Manager Response: Dear  Nancy S,  Thanks so much for the nice 5 star review. We are so happy to hear that you had a wonderful time with us. We hope to have you visit again soon. Sincerely, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: Pageant of the Masters annual getaway
Summary: This is the most convent location to visit the village by using your two feet. Including sawdust and Pageant festival. Wake up and take a stroll on the beach. Next door is Las Brisas restaurant. Pricey but good!
Manager Response: Dear TicketBait,  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your vacation. We hope you will stay with us again the next time you are in Laguna Beach. Thanks again. Warm regards, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: We go to Laguna each year and always wanted to stay here. It is located close to the center of town, and has great beach access and views. The rooftop bar affords great afternoon ocean viewing, while relaxing with one's favoite beverage. The staff was friendly, and the facilities were clean, up to date, and well maintained. will definitely make this our go -to hotel for our future Laguna Beach trips.
Manager Response: Dear U5267BNrichardg,  Thank you so much for your kind review. We are thrilled that you had an amazing and memorable time with us. We are happy to know that we are your new go-to beach hotel. Thank you for staying with us. See you soon at the beach.  Warm regards,  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: Sunset Suite beautiful but so noisy from pool equipment impossible to sleep
Summary: When one pays this much for a room, one does not expect to be sonicated by the pool equipment, which reverberates through the Sunset Suite with so much force, one feels it physically in one’s body. Ear plugs help, but the fact that this extremely strong, low frequency vibration turns on roughly every half an hour for about ten minutes makes it akin to torture. The room is a good size; the bathroom is not, with broken tiles, barely draining tub, and a weird hole in the ceiling. The balcony is relatively private, with weathered recliners that are too big for the space, stained from years of use. The hotel also misleads you with the words “dining” and “dine,” but there is no restaurant here or real food, other than cookies which allegedly appear at 6 pm (didn’t try them). From 5 to
Manager Response: none

Summary: It is so great to hear, see & smell the ocean. The rooms on the upper floors, facing the ocean are the best rooms. I arrived early & my room was ready for me. That made my visit even better. Had lunch on my balcony, so beautiful.
Manager Response: Dear judithc2013,  We agree with you, the ocean and beach here in Laguna are so beautiful! It is nice to hear that you enjoyed your time with us. We hope you will plan a return visit very soon. Thanks for staying with us.  Judi Z. Front Office

Summary: Fantastic location. You could hear the sound of the waves from your room. The view was better than what I have expected. Superb location. Great service. Very nice staff. Great getaway for couples. I love that the pool has salted water.
Manager Response: Dear C583PYmauros,  Thanks very much for your 5 star review of your recent stay with us. We are thrilled to hear that our location and staff exceeded your expectations. Thanks again for staying with us, we hope you will plan a return trip soon. All the best , Judi Z., Front office

Summary: The Inn At Laguna is the perfect location in Laguna beach!  Walkable to everything. Friendly staff. Nice pool. Clean rooms. Good coffee in the morning. My only issue was that the air conditioning was so loud but I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear tparso611346,  Thanks so much for your great review of our hotel. We appreciate your feedback about the air-conditioning. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the amenities and our location. Thank you again for staying with us. We hope to have you visit again soon. All the best!  Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: My husband  I visited Laguna for a 3 night stay from FL. When checking in Judi was great! We got to room 201 and not the view we exactly wanted so back to the front desk and Rob helped us out to a room on the 4th floor with better views, Thanks Rob! Our room 425 was small but the view was OUTSTANDING!! At 5pm every night they have a happy hour wine drinks on the top roof with once again outstanding views! Otherwise, bar opens at 1pm every day. Bartender super nice and pour was nice. There's coffee every morning in the lobby or a Starbucks directly across the street. Loved walking everywhere in Laguna. The Cliff restaurant and The Loft were simple to walk to with views of the oceans galore. Also, Nicks (not on the beach) was tasty as well. One thing to keep in mind it's hard to
Manager Response: Dear gatorgirl4,  Thank so much for staying with us. It was our pleasure to help to make your time with us enjoyable and memorable. We appreciate your fun review and are so glad to hear that you would recommend us to others. We hope to have you visit again soon. Thank you again. All the best!  Sincerely, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: Great location, tiny shower and refresh needed
Summary: Views and location are fantastic - really great spot for downtown LB, walking beach and taking trolley south at night.   However, state of room, particularly doors and shower, was below average; most rooms and areas need refurbishing to justify $1000 or 4-star rating.
Manager Response: Dear m a,  Thank you for your review. We agree that our views and location are some of the best in Laguna Beach and are glad to know you had an enjoyable stay with us. Thanks so much for your feedback. We do have exciting news regarding some refresh plans for our hotel. We hope that you will plan a return visit. Warm regards, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Perfect location, clean, updated rooms, friendly staff - everything you wish for! We absolutely loved our stay and did not want to leave. Three minute walk to downtown. Located on the hill at just up from main beach. Love Laguna Beach!
Manager Response: Dear mkvkxjhc35,  Wow! Thanks so much for taking the time to write your review. Our staff are friendly and knowledgeable.  We are glad to hear that you loved your stay! We hope you are already planning a return visit. Warm regards,  Judi Z, Front Office

Summary: Booked a one night stay and it was lovely.  Excellent location.  Walking distance to shops and restaurants.  Staff was friendly, accommodating and knowledgeable of the surrounding community. Pet friendly.
Manager Response: Dear 817rick,  Thank you for for staying with us! We are happy to hear that our staff met the mark with you during your recent stay. We hope you will visit again soon. Sincerely, Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: We love the property because of its location to the beach, dining, shopping.  We've stayed at this property twice now and went to the Sawdust Festival and Pageant.  We were able to walk to both!  Also, great staff and beautiful views of the ocean. Worth the price of admission!
Manager Response: Dear mimicreedon,  Thanks so much for your review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our location and friendly staff. On behalf of all of us here at The Inn at Laguna Beach we are looking forward to your next visit! Thanks for staying with us.  See you soon at the beach! Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: The best hotel in Laguna Beach!!!
Summary: If you seek the best possible location, the best staff, the best overall experience while staying in Laguna Beach, the only choice is The Inn at Laguna Beach.  There are many, many other options, but stay here and you will never stay anywhere else again!  PS The morning coffee service is one of the best cups of coffee in town.
Manager Response: Dear Peter R,  Thanks so much for your review. We are thrilled to hear that The Inn at Laguna Beach is your new go to beach hotel! Thanks so much for the kind words. We look forward to your return. Sincerely, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Lovely views but overpriced and crummy service. Tons of fees and amenity charges for mediocre lodging, given a smelly room with trash in view at first until we mentioned the problems. Then offered a nicer room “of the same room level”. We almost never complain, but the front desk folks and mgmt here have a knack for making you feel unwanted even in such a nice town. Even extending checkout by 30 min was a hassle and done grudgingly.
Manager Response: Dear George C, We are terribly sorry to hear of your disappointing stay. Thank you for your feedback we appreciate it very much as we move forward to improve guest experience. Sincerely, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Partial Ocean View" room turned out to be a windowless ground floor room with 1 glass door opening onto a bare patio sharing glass walls with a noisy hotel hot tub and pool on one side, and a steady stream, day and night, of hundreds of tourists, loud drunks, crying children,  etc. peering  into the room as they passed by at eye level. The only way for ANY privacy required closing the blinds, no light, no ocean view,( partial or otherwise). May as well have been in a basement in Bakersfield. And, on ground level with thousands of passers-by feet from the door, no security cameras, no security guards, we had to keep the single door shut and locked all night. Tried immediately to change the room (at any cost) but was told all view rooms were booked. Terrible, sad, disappointing
Manager Response: none

Summary: Loved our stay here! This is in the heart of Laguna. Yes, there is a nightly fee to park your car, but we walked everywhere. Coffee, water, tea, and cookies in the lobby throughout the day are great touches! Do not miss wine hour on the roof. Pool is great and you are steps from Main  Beach and close to other area beaches. They have beach accessories available  to borrow each day. We will be back!
Manager Response: Dear eileenmeehle,  Thanks for taking the time to write your review. We are so happy to hear that you really had a nice time with us, enjoying our amenities and the beautiful beaches of Laguna. We are glad to know that you will plan a return trip soon. Thank you for staying with us. Warm regards, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: The room was overpriced for what you get.
Summary: The room was overpriced. The parking was an extra $40. No restaurant, early check in and late check out are discouraged. Aging property. The only good part is it’s on the beach and close to the LB festival. I wouldn’t recommend.
Manager Response: Dear msnancyirvine,   Thank you for your review of your recent stay with us. We greatly appreciate all feedback as we move forward to improve guest experience. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our location on the beach within walking distance to the village and art festivals. We hope you might give us another chance in the future Warm regards, Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: I can tell you if you’re looking for a warm and cozy oceanfront property to stay at, you’re expectations will be exceeded. From the boutique feel of the property itself to the rooms that are perched at an arms distance from the beautiful Pacific Ocean this place is amazing. The staff is courteous, professional and friendly. All of this creates an environment that’s both welcoming and extremely relaxing!!! The only sad thing about our stay was having to check out. You’re going to love it here!!!
Manager Response: Dear cellpoet1,  Thanks so much for the eloquent post! We could not agree with you more. Our staff is thrilled to read your kind words. This is what we strive for, for our guests to have a memorable time with us. Our coastline is among one of the prettiest along the California Coast. Thanks again for staying with us. Warm regards, Judi Z. Front Office

Summary Heading: Hotel can be VERY noisy of they have special events, might want to look elsewhere.
Summary: Since we had a special occasion coming up (Birthday), we decided to make a short getaway out of it and travel to The Inn at Laguna beach. Having stayed here a number of times in the past, we expected a nice relaxing stay while enjoying the view and sounds of the ocean.  Check-in was non eventful other than having to wait until exactly 4PM (check-in time) to get our room. Yes, I know, we were 2 hours early but we do ask for early check in if possible. It just seems that those kind of requests are ignored. Still, I think a repeat guest should get something for coming back.  Upon check-in, we were told that the Roof Top Deck would not be available tonight because of a scheduled wedding. Oh well, we have 2 more nights to enjoy an “advertised” amenity. After saying that, the clerk
Manager Response: Dear nativecal,  Thank you for your candid thoughts regarding your recent stay with us. We are sorry that you were disappointed during your stay. Your feedback is so important to us and will be passed along to the correct team. Our goal for our guests is to have a relaxing and memorable time with us. As return guests we hope that you may give us another chance in the future. Sincerely, Jud Z. ,Front Office

Summary: My wife and I recently stayed here and for the most part its good. The views are stunning, close walking distance to the center of Laguna.  The rooms on the other hand need some help.  Carpet is old, sofa is very old and dirty. Bathroom shower head is very low, door falling off of bathroom....etc.   Common areas lobby carpet is the worst I have ever seen in a Hotel. Very tired.  Staff and views are fantastic.
Manager Response: Dear Laurie M,  Thank you so much for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our friendly staff,  location and views. We have passed your feedback along to the correct teams to resolve. Thanks for staying with us, we hope you will return soon! Warm regards, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: First time staying at this property. Chose it do you the great location. Upon check in staff was very welcoming and friendly. We had chosen the room with a pool view 2 queen beds. Room was clean bathroom a little outdated. Pool was quaint and enjoyable. This is an old building so the sound issues were a big problem.  We paid almost $600 a night after taxes and fees to stay  in a noisy sleepless room. Walls and floors paper thin here! By that I mean the guests above us sounded like they were stomping around all day and night even though I’m sure they were just walking normally. The air conditioning unit was loud as can be every time it kicked on. We were in a corner unit but the one room to the side of us the man woke up at 430am hacking out a lung or god knows what and sounded
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Simply Offering a Room and a Glass of Wine on the Terrace. Nothing Else here, No Food, No Other Beverage Service - 2 *
Summary: Parking Garages should have Security Gates over them to keep out vagrants and thieves from wandering inside the parking garages doing car prowls. That's Negligent Failure to Act. I thought I would see 2 Handicapped Parking Spaces at the check-in entrance, but only 1. And lastly, the pool experience is really a joke: there were like 3 umbrellas around the pool and it's High Season/High-Heat.   Mr. or Mrs. General Manager please fix that too with a small purchase of 6 more umbrellas and bases around the pool.   On a Tuesday, there were too many patrons waiting for a seat in shade beacuse the few umbrellas were taken. Lastly, Inroom dining? There was none. Breakfast? None/ Lunch? None.  And I would not return due to a failure to offer No Food and Beverage Service for breakfast,
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was a nice place to stay in Laguna Beach. Very close to Downtown Laguna Beach and right on the beach!  The views were fantastic! Make sure your room has a balcony to see the views. Or you can step out to the beach walk and see the views.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Inn at Laguna is great for its location and the beautiful ocean view from rooms that have views.  Beach is a few flights of stairs away. The Lobby and room have carpet that is worn and clearly not very clean.  The staff in the evening was service oriented and helpful.  The Staff we met upon our arrival at about 3 PM was not helpful and simply pointed to the luggage carts when I asked if there was help for the luggage.  Left a bag heavy with exercise stuff I needed for Physical Therapy near the cart and told him it was heavy---he left it on the floor so I put it on the cart myself.  We paid resort and amenity fees that amounted to about $70 or $80 more per day above the room rate and the 44/day parking fee.  Not clear what that was for.  Thank goodness for the view from our
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel has great ocean views and you can walk or take free shuttles to most places in Laguna Beach.  The rooms were on the small side, but clean and comfortable.  Note that there is no dining offered on the premises (they do have coffee/tea in the rooms and in the lobby), but rooms have mini-fridges, there is a Starbucks across the street, and many bakeries and restaurants within walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear BethR0812,  Thanks so much for taking the time to write your review. We appreciate your kind words and hope you are already planning return visit.  See you soon at the beach! Judi Z. ,Front office

Summary: While the location of this hotel is great, they charge 4 star prices for a 2 star facility. We stayed in a room off the pool (which was noisy and not very private). Our $579/night room +++ taxes, fees, parking, etc. came out to a whopping $736/night. The Inn is dated and not well kept. Everything looks worn, scuffed, not clean. Staff were nice but I was a bit resentful spending this kind of money for this level of quality. Not sure if the other options in that area are much better but I'd opt for an Airbnb the next time.
Manager Response: Dear cgentile123,  Thank you for your feedback. We are saddened to hear that you did not enjoy your recent stay with us. Your comments are greatly appreciated as we move forward to improve guest experience. We hope you might give us another chance in the future. Thanks again for staying with us. Sincerely, Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: This hotel is the perfect place to stay in Laguna Beach.  It offers stunning views, beach apparatus to borrow, and a location so convenient to restaurants and shops.  Am anxious to return soon for another wonderful vacation.  My room was lovely and the perfect place to rest after a day at the beach and shopping.
Manager Response: Dear wmushell,  Thank you for the kind 5 star review. We are happy to hear that your time with us was enjoyable and relaxing. We are looking forward to your return for another stay with us.  Sincerely, Judi Z.

Summary Heading: Outstanding Location but not an Outstanding Property
Summary: The location of this property is premium,  however the rooms and service are mid-level hotel industry and do not support the pricing.   You are paying for the location and if you are ok with this then stay here.
Manager Response: Dear BiggerKahuna,  Thank you for taking the time to offer feedback regarding your recent stay with us, we appreciate it greatly. We have let staff and management know your thoughts as we move forward to enhance our guests experience. We hope you will plan to stay with us again.  Warm regards, Judi Z.

Summary Heading: Gorgeous location, excellent service, comfy bed, lousy shower
Summary: This is an excellent place to stay if attending the Festival of the Arts or just visiting Laguna Beach. An intimate hotel that feels more like a home than a hotel. The property is well maintained, the staff are fantastic, the rooms are nicely appointed with very comfortable beds and the pool with Jacuzzi area is small but very nice with perfect water temperature and thoughtful amenities (towels and sunscreen!) Two things keep this from being a five star review. One is that the low flow showers are a joke. You can barely get wet let alone decently wash and rinse your hair. For the five star prices charged here, certainly they can let a little more water out. Two, is that their beautiful rooftop drink area provides no foods nor are there any other foods offered other than the 6PM
Manager Response: Dear John M, Thank you for your informative and candid review, we appreciate it very much. Our staff is pleased to hear that they met the mark with great service and smiles during your stay. We have made the proper teams aware of your feedback so that we may make improvements as we move forward. Thanks so much for staying with us, please visit again soon! All the best, Judi Z.

Summary: A gem.  I don't want you to go, the prices will go up.  This hotel is MINE!!!  I don't want anyone else to know about it. But if you insist, it is right on the beach, right on the edge of town, clean, charming, lovely...stay away.  Thank you.
Manager Response: Dear wearingwings,  Thank you for your delightful review. You've got all of us smiling! We are looking forward to welcoming you back soon. See you at the beach! Sincerely, Judi Z.

Summary: Needs a major renovation. There is nothing attractive about this hotel. I don’t understand all the positive reviews. Lobby needs major renovation as well as rooms. The only positive was the location on beach and close to shops and restaurants
Manager Response: Dear bpape23,  Thank you for your review. Your feedback is important to us. We are sorry to hear that you were disappointed in our hotel during your recent stay with us. We are happy to know you enjoyed our location. We hope you might give us another chance in the future. Warm regards, Judi Z.

Summary Heading: Perfect location. Amazing views. Great staff.
Summary: Perfect location. Amazing views. Great staff. Parked car when I got there and did not have to use for 5 days. Walking access to town. Was a great vacation. You have to book way ahead, I tried to book another week 6 months ahead and they were full.  So plan ahead. It’s worth it.
Manager Response: Dear attending,  Thank you very much for staying with us. We are elated to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  We aim to provide friendly, knowledgeable and attentive staff.  The quaint town just steps from our hotel and main beach in Laguna is so fun to explore. Thanks again, see you soon! Warm regards, Judi Z.

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel in the perfect location for beach time and explore Laguna time!
Summary: Fabulous hotel in the perfect location. Beautiful views of the ocean. Easy access to the beach. Short walk to the restaurants and boutiques in Laguna. Nice complimentary cocktail hour on the terrace every evening. Delicious cookies in the lobby. Beach chairs, umbrellas, towels etc all complimentary for use at the beach. Very friendly and helpful staff. Our favorite hotel in Laguna Beach!!!
Manager Response: Dear Jody G,  Wow! Thanks for the glowing review.  It is pleasing to know that we are your favorite beach hotel. On behalf of all of us here at the Inn at Laguna Beach, we hope to see you soon.   Sincerely, Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: Love the beach theme decor, the proximity to the main beach, shops and restaurants. We were there mostly for the Sawdust Festival but also enjoyed hiking along Heisler Park and checking out Pirate’s Tower in Victoria Beach.
Manager Response: Dear RexJie, Thanks! We are so happy that the art festivals are going on again this summer. It is good to hear that you enjoyed exploring along the Laguna Beach beautiful coast. Thank you for staying with us! Sincerely, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: We had a lovely time, we will be back again for sure! The staff was amazing and you can’t beat the location. I can’t wait to bring my family next time it’s a great place for either a couples weekend or the whole family.
Manager Response: Dear  jmagle540714,  Thank you so much for staying with us. We look forward to having you and your family visit again soon.   It is great to hear that our staff was on point. So glad that you had a great time. See you at the beach! Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: This was a special occasion and internet rated this property highly.  Room was very small, air vent had no way to close cold air so had to turn off completely or be uncomfortable.  Shower was a nightmare as only trickle of water.  Toilets to low for seniors.    When I asked for room to be cleaned at 1 pm as we were expecting guests, service person was snotty and said maid had till 4 pm.  Room was cleaned later tho.  Dig barked most of night and woke us early next morning.  I complained to front desk and later did not hear dog tho.  For $1,000 a night for our two night stay I can’t imagine returning as so many nicer places for less.
Manager Response: Dear Thankfulretiree,  Thank you for your recent stay with us. We are very sorry to hear that you were disappointed, especially for your special occasion. We hope you might give us another chance in the future. Sincerely, Judi Z. ,Front office

Summary: Great little spot tucked away in top of an Oceanside hill overlooking downtown snd the waves. Will be staying again for sure. It was the perfect “staycation” in our county so we could park the truck and walk around the town for coffee, music, dinner, and shopping.
Manager Response: Dear 54dlove,  Thank you for your nice review. We agree with you that our location at Main Beach so near the restaurants, shops and art galleries of Laguna make it easy to have an enjoyable vacation. We hope you are planning a return visit soon! All the best, Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: I could have sat on that balcony for a week,, what a treat to get away from the heat and craziness of  life.  This was my quick "staycation" but it was so lovely i tried to keep the room for another night but it was booked,, not surprised,, but i will be back very soon,, just a lovely spot easy walking to restaurants, I actually ordered dinner and walked and picked it up and ate on my balcony watching the sunset,, it was marvelous
Manager Response: Dear Journey19188764117,  We are elated to hear from you. It is wonderful to know that you truly enjoyed the relaxing and beautiful beach and view as much as we do. We cant wait to welcome you back again! Warm regards, Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: My Mom and I visited for a summer birthday getaway to the beach. We really enjoyed our room with an ocean view, balcony, and 2 Queen beds. The staff are great and the room was very clean. Room had Air Conditioning and ceiling fan as well so we could be comfortable. It included nice amenities. The location was walkable to the main village and the Pageant of the Masters. We enjoyed the wine on the terrace and just took in the view.
Manager Response: Dear AlyInTheCity, Thank you very much for writing our review of our hotel. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed all Laguna Beach has to offer as well as our guest rooms and wine on the Terrace. We hope to have you stay  with us again soon! Warm regards Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: We had a beautiful trip. My best friend and I met in Laguna for a fantastic two Days. The hotel was clean, friendly staff and terrific beach access. Very easy . Spacious rooms, nice pool. Close to town but not in the midst of crowds  we are going bk soon
Manager Response: Dear AmyDylanChad,  Thank you for staying with us. We are happy to hear about your fun and relaxing time at our hotel. We hope you are already planning a return visit!  All the best,  Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: I would give 3.5 stars.  The view is 5/5+ Location is 5/5+ Common Lobby 5/5 Room interiors 3/5. (Very clean, but in need of renovation/updates) If you want an AMAZING view and location and do not mind an old room in need of renovations, this is the Inn for you.
Manager Response: Dear SadieO8O1, Thanks so much for taking the time to post your review. We love hearing from our guests and appreciate your feedback. We hope you will visit again soon! Warm regards, Judi. ,Front Office

Summary: The staff was completely disinterested at every level, from check in to check out.  On night two, I woke up to a cockroach crawling on me.  They denied a courtesy half hour late checkout on a Monday morning ..and rudely at that!  Above all, a VERY POOR VALUE!
Manager Response: Dear GTR85254,  We are saddened to hear that we missed the mark with you during your recent stay with us. Thank you for bringing this to our attention so that we may correct course. We have contacted you  and hope that we have resolved this issue to your satisfaction at this time. We hope you would give us another chance in  the future.  Sincerely, Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary Heading: Best hotel location in Laguna Beach.
Summary: Convenient to ALL things. Beach, restaurants, shopping, Pageant of the Masters. Great beach access.  Hotel beach valet provides beach chairs, umbrellas, towels, etc. just steps away from your room. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: If you like quality, then choose wisely.
Summary: The room descriptions on the website are embellished a bit to say the least.  My pool view room was indeed pool view so I guess that's accurate.  I could not open my window as it was sealed shut and could not open the blinds as people were sitting 2' from my window.  Literally 2'.  Totally unacceptable.  Next room was ok at best.  I had a bed, one desk chair and those were the sitting options for 3 days.  Totally unacceptable as my balcony was a walkway and shared space.  Not too romantic to celebrate my wedding anniversary.  The bar tender for happy hour did not share that the house wine was free.  Instead, since that information was not shared, I bought wine only to find out at checkout when I asked about why and what I was getting for my resort fee.  Additionally, I had to
Manager Response: none

Summary: Enjoyed our stay.  We 'borrowed' beach chairs, umbrella, and towels.  The staff was very friendly and accommodating.  Enjoy a glass of wine on the rooftop bar area.  Beautiful view from that area.  Very convenient to Main Beach.
Manager Response: Dear parkerms81 Thanks so much for the nice review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed wine on the terrace and our friendly staff! Please come to visit again the next time you are in Laguna Beach! All the best, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: The inn wasn’t as good as expected the room was like falling apart and the prices were ridiculous but it was the Fourth of July but the fan blade almost hit us because the fan blade just broke off but we will stay here in the future because of location
Manager Response: none

Summary: Ocean view room had stunning view! Hotel a quick walk to restaurants and shopping. The close by Heisler Park is a favorite place to soak up the views. The complimentary morning coffee was much appreciated and my kids loved the evening cookies and milk. Would highly recommend!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Location is amazing but the room not the "luxury" you expect for price.
Summary: First let me say that the location of the inn is amazing - with the most beautiful views.  That being said - the room we stayed in is nowhere near the luxury price we paid.  The room literally was not as nice as a Hampton Inn.  The carpet was threadbare (threads actually coming up that could be pulled).   Our shower did not fully shift from faucet to shower head, and the tub didn't drain - so that we were standing in our dirty shower water - yuck.  The bathroom sink is outside the bathroom, which I hate because you can't get ready without disturbing others in the room.  Then there is the noise.  The walls are paper-thin. The family above us had kids that ran in circles, and you could hear every. single. step.  If staying in Laguna again, I would look elsewhere for somewhere to
Manager Response: none

Summary: Excellent in all categories.  Very clean and tidy.  Terrace Bar was a welcome diversion.  Everything (shops, restaurants, art galleries, entertainment) is within an easy walking distance and/or trolley ride.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Perfect location near beach and restaurants with no need to get back on our car.  Excellent hospitality service and stylish hotel with a history in the area.  Our family walked the beach, used the local park, and enjoyed several meals off the main street.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location. So so everything else.
Summary: Awesome location on the cliffs of Laguna.  Next to Las Brisas, which we enjoyed dinner and a weekend brunch.  Room was next to pool.  Mattress was very lumpy and not comfortable. Wifi speed and connectivity did not meet expectations.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was subpar - needed a remodel and a thorough cleaning!  The old pocket door to the bathroom was broken and the room was not "spacious."  My expectation was the Ocean View room would be superior to the city side room we previously stayed in.  This room was dated 20-30 years.  To pay $1,000 for a Saturday night in a dated, small room and then smell dog on top of that is not worth the price.  They tried to fix the pocket door but it really made little difference and the noise when sliding was so loud, esp in the middle of the night.  Also, we were on the 2nd floor and the noise above was like a herd of animals.  We actually had to leave a night early to get some sleep.  The staff is friendly.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Took trip for our anniversary and hotel was excellent both service and accommodations. Staff was helpful and friendly. Location is perfect in downtown laguna. Room we stayed was ocean view and left balcony doors open all night to hear surf sounds when we slept.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was our second visit and it's still my favorite place to be! It's heavenly to hear the ocean with our windows open and to stroll through town finding a great restaurant. This is a fabulous place to stay with cookies every night!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The best hotel in Laguna Beach!
Summary: I've never been to a hotel where they go above and beyond to make your stat the most comfortable and happy visit. They care about customer service and the location is absolutely perfect! Also walking distance from all the main shops and restaurants. I absolutely love this hotel and how they detail your whole experience. Best birthday I've ever had!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Time for the Inn at Laguna Beach to get updated & refreshed.  This is not a 5 star property however, the location is awesome!! There is no restaurant on site which is actually good because that forces guests to explore.  The main beach next to the hotel was covered in seaweed.  My feet were black from walking around the room and patio in bare feet.  They did have water and coffee and free wine.  They also offered beach umbrellas, chairs, boogie boards and sand buckets and shovels which was really nice.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Inn at Laguna had the best location, rooms, and staff! The jacuzzi and pool are great for a private place to hang out. We always stay here when we come to Laguna because it’s right in the heart of it all with still being in a private place. We love the happy hour and cookies!
Manager Response: Dear Friendsvacayay, Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are thrilled to hear that our friendly staff and great atmosphere helped to make your stay memorable and relaxing. We will share your kind words with our team. We will see you again soon at the beach!  Thanks again, Jud Z. ,Front Office

Summary: Old, dirty carpets in common areas, loud ACs, threadbare linens.  We have stayed numerous times, but it is not being maintained or updated as it needs to be.  It is definitely not a luxury hotel, but the prices are high.  The location can't be beat, and that is all they're going on at this point.
Manager Response: Dear Julie M, Thank you so much for your candid review of your recent stay at our hotel.  We appreciate your comments. It is a pleasure to announce that we will be implementing many upgrades in the near future! Our main priority is to be able to offer a well maintained and comfortable atmosphere. We are happy to know that you enjoyed our beautiful location. We hope that you will visit again soon. Thanks again. Warm regards, Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary Heading: Chantel is the BEST manager, ever!!!
Summary: My twins and I had the most amazing experience here, and it is solely due the manager, Chantel. She was so sweet to me and my kiddos and so kind -hearted and enthusiastic, that it completely made for the best beach vacation we have ever had. If you are reading this, I want you to know that you went above and beyond, and I truly believe God put you in a place to remind my children and me what kindness truly looks like. We have gone through so many trials this last four years and have felt what rejection and hostility from another human being looks like, but we’ve also felt blessing. This vacation for them is all I could provide, and you made it more than I ever could have on my own. I am truly touched by your genuine love for others and must say you’ve helped to make this last
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great property with super good view and location.  I enjoyed the close location to downtown and the beach.  The beds were very comfortable and you could hear the ocean all night.  It is a great place for a wedding and reception as well!
Manager Response: Dear D7812HAgaryp,  Thanks so much for your kind 5 star review. We agree that our views and location are one of the best in Laguna Beach. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable time with us. We would love to have you visit again soon! Sincerely, Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: Good news: Location! Love the it’s proximity to the Laguna Art Museum, Las Brisas restaurant, public beach, and downtown. Great views from rooms with ocean view. Bad news: no restaurant or room service, no coffee maker in room, bar may be closed due to private receptions, sheets on bed not first rate, tile hallways outside guest rooms are noisy.
Manager Response: Dear GoldieLawrence,   We appreciate your point of view. Thanks for taking the time to write your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our location and views. We apologize if we had not mentioned to you at check in that coffee makers are located in the cupboard in each guest room as well as coffee and tea in the lobby each morning. We hope you will stay with us again soon. Best regards, Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: This hotel has a great location, with incredible views. Room was a bit small and outdated for the price. Lots of add on expenses to the standard rate. Staff was very nice, and the roof top terrace is a great place to relax.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our stay at Laguna Inn was a very relaxing and rejuvenating one!!  Hearing the ocean waves and looking out of our room, while still in bed, and seeing the ocean water, was exhilarating!!  The location allows you to walk to any number of restaurants and shops!  We would highly recommend Las Brisas, next door to the Inn....food was absolutely fabulous!!  Urth Caffe was also a culinary delight with an array of breakfast options, from yogurt parfaits, to pistachio/ganache croissants, to egg and bacon platter.  The California Coastal Trail that runs right through Laguna Beach offering wonderful exercise opportunities.  Some reviews mention the hotel is dated....I found it to have welcoming ambiance!
Manager Response: Dear Lauri D,  Thank you for taking the time to write your review of our hotel. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed our location, having fun exploring our beautiful beaches and quaint village of Laguna. We will look forward to your return soon. Thank you again for staying with us.  All the best! Jud Z. ,Front Office

Summary: The location is great but the value was deceiving. We got a street side room that has an outside entry like a motel 6. I don’t recall seeing that anywhere in the pictures. The room was OK until we discovered a toilet leak. It appeared to have been there for a while judging from the right around the bathroom door jam. There were no other rooms available and the attendant got a little testy when I was disappointed by that and then I was unimpressed by his offer to waive the $35 parking fee. Ultimately he did offer to take half of the room but it was still pretty terrible to have a leaking toilet and a bunch of towels all over the bathroom floor.
Manager Response: none

Summary: They did a classic bait and switch on me. Made a reservation on the phone, directly with the hotel number and asked for 2 beds, higher floors, with or without a balcony and direct ocean view. I was promised a room with balcony on 3rd or 4th floor and direct ocean view; instead, i ended up on the first floor. Balcony was basically facing the outside walkway with zero privacy. When I told Jodi at the front desk what we were promised on the phone by the hotel, she just could not care less. Her words: this is what it is! Room was not well-kept, and clearly outdated. Internet was patchy, could not join a zoom meeting from the room! Again, the daily parking charge was also higher than what I was promised on the phone.   Overall, the location was good, but you can get much better deals
Manager Response: Dear ITOcal  Thank you for taking the time to give feedback. We are sorry to hear of your disappointment with the location of your room.  We will share your experience with our team as we move forward to improve each and every guest stay. We greatly appreciate your comments. Sincerely,  Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: This hotel is the same price as the Surf and Sand. We have stayed at both, and the Surf and Sand is head and shoulders above this hotel.  The door to our room opened up to our bathroom area where some stranger got a nice view of me getting dressed.  The pool has nothing to be desired.  The location and the view are the only thing the hotel has going for it.  If you are an early riser and prefer to get out of the hotel for everything you need, then you will be fine.  If you are looking for rest and relaxation, this is not the hotel for you.  We paid $800 per night ($1,000 after taxes and fees) for a King Balcony Ocean View, and were met with loud car alarms in the parking garage and a neighbor upstairs that thought it was cool to get their workout in at 6am - jumping up and down
Manager Response: Dear mpluff2021, Thank you for your review. We are saddened to hear of your disappointing stay with us. We hope you might visit again, we are sure we can provide a more relaxing, enjoyable stay. Your feedback is important as we move forward to improve our guest experience. Warm Regards Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: Great location, but lacking in attention to detail. Sink didn’t work; shower barely worked; no water to drink in room; wine selection at happy hour was cheap wine; rooms fairly small. Desk not particularly helpful, no maid service available. Not an upscale experience for price paid. Great location.
Manager Response: Dear h1g3bqtf91,  Thank you very much for your review. We value your feedback and are sorry we did not meet or exceed your expectations. We hope that you will give us another chance in the future. We are sure that we can provide a better experience.   Sincerely, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Great location. Everything is within walking distance, close to art galleries, restaurants, and right on the beach. The staff was very friendly. Hotel has chairs and umbrellas available for guests to take to the beach.
Manager Response: Dear JessMPjmp,  We are thrilled to hear that our staff were friendly and helpful. We agree that our hotel is in the best location, right on beautiful Main Beach in Laguna. We hope you will plan to visit us again very soon. Thank you for staying with us. Warm regards Judi Z. Front Office

Summary: Lots of extra charges that are not backed by customer service. $100 charge for a dog to stay at a “dog friendly” hotel?!! Anything extra is paid for and tips expected for poor service. Not impressed.  Great location but that’s about it. Pics of rooms are better than actual room.
Manager Response: Dear Tamra R  Thank you for your review. Your feedback is much appreciated as we move forward.  We are saddened to hear that we had not met your expectations during your stay with us. We do add an additional cleaning fee to guest stays when they bring their dogs to the hotel. Thanks again for taking the time to review our hotel. Sincerely Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: INN AT LAGUNA BEACH - GREAT STAY & LOCATION
Summary: This was a great choice, the location was perfect close to restaurants, shops and museums.  Never once needed a car.  The staff was super friendly and helpful.  The ocean view  room was very clean with a nice balcony
Manager Response: Dear misstvgirl, Thank you so much for your kind review. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope you will plan to return soon! All the best Judi Z. Front Office

Summary: There are fancier (and pricier) places to stay in Laguna Beach, but the location and views make The Inn at Laguna Beach amazing.  We've been back four times over the years.  The rooms are nice, but simple.  The beds are VERY comfortable.  The staff is amazing.  But we stay here because the view from the veranda is romantic and beautiful.  It is two minutes walk to downtown and tons of eating.  It sits above Heiser Beach Park with tide pools, and cliffs.  It is just the most romantic place because of the views.  And it is often seen as one of Laguna Beach's best kept secrets.  Locals recommend it to their friends.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The location of the Inn is hard to beat on beautiful Laguna Beach. However, the rooms are pretty noisy from old plumbing and thin walls -- we could hear what was going on around us almost every night. Plus, our room had a window that technically was outside, but it overlooked the hallway to the pool. So we had to keep our window closed every night to have any privacy. Just be warned that rooms that do not overlook ocean do not necessarily overlook the city (which is what I had assumed). We also wish someone had warned us about May Gray/June Gloom before arriving. If you do not know what those things are, be sure to look them up before booking a summer beach vacation here.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I are here for a wedding, our first trip away from our baby. We paid for an ocean view king room with a balcony. We’ve been put in the smallest king room with the smallest balcony on the property. We walked the property and ours is noticeably different than the rest. Our tiny little balcony is the middle picture, and the other two pictures are nearby balconies with lots of space and tables you can actually eat breakfast at. You have to move the furniture around in order to get out to our balcony, and then move the furniture back into place in order to sit down, and we’re small people. I’ve been to the front desk to request a room switch but there was “nothing they could do”. Then I asked for a discount since it’s completely unreasonable for us to pay the same
Manager Response: Dear 851jennb, We are sorry to hear that you are disappointed with your guest room. Upon arrival we had accommodated your request for a higher floor from the original room provided by the wedding block which was on a lower level of the hotel. We had let you know at that time the room was smaller but with a very nice view on the top floor. Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate it very much. Sincerely, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Highly recommend this property.  Perfect location, great atmosphere, amazing staff, and best views!  The rooms are clean, modern, and welcoming. The rooftop terrace is the best for their wind tasting every day at 5pm!
Manager Response: Dear  rharri377711,  Thank you for your nice review. We are thrilled to know that you have enjoyed your time with us. On behalf of all of us at the Inn at Laguna Beach, we look forward to your return soon. Warm regards, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: The entire experience is professional, friendly, & seamless. Love the location and the peaceful environment.  Quaint, clean, centrally located.  Hotel staff are knowledgeable and always on hand to answer questions or help in general.
Manager Response: Dear Cynthia-LAX, We appreciate your kind 5 star review. We will let staff know that they met the mark with you and helped to make your stay memorable and fun. Thanks again for staying with us. Warm regards, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: excellent service, quality and value!  The staff is super friendly and welcoming. Rooms are super clean and cute- beds are comfortable. Would definitely come back and recommend!  The only problem was that the cookies and wine were “complementary” but then there was a service charge for them at the end of our stay.
Manager Response: Dear  jb70h9pp1m, Thanks so much for your feedback. We are glad that you enjoyed our cookies and wine hour. We hope you were able to enjoy the morning coffee and tea, the sand chairs, umbrellas for the beach as well and wireless internet access.  These are some of the amenities you can enjoy while you are staying with us at The Inn at Laguna Beach. We look forward to your next visit. Thanks again. Sincerely, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: We stayed in top floor, full ocean view.  Yes, the view was amazing and easy walk to beach and shops but considering the high price I expected attention to details on cleanliness.  The bathroom door and floor were not clean.  Door was very sticky.  The sliding screen door had hole in it and also needed wiping down.  Deck cushions were stained and worn. Air conditioner very loud.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The rooms are ok, showers are tiny, and you will pay an additional $100 per night on the quote for parking, amenities, +
Summary: The rooms are ok, showers are tiny, and you will pay an additional $100 per night on the quote for parking, amenities, taxes, and other fees. And god forbid you need a late checkout because your flight is later in the afternoon.... that will cost you $50 for 2 additional hours
Manager Response: none

Summary: We sadly had a poor customer service experiences during our stay for our wedding weekend. The staff we interacted with seemed annoyed and like they did not want to make the customer happy. We expected better service for the price we paid. The location is fantastic though!
Manager Response: Dear 336katie, We are sorry to hear that we may have fallen short of your expectations during your special celebration stay with us. We have passed this review along to our staff. We are sure that we can deliver a better experience. We hope you might visit again. Best regards, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: This place is beautiful, well maintained, and perfectly located. I live not far from Laguna and love visiting because it is one of the most gorgeous spots on the CA coast. It can be a bit tricky to visit for the day so we like to take stay the weekend a few times a year. This hotel is perfect if you are local looking for a peaceful staycation or if you are from out of town looking to experience the beauty of the CA coast!
Manager Response: Dear jessicaleeharvey71, Thank you for your nice review. We agree that Laguna Beach is one of the prettiest on the Orange County Coast. We are so glad to hear that you had a relaxing time with us. We hope to see you soon! Judi Z. Front Office

Summary: There is absolutely nothing to dislike about this hotel.  Everything is fantastic and I would highly recommend to all!  Staff is so kind, rooms are amazing!  Love love love!  I had an ocean front room on the 5th floor with a balcony.  The view is amazing and being able to listen to the ocean as well as see it is such a wonderful treat for this Midwesterner!  Bed and bedding are so comfortable!  Evening social hour from 5-6 outside on the 4th floor is wonderful too!  Nothing like a complimentary glass of wine (or 2 or more) overlooking the ocean and downtown Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Dear LocntryWI,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post your review. We are delighted to hear from you. We hope to always meet or exceed our guests expectations for a wonderful time with us in Laguna Beach. Please plan to return for another visit soon! All the best, Judi Z., Front office

Summary: Best Place to Stay in Laguna Beach. My home away from home. Great restaurants and shopping nearby. Just steps from the beach where you can walk south for a mile. There is also a walkway heading north with awesome sweeping views of the ocean.
Manager Response: Dear marcdhead, Thank you so much for your compliments! We are happy to be your home away from home while you are in Laguna Beach. Thanks for staying with us often. We will see you soon at the beach! Warm regards, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: Best Location!  Greatest Staff! Wonderful Hotel to stay at!
Summary: This hotel is a gem!  Been coming here for over 10 years now and it's just so fantastic!  Great staff that makes you feel welcome and valued.  It's like coming home to someplace that's got a better view than home LOL.  Amazing views of the Pacific Ocean and Main Beach!  Fabulous roof top bar with a wonderful complimentary daily wine hour as well as a full bar.  The rooftop atmosphere is like being at a friend's cocktail party.  Great opportunity to meet new friends and end the day with wonderful views.  Can't recommend this property highly enough.  Go and stay in an ocean balcony room it's the best!
Manager Response: Dear Annonnie, Wow! Thank you so much for your glowing review of our hotel. We are more than thrilled to hear from you as our return guests for many years. We will let staff our staff know of your appreciation. We are looking forward to your return soon. Thanks again for staying with us. All the best, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Stayed on the second floor ocean view balcony room.... extremely quiet, listened to the waves all night. Best sleep in years. Staff was super nice and helpful. Ideal location- right on the beach and downtown. Expensive but if you are going to splurge, this is the place.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A peaceful state of mind with their spectacular view of  the ocean. This place is truly a gem! 100% recommended♥️
Summary: A peaceful state of mind with their spectacular view of  the ocean. This place is truly a gem! 100% recommended♥️ Will be coming back this summer and can’t wait to bring along new friends along to explore and enjoy its beauty of Laguna Beach Cali.
Manager Response: Dear jjrose19, We truly appreciate your 5 stars and recommendation. We will look forward to your return.  Thank you very much for staying with us. All the best, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Took my daughter here for a birthday holiday and we both enjoyed it very much.  The room was extremely clean, and just what I had requested....ocean view and balcony!  Staff was very friendly and despite an electrical outage, very kind and helpful when it occurred.  Two suggestions:  Liquid soap for the shower and bottled water on the premises.  Otherwise, I would definitely recommend and return.
Manager Response: Dear marymamamac, We appreciate your kind words and nice review. Thank you for your feedback, we will pass that info along to management. We are thrilled to hear that our staff performed well, helping to make your stay comfortable and fun. Thank you for staying with us. We look forward to your return. All the best, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Great location right in city center. Comfortable beds, great AC, great condition, older styling, very helpful staff willing to help in any way they can, helped us change rooms to accommodate our last minute added son, made great meal restaurants suggestions
Manager Response: Dear Bruce A, Thank you very much for your nice review. We are happy to hear that you found our staff friendly and helpful. We hope to see you again soon! Thanks again, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: Many good things....and a few not so good....
Summary: We booked this overnight stay directly through the hotel for a romantic couples get-away close to home. We LOVED the view from our room, the close and gorgeous walking trail through heisler park, and we really appreciated the amenities available to us ( wine in the afternoon, coffee in the morning, cookies early evening; high-end toiletries).  We would have given the property 5 stars,  but the attitude of most of the staff we came into contact with was indifferent at best, and some staff were just grumpy. Hey staff! Vacations are special, try to look as if you like your customers!
