The TV in our room was not working and the staff was never able to get it going for our entire stay ( we are news fans and this was a big deal for us). Even though the maintenance man Oscar was very
Manager Response: none

Summary: I think they forgot this room existed. Mold, mildew, soaking wet floor.   Internet is extremely insecure here. A simple scan on the wifi showed ask guests device name and IP.  We've stayed here numerous times but won't be coming back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This Inn is an exceptional location and is super cute. My only complaints are that the staff was not super helpful or friendly. Checking in took a long time, as counter staff was dealing with a snafu on a reservation with another family checking in. Seemed very unorganized. Given the type of Inn, one would think they would provide a bottle of water if asked. They had a jug of water up front, which was not yet filled when I asked. Rather than offering to fill or provide a bottle, they just said sorry. Not a big deal, but overall, I would have expected better customer service from this hotel. Otherwise, it is a cute place with a great location.
Manager Response: Dear lisibmac, Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your stay. We value all our guests and hope for each one to have a relaxing time with us. We are sorry to hear that your expectations were not met during your stay with us. This is not characteristic of our usually helpful and friendly staff and we apologize for that. We are glad to know you enjoyed our boutique atmosphere and location. Please come to visit again soon. Thank you again. Sincerely, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: enjoyed my stay at the Inn
Summary: Beautiful place to stay at. Quite and comfortable. Walking distance to shops and restaurants. Went to "Whole Foods" if I needed something from the grocery store. Lots of people on the beach in afternoons and evenings. I went there to get away and relax from my busy lifestyle... Mission accomplished.
Manager Response: Dear bjHP2021, Thank you for writing such a nice review. We are so glad to hear that your stay was relaxing and fun. We hope to welcome you back again for another visit soon! All the best, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Park your car and enjoy Laguna from this hotel's excellent location.  Walking one of the most scenic ocean view parks starts right out your door -- and so does the Main Beach.  Get an ocean view room and you have no reason to leave.
Manager Response: Dear leetirce, Thank you very much for your 5 star review. We agree that the Laguna Main Beach and Heisler park pathway are very beautiful, we are happy to know that you enjoyed our views. We hope to welcome you back again soon! Until then! Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Perfect beach location.  Walking distance to everything.  Nice wine happy hour.  Beach chairs & umbrellas are a big plus!  Staff is very friendly and the service was very good.  Rooms are very nice and clean.
Manager Response: Dear CaliforniaBze, Thanks very much for the kind words. It is great to hear that you enjoyed our favorable location and friendly staff. We look forward to having you visit again soon! All the best, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: Great location right on the water
Summary: You can not get any closer to the water when staying here.  Located within walking distance of great restaurants, shopping, cafes, and local art.  Lots of stairs when using the public walk ways yet you can work off that food from the previous night.
Manager Response: Dear Adventurer727743, We are thrilled to hear that you love our beach location as much as we do! Thank you for staying with us.  Warm regards, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: We booked the Inn based on location reviews.  The views of the Pacific were spectacular, but unfortunately that was it.  The property is tired and does not feel clean and welcoming.  Rooms are small and need updating.  Shower head was about 5 1/2 feet high, which is difficult for a person who is 6-feet tall.  My gut is that when this was property was new (in a different era) people enjoyed it.  It has not kept up with the times. And at the price they charge, ouch!  We moved for our last night to a property that was 75% less than this one...and - except for not having the view - a better experience. I guess the "location, location, location" adage is what keeps this place alive.  If this was a home on that location, it would be sold as a "tear down."  Needs a lot of work!
Manager Response: Dear bobj2472yv, Thank you for taking the time to post your review. We appreciate your feedback. We wish for our guests to have an amazing time with us, and we are glad to know that you enjoyed our beautiful views. We do have exciting plans in the works for our hotel. We hope you will come to stay again. Thanks again for staying with us. Warm regards, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: I enjoyed the hotel's hospitality. Great service! I loved my room with a balcony and ocean view. I wish I could have stayed longer. It walking distance to the village and I don't have to drive during my stay at the inn.
Manager Response: Dear Sara M, Thank you so much for your review. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your guest room and view. It is wonderful to hear that our staff exceeded your expectations and helped to make your stay a relaxing and memorable one.  Thank you for staying with us, we  hope to see you again soon at the beach! Best regards, Judi Z., Front office

Summary: We love this place, it’s not opulent, but clean, fresh and a lovely 3.5 star place to stay with a 5+ star view and location.  It’s priced fair, at least on the weekdays for what you get compared to other Laguna properties .
Manager Response: Dear 432greg, We really appreciate the nice review. Thanks for staying with us. We are happy to have you return again. Until next time! All the best, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Location is fantastic with such easy access directly to the beach.  Clean, beautiful hotel with a very relaxed feel... and it feels so relaxed because of the obvious hard work of ALL of the staff there!  I love it there and keep going back!
Manager Response: Dear Sherry B, Thank you very much for your taking the time to post your review.  We are thrilled to hear your kind words regarding staff. We are happy to know that you enjoyed our location and will be planning a return visit soon. Thank you again for staying with us. Sincerely, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary Heading: Terrible Experience - Inn at Laguna BeachZero Stars
Summary: We reserved our Inn at Laguna Beach ocean view room online from the Inn at Laguna Beach website. When we checked in, the person at the front desk tried to put us in a street side room. When I explained that we had an ocean view room reservation with a balcony, we were asked to prove it. That didn't feel good. After asking for them to check again using my drivers license information, we finally were given the room we requested. We were put in Room 307. Pathetically, our "balcony" turned out to be a patio with litter around the perimeter and shrubs blocking our ocean view. See the two photos to see the litter. Also, the patio was adjacent to the jacuzzi. We couldn't use the patio because of the chlorine gas toxicity coming from the jacuzzi. That was terrible. You always remember
Manager Response: Dear Gerard G, Thank you for your feedback. We are terribly sorry that you were disappointed with your guest room. We want to apologize for any confusion at your check in with us. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We have let the correct team members know about the garden area near the park pathway so that we may correct this issue. We hope you may give us another chance for a future visit. Sincerely, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Fantastic location and experience.  Views are tremendous, staff is excellent and the hotel is a joyful place to stay.  I stay here over and over because of it's location to town, restaurants, beach and shops.
Manager Response: Dear teetor54, Thank you very much for the nice review. On behalf of all of us here at the Inn at Laguna Beach it was our pleasure to have you stay with us. We look forward to you return soon.  All the best, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Very charming property ideally located in the heart of downtown Laguna Beach.  Ocean view rooms with balconies are wonderfully located throughout the property.  If noise is an issue, I suggest staying away from the first floor.  A rental car is only necessary if you plan to do daily day trips or can't walk very far.  Friendly staff.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were disappointed they provided absolutely no maid service.  The room rate was high (the view was spectacular) but the lack of any service was not worth it. We asked for new towels and returned to our room to find a tower of towels on the desk, with no attempt to even hang them up. Other hotels we've stayed at have had processes in place for Covid, so I don't think that was an issue. Cutting staff probably was more of an issue.
Manager Response: Dear NancyinTacoma, Thank you for your review. We wish for all of our guests to have a memorable and relaxing time with us and we are sorry that we did not meet that mark with  you. Guest and employee safety is a priority at our hotel. We are following hospitality industry wide guidelines. To that end as we have stated on our website and verbally to guests at check in time, we currently are not entering guest rooms for full service. We apologize that you were disappointed. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our amazing views and location We hope you might stay with us again in the future. Warm regards, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: This is such an amazing stay! Not only is the location absolutely amazing being right on the water and walking distance to downtown, but the resort itself is outstanding. From the friendly staff to the cleanliness of everything we had such a great experience. They have a free coffee bar in the morning and serve free fresh cookies and wine in the evening. I just love those kind of details.. (: The ascetics of the hotel have a very cozy beach vibe. We slept with the shutters open and fell asleep to the sounds of the ocean. We love this place so much that we are choosing it as our wedding venue. Can not recommend it enough and will be staying here again from years to come!
Manager Response: Dear lindsey23vb, Thank you so much for your review. We are elated to know that you have chosen our hotel for your very special occasion! It is so nice to hear that you enjoyed the relaxing sounds of the ocean and our amenities. We hope to help make every stay with us relaxing and memorable. Thank you very much for staying with us. Looking forward to your wedding day with us! Warm regards, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Want to go again! Was overall one of the best experience staying at a hotel. Everything was great and nothing dIsappointed. I was looking for a place to get away just me and my boyfriend and I happened to see this on someone’s story and how beautiful the room is and how close to the beach it is. We were both so welcomed and well taken care of here. First thing the front desk did was tell us they upgraded our room to a suite and the staff has great hospitality. The place is dog friendly which is a bonus and we are going to plan another trip here again this summer and probably bring our dog.
Manager Response: Dear MichelleMpunkin, Thanks for the wonderful review! Our staff are very happy to hear that you had such a nice time. Thank you so much for staying with us.  See you this summer! All the best, Judi Z., Front office

Summary: Amazing ocean views and very romantic.  The property is clean, the staff is friendly and there are plenty of shops/restaurants to enjoy.  I will be a frequent visitor and can't wait to get my family and friends to join us on our next stay.
Manager Response: Dear Chandrika Rika R, Thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are thrilled to hear that you will be returning and bring friends and family along. We are glad to know you enjoyed a relaxing stay with us. We look forward to your return!  All the best! Judi Z. , Front Office

Summary: Great location in walking distance to shops and restaurants. Nice rooms. Loved the rooftop bar and morning coffee. Located right on a lovely beach walk path. Would definitely go back again. Staff was great!
Manager Response: Dear  jillsbennett,  Thank you for writing your nice review. We are so glad you had an enjoyable experience with us. Our staff are always happy to hear that they are helping to make our guests stays memorable. We hope you are already planning a return visit! Thanks for staying with us! Warm regards, Judi Z. , Front office

Summary Heading: The best location EVER for Laguna!
Summary: Love to stay at this hotel because of the views and the location. We love the walking distance to all the restaurants, beach and all the wonderful amenities Laguna has to offer. I highly recommend this hotel to all who travel to Laguna!
Manager Response: Dear Climber482166, Thank you for staying with us! We are very happy to hear from you and agree that our views are beautiful. It is wonderful that you enjoyed the beach, the restaurants and shopping nearby.  Thank you again, we look forward to welcoming you back soon! Sincerely, Judi Z. ,Front Office

Summary: Poor quality.  Outdated bathrooms.  No housekeeping despite most hotels with some modified plan during pandemic.  Overpriced for what you get.  Wanted $50 extra to stay an hour past checkout time on a Monday!!! For the amount charged per room, invest in renovation.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I visit Laguna Beach at least twice a year because we have relatives in the area.  We have always wanted to stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  The hotel is beautiful and the staff were very friendly and helpful.  The whole property smells like you stepped into a Spa!  The rooms are wonderful and very clean.  After visiting many hotels in the area this is my new favorite place to go!  You can not beat the views of the ocean and the access to the main beach.  I would highly recommend The Inn at Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Dear Margie0911, Thanks for the great review! It was our pleasure to have you stay with us. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your guest room and view. Thank you for your kind words regarding our hotel and staff. We look forward to your next visit! Thanks again for staying with us. Warm regards, Judi Z. , Front Office

Summary: You could not ask for a better location. There is ample, but tight, parking. You are right next to the beach and downtown area which has lots of shops and restaurants. It is super convenient to walk ever where. The hotel has beach towels and beach chairs which they will loan out. All the staff were super friendly and helpful.  The rooms are nice, but it is a bit tight for a family of 4 to stay. Definitely ask to not get a room with an adjoining door if at all possible. We had loud neighbors and it was terrible. The walls are not super thick but the door did almost nothing.  The pool and hot tub are nice, though it is a bit of a tight space and other guests are rude and put their stuff out to reserve all the chairs and tables but are not there. Staff should clear things every 30
Manager Response: Dear 92cyrusb, Thank you for taking the time to submit your review of our hotel. We are taking steps to assure our guests have a wonderful experience with us and wish to return for another visit. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our beautiful location. At our hotel you may enjoy amenities such as freshly baked cookies and milk every evening, beach chairs, umbrellas and boogie boards, also wine hour every evening and coffee and tea served for our guests in the morning. We appreciate your feedback! Thanks for staying with us, please visit again the next time you come to Laguna Beach.  All the best, Judi Z. , Front Desk

Summary: The hotel has rooms with excellent ocean views.  We suggest King with balcony overlooking the beach.  Please note that off-season prices are 50% lower (not including suites--average $450-$580 per night).  Every night they offer Happy wine hour with free wine and soft drinks for guests ( Their Bartender, Joaquin, has an excellent personality with a gift of hospitality-- and knows how to make drinks.).  The beds are very comfortable and they have a most courteous staff.  The property is right along the beach with only a few minutes walking distance to the shore.  They have a wonderful swimming pool that is easily accessible to most rooms.  They offer towels for the pool and beach area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Excellent!!  Staff was friendly and helpful.  Rooftop Terrace Bar is a great gathering place.  We will definitely stay there again soon as our adults and children loved the experience.  It was close to everything we needed...food and beach!!
Manager Response: Dear joanames, Thank you so much! We are thrilled to have provided a wonderful experience for you and your family. On behalf of all of us at the Inn at Laguna Beach, we hope to welcome you back very soon. Thanks for staying with us! All the best, Judi Z., Front Desk

Summary: The location is walking distance to everything!  The view from our room... perfect!  Super friendly staff and the accommodations were fantastic.  I highly recommend this hotel if you come to Laguna Beach!
Manager Response: Dear michelelrogers, Thank you for your nice review. We are happy to hear that you had a great experience with us. Thanks so much for the recommendation! We hope to have you visit again soon. All the best, Judi Z. Front Office

Summary: This was our first trip to California.  Great choice, right on the beach with a pool and cocktail hour on the patio.  The staff was friendly and everything spotless and cared for. I  will stay there again when I return.
Manager Response: DearMaur829, Thanks for the great review. We are so happy to hear that your first trip to California was memorable, that we could be part of that fun experience for you. We will look forward to your next visit. See you soon at the beach! Best regards, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: This hotel was great for our family of four. It’s in a great location with beautiful views! Walking distance to shops & restaurants. Family friendly. Great amenities. Nice and helpful staff.  Would stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear iorg4107, Thank you very much for your nice review. We are thrilled to hear that you and your family had a wonderful time with us. It was our pleasure to have you as our guest and on behalf of all of us at the Inn at Laguna Beach we hope to welcome you back soon. Sincerely, Judi Z., Front office

Summary: The hotel was in a great location up above the beach.  Easy to walk into town with access to great shops and restaurants.  Our room was right by the pool which was a little bit loud, so we had to close the sliding door, but since the hotel had upgraded us to an ocean view room, it is definitely nothing I would fault the hotel for.
Manager Response: Dear droach104645, Thanks so much for your review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our amazing location. We appreciate your feedback and hope to welcome you to visit again soon! All the best, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Partial ocean is more of a wall. Had such high hopes of our anniversary weekend and we have an ugly wall of a view. The front desk were of no help to us. Stay somewhere else. 1k for 2 nights is such a waste!! Never again!
Manager Response: Dear marieneedswine, We are sorry you were not pleased with the view from your room. Our partial ocean view guest rooms do have unique views to each room and feature along with the balcony, a nice peek of the sea, waves and sand of Laguna Main Beach. The day you came to stay, all of our guest rooms were occupied. We are sorry that we were not able to offer a different location for you. We hope you will come to stay with us again. Warm regards, Judi Z. Front Office

Summary: My husband and I specifically reserved an ocean front balcony upper floor room and were placed in a street level room right on the public walkway. People could see and reach into our room if the windows were open. We were moved to a different room with no balcony but could also not open windows or blinds due to walkway, what's the point in paying for an ocean view room!  The rooms are not remodeled and the two photos on the website do not accurately show what the rooms look like - very outdated. The toilet barley flushed and the bathroom vanity is inside of the room (not in bathroom) which was not shown online. The bed and pillows were very hard and resulted in back and neck pain.  There was no bottled water in the room and the wine provided retails for $5!  The price that we
Manager Response: Dear travel_jp_18, Thank you for your review. We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations during your stay. We hope you might give us another chance in the future. Sincerely, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: The two rooms we were placed in were right on the public walkway so we could not open the windows. No water provided, wine in room retails for $5. Very outdated and never remodeled. Price does not justify the room!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great experience.  Staff was efficient and friendly. Location is next to beach walking paths and only a block from the main beach and downtown shopping areas.  My sister enjoyed the afternoon wine bar and I was happy to get a nice selection of complimentary cookies every afternoon.
Manager Response: Dear Mary D., Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. We are thrilled to hear that you and your sister had a wonderful time during you stay with us. We want to ensure that our guests leave us happy and relaxed and are glad  we met that mark with you. Thank you again for your review. We  are looking forward to your return for a future visit. Warm regards, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Please refer to my previous survey notes. Terrible room at ? Poolside  Downgraded to city side with a lot of noise. Didn’t agree at least to adjust the rates. I will never recommend this hotel. I might even dispute the charges.
Manager Response: Dear homayouna63, Thank you for your feedback. Management has addressed this with you directly. We apologize that we had not met your expectations during your stay with us . We hope you might stay again sometime in the future. Thank you again. Best regards, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Outstanding location, perfect for beach walks and great,easy access to restaurants and shopping. Rooms are marginal/adequate at best for the cost. Thin walls, crying baby all night next door. Would recommend for location but unimpressed by the rooms.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We really enjoyed the location and will be back. We were in room 303 ocean balcony king, which is on the south side of the property. While it has a fabulous direct view of the ocean, we could not see the sunset as that was blocked by other rooms. Next time we will ask for rooms in the north section.  Bed was comfortable, linens squeaky clean, in room safe and coffee maker. No fridge. Standard internet was fast enough about 4 mbps down and 9 up.   This room had a hump in the floor going from the entry to the vanity...almost a trip hazard.  Leaving the double windows open at night brought the sound of waves and made sleep perfect.   Parking was fine although expensive at $35, IMHO. The open patio bar upstairs was terrific. Lots of padded chairs, sofas, and many heat lamps. They
Manager Response: none

Summary: We love this place. This is the third time we have stayed here and each time is equally enjoyable. The proximity to shopping, restaurants, beautiful trails and of course the beach as it’s directly on the ocean is fantastic. The people are always welcoming and friendly. The beds and pillows are super comfy, a great nespresso in room coffee maker and a complimentary happy hour from a roof top patio overlooking the ocean. Also, there are binoculars in every room which makes looking for whales and dolphins really fun. Looking forward to our next stay already.
Manager Response: Dear Jlroberts, Thank you for writing your nice review. We are so glad you had an enjoyable experience with us. Our staff are always happy to hear that they are helping to make our guests stays memorable and love to hear when guests return for another visit. Laguna Beach is a very pretty place and so fun to explore the beaches and shops. Thanks again for staying with us. We are glad you are planning to visit again soon. All the best, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: This hotel is in the perfect location right on Laguna Beach with great restaurants within walking distance! And Greg the bartender of the rooftop terrace bar is very helpful and friendly! Great service!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Cramped, noisy, under renovation but nice view, location.
Summary: Good location on the beach, walking distance to restaurants & beach. Hotel was built in 1950s. It has been updated but it is currently "under renovation" ? They had a plumbing problem when we were there. They turned off the water for 2 hours. Banging/ hammering construction for one full day. We paid extra for a room with a balcony facing the ocean. We got a room on the first floor with a partial ocean view and street / traffic noise. Parking was cramped & challenging. "Amenities" that you pay for a minimal: small pool & spa. 4th floor terrace that sometimes has a bar.
Manager Response: Dear Avalon2040, Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback as we move to improve our guest experience.  We apologize for the noise as we completed some improvements in the hotel. We are happy that you enjoyed the beautiful views from our hotel and location on Main Beach park in Laguna Beach. We hope you will plan another stay with us. Sincerely, Judi Z. Front office

Summary: We just returned from a 3 night stay at this hotel.  We had a perfect end room (305) with an amazing balcony that overlooked Main Beach.  Such beautiful grounds and room.  I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone.  I told them during the reservation process that it was our 25th wedding anniversary trip- and they had a bottle of champagne chilling for us when we arrived in the room!   The location can't be beat either.
Manager Response: Dear Maureen B Thank you so much for your review, We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed your stay with us.  It was our pleasure to have you as our guest and on behalf of all of us at the Inn at Laguna Beach . We agree that our location is a beautiful place to relax. We hope you are already planning a return visit! Thank you for staying with us, Sincerely, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Great location to enjoy the beach. Easy walking distance for many great food and shop locations. Great staff to help with our service. Recommend you  stay more than 1 day and ocean view is best. Parking is good and safe.
Manager Response: Dear ply74cuda, Thank you for your kind review. We appreciate that you took the time to comment. Our beachfront location is amazing with beautiful views of Main Beach and Heisler Park, the tide pools and natural coastline. We are glad you enjoyed the great eats in town and our amenities, such as wine hour, fresh cookies in the evenings and complimentary coffee in the rooms as well as coffee and tea service every morning. We look forward to having you stay again soon! Thank you again for staying with us. Warm regards, Judi Z., Front office

Summary: Apparently they're doing construction on the weekends here, isn't that against local laws?  We were awoken at 8am on a Sat by heavy construction in the room next door.  Why would they put is in that room?  The hotel seems dingy, the staff is unfriendly.  This is a do it yourself hotel. No valet, no bellman, no food services on site.  Supposedly limited services due to Covid, but not listed on their website.  Other places in town providing full services.  We left by 10 and will never be back.  They did refund us for the night, but my gooodness, not how I want to spend my vacation.
Manager Response: MrWilms69, Thank you very much for your comments. We are terribly sorry for the noise incurred during your stay as we complete some improvements throughout the hotel. We hope to welcome you back again soon. Sincerely, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Expect little to no amenities. Bring your own water cause they charge you to stay hydrated. Bring your own food and snacks cause they werent provided to us via "Honor Snack Bar". For the ladies, bring your own hairdryer cause theirs was made in the 50's.
Manager Response: Dear silversadez94, Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your stay. We value all our guests and hope for each one to have a relaxing time with us. We are sorry to hear that your expectations were not met during your stay with us We do have mini bar items available at the front desk. At this time we do not leave the mini bar items in the rooms for guest safety. Hair dryers are new and replaced often. Thank you again for your review, we hope you might stay with us again in the future. Sincerely, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Great location, clean room and close to everything. Very safe during Covid times, masks and cleaning protocols enforced.perfect for our romantic escape, away from kids, work, worries and busy city life. we enjoyed the ocean, the beaches, the long walks, the clean air, the neighboring golf course, Dana Point harbor and the nearby restaurants. we will love to return during summer time.
Manager Response: Dear aloy306346, Thanks so much for your review. It was our pleasure to have you as our guest and on behalf of all of us at the Inn at Laguna Beach we hope to welcome you back soon. Thank you for staying with us. All the best, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Great location, but property needs updating and staff needs better training overall. They have a great Rooftop Terrace, but the bar and bartender is not set up properly to deliver quality drinks. The bartender is not trained properly and you should have a "mixologist" making the drinks. The pool did not have any towels to use when we arrived, so I had to call the front desk.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I chose this hotel for the location which is just great.  I had a disabled family member traveling with me and needed special accomodation, which the receptionist named Carlos provided and did his best to make her feel save and comfortable. With regards to the room, there were no sanitizers at all, which was disappointing. And the door keys were magnetizing all the time, so you better keep them away from the cell phones. I think I might be back here, but only for the location.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A beautiful break for this tired parent!
Summary: We have stayed at the Inn several times and always enjoy our stay! Friendly staff, super clean rooms, and perfect location! Such fabulous hospitality for us and our little kids. I love that beach chairs, toys, and towels were available for the beach. We look forward to visiting again!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Teenagers in a Suite with no Adult Supervision and Hotel allowed it!
Summary: Approximately 10 kids above us with no adults.  They had a birthday party with no adult supervision.  This kids were stomping, walking very loudly above us all night and all day.  I called downstairs Sunday morning, and I was told they were leaving to go have breakfast, but as soon as they returned to the room they were stomping like a heard of elephants until they left.  Horrible night of sleep, and I couldn't call because I couldn't see the phone nor did I know how to work the phone, and I didn't want to walk downstairs at 2am. So frustrating, as I needing to get away for some rest for the weekend. There were no compensation at all from the hotel other than I'm sorry!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This place was fantastic.  Highly recommend this hotel.  It has a beautiful views, a great terrace for drinks and bites. The hotel is on the beach with all of the beach toys and gear available to make a sitting on the beach pleasant and nice.
Manager Response: Dear rparra, Thank you so much for your review. Thank you so much for choosing the Inn at Laguna Beach to celebrate your special day with us!  We are happy to hear that you had a relaxing and fun time with us at the beach. We hope that you will plan a return visit soon! Sincerely, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: Unfortunately the room wasn’t as clean as we had hoped for the price we were paying, while also hearing dogs bark from other rooms. We really wished for a better outcome, however the staff was extremely polite and helpful upon checking in.
Manager Response: Dear Anthony W, Thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations during your stay. Thank you for bringing this to our attention se we may correct course. We are glad that you found our staff polite and accommodating. We hope that you might give us another chance in the future. Thanks again. Sincerely, Judi Z., Front Office

Summary: I needed a Change of Scenery from San Diego. Upon arrival and throughout my stay, Desk Supervisor Judi, made sure I had everything I needed. The room was spacious, bed was comfortable, and location is priceless. Walking distance to Laguna Beach businesses and restaurants. I can’t wait to go back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The price I booked at was a little over 400 for two nights. However, when I arrived, I was slapped with $215 worth of fees. The place is great, however, they are lying about the ACTUAL price of their room.
