Summary: Love this hotel.  It is located in the heart of downtown Laguna Beach!  Lots of great restaurants and shopping nearby! the room had nice ocean view, and walkable to the beach.  I will definitely be coming back
Manager Response: Dear gilale2017,  Thanks so much for your kind survey. It was our pleasure to have you visiting and on behalf of all of us here at the Inn at Laguna Beach we look forward to welcoming you back soon. Thank you for staying with us. Sincerely, Judi Z, Front Office

Summary: Have stayed here a few times now and it never disappoints. We were lucky enough to get an ocean view room w/ balcony that had amazing views. The hotel is conveniently located to fantastic restaurants and bars.  We parked and pretty much walked everywhere. I definitely will be coming back and highly recommend The Inn at Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Dear DesertCheeks, Thank you for taking the time to write such a nice review! We are glad you enjoyed our ocean views and great location.  We are happy to have you visit again, we love our returning guests! See you soon at the beach! Warm regards Judi Z, Front Office

Summary Heading: Kicked out of rooftop $100 Stoln swim shorts
Summary: I was kicked out of the rooftop without a warning because a guest made something up. I wish i knew who so i could make something up about them too and demand they get kicked out plus my shorts were stolen from pool.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A great get away in a workweek
Summary: Wonderful surprise in the middle of a business trip.  Loved the accommodations, the staff were on point, and the location/views could not be beat for the price.  I will definitely be coming back and bringing my wife.  After I told her she was a little jealous :-)
Manager Response: Dear DRayPrior, Thank you for writing your nice review. We are so glad you had an enjoyable experience with us. Our staff are always happy to hear that they are helping to make our guests stays memorable. Laguna Beach is a very pretty place and so fun to explore the beaches and shops. Thanks again for staying with us. We are glad you are planning to visit soon. Sincerely, Judi Z, Front Office

Summary Heading: Our stay at The Inn At Laguna Beach
Summary: We were very happy with our stay at the Inn. The room was clean, and the view was perfect! The sound of the waves crashing pleasantly filled the room. The price was fair for an ocean front room. The open bar at the rooftop terrace was a real treat. We watched the sunset and enjoyed a couple glasses of wine. The bartender was nice and friendly.  We liked the free cookies from the Lobby too!  We were able to walk to all of the Laguna cafes and galleries. Our only complaint would be that the beds were very hard.  I could not sleep well because of that, and I would hesitate to return because of it.  That is unfortunate, because I really loved the Inn. Hearing the waves crashing in our room and the amazing view from our patio was a real treat.
Manager Response: Dear  lisasY50OH,  Thank you so much for your review! It sounds like you had a wonderful and relaxing time with us, listening to the surf and exploring beautiful Laguna Beach. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our bar views and staff. Thank you for your feedback, we value our guests opinions and will take that information to the right level.  We hope you reconsider us for a future visit. Thank you again. Sincerely, Judi Z, Front Office

Summary: Not sure when you became a pet friendly hotel. For the price you  charge I really was not expecting to wake up to dogs in the hallway at 0700 am . Need better pillows. Tub had rust in the drain. Very disappointed with my stay. Lucielle Meister
Manager Response: Dear Lucielle M,  Thank you very much for taking the time to post your review. We want to thank you for bringing the pillows and tub to our attention so we may correct course as we move forward. Our goal is for our guests' to have a wonderful time with us. We want to apologize for a noisy pet waking you up early. We hope you will give us another chance and plan to visit again soon. Sincerely, Judi Z, Front Office

Summary: This is our second time staying at The Inn At Laguna Beach and it was as enjoyable as our first! We stayed in an oceanfront room (again) and the views and sounds of the ocean were a welcome respite and very relaxing. You can’t beat the location of this oceanfront hotel — within walking distance of restaurants, shops, art galleries and only a few steps onto the beautiful beach. The COVID19 protocols and protections in place throughout the property were excellent and reassuring. We look forward to returning.   Just a few suggestions...it would be nice to have a microwave and a Kcup beverage maker as opposed to the Nepresso coffee maker and wine glasses please!
Manager Response: Dear SGBottomley,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review of the Inn at Laguna Beach. We are always happy to hear when our guests have had an amazing time with us and are happy to have you as a returning guest. The views from our beachfront hotel are beautiful. We are right in the heart of the Laguna Village and this makes our location so convenient and fun. We appreciate your suggestions and will definitely let our managers know your thoughts. Thank you again for staying with us, we are looking forward to your next visit. Warm regards, Judi Z, Front Office

Summary: Great place, I really enjoyed staying here even though the room wasn’t the best (room101) for sure I’m coming back everything around this hotel is lovely the food the people the beach THE WINE! Beautiful !
Manager Response: Dear rodriguezmelissa, Thanks so much for your nice review! We love your enthusiasm for the wine! We really enjoy providing wine hour for all of our guests daily as well. The evening beach views are spectacular. We have several different types of ocean view rooms from partial view to full view with or without balcony. You may choose the room type that are shown on our website when you make your reservation with us. Thanks again for your feedback. We are thrilled that you are planning a return visit soon.  All the best, Judi Z,

Summary Heading: Room location is everything. Ocean View is more like Peek a Boo for this room.
Summary: Decided to make another quick jaunt to Laguna Beach this last September. We’ve been rather lucky as far as pricing goes for The Inn at Laguna Beach, so we decided to stay there again even though its only been a few weeks when we were there last.  At check in, we were pleasantly greeted however our “Ocean View Queen/Queen balcony” was not yet ready for occupancy and we were given the choice to wait for it or take another room. We decided to take the ready room as it would be a number of hours before we could physically check in.  We ended up in room 306, although this room is supposedly an “Ocean View” room, I beg to differ. I have to honest though. they offered to let us see the room and make the choice ourselves. This room is located right at the top of the stairs if you choose
Manager Response: Dear Nativecal, Thank you very much for staying with us. It is always nice to hear from our returning guests. Thank you for sharing your feedback during your stay!  We are glad we were able to accommodate an early arrival for you. Our boutique hotel is perched atop the cliff on Main Beach in Laguna Beach. Our ocean view rooms are located on several levels. Some of our ocean view rooms feature views of the Main Beach  with breaking waves and beach view, while others look across the ocean towards Catalina Island and along our rocky coast. There are several areas that feature privacy landscaping while  still maintaining the view. Our ocean view queen queen rooms feature tub shower combo. The ocean view king rooms have the walk in shower. We are glad you enjoyed the larger patio, lounge chairs and the additional view down the coastline from your guest room. We want to ensure that our guests leave us happy and relaxed and hope we met that mark with you. Thank you again for your review. We  are looking forward to your return for a future visit. Warm regards, Judi Z, Front Office

Summary: The location was perfect.  We were able to find a room with two queen beds.  The availability of beach towels, chairs, and umbrellas was a nice touch.  The staff was very courteous and helpful, allowing us late checkout to await our ride home.  On the down side, there was quite a bit of external noise on our last night.  The lack of a restaurant was not a problem, as there were many restaurants within waling distance.  The room rate was a little high, even with the stay two nights and get the third night free deal.  Nonetheless, overall, I recommend the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Richard Novak, Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed our beautiful views and convenient location. We appreciate the 5 star review and recommendation.  We hope you will stay with us again the next time you visit Laguna Beach Sincerely, Judi Z,  Front Office

Summary: I wish we could have booked an additional night. My wife and I had such a wonderful time. We got amazing sleep. The view was incredible. The amount of amenities included was really neat. Espresso in our rooms. Wine hour. Cookies and milk. We felt spoiled. And we hope to come back with other families members so they can be spoiled too.
Manager Response: Dear ljgarcia, Thank you very much for your wonderful review. We really appreciate your kind words and are thrilled to hear that your time with us was everything you had expected and more. We can't wait to welcome you and you family back for another visit soon. All the best, Judi Z.  Front Office

Summary: This hotel is located at a great location adjacent to main beach and the Heisler Park walking trail. it allows for easy strolls to so many local stores and eating/drinking establishments. The hotel offers a nice "nightly wine event" on the top floor overlooking the beach that is not to be missed. My only complaint was that our room had ants in bathroom area on the day we were checking out.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The property is beautiful! It is right on the ocean and just walk down the stairs from the hotel and your feet are in the water. We kept our doors open and our screens closed so we could hear and see the waves. The wine reception was a great touch!
Manager Response: Dear Guide37211952939, Greetings from Sunny Laguna Beach and thank you for the grand review. It's a pleasure to know you enjoyed your stay with us. Our amenities combined with our exceptional staff make our hotel unique and I'm glad you thought so too. On behalf of our entire team we thank you for choosing The Inn at Laguna Beach and look forward to welcoming you back. Best regards, Sofya

Summary Heading: Great location and view at The Inn at Laguna Beach
Summary: The Inn at Laguna Beach offers a perfect location to the heart of downtown Laguna Beach, and also have a breathtaking view of the ocean and access to everything you need for a fun getaway. I would highly recommend The Inn for anyone who wants a great hotel with the perfect location for a great price.
Manager Response: Dear jennifercapunitan, Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach! Our Ocean View rooms have a breathtaking views and our convenient location puts our guests in walking distance to some of the best beaches, shops and restaurants Laguna has to offer. Thank you again. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future. Best regards, Sofya

Summary: Amazing views. Amazing location. Amazing staff. Amazing place to stay. I could literally talk about my experience for hours. Amazing food. My stay was amazing! I didn't come in thinking I had an expectation and everything about my experience was above whatever expectations I had.
Manager Response: Dear stanmccorkle, Thank you for your kind review! We are always thrilled to read about our guests experience.. I am pleased to note that you were satisfied with the level of service provided by our staff and that you enjoyed our Hotel in the heart of Laguna Beach. Our goal is to ensure our guests leave with an exceptional experience and we are glad we met your expectations. Enhancing our guests amenities are a top priority and we appreciate all feedback. On behalf of our entire team we thank you for choosing The Inn at Laguna Beach and look forward to your next visit. Best regards, Sofya

Summary: Would prefer a cleaner bathroom, later check out and more friendly coffee staff to pour coffee. The hotel is in a great location, but the parking is first come first serve. 11am is way too early of a check out time.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed in the top floor king room with view and my expectations were exceeded in every single way from check in to check out. The sound from the waves was very soothing as I fell asleep, the coffee service in the lobby in the morning was a great way to start the day! I will certainly be staying at this location more often every time I visit the area!
Manager Response: Dear scottmroach, Thank you very much for taking the time to post your nice review. We are thrilled that your time with us was enjoyable and relaxing. We agree that the sounds of the ocean waves are wonderful to hear. We are glad you enjoyed our morning coffee service and our friendly staff. Thank you for staying with us, we are happy to hear you are planning to stay again the next time you are in Laguna Beach. Warm regards, Judi Z Front Office

Summary: I stayed at  the  inn  at laguna  Beach from September 22nd to September 30th.  When  I checked  in  I was  told there wouldn't be any room services for the time I would be there due to the pandemic it was  a supposedly a recommendation of the  cdc. If I needed  anything  I should  call  the  front desk and they would bring it up. I went  on  the  cdc website and couldn't  find any such recommendation.  Since I wasn't getting all the amenities that was on the  website when  I booked  on April 1st i spoke  with the manager. Since I  wasn't getting a reduction in rate I didn't think a reduction in amenities was right.  Reluctantly the manager agreed to be sure housekeeping would come everyday.  I was disappointed when I had to pass the used towers and trash in the hallway. Not
Manager Response: Dear upsetkathy, Thank you for sharing your review. Now during COVID-19 pandemic our priority number one is our guests and employees safety, so we are following CDC guidelines and not providing daily housekeeping stayover service to make sure no one is entering your room during your stay. But, as you mentioned, we made an exception for you and we were providing daily housekeeping service for you. We do provide all the amenities that are advertised on our web site. Our pool and jacuzzi are open, we provide beach towels, chairs and umbrellas, we also serve tea and coffee in the morning, wine hour and cookies in the evening. Thank you for taking the time to bring your experience to our attention as it is appreciated. Best regards, Sofya

Summary: The rudest housekeeping staff I’ve ever had the opportunity of dealing with. We got a knock on our door at promptly 11a. I told the staff that we were just cleaning up, packing and would be out of the room shortly. She curtly informed us we were to check out by the 11a time. Now I’ve stayed in 100’s of hotels in the past few years and this was the worst experience I’ve had with a housekeeper. I checked my bill after checking out and noticed an unusually pricey parking fee. I called and they informed me that they had overcharged me for parking (btw, the most expensive overnight parking charge I’ve seen). The desk clerk was unapologetic, gave no explanation as to why I was overcharged.. The room was small, but nicely furnished. The location was fair, amenities adequate. But for
Manager Response: Dear MattN2345, Thank you for submitting your review. We are sorry to hear of your disappointment with our services at this time. We do apologize for the clerical error. We want to thank you for bringing this to our attention so that we were able to resolve it quickly. Our front desk and housekeeping staff are well trained, friendly and knowledgeable. We apologize if we fell short of your expectations during your stay. We hope you enjoyed exploring Laguna Beach and the amenities we offer at our hotel. We hope you will give us another chance in the future.  Sincerely, Judi Z Front Office

Summary Heading: Amazing experience at The Inn at Laguna Beach
Summary: The Inn at Laguna Beach is a very special place, The obvious draw is the spectacular views of the Pacific. It is definitely worth it to get an ocean view room. This gem is a perfect combination of California cool and boutique classy. The impressed us with hitting it on all the details; free coffee every morning, comp wine in the afternoon, in-room Nespresso machines, beach chairs and umbrellas... the list goes on. Every single memeber of the team at this hotel were top notch and they genuinely serve you with a smile. We liked them all but Ekaterina or "Kat" is our favorite! We did a reservation snafu that was totally our fault. Kat and her team pleasantly helped us to navigate through it and saved the day! We will definitely return to The Inn at Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Dear Benerps, We thank you very much for staying with us! We are glad that you enjoyed our beautiful view and the amenities we offer. On behalf of all of us here at the Inn at Laguna Beach we thank you for the kind words and cant wait to have you visit again soon. All the best, Judi Z Front Office

Summary: This Boutique hotel is casual, yet luxurious. Our balcony had a stunning ocean view and overlooked Heisler Park.  We were only steps from Main Beach and we walked everywhere. Morning complimentary coffee is served each morning in the lobby and cookies/milk at night.  The rooftop lounge is a lovely spot to enjoy wine from 5-6.  We are already planning our return visit!
Manager Response: Dear NRH88, Thanks so much for your glowing review. We are truly thrilled that you enjoyed our hotel on the beach. Our guests really love our location. Thank you for staying with us. We are glad you are planning a return visit soon!  Warm regards, Judi Z Front Office

Summary: We stayed for a few days to get away from the relentless heat inland. Beach front was the primary criteria so we considered the entire SoCal coast. Laguna Beach and The Inn at Laguna Beach ticked all the boxes. The Inn is lovely and walking distance to everything; the beach, bluff trail and restaurants. The rooms are pricey and could use updating but even though it’s right on PCH all we could hear was the surf. Note, The Inn and all of LB take COVID measures seriously.
Manager Response: Dear ldcorrea77, Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your recent stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach. Our convenient location along with our easy access to Laguna's best beaches makes The Inn the perfect location for every beach getaway. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Thank you again. Best regards, Sofya

Summary: The location is wonderful, super convenient and also the beach is reachable by meters away . the room is big for a family trip , but fine for a couple . sea view is great . very relax trip with kids around
Manager Response: Dear zshen813123,  Thank you very much for your nice review. It was a pleasure to have you and your family stay with us. We are happy you had a relaxing beach vacation here in Laguna Beach. We would love to welcome you back soon. Sincerely, Judi Z Front Office

Summary: I made my reservation April 1St 2020 for 8 nights. When I checked in on Sept 22,2020 I was informed there's no daily housekeeping and if I needed anything to call the front desk and it would be delivered.  The reason for this is the pandemic and they're following CDC guidelines.  Since I had to pass TRASH and USED TOWELS on my way to my room and I was not getting a reduction in the room rate I looked up hotel guidelines and didn't see any such guideline on the cdc's website. Since I was told this was for my protection as well as for the staff how can the hotel be concerned about anyone's health when I had to pass the trash and towels and the hallway is probably not 6 feet wide. Keep in mind the average price for the room was $300.00 a night. So yes I have posted pictures to back
Manager Response: Dear645Kathryns,   Thank you very much for your feedback. We value all of our guests and wish for each one to have a memorable and relaxing time at our hotel. Guest and employee safety is a priority at our hotel. We are following hospitality industry wide guidelines. To that end as we have stated on our website and verbally to guests at check in time, we currently are not entering guest rooms while our guests are staying with us. We did make an allowance for you during your stay, servicing your room every day at the time you requested. Our hotel has a lovely location on the beach where you may see beach towels and picnic items as we are cleaning the hotel daily. We thank you for choosing our hotel for your 8 day vacation in Laguna Beach. Sincerely, Judi Z Front Office

Summary: We had a great experience staying at The Inn at Laguna Beach! The location, the friendliness of the staff, the view, the room were superb, and we can't wait to be back! We highly recommend this place!
Manager Response: Dear Lenaakelly,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review of the Inn at Laguna Beach. We are always happy to hear when our guests have had an amazing time with us. The views from our beach front hotel are beautiful. We agree that our friendly staff are superb at their position, they will be happy to hear your kind words. Thank you again for staying with us, we are looking forward to your next visit. Warm regards, Judi Z Front Office

Summary: As I sit here in the lobby of the hotel, waiting for housekeeping to finish cleaning up the room before I can check in, a Caucasian guy checks in and the person who checked in me in offered to upgrade his room. They were called a bellman (wait I thought they didn’t have one?) and their luggage cart is in the lobby. No one told them no as they did me.   When I checked in (I’m Asian), I was met with NO. No, your room isn’t ready. No we don’t have a bellman to help you with your luggage. No, we can’t store you luggage.  No this no that. Maybe my race has nothing to do with it but it always makes me wonder how people can be so welcoming to one and not the other. We paid $600 for our room. Luckily for this hotel, they are in the heart of downtown Laguna beach otherwise, we would opt
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: First Stay at Inn at Laguna Beach
Summary: The view is what you pay for. I would have preferred a little more privacy on the balconies. But the one thing that I felt needs to be in the rooms is a microwave. You have no food or room service at the hotel so there should be a way to bring food back and heat it.  I was surprised by that.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Exceptional service from the staff from the moment we walked into the lobby.  Our room was very clean and the terrace view from our room of the ocean was perfect.  I would highly recommend anyone who needs to get away for an evening or celebrating a special occasion.  This is Orange Counties little gem by the beach.
Manager Response: Dear dianalegz007, Thank you so much for your wonderful review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed a relaxing getaway at our hotel. Our staff will be pleased to hear your compliments. Thanks again for staying with us, we hope to have you visit again soon. Sincerely, Judi Z Front Office

Summary: This place is amazing.  It is centrally located and in walking distance of everything.  Room was clean, close to the beach, close to a nice restaurant.  The pool is great and overall the entire experience was amazing.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our first trip out during the pandemic.  The good points:  The hotel is well situated so that you are on the sand in 2 minutes, and able to walk to restaurants. The staff was friendly. Enjoyed hearing the waves break on the shore.  The bad:  So very much money for what is really an adequate room: modest size bedroom, tiny bathroom, small balcony.  Not a refrigerator, only a "drink cooler", but ours didn't work. But, the room base price was $459 per night.  Plus tax. Plus Amenity Fee. Plus Parking Fee.  So, $600 a night by the time we were done.    Too much money for a basic room.  Sorry, but it's true.  If you are very wealthy and have money to burn, I guess it's worth it. If you are not, this is not a good value for your dollar.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Inn for Safety, Quality & Location
Summary: In this time of COVID 19, we were very pleased with the concern for guests exhibited by the Inn at Laguna Beach.  It is a first class property with lovely grounds and a great location overlooking the Pacific Ocean.  We had an ocean view room but no balcony.  The room was spacious and well maintained.  Masks in the public places for guests and staff were required.  The Rooftop Bar was a great location for a late afternoon or evening beverage.  Very short walk along the ocean path to the Las Brisas Restaurant with great socially distanced dining outdoors.
Manager Response: Dear Kath R, Thank you very much for your kind review. We value all of our guests and wish for each one to have a memorable and relaxing time with us. Guest and employee safety is a priority at our hotel. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your guest room and the Rooftop Bar. Thanks again for staying with us. We hope you will plan to return to beautiful Laguna Beach soon. Warm regards, Judi Z  Front Office

Summary: Had the most wonderful time!  Location of hotel was perfect for  walking anywhere in town. Weather was beautiful!                                                                                       Hotel staff was great and all safety measures were taken for all hotel guests.  Perfect family vacation!
Manager Response: Dear BMillerTarzana, Thank you for your nice review. We are thrilled that you had an enjoyable stay with us. Our guests love the location, close to the great restaurants and shops of Laguna Beach. Thank you so much for staying with us, we look forward to your return. Warm regards, Judi Z Front Office

Summary Heading: Always love the ocean sounds and fresh ocean air
Summary: Staying at the Inn is always a relaxing experience but make sure you check in on time to enjoy the roof top view before sunset.  You will certainly feel relaxed hearing the sounds of the surf and enjoying a stroll long the beach.  If you walk into town there are great restaurants and cool shops to enjoy.  Of course if you love Gelato stop at Dolce Gelato for a delicious taste experience.  Walk up the path to Las Brisas for a great margarita and delicious food.  You will enjoy a wonderful time here.
Manager Response: Dear Magprostho, Thank you very much for your kind review. It is always wonderful to hear from our guests and we are beyond thrilled that you had a relaxing and memorable time with us. Enjoying the beach and tasty treats in town is among our guests favorite activity along with visiting our Terrace Bar. Our genuinely friendly staff are happy to assist you. We can’t wait to have you visit with again! Warm regards, Judi Z

Summary: I would really give this place 4.5 stars for the ocean view balcony rooms but trip advisor doesn’t allow that ranking.  The Inn is a great option for those looking for a low key beachfront small hotel... we purchased the ocean view balcony- I would recommend this room category-we were in room 106- which offered beautiful views of main beach- the hallway is covered but semi outside- so it felt safe and stairs next to our room lead to the lower parking garage- easy to get to our car and to the beach- so easy!!! The hotel has someone stationed by those stairs with beach chairs, umbrellas, and towels- so you don’t have to worry about any of that!! Very convenient!!!  The room itself was comfortable- awesome balcony- main stairs to public is outside of balcony about 25 feet away- so
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were looking for a simple, relaxing, no hassle trip to the beach to a) just get out of the house, b) celebrate my husband’s birthday and c) celebrate a milestone anniversary that was necessarily ignored and left uncelebrated during the pandemic lockdown. We just wanted to lay around all day drifting in and out of sleep to the sound of the waves. The Inn delivered in EVERY way! With light traffic, the trip from LA was less than an hour. From allowing us to check in early to giving us our choice of rooms when we did check in, The Inn was extremely accommodating. Large, nicely appointed rooms, lovely balconies overlooking the beach and steps from town, coffee shops and a plethora of dining options - the location was perfection. It was obvious the staff were making a concerted
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff was really kind upon arrival and offered us a free upgrade. But for $950/2 nights I was expecting luxury rooms. The room was very run down. The carpets were damp and coming up by the entry, the bathroom door didn’t close all the way, the “king bed” was small, the smoke alarm was beeping and was then removed but not replaced. Overall the room was very shabby and motel-like for such a high price. Wonderful location, way too overpriced for the room.
Manager Response: none

Summary: There’s a lot to like about this hotel. Great service. Wonderful views. Recently remodeled. Roof top bar (even during Covid). My only complaint is that we asked for an oceanfront room and the one we got was just above the pool (room 310). Now if you want to jump from the patio into the pool it’s perfect. Otherwise, it’s a noisy room with kids in the pool and people in the Jacuzzi with boom boxes (which management did ask them to turn down). Maybe just avoid this high-priced noisy room. Highly recommend Las Brisas restaurant right next door. Equipped for social distance.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here for only one night because was unsure what the experience would be like. Well it was definitely worth it and I will be planning another trip soon! The staff were very nice and helpful. The room and public areas were very clean. And best of all the views were beautiful.
Manager Response: Dear RowanTatiana, Thank you for writing your nice review. We are so glad you had an enjoyable experience with us. Our staff are always happy to hear that they are helping to make our guests stays memorable. Laguna Beach is a very pretty place and so fun to explore the beaches and shops. Thanks again for staying with us. We are glad you are planning to visit soon. Warm regards, Judi Z

Summary: The room and experience was one of the best beach experiences ever! We had a balcony view (which I recommend) that was amazing. The rooms and hotel are clean. The hotel staff was very friendly and very helpful. BUT the view from the balcony was the best!!! We plan to make this our go to destination anytime we take a trip to the beach.
Manager Response: Dear gbalentine3, Thank you very much for your kind review. It is always wonderful to hear from our guests and we are beyond thrilled that we are your new go to beach destination. Our genuinely friendly staff are always happy to assist you. We cant wait to have you visit with again! Sincerely, Judi Z

Summary: So I’ve been reading that now more than ever, it’s good to take a little time away if you can. I decide a quick beach getaway was just what I needed.   I really wanted something further south (I’m in LA) and something on the beach side with a balcony, not on the other side of PCH. I was also looking at COVID precautions, whether or not there was A/C (not every property has it), and of course, location.   Well, I am typing this as I sit on my balcony overlooking the sea (room 203). The Inn at Laguna Beach had everything I was looking for. They’re enforcing COVID precautions and doing lots of cleaning. The staff is friendly, the hotel is clean and cute. It seems there may be lots of areas to explore within the hotel (I know there is a rooftop area) but due to COVID a lot of their
Manager Response: Dear 465 danam, Thank you very much for your glowing and candid review of our hotel. Laguna Beach is an amazing and beautiful place to explore. We hope you come to visit again and take advantage of our Pacific Terrace that features one of the best views in all Laguna with tasty drinks as well. We are thrilled that you were able to relax at the beach and enjoy the restaurants and shops  of the village. We too are looking forward to your return. Thanks for staying with us and see you soon! Warm regards, Judi Z Front Office

Summary: After months of being cooped up at home we decided to venture out for a short staycation before our daughter goes back to school.  Our stay far exceeded our expectations.  Alyssa, the professional and courteous front desk agent, made sure our trip got off to a right start.  Our kids’ eyes lit up when she told them about the milk and cookies they could get in the evening.  Alyssa expressed warmth and hospitality in a laid back, non-pretensions manner which was greatly appreciated.  Judy, the front desk agent in the evening was equally as gracious and we enjoyed chatting with her about local restaurants.  The property itself is quite pristine with breathtaking ocean views from the Laguna Beach bluffs.  By far, we had the closest beach view we’ve ever had a beach hotel.  You can
Manager Response: none

Summary: If your looking for convenient beach access this is the spot! Close to galleries and restaurants. Pool is small but enjoyed it everyday of our stay. Music at the pool & terrace bar would improve the awkward silence especially on the terrace.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Get a room with Ocean View
Summary: Not worth the stay for a room with a view of the street. If you are gonna stay here spend the money for ocean view. Too many fees and taxes, make sure you get the full price before booking. Great location and nice hotel but no any extras
Manager Response: Dear joverb603651, Thanks so much for your review. It was our pleasure to have you as our guest and on behalf of all of us here at the Inn at Laguna Beach we hope to welcome you back soon. We agree that our location is amazing, close to shops, restaurants and just steps to the beach. We have many room view types at our hotel including the village view rooms, pool view and ocean view rooms as well. We hope you will plan a return visit to our hotel. Sincerely, Judi Z Front Office

Summary: I enjoyed my time there and everyone was helpful and pleasant! The inn had a very nice pool and wine bar at 5, I would come back for sure, also they give you towels, chairs and umbrella if you stay there.
Manager Response: Dear Jessehenrici, Thank you very much for taking the time to post your review. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed the pool and our wine hour at the Terrace Bar. Our friendly staff will be pleased to hear your compliments. Thanks again for choosing us, we look forward to your return. All the best, Judi Z Front Office

Summary: I had one of the Best views Room 508 Very relaxing & peaceful.  The bartender on the 4th floor rooftop mixes the best drinks. And the Restaurant next-door That is walking distance has good breakfast & You could just walk down to the beach everything is walking distance I suggest staying for two days to get the full experience👍🏼 Thank you
Manager Response: Dear mserlka21, Thanks so much for your review. It was our pleasure to have you as our guest and on behalf of all of us here at the Inn at Laguna Beach we hope to welcome you back soon. Thanks for the kind words, we will let our great bartender know you enjoyed his drinks. We agree that  our location is convenient and a beautiful place to relax. We hope you are already planning a return visit! Thanks again, Judi Z. Front Office

Summary: Upon checking in we were asking to pay a daily resort fee and an amenities fee (I think this is what they were called). I asked the staff member why this wasn't included in my total and he said it's something they charge upon arrival. I have never had this happen and it impacted my whole experience. As you can imagine, we were very excited to finally have a get-away weekend during these crazy times. We were comfortable with the dollar amount that we had commit to paying. Both me and my guest had saved up for this weekend and that was how much we could afford. The additionally cost was something we didn't agree to. I travel all the time all over the world and have never had an experience like this. The staff member was just repeating the fact that this was a mandatory fee and
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was a trip taken with a friend and We both had our daughters with us.This was a trip we took after 12 years and may not be able to do another one for several years. So it was a special one. But the hotel was the only part of our trip that we are not happy about.
Manager Response: Dear rachelsutaria2020,  Thank you for your feedback. I am very disappointed we did not meet your expectation. Our goal is to provide an exemplary experience. I would like an opportunity to connect with you directly to discuss your stay in further detail so we may correct course. At your convenience, can you email slukina@thelagunabeachhouse.com? I appreciate your review.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: The amenity fee, which is very reasonable, included wine hour, cookie hour, next morning coffee, AND the use of towels, chairs, umbrellas, body board for the waves! You just walk from your room down a few steps, grab the beach items and you are RIGHT in the sand immediately. Simple property and nicely decorated. We paid for an ocean view room AND the whole wall IS the window!! FAB-U-LOUS!!!! You can walk right to restaurants - like literally across the street. We are going back for sure!
Manager Response: Dear E6420CYmicheleb,  Thank you for the kind review. We are always thrilled to read about our guests experience during their stay. I am pleased to note that you were satisfied with the level of service provided by our staff and that you enjoyed our hotel in the heart of Laguna Beach. Our goal is to ensure our guests leave with an exceptional experience and we are glad we met your expectations. Enhancing our guests amenities are a top priority and we appreciate all feedback. On behalf of our entire team we thank you for choosing The Inn at Laguna Beach and look forward to your next visit!  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: July 8-11, 2020  The Inn at Laguna Beach!  What a slice of paradise!  What a life-saver!!!  There aren’t enough words to express my thanks & appreciation to this facility and their amazing staff.  After a very challenging, stressful, uncertain few months of trying to plan my daughter’s wedding in the midst of this pandemic, with many changes of plans and cancellations etc, they were the answer to my prayers!  There were times when I wasn’t sure whether we were going to be able to pull off this wedding in the midst of Covid, but when I finally made contact with the people at The Inn, suddenly, my fears began to ease, and all the details began to fall into place.  From my first email to sales manager, Scott Burdick, to my interactions with the on-site team, John Richardson, Elisa
Manager Response: none

Summary: The rate was 189, but once they add $35 for parking, tax, and a $25 amenity fee, it was closer to $300. Even though the hotel is on the beach side, our room was facing the street.  We couldn't sleep because of the constant street noise.  It was horrible.  Also, a landscaper woke us up a little after 7am, when we had planned on sleeping in.  The lobby had gnats in the waiting area. On a positive note the staff was friendly and very informative.
Manager Response: Dear anthonyota74,  I am sorry to hear that you didn't enjoy your recent stay with us. We have a lot of different room types and your reservation was for Village View room, so it is facing the street, but please try our breathtaking ocean view rooms next time! We are glad that you were satisfied with level of service provided by our staff.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary Heading: Great Front Desk Staff, Alyssa was the best!!
Summary: This review is long overdue. Alyssa at the front desk staff is the model all agents should strive for. She was always helpful and kind. When parking was crowded, she immediately moved her own car to make room so we did not have to park on the street. She remembered my wife's favorite wine and and greeted us personally each time we came in from outside. Thank you Alyssa for making our stay special!
Manager Response: Dear Andrew,  Thanks so much for taking the time to submit your review. We are happy to have Alyssa at the front desk, she is a valued member of our team. Thanks again for your kind 5 star review, we cant wait to welcome you back. Best Regards, Judi Z

Summary: We've stayed beach hotels and resorts from Coronado to Carmel by the Sea...the Inn at Laguna Beach just became our "go to" destination when we want to escape the Arizona heat.   The property is great for the following reasons;  beach front location, terrace bar, pool, views, service, cleanliness, cheerful staff, on site parking, convenient to shopping and restaurants and more.
Manager Response: Dear John, Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed our beautiful views and convenient location.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed relaxing afternoons at our Terrace Bar. It is wonderful to hear that you will be planning to visit again, we look forward to your return. Thanks again for your kind words.  Sincerely, Judi Z Front Desk

Summary Heading: Great Staff, needs a little more Covid Precautions
Summary: We had an oceanfront King room this past weekend.  Its a fantastic view.  Its over the pool which is pretty but noisy.  Lots of public people going by and about 70 percent of people wearing masks in the hotel and out of the hotel.  The room needed to be more sanitized.  They probably should get rid of pillows that are decor.  Sofa bed seemed soiled.  The bathroom door did not shut all the way.  They are charging amenities for daily resort fee that they can not give now.  But... the staff is really nice.  The oceanfront view is great.
Manager Response: Dear reinar2121,  Thank you for submitting your survey. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the great view from your guest room and our truly friendly staff. We thank you for your feedback regarding  covid precautions. We do ask that all of our guests wear masks in the common areas of the hotel and maintain 6 ft distance for safety. Our staff are well trained and as the processes in hospitality have changed due to current events, we are keeping up with the recommended protocol to create the safest environment for our guests' and staff. We want to thank you for bringing this to our attention. Given that, we hope you will plan a return trip to our hotel for a fun and relaxing time in Laguna Beach. We value all of our guests and thank you again for your feedback. Sincerely, Judi Z

Summary: The advertised savings of “Buy 2 nights, Get 1 free” was offset by all the hidden fees (totaling $60/night). Rooms are very small but updated and cute. Pool closes too early (9pm) and you can NOT see the ocean from the pool, as shown in ads because the tall over grown hedges completely block the view from the pool. However, the location can’t be beat! You can walk anywhere in town and best of all, a quick walk downstairs brings you to  the sand and ocean! The surrounding grounds and area are lush and beautiful! The hotel overall is very clean and cute and has a great feel to it...no creepy vibes as you’d find down the street at the Art Hotel. We enjoyed our stay at the Inn.
Manager Response: Dear Myrabeth,  Thank you for your positive review of The Inn at Laguna Beach. Our hotel is located in the most ideal location - steps away from downtown Laguna Beach with the best bars, restaurants and endless shopping; and of course, right on Main Beach. That is correct, parking and amenity fee are not included in complimentary night, room rate plus tax is complimentary. We apologize for the fees misunderstanding. And you can't see the ocean from the pool, but we have have ocean view terrace with beautiful breathtaking views! We hope to welcome you back again soon!  Best regards,  Sofya

Summary Heading: Noisy room and charging for amenities that are not provided during pandemic
Summary: Hotel location and look is great, the problem on our stay was that our room was very noise with plumbing coming thru anytime someone flushed somewhere else, really loud noise that made it difficult to sleep at night. Also the hotel is charging a $25 amenities fee for amenities it can't provide during the pandemic, seems to me like cheating. They should remove the amenities fee while they can't provide for them.
Manager Response: Dear IsabelaH1, Thank you for submitting your survey. We are sorry to hear of your disappointment with your stay at this time. Our front desk staff are well trained and as the processes in hospitality have changed due to covid we are keeping up with the recommended protocol to create the safest environment for our guest and staff. We are still offering our amenities such as the wine reception every evening on the Terrace, fresh baked cookies at 6 pm and of course the coffee service in the lobby 6 am to 10 am every day. We also supply beach amenities daily. Our pool is open daily for our guests to enjoy as well.  Given that, we hope you will plan a return trip to our hotel for a fun and relaxing time in Laguna Beach. We value all of our guests and thank you again for your feedback.  Sincerely, Judi Z

Summary: We had a problem with our room the first night of our stay and were upgraded to a much better room at no additional charge. The staff is very helpful, friendly and professional. The hotel location is perfect - on the beach and close to great restaurants. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Mark Y.,  Thanks so much for taking the time to fill out and submit your wonderful review. We always love to hear when our guests have a wonderful stay with us. Our staff will be delighted to hear  your compliments.  Thanks again for staying with us. We look forward to your return soon.  All the best, Judi Z

Summary Heading: A few inconveniences due to Covid (CoronaVirus), but still a great stay
Summary: Made a quick trip to The Inn at Laguna Beach after being cooped up on lockdown for the previous 4 months in our home. We knew it wasn’t going to be the same as are previous trips there, but hoped for the best. We made a quick call to the hotel to check on current conditions just to make sure that the hotel itself wasn’t on lockdown and that the amenities (which does cost a good amount and is added to your room charge whether they are available or not) are indeed open for enjoyment. Sure enough, everything at the hotel was open. We had to wear face masks throughout the hotel when we arrived, but other then that it was a non-eventful stay.  Since there was concern over the local businesses being open, we opted for a village view room. We felt the lower cost room would offset any
Manager Response: Dear nativecal, Thanks so much for taking the time to fill out and submit your review. We always love to hear when our guests have a wonderful stay with us. The beaches have been extra beautiful weekends and weekdays. It is wonderful to take a walk on the sand in the early morning or evening time. Thanks for the nice words for Joaquin, he is a valuable member of our bar staff. Your feedback is important as we move forward to improve our guests experience with every day especially during this time. Thanks again for staying with us. We look forward to your return soon. All the best, Judi Z

Summary: If you’re looking for amazing service, and kind staff look no farther. Judy was so kind and answered al of my questions regarding our recent visit and the “lockdown” that was going on. She called me when our room was ready for check in, and again so warm and welcoming. We goofed up and they were also able to extend our stay without having to change rooms. We had an ocean view room with a balcony. I must say, it was worth the extra money for this incredible view. Cookies each evening that our children enjoyed and a wine reception each night, which we enjoyed. We will most definitely be staying here on our next visit to Laguna. The beach in front of the hotel was nice, and the hotel loans out boogie boards, towels and umbrellas as well.
Manager Response: Dear Scott Family  Thanks so much for your kind review. We are thrilled that you had such an enjoyable stay. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed our amazing views and amenities. It was our pleasure to have you visiting our hotel and on behalf of all of us here at the Inn at Laguna Beach we are looking forward to your return soon. Thanks again, Judi Z

Summary: Be sure to watch out for the $25 Amenity Fee!  Location is great. Walking distance to downtown Laguna Beach. Beautiful views. Did not like that rooms were accessible to anyone who walked up the stairs.  Prefer a higher security when staying at hotels.
Manager Response: Dear Susan,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed our beautiful views and convenient location. The amenity fee information is posted on each web site, where you can book a room at The Inn at Laguna Beach, to make sure our guests have right rate information. The amenity fee includes tea and coffee to start your day, complimentary wine hour, fresh baked cookies before bed time, all kinds of beach amenities such as beach towels, chairs, umbrellas, body boards, kids toys and volleyballs. There is only one hotel access through the main gate where front desk staff is making sure that there are guests only on the property, all other doors are locked and only guests with a key can access that, also we have cameras all over the property. I am sorry if you didn't feel safe at the hotel. Hopefully you will stay with us on your next trip to Laguna Beach.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: This place is centrally located near main beach and the main pedestrian district in Laguna beach. Offers great beach amenities - towels, chairs, umbrellas, buckets and shovels for kids. You can’t complain about any hotel stay where you can walk out of your room, down some steps and straight onto a beautiful beach. We really enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Dear eleanorvermillion,  Thank you for your positive review of The Inn at Laguna Beach. Our hotel is located in the most ideal location - steps away from downtown Laguna Beach with the best bars, restaurants and endless shopping; and of course, right on Main Beach.  We hope to welcome you back again soon!  Best regards,  Sofya

Summary: Great location, no car needed. Beach and pool within steps. Great rooftop and complimentary happy hour! Staff was very accommodating and friendly. Will spring for an ocean view and balcony next time. Boutique hotel with great amenities.
Manager Response: Dear Balesmitch,  We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your baby moon stay with us. Thanks so much for your kind review. From all of us at the Inn at Laguna Beach, we hope you will plan to return soon and look forward to welcoming you and you family back for another wonderful beach visit.  Best regards, Judi Z

Summary Heading: Perfect spot and such a deal!
Summary: So happy to book a night here, best deal by the beach and great walk to town, the beautiful Heisler Park and restaurant, it doesn’t feel like your in California. Clean room, has complimentary wine and coffee, can’t wait to come back.
Manager Response: Dear Sugaylange, Thanks so much for taking the time to submit your review. We always love to hear when our guests have a wonderful stay with us. We are thrilled that you enjoyed our location and all Laguna Beach and our Hotel has to offer. Thanks again for staying with us. We look forward to your return soon. Warm regards, Judi Z Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: I would not stay at this hotel again. The service was subpar from management. The room we received was not what was expected and when I inquired about what could be done to improve the situation, I was told that the only option was for me to pay more for another room for the next day and I would have to leave my current room at checkout (12 pm )and not have the new room until checkin (4 pm). They were unwilling to be helpful and the way they replied showed that they really don't understand customer service. The manager, Judi, was rude and told me I could leave if I didn't like my options.  Judi also was not wearing a mask properly and when I asked about requiring guests to wear masks, she again told me if I didn't feel safe, I could leave if I wanted. From my observation, the
Manager Response: Dear Traveler318247,  I apologize for the service you received, I am confident that we can deliver a better experience. I want to thank you for bringing this to my attention so we may correct course. I hope you reconsider us for a future visit.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: We recently stayed at the Inn at Laguna Beach and had a great experience. Location is second to none. Right on the beach with access to bathrooms and beach showers, pool was beautiful and we had a great time relaxing. Room was awesome and we were upgraded to a suite which had a fabulous view of the ocean. Overall our experience was really awesome and we plan on going back at some point. Carlos was the representative that booked our room and was EXTREMELY helpful and professional. Thank you for making our stay wonderful!
Manager Response: Dear realestatecole,  Thank you for your compliments to our team, as we thrive for 100% guest satisfaction on all occasions. Your feedback is important for us to ensure that every guest has a great experience. We are glad that you will be planning another stay with us and look forward to your return.  Best Regards, Sofya

Summary Heading: My Inn at Laguna Beach Exprience
Summary: The overall location of the hotel is excellent but I did not give a good review for this hotel because my family had issues in our room and with other guests next to our room not following hotel rules.
Manager Response: Dear mhinojosa71,  Thank you for taking the time to share with us your review. We are glad you enjoyed our central location. Hopefully you will stay with us on your next trip to Laguna Beach.  Best Regards, Sofya

Summary: Disappointed. Unfortunately the Inn was mediocre at best.  The view was great and staff was fine. Given the price tag, the rooms were in poor repair and showing significant signs of aging. Floors were damp, rusting was evident on hinges. The room was so poorly sound proofed that sleep was very interrupted due to proximity to the road. It may have been that the room was uneven causing a large bump near the entry door. This led the entry door to have significant gaps and allowing light and sound thus poor sleep. Lastly the rooftop “bar” was a rolling cart. Drinks were expensive and not good at all.  The cost of the room was comparable to The Hotel Del... the experience however was nearer to a Roadway Inn.
Manager Response: Dear sarahsuttonrn,  I am embarrassed by the conditions you had encountered during your visit and have communicated your notes to our team to resolve immediately, I am confident that we can deliver a better experience. I want to thank you for bringing this to my attention so we may correct course. I hope you reconsider us for a future visit.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: You pay for the location. The hotel is stripped of any amenities that I have experienced in other hotels at a lower rate. The top floor ocean view room at $800 looks tired, and worn down. Everything from the stand up shower, to the carpet, to the pocket bathroom door, etc...  However, the front desk staff and greeting committee were extremely kind and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Camper439481,  Our goal is to ensure our guests' comfort and satisfaction, and I am sorry that you felt disappointed with your stay. We hope that you will give us another opportunity to regain your trust in the future.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: The location of this hotel is by far the best in the area! It's has a pleasant and inviting environment in addition to a clean salt water pool and a jacuzzi that is shaded most of the day. I recommend this lovely place for anyone longing for a convenient beachside vacation.
Manager Response: Dear azine20142020,  Thank you so much for giving us a chance and I am ecstatic we exceeded your expectation. I genuinely appreciate your time to share your experience.  Please, come back and visit soon!   Best regards,  Sofya

Summary: I booked a 4 day weekend for my sons 21st birthday. The front desk recognized that it was his birthday and upgraded him to a better room. They went above and beyond to make sure he has the best birthday. Thank you to their wonderful staff!!!
Manager Response: Dear Wanderluster74, Thanks so much for your nice 5 star review. We are happy to hear that our staff helped to make your sons' birthday stay a memorable one. On behalf of all of us here at the Inn at Laguna Beach we thank you again and hope to see you and your family soon.  Warm regards, Judi Z Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: Definently worth the money. I would suggest getting a balcony with an ocean view. The ocean views are spectacular and right on the beach, no driving required. Try not to get a room right below the terrace, as it can be noisy at night if you are trying to sleep.
Manager Response: Dear MTVANSCOY,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach! Our ocean view rooms have a breathtaking view of the Laguna coastline and our convenient location puts our guests in walking distance to some of the best beaches, shops and restaurants Laguna has to offer. Thank you again. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Best regards,  Sofya

Summary: What a great property. Facilities and staff were outstanding. Great arrival experience and the ocean view are beautiful. I would love to come back and stay again and will be telling everyone what a great hotel this is. Lots to do in the area as well.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Be up front with guests when daily cleaning will NOT be provided and disclose, up-front the amount and purpose of the added and expensive resort fee. Its conveniently left out of online rate comparisons, making you look more competitive than you are.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a nice time. The only problem was that we upgraded to an ocean view room but it really wasn't ocean view; the bushes blocked most of the view.  Otherwise it was nice.  No restaurant.  Excellent location for the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Maggi Havas,  Thank you so much for submitting your survey of our hotel. We are glad you enjoyed our beautiful location although sad to hear about your disappointment with the view. We appreciate your feedback as we strive to improve our guest stay experience. We look forward to your return visit soon. Best regards,   Judi Z Front Desk Supervisor

Summary Heading: Disappointing.  A bit run down for the price. Hidden costs. Decreased service with full price fees.
Summary: For the nightly cost, the rooms are in serious need of updating.  There were $110 in additional daily fees that were mandatory = hidden costs that should have been included in the room rate.  Dramatic decrease in service due to Covid while still charging full price didn't seem right.  Overall, for the same price, there are much nicer hotels in the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: First time staying here. We were upgraded to oceanfront view.  Staff were very nice. Very family friendly - we were lent toys for the beach and chairs and towels so it saved us having to lug stuff. Easy beach access. Right next to lifeguards and the restrooms at the beach. Restaurants walking distance. Appreciate them following CDC guidelines regarding social distancing and cleaning. Looking forward to staying here again. My son never wanted to leave.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Inn at Laguna Beach is directly on the beach with both Oceanview and street side rooms. The rooms and grounds are dated however very well kept. Hotel staff are upbeat and accommodating. The Strand is a 2 minute walk and the hotel does have a pool.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Location is perfect, but disappointed by everything else
Summary: Booked room online, price was significantly different when we checked in, room quality is poor water damage in the bathroom. Bathtub drain was broken, toilet water would constantly run, shower temperature handle was loose, had a cockroach on our second day, visit ours on lever above us where very loud and could hear them walking.
Manager Response: none

Summary: So great view of the beach and very friendly!!!!If ur up for view at the beach and by the beach come here!!!!!!!!!!!   But the parking is crowded and tough.... Another than that it’s perfect , perfect , perfect!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I will be back. The team here is  A +.  From the top to the bottom.  Everyone was accommodating and eager to please. I was here in February, June, and will be back in September.  The location was spot on. No car needed. There plenty of food options around   Thanks for everything.
Manager Response: Dear ymiddl137110, Wow! Thanks so much for your kind words, we really appreciate it. We will let our staff know how much you have enjoyed your exceptional visits. Our location in Laguna Beach is stellar and we are happy that you think so too. We are thrilled that you are already planning a return stay. On behalf of all of us here at the Inn at Laguna Beach, thanks again and we will see you soon! Best regards,   Judi Z Front Desk Supervisor

Summary Heading: Pam's trip to her happy place!!
Summary: Incredible place- the view, the room, the service. I want to live in that room!! I was originally booked in the sister hotel, I stayed  there in February, and I was quite happy, but it was closed due to Covid. Don't think I will ever stay anywhere else now. The manager took care  of me with exemplary service. Unfortunately the  bar/dining areas were closed so I didn't get to have that experience, but Las Brisas is next door, so all good! I want to go back asap!!
Manager Response: Dear Pamela J  Thanks so much for your glowing review of the Inn at Laguna beach. We are thrilled to know that you will be planning to return soon. Thanks again for the kind words regarding our friendly service. We are looking forward to your next visit. Best regards,  Judi Z Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: We needed a couple nights away after this stay at home and found this to be just what the doctor ordered.  Quiet, restful, nice bed and bedding, staff very friendly.  We didn't have an ocean view but it didn't matter since we were only in room to sleep.  Would book here again, for sure!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This property sits on the beach. It's beautiful and soul-soothing. The room (509) had a beautiful view of the ocean. If I had anything to complain about it would be that I wasn't made aware that this room also sat just above the pool. That proved a bit noisy. I also had thought it was the "best" view (as indicated on the website), but I believe I would have preferred room 514 because it wasn't directly on top of the pool and had a table with chairs on the balcony and seemed to have more of a sunset view. I greatly enjoyed my stay, however, I wish the amenity fee would have been optional. I unplugged and stayed in my room, so I didn't use any beach chairs or anything at all. It was wonderful that late checkout is offered until 2 pm (for $50 extra) -- that helped further my
Manager Response: none

Summary: My daughter and I had a wonderful stay last week. It was very clean and the staff was amazing! Beach view was breath taking. I kept the balcony door open to listen to the waves while I slept.   They were following the COVID-19 guidelines, this made us feel safe during our stay. There is no housekeeping while you’re in the room under these guidelines. However, were very quick to get us what we needed such as towels and anything else.  Thank you- it was a much needed get away and we feel refreshed!   Can’t wait to go back!!
Manager Response: Dear Mjoneslove74, Greetings! Thank you for posting your review following your recent stay with us. All of us at the Inn at Laguna Beach are here to make sure your vacation is fun and memorable. We are excited to hear about you and your daughters' fantastic experience and look forward to welcoming you back soon for another relaxing stay. All the best, Judi Z Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: Every thing was great, except for the strong smell of urine around the sink area. We could not sleep comfortably due to the strong smell. Your room carpet needs to be clean, wash or replace. Also, after returning from the pool or the beach, the carpet get wet and the possibility or mold in the rooms can occur due to not enough ventilation. another reason rooms will smell to.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is located at a great location in Laguna beach right on the beach. Room is small but very clean. However, please be aware wall is thin and can easily hear next door. We called front desk 3 times between 10.30-11pm to tell them our next room was having a party (several people in the room)  with loud noise and music. They told us they would take care of that but it never happened until we pressed further. They did eventually contact next door and ask them tuning down but it didn't help. On the phone the front desk told us there is nothing more they can do. Well, the fact of low occupancy they could have placed us further apart at check in or they could have offered to move us. We were very disapointed with their customer service and their attitude.It was a first get
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I wanted a short weekend get away near the beach. This hotel is next to Las Brisas restaurant and nearby trails with direct access to the beach. I was expecting a better view than what we actually got. I would recommend to anyone who’s paying extra for the ocean front room to go for the top view. Our ocean view balcony room on the 3rd floor was impeded by bushes.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was a quick trip to visit friends so we didn't get to stay long.  This place has a great location. I do like the self parking.  I didn't get to go to the rooftop but will do that next time.  Location Location Location!
Manager Response: Dear Karen F.  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your recent stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach Our convenient location along with our easy access to Laguna's best beaches makes the Inn at Laguna Beach the perfect location for every beach getaway. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Thank you again.  Best Regards,  Judi Z   Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: We were happy with the property and room, just not the price, they were $200 higher than priceline. Not to mention $8 for a bottle of Coke. They allowed customers to be facemakless even with a mandatory OC Rule requiring them
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: lovely little hotel, on the beach
Summary: a cozy hotel with nice ocean views that is just steps from the beach, just literally go down a set of stairs to get there. W were lucky enough to be upgraded to a suite that had a wraparound deck. We absolutely loved it. The room isn't fancy, but it is in nice condition.The views were just incredible. We left the window open at night to hear the sound of the waves.There really isn't any better location in Laguna Beach. we never took our car out of the garage. (bummer that you have to pay $35 for parking)You can walk around to many shops and restaurants.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Dogs parking. Can hear people above us walking. Can hear people opening and shutting their doors. People yelling in the hallways. No room service. We were suppose to stay for 5 nights, we left after the first night.
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you enjoy the sounds of the ocean this is the place for you! but expect to pay $$$$ not cheap but well worth it. the parking is provide it and it is what you call close quarters I mean tight once you get parked no need to drive. all you need is within walking distance. GREAT LOCATION!! can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Inn at Laguna Beach has the best location being just steps from main beach and two blocks from downtown Laguna Beach.  Staff is great and amazing view from the terrace on the fourth floor.  The Staff is great and having morning coffee or glass of wine on the fourth floor terrace is the best way to start and end a fun day!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Smoke alarms went off multiple times from not enforcing their non smoking policy

Upgraded to the beautiful suite. It was worth the upgrade especially with things being closed due to coronavirus. Was able to bring meals back to our beautiful balcony and enjoyed ocean front dining each meal. Pool and and hot tub is great! Looking forward to returning soon!

Summary: BEWARE! BEWARE! BEWARE! DIRTY. OVERPRICED. DISHONEST. Please read my review before reserving with this so called hotel. Absolutely horrible experience. Not worth even a penny let alone hundreds of dollars. There are many other choices in the city way better and more affordable than this hotel. First: the lady at the front desk tried to overcharge me when I arrived by saying that rooms are $269 while the customer service rep said it was $215, and I had to call him and have her hear him on the phone to charge me the same amount he quoted. Second: they advertise that rooms with a balcony is more special but the reality is all rooms have a view with a balcony. Third: the so called balcony had dirty tissues all over and one of the towels in the bathroom was dirty too! I had to
Manager Response: Dear FadyEs,  Thank you for sharing your review. I am saddened to hear your stay was less than enjoyable. It was the correct rate that was offered to you at Front Desk, also when you called back to our reservations departments they confirmed the same rate, but after you asked for some discount, they were glad to provide some discount for you, also we had the same rates posted online on our web site. We have different room types at the hotel and you are right, all the rooms with a balcony have ocean view because they are all the same room type - Ocean View with a balcony and we have gorgeous direct ocean view because we are located right on the Main Beach. We also we have rooms without balconies, which are village view, standard or pool level rooms. As I know, before check in you requested to look at couple of rooms and our employee walked you to the rooms, including the balconies and I believe it was no any tissues on the balcony at that time, I apologize if you found some later. Due to COVID-19 we are doing extra cleaning and disinfecting in all the rooms, also to make sure our guests and employees are safe, we are doing cleaning only 48 hours after every check out. And I apologize that you assumed that the mini-bar was included in your rate, we always put mini-bar menu inside the mini-bar, so our guests know the rates and it was price stickers on some of the items. Thank you for the review.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: The Inn at Laguna Beach is right on the beach with sweeping ocean views. The King Ocean view room was spacious and comfortable with a large patio overlooking the beach. The hotel is in North Laguna walking distance to Downtown Laguna  Beach right across from the Urth Cafe. The hotel staff was very friendly and there was coffee/ tea in the morning and wine in the evening. I look forward to my next stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.

Summary: We came to this property to celebrate our 31st Anniversary and we were not disappointed at all.  This property was picture perfect, Rm (515).  We stayed in a Village King and the staff was so kind that they pre booked our room to have the very best room as close to the ocean as possible without booking the ocean front room.  We had an ocean view from our window and the sound of the surf with our window open.  The room was clean and comfortable and the bed was very nice as well.  The room was a little small but cozy.  Unfortunately, it rained the entire time we were there and even though the hotel was nice we really wanted to sit on the beach to enjoy the surroundings. Because we were in our room a lot we wished the room was bigger and had a table with chairs to play games.
Manager Response: Dear Tcampa,  We appreciate your great review and are so happy that you enjoyed all that our hotel has to offer and the sounds of the ocean waves. Thanks again,  Judi Z

Summary: This is a wonderful small hotel on the Pacific in Laguna Beach.  Several very nice special touches.  Our meeting was in the Pacific Room - wow what a nice place.  Rooms are very comfortable.  I will definitely return to the Inn at Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Dear  Connector48498563870, We are very happy to receive such a nice review and are glad that you enjoyed our comfortable rooms and especially the Pacific Room for your meeting. The views of our room were absolutely stunning! The rooms were very clean. The only negative is that there was no staff to help unload bags or load up bags.

Summary: Excellent location in Laguna Beach.  Fantastic view of the ocean.  Small, clean property, quiet property.   The room was very clean and up-to-date.  Very impressed.  The roof-top terrace and bar has amazing views.  I highly recommend this property.

Summary: You can not beat the Inn at Laguna Beach.  The location is perfect.  You get so much more bang for your buck here than with much more expensive hotels nearby, without sacrificing any of the luxuries.  Wonderful experience!  Highly recommend.  You will not be disappointed.

Summary: We had the most lovely time at The Inn at Laguna Beach. The staff was very friendly and always available for any questions. The location is close to several beaches and the best restaurants. Only downside, our room was right off the lobby which made for some noise through out the night. However, the room had amazing views which made up for it! We also loved the fun addition of nightly happy hour and cookies/milk.
Manager Response: Dear knlemiec61, Thanks so much for taking the time to write such a wonderful review. Summary: The real great part of this hotel is the location, right on the beach, with the boardwalk lead up to the lobby.  We expected more for the money we spent, but we selected this property for its location and that didn't disappoint.  Check in is at 4pm and our room wasn't ready for half an hour.  They offered to put us in a room that wasn't as good if we didn't want to wait, but offer of any discount or a bottle of wine.  When you are paying top dollar and the place lists itself as a premier location and the check in is late you kind of expect that they might try to offer a small token.  This place nickels and dimes you with $35 dollars a day for parking, $12 dollars of a bottle of water in the room.  Everything here is a bit of a money grab....however, the location and view do not
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent location, loved the sunset view!
Summary: From the friendly helpful staff at reception to the picture perfect sunset views from the roof terrace, this was my absolute favorite stay in LA so far!  My room faced the street so not ideal, but since I was out on business during the day it was satisfactory to my needs. Enough cupboard space and hangers. Loved that I had the Nespresso machine in the room but usually grabbed the Starbucks coffee offered in reception every morning before watching the sunrise over the waves.   The pool area is great for a lazy sunny day.   I didn’t try breakfast but it was offered as in room dining and an optional extra. Restaurants are nearby and walking distance. Massage and shopping also nearby.  Best time of the day? Between 5 and 6 on the roof terrace, free glass of wine while watching the

I was in 5th floor ocean front suite and view was amazing - as was the sound of ocean waves right below my balcony. Carlos at the front desk was super welcoming and helpful with any requests I had. This is perfect location - Heidler Park walking path is right at doorstep and the quaint town is just across street. Make sure to walk across street to have bfast at Urth Cafe!

Since they didn't have one of those rooms, the hotel told me it would cost $200 a night for better room. But in the circumstances they would do it for only $100. We declined. My biggest complaint would be the amenities fee + tax on the amenities fee which is ridiculous for what you actually get for the fee.

Summary: The Inn at Laguna Beach is our all time favorite place to stay!  The staff are so welcoming and friendly.  They make you feel like family. You can see seals, dolphins and even the occasional whale if you are lucky.  Bunnies and humming birds play in the gardens.  Sleep to sound of waves crashing on the shore.  Watch the amazing sunsets from the rooftop lounge while drinking a glass of wine at the complementary cocktail hour.  A great time to meet fellow guests.  Walking distance to fantastic restaurants, art museums, shopping, beaches...

Summary Heading: Great hotel right on the beach
Summary: We stayed in a balcony oceanfront room that was very nice.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  The location is great and right on the beach.  There were several tide pools just to the right of the hotel on the beach that were fun to look at.  The pool and jacuzzi were clean and heated.  The rooftop complimentary wine hour was nice.  Heard there were cookies in the lobby at 6pm but never made it there.  The beds were comfortable and the entire hotel was very clean.  We would return to this hotel again.  The price was on the high side but this is to be expected for an oceanfront balcony room in Laguna Beach.

Summary: Great place to stay. Excellent location, can walk to shops and restaurants, hotel has a great beach and a great pool. Staff is excellent and always available. Summary: Best location in Laguna Beach.  So friendly and the rooms are beautiful. And we really loved the wine time and sunsets at the roof terrace.
