Summary: I surprised my two grown daughters with a "Mystery Date" to Inn at Laguna in Laguna  Beach, CA USA.  During peak season, a two night stay is required.  However, in January we were able to stay just one night in a room with two queen beds.  We were on the pool level with direct  access to the pool and jacuzzi.  The pool is basic and the jacuzzi is small; but when ocean waves sing in the ears, they are perfect.  The property borders Main Beach in Laguna.  Consequently, we were walking distance to everything downtown Laguna Beach has to offer.  The beds are comfortable, the linens are luxurious.  The tv is wifi accessed; so using a smart phone, once WIFI is figured out, lots of options are there. Be sure and attend the complementary wine “happy hour” on the roof terrace with
Manager Response: Dear beckyjake123, A sincere and heartfelt thanks for your your glowing review and wonderful words regarding a visit to our hotel and Laguna Beach. We will be happy to welcome you back soon. All the best! Judi Z

A fresh brewed pot of mint tea delivered at night.  Cookies in the evening.  Wine and spread with views of the ocean.  Lots included in this price of the room.  Lovely stay.  Staff is attentive and helpful.

Summary: The Inn at Laguna Beach was amazing and we are looking forward to future stays. The views are impressive and we feel asleep to the sound of the waves.  We spent time on the beach looking at tidepools.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  The room was clean and comfortable.  It was very easy to walk to restaurants and stores.

Summary: The room was wonderful, the view unsurpassed. Loved the salt water pool and spa. The staff were all friendly and went above and beyond to be helpful. Free wine at 5 and cookies and milk at 6 are so sweet.  Minor warning: Over and above your room price and taxes there is a 25.00 Amenities fee and a 35.00 parking fee. Parking at Laguna Beach is hard to find, so you will need to park onsite.

Summary Heading: Best room with a view ever.
Summary: A dream come true. Fabulous room. Lulled to sleep by the ocean. Beautiful ocean and sunset view. Lovely friendly staff. I want to stay here again. Very expensive but worth it as a special treat. There is a heated pool and a jacuzzi and it’s a block downhill to the beachfront.
Manager Response: none

Summary: From the moment our Uber arrived we knew we would be back. We traveled with my 2 year old son and his 2 aunties (my best friends). Our room was on the 4th floor with a stunning ocean and pool view. The weather was perfect ranging from 20 to 25 degrees. We kept the screen and door cracked open to sleep to the sound of the waves. There is so much in walking distance. Everything you need and more. We were here for 3 nights but I could stay for weeks. We will be back time and time again. We ate seasoned travelers and this I can say is one of the only places I would come back to again and again. It just doesn't get old.... Until then.... Dream g of the Inn at Laguna Beach

All very clean, room service available or you can pickup coffee by the front desk and choose several healthy and wonderful places just steps away.  The location is great. Beach chairs available. I will stay there again when in Laguna.

Hotel has nice touches as coffee is available in the morning for your walk, there are cookies in the afternoon with milk for kids and drinks in the rooftop for the sunset. We. Did not get a great room (faced parking lot) but it was quiet. Room is a bit on the small size. We had breakfast everyday at Urth which is super close.

Summary: If you want to be on the beach, this is the location for that. The property needs some updating, but the staff is friendly. Very close to downtown Laguna with many places to eat. We were able to watch the sunset from the property every night.
Manager Response: Dear lamcknight,  Thank you for taking the time to share with us your wonderful review of the Inn at Laguna Beach as we continuously strive to exceed our guest expectations. We are looking forward to your return soon!  Warm regards, Judi Z

Summary: Really enjoyed the stay here. Excellent rate. Very clean, nice room. We did not have ocean view room but WOW if you do. Hotel has all the great amenities: heated pool, hot tub, beach access, paved walking up and down coast just behind hotel, city park adjacent, Starbucks coffee offered in lobby/Starbucks also across the street, easy walk to restaurants and shopping, staff nice, and rooftop bar with free wine at sunset! Could not have been nicer. No restaurant on site but room service available. Recommend for view, access to beach, and for convenience. Parking fee per day is $35. Resort fee another $25. So these are adders☹️. Otherwise, perfect.
Manager Response: none

Summary: PROs  - location - on a bluff above Main beach, excellent view, you can walk down on the beach, open your doors to the ocean sound, and be within minutes of art galleries and places to eat in central Laguna   - sustainability - as should be the case everywhere, there are steps towards saving water/energy and minimizing waste, and this is clearly indicated and carried out in the rooms  - staff - cleaners and servers did a very good job and were friendly  - WiFi - in open spaces it is spotty but not charged for  - marketing - cute logo and colors, website works well  CONs  - old - the door to our room did not fit the door frame, making it cold and unsafe, the ceiling in our room dripped water so that our bed and floor were wet, and... (yikes!) there were insects in the bathroom
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a plumbimg issue around the 3rd night. Good hotel with a nice pool. Rooms were very clean. We had to switch rooms. The hotel needs to make the plumbing stronger. Please fix this problem. PLEASE!
Manager Response: none

Summary: When I come to my LA office I always look forward to stay at The Inn At Laguna Beach - the view, friendliness, charm, value, and location of the hotel is just great! Not only are the rooms comfortable but you can also hear the waves crash the beach and waking up to the beach and the sun and the ability to go walk or work out outside makes the stay here just a blessing!
Manager Response: Dear Tourist03145183027,  Thank you for your positive review of The Inn at Laguna Beach. Our hotel is located in the most ideal location - steps away from the sand and surf of Laguna Beach with the best restaurants and shopping just a short walk along the shore to the heart of the village of Laguna. We appreciate your kind words very much. We hope to welcome you back again soon!  Sincerely, Judi Z

Summary: The hotel location is perfect when staying in Laguna Beach as you are walking distance to the main town.  The hotel is beautiful and charming.  The staff friendly and happy to assist.  We stay here annually and have visited this property at least 10 times.
Manager Response: Dear travel4fun55,  Thank you for your wonderful review! We agree that our staff members are friendly and knowledgeable. We work diligently to provide an exceptional experience to each of our guests and we are thrilled to hear that you stay with us annually, having visited many times. We are looking forward to your return.  Warm regards, Judi Z

Summary: The Inn is located right on the beach and Heisler park, and very close walking distance to the downtown area with tons of restaurants and a Whole Foods! The property is renovated, the lobby and public spaces are very nice, but the room was a little dated. We didn't get a chance to use the pool/hot tub, but they looked really nice, and the coffee in the morning was appreciated. Although you end up paying for both with an amenties fee. Also, watch out for the $35 per night parkade fee. There's not much parking in this area. Overall we enjoyed our stay!
Manager Response: Dear Jesse M  Thank you so much for giving us a nice review and we are so happy you enjoyed our beach location. We genuinely appreciate your time to share your experience on TripAdvisor.  Please, come back and visit soon!   Best regards,  Judi Z

Summary: The view is amazing from the ocean view room and the sound of the crashing waves was wonderful to listen to while going to sleep. The staff was wonderful and very helpful. Watch the shower handle when adjusting the temperature - stay closer to 1:00 at first. The water temp. is quite hot.
Manager Response: Dear coastalgirl2019,  Thank you for taking the time to share with us your wonderful review of the Inn at Laguna Beach. Your feedback is so appreciated as we continue to make guests experience our priority every day. We look forward to your return visit soon.  Warm Regards, Judi Z

Summary: I stayed here mid-week for work—boomed 2 rooms so I could bring my baby and our nanny.  The hotel was very quiet, hardly any guests.  I was still put in a tiny, outdated room.  The air conditioning was so loud and odd sounding that it woke my infant and me up multiple times throughout the night.  Check-in was not pleasant, at all.  The man checking me in made it seem like I was bothering him with my questions and requests.  The only nice part about my stay was the wine house.  I received a survey from the hotel after my stay where I gave this same review.  No one reached out to me afterward.  I always stay at the Surf and Sand or Monarch when I go to Laguna and will continue to stay there.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The location and views are wonderful, but the rooms and bathrooms are a little tired.  When we arrived our ocean view room's windows were filthy, but on request they were cleaned within the hour.  The hotel wasn't full on our November visit and they asked if we'd like to upgrade our two rooms for a price.  They explained that a daily amenity fee of $25 covered coffee in the rooms, a wine hour, and pool use and towels. The pool was not sufficiently heated to use in November, the hot tub was broken, and the wine was rot gut.  I'll never forget the five star hotel in Rome that surprised me with an upgrade to a beautiful suite, despite the fact that I'd gotten a super discounted rate.  Of course, I loved that hotel.  Why would folks in the hospitality business nickel and dime guests
Manager Response: Dear Isabellarcher,  I am saddened to hear of the conditions you had encountered during your visit and have communicated your notes to our team to resolve immediately. I am happy that our team was fast in resolving the window issue. A side note, we had just had a rainstorm in our location. I also apologize for the service you received and given another chance, I am confident that we can deliver a better experience. I want to thank you for bringing this to my attention so we may correct course. I hope you reconsider us for a future visit.  Sincerely, Judi Z

Summary: Helpful and friendly staff.  A very comfortable and relaxing atmosphere, enhanced by the complimentary wine hour from 5 - 6.  The view of the ocean and of downtown Laguna Beach are gorgeous from our ocean side room and the roof top bar.  A very quiet and relaxing location within walking distance of several good restaurants and the downtown section with several unique shops to explore.
Manager Response: Dear 383highlander1,  Thank you for taking the time to post your nice 5 star review of The Inn at Laguna Beach. Our hotel is located in the most beautiful location -  just steps away from downtown Laguna Beach with great bars, restaurants and endless shopping; and of course, right on main beach park with amazing ocean views and romantic walks on the sand. We are so glad you enjoyed our Pacific View Terrace and the wonderful view there as well as our nightly wine hour. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Warm regards,  Judi Z

Summary: Beautiful ocean views on the upper floors, fantastic patio decks on the lower ocean side rooms.  Rooms are extremely clean and comfortable.  Staff is AMAZING!  The hotel lobby smells fantastic, I want a bottle of whatever air freshener they use!
Manager Response: Dear gaylaellison, Thank you so much for your wonderful 5 star review. I agree that all of our staff are truly the best at what they do every day! We wish for all of our guests the type of experience that leaves them yearning to come stay with us again. We hope to welcome you back again very soon.  Sincerely, Judi Z

Summary Heading: Terrible Rooms that face the road
Summary: Empty Hotel but would not upgrade our room to view the Ocean.  Instead we had a room that overlooked the road and was EXTREMLY loud at night due car noise. Will go back to the Ritz Carlton in the future.
Manager Response: Dear etde,  Our goal is to ensure our guests' comfort and satisfaction, and I am sorry that you felt disappointed with your stay. It is our priority and daily goal to provide the best experience with us leaving our valued guests with an eagerness to return to our Hotel and Laguna Beach again. We hope that you will give us another opportunity to regain your trust in the future.  Sincerely, Judi Z

Summary: Great location. Wonderful staff. This is the only hotel on the beach near downtown. It is a 5 minute walk to the restaurants and galleries. The pretty hotel rooms have ocean views.  We had delicious breakfast on the balcony.
Manager Response: Dear MartB346,  Thank you for your wonderful review of The Inn at Laguna Beach. We agree that our hotel is located in the most ideal location - steps away from downtown Laguna Beach with fun bars, music, restaurants, amazing art galleries and endless shopping.  The beautiful surf of Main Beach just a short walk from our lobby. We are looking forward to welcoming you back very soon!  Best regards,  Judi Z

Summary: Outstanding staff,very helpful, Room perfect ocean view  to watch sunset and people watching..  If you are looking for an ideal hotel, this one has it all. Walking distant to shops, art galleries, and great restaurants. Will be back for R and R again.
Manager Response: Dear Melba F,  Thank you taking the time to write your review! Our staff and I are so happy to hear you were impressed by our knowledgeable and thoughtful service.  I am sincerely grateful for your kind words and would love the opportunity to welcome you to our property again. We agree that this is a wonderful spot to really relax! I appreciate your 5-stars, and I cannot wait to welcome you back for your next visit!  Best regards, Judi z

Summary: The Inn at Laguna beach was the perfect stopping point on our drive from LAX to San Diego. I requested a pan ocean room view and was not disappointed. The beachy vibe to the hotel and room made for a fabulous nights sleep in a comfortable bed. We turned the ac off, opened the door to our balcony and were serenaded by the waves. Great cup of coffee in the lobby on our way out in the morning. Will definitely recommend and would not hesitate to return if we are back in this part of California.
Manager Response: Dear fionamcn2,  Thank you so much for giving us your kind 5 star review and I am ecstatic we exceeded your expectation. I agree that our location by the sea is unparalleled. I genuinely appreciate your time to share your experience on TripAdvisor.  Please, come back and visit soon!   Best regards,  Judi Z

Summary: Love this place.  Ocean views are spectacular..  The staff was great.  The whole experience was warm and inviting.  I have come about 4-5 years now. I plan on coming each year. Highly recommend the Inn for it's service and atmosphere.
Manager Response: Good afternoon,  Thank you for your compliments to our team, as we strive for 100% guest satisfaction on all occasions. We agree that the Laguna Beach ocean views are truly spectacular! Your feedback is important for us to ensure that every guest has a great experience. We are glad that you will be planning another stay with us and look forward to welcoming you back soon. Warm Regards, Judi Z

Summary Heading: Overpriced, outdated and location isn’t enough
Summary: Dated and not worth the money Though nice, an unresponsive staff that doesn’t know how to help. Limited and spotty WiFi with nowhere to work outside room as no plugs anywhere near even a table. Public spaces old and worn  down. A beautiful location isn’t an excuse for updating a place
Manager Response: Dear emjog2015,  I am sorry your expectations were not met during your visit and have communicated your notes to our team to resolve immediately. I also apologize for the service you received and given another chance, I am confident that we can deliver a better experience. I want to thank you for bringing this to my attention so we may correct course. I hope you reconsider us for a future visit.  Best regards, Judi Z

Summary: Couples will enjoy the happy hour  Location is great for restaurants and the beach is cleaned up every day. If you like to walk there is a path to do your exercises. Coffee every morning in the lobby and milk and cookies every afternoon
Manager Response: Dear janodee,  Thank you for your wonderful 5 star review of The Inn at Laguna Beach. I agree our hotel is located in the most ideal location - steps away from downtown Laguna Beach with the best bars, restaurants, shopping and amazing art galleries; and of course, right here on beautiful Main Beach and Heisler Park.  We hope to welcome you back again soon!  Best regards,

Summary: My 5th visit to The Inn At Laguna Beach. Unbeatable location , super friendly staff, and beautiful clean rooms. The weather is great and it's the closest thing to a nite in Hawaii  without leaving the mainland. Lots of great restaurants in walking distance. You can leave the car parked and enjoy the Laguna Beach life!
Manager Response: Dear Mark A,   Thank you very much for taking the time to write such a kind review. I am so happy to hear your praise of our associates. We work diligently to provide an exceptional experience to each of our guests and I am thrilled to hear you were impressed by our associates' knowledge and friendly service.  I am sincerely grateful for your endorsement and would love the opportunity to welcome your family to our property again in the near future.  We are truly lucky to have each and every one of them on our team. I appreciate your 5-stars, and I cannot wait to welcome you back for your next visit!  Warm regards, Judi Z

Summary: Location made the trip great.  Older building, however quaint.  No restaurant on site is a drawback when hungry.  Killer views!  Extremely pricey, so can’t visit often.  Very nice couple days.  On a small cliff and directly on main beach.  Complimentary beach chairs, towels, umbrellas for use.  Not too many stairs down to pristine beach.  Staff is great.
Manager Response: Dear 351maryannec, Thank you so much for taking the time to write your nice review. I agree that our Laguna Beach views are truly spectacular! Walks on the sand are romantic and beautiful. The quaint village of Laguna with it's many great restaurants and shops are just minutes from the Hotel. I am so happy to hear that our associates have added to the quality of your time with us. We will look forward to welcoming you back again soon! Warm regards, Judi Z

Summary Heading: My favorite place to stay in Laguna
Summary: This place never fails at providing an excellent experience. Rooms are exceptional and most have outstanding views! Staff are always helpful, and everything is clean. Definitely pricey but worth it if you want to splurge with that special person
Manager Response: Dear mkelle212113  Thank you so much for your 5 star review of The Inn at Laguna Beach. It is wonderful to hear from you that our staff provided a friendly and helpful experience as this is always our goal. I agree that our location and views are some of the best in Laguna Beach. We hope to welcome you back again soon!  Best regards,  Judi Z

Summary Heading: First time here, not the last!
Summary: Stayed for 1 night in a pool level room with a great private patio. We live in SoCal and usually day trip. I had a friend visiting from AZ so we thought we’d avoid the traffic home at the end of the day and spend the night. With the added parking and resort fees it can add up, but we didn’t have to haul our own beach chairs,etc. and you have to pay to park in Laguna anyway so it was worth it. Room was nice, bedding was awesome. Location is great too!
Manager Response: Dear Lovstotravel,  Thank you for taking the time to share with us your wonderful review of the Inn at Laguna Beach as we continuously strive to exceed our guest expectations.  I also love the pool location of the hotel and how close we are to the Main Beach. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Warm regards, Judi Z

Summary: Awesome view and location! The staff is very friendly and helpful! They have beach chairs, towels and umbrellas for use which was great! We loved our stay! Clean room and facilities. Was bummer to pay for parking. Walkable to most shops and restaurants!
Manager Response: Dear sherryhN6072ZV,  Thank you so much for sharing your five-star review of The Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am so pleased to know that your recent stay with us was wonderful. Our staff works to provide the kind of hospitality you describe and I am so happy to know that it enhanced your experience in Laguna Beach. It is truly a luxury to be able to walk to all of the galleries, beaches and restaurants from our hotel and I am so glad that you were able to take advantage of that throughout your time here.  We all hope to welcome you back in the very near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: Great little spot on the beach
Summary: Perfect location to stay to enjoy both the beach and the shops and galleries of Laguna.  The staff was very friendly and helpful, and we enjoyed our stay immensely.  The beach walk up to the hotel is picturesque.
Manager Response: Dear neo0x6  Thank you for sharing your kind five-star review of The Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am so pleased to know that you thoroughly enjoyed your recent stay with us. Our staff works to provide all of our guests with experiences like the one you describe. It is wonderful that we met that mark throughout your time in beautiful Laguna Beach.  We all hope to welcome you back in the very near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: I stayed here for two nights on a business trip recently. My only regret is that I didn’t extend my trip to truly take in all that was available and to take in the town more. The hotel itself is beautiful. My room was so very comfortable. The staff was very friendly and helped with recommendations for a nearby restaurant. The only slight negative I saw is that there room service options were fairly limited. But there is a Starbucks across the street and a ton of shops/cafes within walking distance. The view from the 4th floor (where they host a happy hour) is amazing. I will be back for sure!
Manager Response: Dear ml5552019,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind five-star review of The Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am so pleased that your recent stay with us was fantastic. I agree that the views are amazing and I am so glad that you were able to enjoy them during our wine hour. I will be proud to share your kind words with our staff who strive to provide memorable hospitality like you describe.   We all look forward to welcoming you back for another beautiful stay in the near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: Great location, but the room was a bit musty
Summary: The Inn is at an amazing location with wondrous views. We stayed in the corner room right below where they serve drinks for the social hour. The check in service was hospitable and inside the room you have everything you need. However, the room was over perfumed, trying to cover some smells. I believe it was coming from the drain for the shower, and the room itself was also a bit musty.   You can't beat falling asleep to the sound of crashing waves...
Manager Response: Dear izuj,  Thank you so much. For sharing your review.  I am so pleased to know you enjoyed your recent stay with us. We work to provide all of our guests with outstanding experiences and I am so happy to know the beautiful views and hospitality enhanced your experience. I offer my apologies for the perfumed odor you describe and assure you that I will address your concern with all appropriate departments so this issue will not reoccur.   We all hope to welcome you back in the very near future.   Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: Wonderful from check in to check out.  A very positive experience.  Luved it.  Great location.  Close to any extra amenities that would be needed.  Restaurants close by within walking distances. Staff on anything needed plus they’ll recommend what you may consider for food, locations of events, happenings.
Manager Response: Dear mugsual,  Thank you for sharing your kind five-star review of The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We are so happy to hear about your wonderful experience with us. I agree that our location and views are fabulous. Our staff takes pride in providing our guests with the highest caliber of service. Like you mentioned, we are always happy to provide information make arrangements and for the best restaurants and activities in Laguna Beach.  We all hope to welcome you back in very near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: Hotel, Rooms, Views, Pools, and Amenities leave nothing to be desired! Great location and beautiful views! This place would be my top recommendation for anyone wanting to stay in Laguna Beach. Service is a bit disorganized. Checkin experience and housekeeping were clumsy and slow.
Manager Response: Dear angelikalintner,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I am so pleased to know that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. I am saddened to know that you felt your experience at check-in detracted from the overall experience and rest assured that we appreciate your feedback as it will allow us to improve and address your concern. I agree that the views and location are phenomenal and it is wonderful that this enhanced your experience in beautiful Laguna Beach.  We all hope to welcome you back in the very near future.  Warm regards,

Summary: The location of this hotel is perfect for Laguna Beach. The hotel sits on the public beach in  Laguna, CA. The view and scenery are absolutely gorgeous.  This hotel is great for walking to Laguna’s amazing shops and restaurants.  Location is perfect!  The public areas of the hotel were always clean.  The pool is small but all you need, especially if you love the beach. Unfortunately, at the pool there are a thick row of bushes blocking the beautiful view of the beach, coast and ocean.  I cannot imagine why the hotel would not remove the bushes to allow guests to enjoy the view.   The sleeping rooms were very clean. The rooms were a little outdated, including worn carpet.     The most disappointing part was the hotel staff, in particular the front desk staff and specifically the
Manager Response: Dear Sarajude,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  While I am so pleased to know that you enjoyed our superb location and hotel I am saddened to know that the service you encountered detracted from your overall experience. I will be sure to address this with our team as this is not indicative of the high standard that we hold ourselves to. We strive to provide the highest level of hospitality and I offer my apologies that we seem to have missed this mark throughout your stay. I hope you may be so kind as to afford us the opportunity to welcome you back in the future so we may show you how wonderful our service and hotel are.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: The staff is horrible! After our experience this year, we will not be coming back.
Summary: For the last three years, my company has booked this property for our annual planning meeting. After our experience this year, we will not be coming back.    We had our meeting space booked and contracted over a year ago.  There is a specific room that we reserve each year, and the hotel double-booked us and decided to book a wedding party for the same day instead.  The sales department did comp. one free day and some of the technological elements.   The first day we were in our meeting space, they threw away our shipping box, which isn't that big of a deal if you just get us another box so that we can send our stuff back to Seattle. Finding someone to help us get a box was so unprofessional and unaccommodating. The staff did nothing to help us resolve the issue. Finally, the
Manager Response: Dear amandabc305,  I am troubled to learn of the experience you describe. I can assure you that this is not indicative of the high standards we hold ourselves to. I hope you may be so kind as to contact me directly at panderson@theinnatlagunabeach.com so we may discuss your experience further.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: We had a great time staying there before our cruise for our son's fall break... staff was very friendly and great location..near all the shops, restaurants and most of all a step from the beach.. beautiful ocean view for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Ms Theng B,  Thank you for sharing your kind five-star review of The Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am so glad to know that you thoroughly enjoyed your recent stay with us. We strive to provide all of our guests with outstanding experiences and I am so pleased to know that we met that mark during your time with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: Nice updated hotel located at Main Beach
Summary: We decided to take a quick trip to Laguna Beach a couple of weeks ago, but decided to stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach (note, NOT Laguna Beach Inn which is a completely unrelated property in Laguna Beach). The Inn at Laguna Beach is a sister property of Laguna Beach House. Both hotels are on the beach side of PCH but only Inn at Laguna Beach has rooms with direct views of the beach and/or ocean.  The inn at Laguna Beach is a fairly large hotel with about 70 rooms. All rooms that we have ever stayed in (including the handicap accessible room which we stayed in once) are newly remodeled and not like your typical Laguna Beach hotel room which many times are older/dated rooms. The hotel is very centrally located to Main Beach which is walking distance to the beach, restaurants and
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is our 2nd time staying at the Inn.  We loved the location and the staff is amazing.  The rooms are becoming a bit dated, however, are clean.  I have made the suggestion about these updates.  You cannot go wrong with staying at the Inn...and will even better with fresh updates.
Manager Response: DearBucsgirl88  Thank you so much for taking the time to write your kind review. I am happy to hear that our staff exceeded your expectations as we welcomed you back to The Inn at Laguna Beach. We are confident that each one of our associates are at their best in a knowledgeable and friendly manner at our Front Desk every day! Our goal is to ensure our guests' comfort and satisfaction, Your feedback is extremely valuable to us, as we strive to improve with each and every stay. Looking forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Sincerely, Judi Z

Summary Heading: Why did we wait so long?
Summary: We loved Laguna Beach. The coastline is beautiful and lined with wonderful walkways right in front of the hotel. We had a full ocean view room that was very expensive—about $1600 all told for an off season weekend! Lots of fees. But a lovely investment. Very helpful checkin even though he tried to convince me to take a room that would’ve put us next to the beach public restrooms. But gracious enough to give us another room. The rooftop bar looks much better in photos than in person. But you’re there for the ocean. It’s a very walkable village, right nearby, and a friendly place. Lots of good eats too!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Beautiful property, excellent staff (John + Etkerina) made us feel like home after our car got broken into prior to the trip! You forget you’re in the continental United States. Can’t wait to come back!
Manager Response: Dear Frank B,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review and beautiful photograph.  I am so pleased to know that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. I am also so sorry to hear of your car troubles but I will be happy to pass along your praise to John and Ekaterina . We strive to provide the level of hospitality that you describe and it is wonderful that you already plan to return to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We hope your return will be in the near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: the location is superb , the front desk very polite "polite" and helpful "genuinely so" ! , the rooms "are" stunning , the views !..., breakfast and wake up call "exactly on time" , so """THANK YOU""" !! ,
Manager Response: Dear alexander d,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind words.  It is heartwarming to know your recent stay can be celebrated with such an exuberant review. We strive to achieve the level of hospitality that you describe and I am so pleased that we were able to meet that goal throughout your time with us. I agree that the rooms are stunning and we all look forward to welcoming you back in the very near future for another outstanding experience.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: For the past 24 years we have visited The Inn At Laguna Beach the third week in September and in the same room.  Our room isn't the largest nor the smallest but it has an amazing view of Main Beach.  Being so close to the ocean you hear the crashing waves 24/7 and we refer to this week as wave therapy that sustains us the rest of the year.  We love that the hotel is considered a boutique hotel, small, intimate and with excellent service with a smile.  The room service is limited to breakfast but the hotel's location affords walkability all throughout Laguna Beach.  The management all through the years has been excellent and very attentive to guest needs.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have been trying to make a reservation with our gift certificate for approximately two years. This year it was approximately 4 months to get the first available date (a Tuesday) after we originally tried to book a open available room with out a gift certificate. It was a unbelievable experience!
Manager Response: Dear randyandrus,  Thank you for sharing your review.  I am so saddened to learn of your experience applying the gift certificate to your reservation. I will be sure to address this with all appropriate departments so we may ensure that this does not occur in the future. I hope your time in Laguna Beach was fantastic and we hope you may afford us the opportunity to welcome you back in the future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: Property is Good but the desk staff is Bad
Summary: Good location and decent rooms given the area in general. Cleaning and landscape crews were great, always saying hello. The front desk staff?? Not so much. Every interaction I had with them made me feel as if I was disturbing their day.   Scheduled a wake-up call. Call never came. Told the staff and there was no shock, no apology, just a look as if I was bothering them. Scheduled a wake-up call on that second night. ONCE AGAIN, the call never came.  The front desk staff either hate their jobs or just hate their guests.
Manager Response: Dear ttannenholz,  Our goal is to ensure our guests' comfort and satisfaction, and I am sorry that you felt disappointed with our front desk staff. I greatly appreciate your feedback as we strive to improve with each and every stay. We hope that you will give us another opportunity to show you our best performance in the future.  Sincerely, Judi Z

Summary: Location can’t be beat! Close to the Main Street with restaurants and shops and right on the beach with fab views!  But......that’s where it ends.....the hotel seems to be relying on its location to make up for the old tired decor. The upholstery was old and looked dirty, the carpet felt dirty and was fraying on the edges.  Our bathroom pocket door was impossible to slide closed fully.  Our toilet took 2 flushed to work. They are charging a lot of money and for what you get.......it’s time for a major interior refresh at those prices!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: AC so loud it’s hard to sleep
Summary: The hotel was nice and so were the staff.  But the A/C clicked on and off so loudly it kept us awake on and off all night long.  Luckily we were staying for just one night. The location was nice, close to beach volleyball, coffee shops, shopping.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is perfect in every way! The location is an easy walk into town to galleries, shops and great restaurants. The view of the ocean and beach is all part of the ambiance and the sound of the surf is wonderful! I will be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The place needs a lot of work and the room was so small I needed to go outside to change my mind. There was no room for the bags. Great location. Over priced for what you get, but I know it's the location.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Seriously overcharged for two people at 500 usd per day for a 3 night stay.all round very disappointing.
Summary: If this hotel was not in such a prime position !!!! Staff very rude and unhelpful and don’t make much of an effort. Serious management problem as staff don’t seem motivated to look after their clients. Perhaps because of the prime position they don’t need to try too hard .
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had an excellent stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach. We booked two spacious rooms for our family, both were very nice with ocean views. Room service was prompt and the breakfast was excellent. We will definitely come back and stay here.
Manager Response: Dear borncwt,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I am so pleased to know that you thoroughly enjoyed your recent stay. I agree that the views from our hotel are spectacular and it is wonderful that you were able to enjoy them from your two beautiful rooms.   We all hope to welcome you back in the very near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: Spur of the moment weekend trip
Summary: My husband and I took a spur of the moment weekend trip to Laguna Beach.  We have stayed at this property before and love it.  Great rooms, great location, and right on the beach (doesn't get any better than that).  We love that they do have an option for in-room dining for breakfast and we took advantage of that. We were initially going to stay for just one night, but decided to stay for a second night because it was a Sunday night and the rate had dropped.  My husband went down to the front desk to arrange that on Saturday.  Upon checkout on Monday, we noticed that we were charged the same rate for the second night. Summary: What more could you ask for?. Close to all and million dollar views. You don't to leave you balcony.  All day room service may have been nice but there is plenty nearby to take care of your appetite. Can't wait to go again!.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: BEWARE!!!!  Really gone downhill.  Great View BUT the hotel is a dump!!!!!
Summary: ABSOLUTELY GROSS!!!!  The place is so unbelievably dirty.  For the same price you can stay down the street at the Ritz-Carlton and not run the risk of getting an infection of some sort.  Rust everywhere, filthy floors in the elevators, rooms and hallways, I could go on and on.  You're paying only for the view in a hotel that hasn't been updated in 30 years.  I thought for sure I was going to catch something in the room.  BEWARE!!!!

Summary: Thoroughly enjoyed our trip. Excellent location, views, walking distance to everything is very convenient. Beds comfortable, clean. Friendly service.  The only glich was asking for clean sheets. They were not changed daily until actually requested.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very attentive staff-couldn’t have been more helpful. Parking was convenient. Wine hour and cookies were an extra treat.Room Service  Breakfast options were timely delivered and a good variety of choices, as well as being well prepared and tasty.
Manager Response: Dear mshemo529190,  Thank you for taking the time to share with us your wonderful review of the property as we continuously strive to exceed our guest expectations. It will be a pleasure to welcome you back to our hotel soon.  Sincerely, Judi Z

Summary Heading: Wonderful Stay in Ocean View King Balcony Room!
Summary: My husband and I stayed at The Inn at Laguna Beach in mid-September for a long weekend to celebrate a milestone birthday. We live in Los Angeles and chose this  location for the weekend getaway. We reserved the Ocean View King Balcony room (#406) and the view of the beach and ocean were absolutely incredible! The balcony was private and spacious with a nice table for two, and we could watch the entire sun rise and set each day. The room was nicely decorated including a sofa and coffee table. We ordered breakfast via room service (mixed pastries and then sandwiches with salad) and it was great to dine on the balcony. The hotel offers a complementary and generous happy hour on the terrace each evening - it was most pleasant overlooking the beach or the hills to the back of the
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: I stay at a hotel to stay there not review it.
Summary: Unless you like getting spammed after you stay there, stay somewhere else. The Holiday Inn down the road is nice. This is just as bad as buying a ream of paper at Office Depot and asking how I liked it. I put it in the printer and it accepted the ink.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Just returned from a great stay at the Inn at Laguna! That ocean view and sleeping to the sounds of the ocean never gets old! The staff is very friendly and accommodating. They helped make our stray even more special!

Summary: My qualms are not with the hotel per se, as it is wonderful: Best location in LB (on a bluff overlooking the beach and adjacent to beautiful Heisler beach park), a short walk to all the village restaurants / bars: Comfortable, spacious, nicely furnished rooms, great pool and roof-top deck (w/ complimentary wine each evening), fresh cookies in the lobby, terrific housekeeping (not a single miss in 7 days/nights).  What put a damper on our trip was transportation arranged by the hotel for our ride to the airport. The night prior to check-out,   front desk indicated that they often used a service, and said that the price was appx $ 45 (she indicated it was more or less the same as a Taxi or UBER). So we agreed to use the service & she phoned the contact & arranged for 8 AM
Manager Response: none

Summary: staff was friendly and helpful. The hotel is simple/basic as far as amenities go.The room was clean and comfortable.Just outside the pool gate is the beach! BEAUTIFUL. only thing I would hope to change is the fact that the A/C unit was super loud.

P.S. take Uber and avoid the pricey $35/night parking fee.
Manager Response: Dear Grant R,  Thank you so much for sharing your five-star review.  It is wonderful to know that you thoroughly enjoyed your recent stay with us. I contacted AMEX and they told us that scenario was not possible. Endless problems with this hotel. Unfortunate, I’ve stayed here many times during the ‘70’s - 80’s, and also stayed here in 2017. Beautiful hotel in stunning location, miserable management. You can do better at the Ritz or Montage for the same price.

None were available for our dates.  So, The Inn at Laguna Beach popped up.  Quelle Suprise!  Delightful.  Will return.
Manager Response: Dear nobodyruss,  Thank you so much for your kind review.  I am so pleased to learn that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. Head to the terrace bar for a sunset beverage then make your way into Laguna for a wonderful meal at any place you visit, walk barefoot  through the sand home, open window and fall asleep to the sound of crashing waves. Spellbinding!  They don't have a kitchen but you can pre-order breakfast and the bring it in the morning.

The bar service was professional, friendly and truly exceptional as everyone else who works on the property. The property is pet-friendly and charges $50.00 as they must provide allergic free rooms for the following guests. But it is a small price for having my 2 puppies with me at all times. Returning for an evening performance, the night staff was professional and greeted us with warmth and made us feel truly special. I highly recommend this hotel

Recommend getting an ocean front room that is on one of the higher floors to avoid the problem. No restaurant on premises, but close to everything in town and breakfast room service ( only average) is available.  Espresso coffee maker in room as great.   Easy walk tdownhill to beach and hotel offers umbrellas, towels and beach chairs for guests to use.  Small pool, no changing room or locker room by pool. Lovely rooftop patio with amazing views and complimentary wine hour every evening.

They say the devil is in the details.  But they didn't pay attention to any of those details.  It's just a good location.  That's it.

The Inn offers iced water, coffee, wine & cookies daily at various times of day. We had a village room I found pricey especially since it was on the small side & the a/c was powerful but loud. The bed was very comfortable though. Overall we would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Clarisse C,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I am so pleased to know that you enjoyed your recent stay with us.  I agree that it is truly fantastic to be able to enjoy Laguna Beach without ever having to use a car. Our location provides that luxury and I am so glad that you were able to take advantage of it throughout your experience. It is wonderful to know that you would return to stay with us again and I hope we will have the opportunity to welcome you back in the very near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: This was a last minute getaway and I found The Inn by just searching the internet.  Glad I found it.  Great location and the staff is very friendly and helpful.  To get to the beach is so fast and easy.  Plus there is a stand on your way down to get towels, chairs, or an umbrella.
Manager Response: Dear tamiwilliams2013,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review.  I am so glad to know that you thoroughly enjoyed your recent stay with us. I agree that our location is phenomenal and truly unmatched among the many hotels in Laguna Beach. Our beach valet is always happy to provide our guests beach amenities and I am so glad that the hospitality of our staff had such a positive impact on your experience.  I hope we will have the opportunity to welcome you back to The Inn at Laguna Beach in the very near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: This is a 1st Class operation. You feel the warmth of welcoming from the time you enter the lobby during check-in....all the way to your check-out. And it starts with the smoothing fragrance they pump into the lobby--->and the smiles of the front-desk staff---> and the water dispensers---> and to the very conscious hotel managers. Superior customer service! Outstanding staff!
Manager Response: Dear jcovin861418,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review.  I am so glad that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. It is true that our lobby smells of sandalwood and coconut. I have always noted the fragrance of eucalyptus, citrus and sea spray when in Laguna Beach and our location allows for stunning views of the coastline while being constantly surrounded by this welcoming aroma. I hope we may have the opportunity to welcome you back in the very near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: Location is only thing going for this Inn...No food, the bar and beverage is only open till 6 ...the beach is full of sea weed n the water is cold..the poll is very small...the pictures on line look so much better selling this place as amazing from it  very outdated
Manager Response: Dear newwedohawk21,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I am saddened to learn that you did not fully enjoy your time with us. While we appreciate all feedback as it provides us the opportunity for improvement, I regret that you encountered any disappointment during your experience. Our goal is always to provide our guests with outstanding experiences and I offer my apologies as it seems we failed to reach that goal during your stay.  I hope you may afford us the opportunity to welcome you back in the future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: As I wrote earlier, we greatly enjoyed our stay. The location was the main attraction, but the staff was friendly and the room was clean and comfortable. Would have like a regular coffee pot in the room.
Manager Response: Dear sblair6793,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I am so pleased to know that you greatly enjoyed your recent stay with us. We strive to provide all of our guests with outstanding experiences and it is wonderful to know that we met this goal during your time at The Inn at Laguna Beach. I will certainly address your concern about the coffee pot. I hope we will have the opportunity to welcome you back in the very near future.   Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for the first time & really enjoyed the onsite parking, views & proximity to the downtown Laguna area & main beach. The hotel offers a 5pm wine hour which is wonderful when you have spent a day down at the beach and want to relax
Manager Response: Dear dillonmcdonald,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review.  I am so pleased to know that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. I agree that the wine hour is wonderful and relaxing. It is fantastic that you were able to take advantage of this amenity and enjoy our outstanding location during your time at The Inn at Laguna Beach.   I hope we will have the opportunity to welcome you back for many more outstanding experiences in the future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: weak check in, hidden charges, small rooms, bad A/C systems, non-responsive staff, weak happy hour with complementary wine...we paid for our wine but advertised as complementary.  2 prior visits and this time the place has gone down hill.  Feels like a change in management with a sole focus on $$$ and not the customer.  Staff says "sorry" but never we can resolve that for you.  Place shows lack of attention to detail and upkeep.
Manager Response: Dear tnesbi289960,  Thank you for sharing your review.  I am saddened to hear of your experience. Above all else, our focus is and will always be on guest satisfaction. Our goal is always to provide outstanding experiences to all of our guests. It seems we failed to provide this experience during your time with us and for that I offer my most sincere apology. I hope that you may be so kind as to afford us the opportunity to welcome you back to show you how truly wonderful our hotel and hospitality are.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: Staff wasn’t very friendly upon check in nor did they go out of their way to say hello as you passed by. The room was nothing extraordinary. Only thing they had to offer was the view and location. Probably wouldn’t stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Victoria S,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I am glad to know that you enjoyed our wonderful location and views. However, we strive to provide all of our guests outstanding service and I regret that it seems we missed this mark during your time with us. I offer my apologies for this and hope you may afford us the opportunity to welcome you back in the future.   Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: Nice location, easy to walk to restaurants and events. On the beach, just a short walk down a flight of stairs. The room was small room, and had no view, but it was nice and clean. No free parking and no restaurant. We just stayed one night.
Manager Response: Dear JPTUC,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I am so pleased that your experience was enhanced by our fantastic location. I agree that we are situated in the premier position to be able to experience all of the best of Laguna Beach without ever needing a car.   I hope we will have the opportunity to welcome you back in the near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: great location, great ocean view rooms, greatest front desk staff we have ever worked with. we have been staying at The Inn at Laguna Beach twice a year for the past ten years, and have never considered staying anywhere else. we have family and friends who feel the same.
Manager Response: Dear sam d,  I am so glad to know your most recent stay with us was such a pleasant one.   It is wonderful to hear that our front desk staff provides such remarkable hospitality. I know we all look forward to welcoming you back to the Inn at Laguna Beach in the near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: What a pleasure to listen to the ocean as we fell asleep.The location was perfect and the views of the beach and coastline cannot be beat. Staff were all professional and friendly.I will stay there on our next getaway.
Manager Response: Dear Road296402,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review.  I am so glad to know that you thoroughly enjoyed your recent stay with us. I agree that The Inn at Laguna Beach has exceptional views and I am so pleased that your time with us was so relaxing. I am so glad to learn that you plan to return for your next getaway and we all look forward to welcoming you back.   Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: Lovely place to be at Laguna Beach!
Summary: Enjoyed the location in town near restaurants and on the beach and onsite parking. Beautiful views, relaxed setting with access to the beach. Clean updated rooms with comfy beds and friendly staff. Breakfast served in room and wine at happy hour on roof with gorgeous views made it a perfect choice to stay. Bathroom could be updated for more convenience for older guests but clean and doable...
Manager Response: Dear cw849,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  It is wonderful to know that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. I agree that our hotel is relaxed with beautiful views and a truly outstanding location. I hope we will have the opportunity to welcome you back for another wonderful experience in the near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: Beautiful location: beachfront with easy beach access.
Summary: The room was small for the price but had plenty of storage. The daily wine reception was lovely and the view from the bar was great. It was also a perfect place to drink morning coffee as we did not have a balcony. We could hear the people above us walking around at night. Also, the refrigerator is packed with the wet bar so things have to be moved around in order to use the refrigerator for our things. This is a great location for walking around Laguna Beach. We walked to the Pageant of the Masters as well as to several local restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear Rita B,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I am so pleased to know that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. I agree that our terrace is the ideal place to view the coastline and I am so glad that you enjoyed evening wine and morning coffee there.   I hope we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back to The Inn at Laguna Beach in the very near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: Perfect place to stay in Laguna Beach!
Summary: This property is located on the beach side of PCH. Views of the beach and the sound of waves crashing make for a perfect night sleep in their ultra comfortable beds. A short walk to the beach, restaurants, and downtown Laguna.  Staff goes above and beyond to make sure your stay is the best. Will be back!!!
Manager Response: Dear Joyce G,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review.  I am so glad to know that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. It is true that our staff go above and beyond to make all of our guests experiences outstanding and I am so pleased that we met that mark during your time with us. I agree that our location is phenomenal and I am so glad that our proximity to the beach and downtown Laguna Beach enhanced your experience in this beautiful place.  I hope we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the very near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: The Inn at Laguna Beach has a wonderful location on the beach . The services and rooms are correct but could be better according to the price level . Furniture are basic and cheap . Décoration standard . No food except breakfast . Wine time on the terrace at 5 pm .... a bit strange for French people !
Manager Response: Dear Z2487FOalexm,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I am so glad to know that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. I agree that our location is superb and it is wonderful that this enhanced your experience in Laguna Beach. I regret that you did not enjoy our furniture and I will be sure to pass this feedback along to the appropriate department. I hope we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: The hotel is in a great location and the room was very nice. Staff was very courteous and helpful. They gave us beach chairs and towels right in the lobby before the beachside equipment location was open.
Manager Response: Dear Trek55674420764,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review.  I am so pleased to know that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. The morning is such a beautiful time to enjoy the beach and we are always happy to provide beach amenities even before the valet is open.   I hope we will have the opportunity to welcome you back for another outstanding experience in the very near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: I reallly enjoyed this hotel.  Especially for the location being right on the beach. I lugged all my beach stuff for a trip up the PCH with my kids and I didn't even have to take it out of the car for this hotel because they had everything I needed.  You just sign it out. I'm talking chairs, buckets, boogie boards and towels.  It had a nice pool and was walking distance to quaint shops and restaurants.  I saw what some people paid and would not say its worth top dollar but for the last minute deal I got it was well worth it.  Rooms were very nice. View from the top is awesome in the evening especially.  I would stay again and definatley recommend it. Staff also VERY friendly and accomodating. Parking was easy.
Manager Response: Dear Lisa G,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review.  I am so pleased to know that you thoroughly enjoyed your recent stay with us. Our staff work diligently to be as accommodating as you describe and I am so pleased that this made a positive impact on your experience. It is wonderful that you were able to enjoy the beach amenities that we provide along with the beautiful views from the terrace.  I hope we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the very near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: This place was booked for me for a corporate trip. Very clean, nice views, with beach access and plenty of shops within walking distance. Very nice restaurant next door with very friendly staff and excellent food!!!
Manager Response: Dear Tour11612558547,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review.  I am so pleased to know that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. It is true that the views from our hotel are excellent and I am so glad that our location had such a positive impact on your experience.  I hope we will be able to welcome you back to The Inn at Laguna Beach in the very near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: Ocean views and chocolate chip cookies!
Summary: Spent a few weekdays here with my wife and 3 kids from the Bay Area. Absolutely gorgeous ocean view room with a balcony and very clean. Big fan of the Yuzu hair conditioner. Elisa was an angel and gave us an extra set of hair conditioner when she heard my wife loved the smell of her lovely locks of hair. Don’t forget cookies and wine at night.
Manager Response: Dear vintagecouch,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I am so pleased to know that you thoroughly enjoyed your recent stay with us. I agree that the views from our hotel are absolutely gorgeous and it is wonderful that you were able to enjoy them from your beautiful room.   I hope we will be able to welcome you and your family back for another fantastic experience in the near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: My birthday at the Inn at Laguna Beach
Summary: Arrived early, in time to take free trolley to the Montage.  Front desk helpful in guiding me to trolley.  Came back in time to enjoy a glass of wine at their rooftop with a view.  When I entered the room I was pleased to see a thoughtful momento wishing me a happy birthday.  Later went out and discovered that there are plenty excellent restaurants, shopping within walking distance.  And the best part the phenomenal beach and view are right there!
Manager Response: Dear elsareynaga,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I am so pleased to learn that you thoroughly enjoyed your recent stay with us. It is wonderful that you were able to enjoy the luxury of our location and that the hospitality of our staff had such a positive impact on your special occasion.   I hope we will have the opportunity to welcome you back to The Inn at Laguna Beach in the very near future.  Warm, regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: Don't waste your money on those gorgeous balcony rooms!
Summary: that blasted sand raking machine right out side the window which fired up at 7am - that's SEVEN AM! It began with the annoying back up beeps (plural - as in MANY MANY) that were worse than my alarm clock because I couldn't reach over and smack it off! Then a SECOND even bigger machine started up at 8am and continued up and down the peaceful beach until at least 11am.   So much for a peaceful breakfast on the balcony.Notwithstanding the above complaint - the General Manager should know that the STAFF at the Inn at Laguna Beach is SUPERIOR.  From the friendly maintenance engineer who happened to be in the parking garage when we pulled in (lost!) before we had properly checked in  and guided us in and directed us to the Lobby, to the charming bell-man Sebastian who helped us with

Summary Heading: The best hotel in Laguna Beach
Summary: When we arrived, the people at the front desk were welcoming and attentive, and we were grateful our room was available early.  This hotel has it all, balconies with ocean views, direct access to the beach, a roof top bar, and a swimming pool.  Even though there is no on site restaurant, they are located next door and across the street.  The room was fresh and clean, housekeeping had done a great job.
Manager Response: Dear moerke,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review.  I am so happy to know that your recent stay with us was outstanding. Our staff works diligently to provide all of our guests with the highest level of hospitality and it is wonderful that we met this mark during your time with us. I agree that our hotel has fantastic amenities and the views are stunning.   I hope we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back for another exceptional experience in the very near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: This is a beautiful and cozy hotel with a fabulous ocean view, in a scenic location within easy walking distance to shops and restaurants. Sit on your balcony and enjoy the sounds of crashing waves onto the shore while sipping your coffee or cocktail.
Manager Response: Dear Safari684155,  Thank you for sharing your review.  I am so pleased to learn that you thoroughly enjoyed your recent stay with us. I agree that our hotel is beautiful and our location is just steps from all of the best shops, restaurants and beaches in Laguna Beach.  We all hope to welcome you back for another fantastic experience in the very near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: We stayed at this hotel due to its location and great reviews. You are right in the center of all of the shopping and restaurants. It is a lovely stroll next to the beach. We took advantage of the happy hour on the deck with ocean views. The hotel has a nespresso so we enjoyed our espresso shots in the morning.
Manager Response: Dear laf00,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review.  I am so pleased to know that your recent stay with us was a wonderful experience. I agree that our location is phenomenal and I am so glad that this made such a positive impact on your time in Laguna Beach. It is lovely that we have espresso makers in each room and it is fantastic that you enjoyed this amenity throughout your stay.   We all hope to welcome you back in the very near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: I so enjoyed my stay here. The staff here was so helpful and always with a smile. At one point I couldn’t get my safe open and just as promised, within 5 minutes one of their staff was at my room to assist. While the lobby is modest...the room was clean, fresh, contemporary with all the modern conveniences. The amenities such as lotion, shampoo...were wonderful. Bedding was great. I loved the coffee every morning as well as milk and cookies every evening....did I indulge...no...but the gesture was wonderful to see. The rooftop terrace for an afternoon glass of wine or Cocktail was beautiful. Lastly, the location was amazing. I parked my car and never had to move it until I departed.
Manager Response: Dear SofRiley,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review.  I am so happy to know that you thoroughly enjoyed your recent stay with us. Our staff always strive to provide the highest level of hospitality. It is wonderful to learn that we met this mark throughout your time with us. It is true that our location is fantastic.  I hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back to The Inn at Laguna Beach in the very near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: My family and I stayed in Laguna Beach during a Southern California vacation. We loved the Inn at Laguna Beach it was in a great location walking distance to the beautiful Main Beach, shops and restaurants. The staff were very friendly and accommodating. Laguna beach is a wonderful town and the Inn is a perfect place to stay while visiting. Highly recommend and will return when in the area.
Manager Response: Dear 337clarissat,  Thank you for sharing your review.  It is wonderful to learn that your recent stay with us was such a wonderful experience. I am so glad that our fantastic location and staff made such a positive impact on your time in beautiful Laguna Beach.  I hope to welcome you back to The Inn at Laguna Beach in the very near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: Great stay if you wish to attend the art festivals..walking distance to the venues and close to many excellent restaurant selections. Hotel providers complimentary beach chairs & umbrella ..conveniently set up for enjoying the main town, dining or beach fare
Manager Response: none

Summary: Only 30 minutes from home but feels like a world away. Nice for a quick getaway - able to walk everywhere - chill and listen to the waves - good restaurants- lots to do or nothing to do - your choice.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Loved the location overlooking Laguna's Main Beach and so close to Heisler Park, the saltwater pool, the daily wine pour on the terrace, and the delicious coffee, tea and cookies in the lobby. Close to shops and restaurants in the town center. Friendly, helpful staff. Unbeatable.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Location and right on the Beach
Summary: Loved my stay. Had a room with a balcony looking to the ocean and steps away from the beach. The hotel is right smack in the middle of Laguna. It is a great location where yo can walk to just about any shop, restaurant, etc.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Loved our stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach
Summary: The Staff was wonderful!!! They catered to our every need. Room was perfect, clean and great view. Perfect location as we were there for a wedding on Laguna Beach.  Very Cute Boutique Hotel We would highly recommend the Inn at Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: 500 bucks for a roach infested sea view
Summary: Not worth it. Many cockroaches in room. Absolutely disgusting. No refund. Not worth the money. The roaches were crawling around the room and under the sink, bathroom and bed. I could not sleep at all.
Manager Response: Dear mbrenn934843,  Thank you for sharing your review.  I would like to offer you my most sincere apologies.   We strive to provide all of our guests with exceptional experiences and I can assure you that this will be addressed with all appropriate departments. We take your feedback seriously and will take all necessary steps to insure this will not occur in the future.   Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: I really loved my stay at the hotel.  The staff was pleasant and helpful.  I liked my room, but the only complaint I had was there is a walking path about 100 feet from the hotel so when you sit on your balcony people can see you.  This is a double edged sword, because the walking path is easily accessible from the hotel and you can go on a wonderful walk for about a mile.  Also the air conditioning unit is kind of old so every time it came on it woke me up.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This trip was to celebrate my birthday, as well as a few of my girlfriends and this hotel did not disappoint. The location is spectacular! The staff went above and beyond for us with every request. We are already planning our trip back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Location of this hotel is absolutely perfect for beach and city shopping and restaurants, you can walk everywhere. There are tide pools close to Hotel that are really cool. Beach is beautiful, lots of lifeguards, park like area and boardwalk. Hotel roof top has great views and a nice little happy hour. Very clean hotel. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Expensive, but the absolute best place to stay if you want to be on the beach and able to walk everywhere. View cannot be better. Nice late afternoon rooftop bar. Room service quick and well done. Inn offers beach chairs, umbrellas and towels - nice touch.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a fine time, even the weather was excellent.  However, we have three nitpicking quibbles:  First, the low-flow toilets are terrible.  They must be flushed twice or three times consistently and so are huge water-wasters.  After the first day, we found it easier to use the toilet publicly available on the first floor rather than the one in our room.  (We’ve had similar problems in other rooms on other visits.). Second, does anyone really like the zucchini water in the lobby?  Surely lemons would be preferable.  And third, please don’t so overfill the small room refrigerator with junk so that it is difficult to use.  Left some room for a guest to chill a bottle of wine, or to keep an unfinished sandwich. Does anyone ever read these responses?  I doubt it.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We loved our stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach. We were able to walk to everything - the Pageant of the Masters, restaurants,art galleries and shops plus the ocean was right out our door - we splurged on an ocean front room with a balcony for my birthday celebration - one of my favorite gifts! Nothing like the sound of the ocean to lull you to sleep. All the staff were friendly and helpful and we look forward to coming back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Enjoyed our stay. Easy beach access with towels, toys, and other beach items available for guests.  We enjoyed a partial view of the ocean and enjoyed sleeping with the window open.  The staff we helpful and polite.  They offer cocktail hour from 5-6pm on the rooftop terrace.  Cookies and milk served at 6pm in the lobby.  Nice added options. Why not 5 stars - mini fridge in room but it was stocked without a price sheet and no room if we wanted for our personal use.  Bed little too soft.  Water flow on the low side. Room was stuffy unless you left the fan “on” and then you lost the sounds from the ocean. Would recommend for sure!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The best place to experience Laguna Beach
Summary: Really friendly staff and great location and facilities. The evening terrace bar wine reception was a marvellous way to finish the day on the beach. Ocean view room balconies were a joy. Even binoculars provided to watch the wildlife!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We love staying at the Inn because of the location, the view and the sound of the waves. The rooms are clean and well appointed - but not over the top. I love the binoculars that they furnish to look at the sights close up from the balcony. The staff is very friendly and efficient - and the lobby coffee and evening cookies are very tasty. We will be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Loved the hotel. Beautiful view of Ocean from my room. Wine on outdoor patio at night! Cookies when you get back for the evening! The staff was terrific! Location of the Hotel is perfect for walking in Laguna, close to the Pageant of the Masters and Sawdust Art Festival.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everything was very nice but kind of out dated. Wish we had more time to stay here.  The only thing was that the air conditioner was very loud and blew right at you and it woke you up every time it went on.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Inn at Laguna Beach is a charming older hotel overlooking the water in Laguna Beach. The room was large, had a great terrace looking out over the beach, and was quite comfortable. The front desk staff was friendly, welcoming and spent considerable time acquainting us with hotel amenities, rooftop terrace, beach equipment, and local attractions. The nightly happy hour on the rooftop terrace was popular and quite busy, so getting a glass of wine took a little longer than you would like, but the price and view made it worth the wait. The hotel is expensive, but the location is perfect.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The best hotel in Laguna.  We've visited Laguna for many decades.  Don't know what took us so long to stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach, but we're glad we did.  Impeccably clean, well cared for pool and facility was a delight ... and un-crowded ... unlike most other beachfront hotels.  Having everything so easily accessible, being right ON THE BEACH, was a joy.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Be careful! They suck you in with a hot low price and then raise it 200%. The next day in an email they said “we made a mistake”. And if you don’t acknowledge the email within 5 days the price automatically goes to their normal rate, which happens to be ten times higher then the published rate. I can’t trust the way this hotel does business, therefore we’re canceling all together and staying somewhere else.

I am truly sorry for the mistake and we hope you will think of us for future stays.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: Staff was very welcoming and friendly.  Juan at the front desk was awesome!  They provide chairs, umbrellas and towels at beach and has the perfect location.  Very centrally locates to all restaurants and shops!

Summary: We have stayed several times over the years. The location can't be beat. Sits on the beach.Walking distance to dining, shopping and entertainment. The roof top bar alone makes the stay. Gorgeous views of the main beach and the city. Little expresso maker in room. No room service, but they serve a delicious breakfast in your room. Bed is amazingly comfortable, crisp linens, thick down pillows, thick robes, a/c, free wifi. Room is very clean. We love boutique hotels, and are always very happy staying here. By booking direct, we received 2 complimentary cocktails at the roof top bar.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Over priced, no restaurant, bar shuts at 7pm
Summary: Location is nice but that’s it. We paid $599 for a small room with a small balcony.  No breakfast, no restaurant, no bar.  Price goes up each day if you don’t book. Weekend rate for our room is $799 - total rip off. Get nothing but a small room with no complimentary water just upselling with $12 bottles on the room.   Just get the cheapest AirBnB nearby and walk to the beach.

Summary: Laguna Beach is a beautiful beach town that is inviting and not overdeveloped and The Inn at Laguna Beach embodies it perfectly. It was very relaxing and de-stressing was very easy. Our room was  comfortable with an amazing view and the sound of the waves made it exceptional

Summary: The location of this hotel is great. Stuff was friendly and helpful. Pool is a bit small but nice, kind of too close to the public trail. The hotel is not a 5-star hotel but was clean; one of the best slipping experiences I had; room was clean, a bit small though; happy hour with wine is a must; convenient parking. In June you cannot see the sunset from any room in this hotel (the Sun is simply too north).

Summary: The Inn is located on the beachfront in the village with immediate walking access to the beach, restaurants, and shops.  We stayed there for its proximity to the Festival of the Arts Pageant of the Masters and were able to easily walk to that venue under ten minutes.

Summary Heading: Great hotel in a fantastic location
Summary: The Inn at Laguna Beach is a exquisite hotel that strives to exceed their guest's expectations. The hotel facility and rooms are clean and well maintained...and you can't beat the location!  Although there is not an onsite restaurant, just walk a block in either direction and you will find many great choices.

Summary Heading: Not what I expected for the price.

Summary: Our best hotel experience with Mr Juan so very professional and courteous. The ocean is beautiful and the hotel is very nice. It is easy to park and the rooms are easy to access. Thank you to the staff and Mr. Juan.

Summary: Very friendly staff. Clean room. Close to everything in downtown Laguna Beach. Very pricey if you want a full beach view. Nice outdoor areas for enjoying the scenery. An enjoyable getaway for us, close to LA or San Diego.

Summary: Hotel with a wonderful view, excellent location and extremely friendly and helpful staff! My mom and I came down here for the Arts Festival and really enjoyed our stay. The beach is just steps away and they have a wonderful wine reception nightly on the roof.

Summary: Best location in Laguna, a real vacation house!Althogh it does ot have any restaurants, it is a lovely place, best view when you take the Ocean view room, the pool is perfect, the Trrace is super wonderful! they have wine there every afternoon also you canget beach umbrella chairs towels and toys for the kids.We had such a great time!

The staff is extraordinary; with an unconditional commitment to ensure every guest feels appreciated and welcomed. Ekaterina is our fav but the rest of the staff does their very best to met each guest’s needs.

Warm Regards,  Peter A

I had to get up earlier than my friends for a flight so I could not turn on a light because the entire room would have been lit up.   Staff is friendly!

I used to "hang there" regularly in summers of the early 80s when it was still a rather isolated artists colony.
