Alas, a business meeting forced my first return in 15 years.  I spent one night at The Inn at Laguna Beach and it was fantastic despite the fact that we experienced a fairly dramatic winter storm.  My top floor King with Juliet balcony was perfect for watching the storm blow through.  The front desk staff was friendly and helpful in discussing dining options.  While this property has limited amenities (i.e., no
Manager Response: Dear Irreverent,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review.  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. Warm Regards,  Peter A

So If you are coming to have a Beach View that was amazing, then good.  But if you also want a good nights rest well good luck.  Having said that the Staff were very friendly and helpful.  They offer coffee in the Lobby every morning (they only have Espresso in the rooms).  A local paper is also provided.  They are dog friendly however you must crate your dog when you leave them in the room.  The rooms were clean and beautifully decorated and If you want a Beach View make sure that you ask for a 2nd or 3rd floor room. The first floor has views but not as wonderful.  Some of the

Again, be careful as some only overlook the

Downsides: There was a staircase in front of our room that was open to anyone so there wasn't much privacy. I highlighted it in yellow on the picture and circled our room in blue. You can see the staircase from the room in the first picture.  Our room could not see the sunset because it was blocked by an Overlook area which was at the top of the staircase.   The air conditioner/heater is the loudest air conditioner I have ever heard. The air handler is located in the ceiling and it was extremely loud.  The entrance to the room opens up to a corridor that is outside and the road noise was loud by 8 a.m.
Manager Response: Dear tricias721,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I am pleased to learn that you enjoyed the well decorated clean and comfortable atmosphere in your room. However, I regret that you experienced some disappointment regarding the rooms location and air conditioning. We strive to provide all of our guests with fantastic experiences and hope you will be so kind as to allow us another opportunity in the near future to show you how wonderful our hotel truly is.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: Great location w/ beautiful sunrise & sunset beach views
Summary: Excellent location walking distance from shopping, restaurants and beachside walks.  I stayed in a Standard room which was very clean and had plenty of space.  The rooftop has beautiful views and they open a bar at 1pm with cocktails available for purchase.  I’d stay here again as the rates were reasonable.
Manager Response: Dear Christinatravels2,  Thank you for sharing your review.  I am so glad to learn that you thoroughly enjoyed your recent stay with us.  I agree that our location is unparalleled in comparison to the many hotels in Laguna Beach. I am pleased to know you were able to take advantage of this great luxury throughout your time in Laguna Beach. It is also wonderful that you were able to join us for the cocktails and beautiful views offered on our private terrace.   We hope to welcome you back in the very near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: We arrived for a 2 day stay last weekend which had been booked well in advance. They put us in a room that can only be described as 1950's Motel. Ground floor with outside door to parking lot and main street (Pacific coast hwy,) Motorcycles and trucks going by constantly. The room was clean but very tiny. One chair, no place to eat breakfast which we always like to do. We asked to have another room and were told there was nothing else available. The room with parking and tax cost $464.00. To be fair the desk clerks were pleasant and offered to move us for the second night at no additional cost. The second room was very nice with plenty of space and an ocean view. Had we had this room to begin I would have given a 4 or 5 star review. The original room does not even warrant 1 star.
Manager Response: Dear Thomostoo,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  While I am pleased to learn that you enjoyed your second room, we always strive to provide our guests an exceptional experience from beginning to end and I offer my apologies as it seems we have missed this mark during your recent stay.  We hope that you may be so gracious as to allow us another opportunity to prove how wonderful our hotel is in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: Been staying here for the past 15 years. Love this whole area. The views are spectacular. Love to people watch. The best location for everything. Walking distance to downtown, the beach and restaurants galore. Something for everyone. The staff at this hotel is so friendly and accommodating to your every need. Rooms are just perfect.
Manager Response: Dear Voyager62891989740,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review.  It is wonderful to learn that your recent stay with us was a wonderful one.   I am so glad that you have made The Inn At Laguna Beach your second home at the beach for the past 15 years. We strive to provide the level of hospitality that you describe and I am so pleased to learn that we met this goal throughout your stay.   We all look forward to welcoming you back in the near future for another fantastic experience.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: This was the second time in as may years that we have stayed at this hotel, and our experience this year was very much the same as last year.  The hotel excells in customer service and comfort; and it all seems very natural and genuine.  Our gratitude especially to the following team members Peter, John, Elisa, Ryan, Wendy, Edson Michael, Karl, Shayan and Judi who we came in contact with the most.   However all of the staff team are very helpful and friendly and appear to do their best to make you feel at home.  The hotel is spotlessly clean and well maintained and the rooms are very comfortable.  The hotel is perfectly positioned. We had an ocean facing room with a balcony and it was perfect.  We were both celebrating our birthdays on this occasion and the bottle of red wine
Manager Response: Dear Michaelorraine1,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review.  I am so happy to hear of your outstanding experience with us at The Inn At Laguna Beach.   We always aim to reach the level of hospitality that you describe and I am so glad that this genuine commitment to service in all forms stood out during your stay.  We are all so grateful for your recognition and I will be certain to pass along your kind words to all of the fantastic members of our staff that you have mentioned.  I am so glad that you were able to celebrate your birthdays with us and we hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: Booked the highest prices “ocean view” only to find we were stuck in a room on the lowest level with an obstructed view. When we complained they offered to move us but made us sit and wait for an hour and a half—rather than simply sending staff to get our room ready cost. Staff smiled a lot but were completely unhelpful. “Good” hotels go out of their way to help you. This hotel didn’t. Nuff said. A disappointing start to the weekend.
Manager Response: Dear KennyboySO,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  While we always strive to go out of our way to provide all of our guests with fantastic experiences it seems that we regrettably did not meet that standard throughout your stay. I offer my apologies for this and will address your concerns with diligence.   Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: If you desire a charming room in an Inn right on the beach, this is the place for you.
Summary: This is a quiet and lovely place to curl up with the ocean and the sunset.  The people are lovely and more than willing to help with whatever request you have.  The manager, Nick, is charming and generous and takes an interest  in his guests.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The location is the best. Walking distance to shops and restaurants. Really nice happy hour on the terrace, with sunset views. Beds are comfortable. Rooms are not the most modern, but they are fine. Pool and hot tub are nice. Staff are friendly.
Manager Response: Dear TAP647,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I am so glad to learn that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. Our terrace is an incredibly beautiful place and it is wonderful that you were able to take part in our nightly wine hour there.  We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: This hotel was expensive, but I was glad I splurged on it for a 2-night stay. Totally worth it for the location and amazing view from my own private balcony overlooking the beach. It was very quiet and peaceful, with great service and amenities.
Manager Response: Dear 957marielt,  Thank you for sharing your kind review.  I am so glad to learn that your recent stay with us was such a wonderful experience.  We always strive to provide the highest caliber of service and amenities and I am so pleased that we met this mark throughout your stay. I agree that our location is unparalleled and it is fantastic that this contributed to your peaceful time spent in Laguna Beach.  We hope to welcome you back in the very near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: The hotel is beautiful, very comfortable.  Views are extraordinary.  Easy walking access to restaurants, bars, shops, etc.  I loved it.  I traveled alone and I felt safe and had a ball!  I will definitely stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach again!
Manager Response: Peter A  Dear loriginachurch,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. I agree that our location is incredible and I am so glad that you enjoyed this luxury throughout your experience.  We hope to welcome you back to The Inn At Laguna Beach in the very near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: The staff was wonderful and made us feel super special. Elisa was FABULOUS with her lovely note to us and artistic work. the perfect getaway! Tea at bedtime was the ultimate! Appreciate the personal touch!
Manager Response: Dear Leah R,  Thank you for sharing your kind review,  I am so pleased to learn that you thoroughly enjoyed your recent stay with us.   The experience you describe is exactly what we aim to provide all of our guests. I am so happy that we were able to meet this mark throughout your stay and especially on such an important occasion. Elisa is a wonderful member of our fantastic staff and I will certainly be sure to pass your kind words along to her.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: The Inn at Laguna Beach is a gem, with a perfect location and a charming atmosphere. The hotel is right on the beach next to the "main" beach in Laguna, and a 5-minute walk to all the major shopping and restaurants. There is no better location in Laguna. The hotel itself is nicely appointed, and the staff is very helpful and welcoming. It's not the most modern property by any means, but it has a warmth and a charm about it that is very appealing. Rooms are small but comfortable, with very nice bedding, and many rooms have private patios overlooking the ocean. There is a lovely rooftop bar, and every night the hotel hosts a wine reception from 5 to 6pm. This is not a "tasting" with small tastes of wine, but generous pours and refills any time your glass is empty. Very cool. The
Manager Response: Dear Gary C,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review.  I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. I agree that our location is paramount among hotels in Laguna Beach and I am so glad that you had a fantastic time walking to all of the amazing nearby restaurants and shops. I will be sure to address your concerns about the hairdryer and we certainly value this input as an opportunity to improve. Our goal is always to provide the highest caliber of service to all of our guests and it is wonderful to hear of the welcoming hospitality you experienced.   I look forward to welcoming you back to The Inn At Laguna Beach in the very near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: Very nice hotel but rooms a bit disappointing as quite small. Our room faced the road & was a bit noisy from the traffic. Wonderful location though with 5 min walk to shops & restaurants. The beach here is just stunning, you could watch the view all day long.
Manager Response: Dear JaneSmoothy,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I am so glad to learn that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. While we value all feedback as an opportunity for improvement, I regret that it seems you were not fully satisfied with your room and for that I offer my apologies. It is wonderful that you enjoyed our incredible location and the beautiful views that accompany it.  We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: It’s all true, walk to all shops and restaurants.  Hotel just above the beach, just a short walk away.  Plenty of beach, walkway to explore.  Or just sit on your balcony and relax.  Definitely a 4 plus star hotel.  We will return.
Manager Response: Dear 339drossi,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review.  I am so pleased to learn that you truly enjoyed your recent stay with us. It is delightful to hear that you were able to enjoy all of the wonderful parts of Laguna Beach just a short walk from the hotel.   We all look forward to welcoming you back for another fantastic time at The Inn At Laguna Beach in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: Super clean and excellent location. My second time staying there. Love being able to walk to Nicks for dinner along the beach and watching sunset in the cliff side park looking out over the ocean.  The best. Peter was great checking us in, even though we were slightly past  sunset wine hour, he definitely hooked us up with the wine anyway.
Manager Response: Dear Darin B,  Thank you so much for your kind words.  I am so pleased to learn that you thoroughly enjoyed your recent stay with us. I agree that being able to walk to the best restaurants and most beautiful places in Laguna Beach are some of the standout luxuries specific to The Inn At Laguna Beach.  We hope to welcome you back for your third stay in the very near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: Older hotel, but recently remolded with attentive staff. Great location right on Laguna Beach, but very small rooms and noisy over Hwy 1. We were not to happy about paying $30 per night to park our rental car, but would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear LTPAGE,  Thank You so much for sharing your review.  I am so glad to learn that you enjoyed your recent stay with us.   We always strive to create positive experiences for all of our guests and hope to welcome you back to The Inn At Laguna Beach in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: This is a great boutique hotel on the the hill overlooking the ocean and beach.  It's a bit pricey, but the staff are great, the rooms are spacious, and parking is convenient. One of my things is a very early morning walk on the beach with a hot cup of coffee. There's a Starbucks across the street that opens at 5:00am making this so easy to do.  It's an easy walk to the shops, galleries, and cafes in the heart of Laguna Beach. Great for a quiet weekend get away!
Manager Response: Dear Rick S,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your getaway here at The Inn At Laguna Beach.   I am so glad to learn that our hotel and staff stood out and made your experience in such a beautiful place like Laguna Beach that much more enjoyable.   We hope to welcome you back in the very near future.   Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: Poor Response to Fire Alarm Disruption
Summary: We've stayed here before because of its closeness to Main Beach and the center of town. It's a good upscale choice between the really high end hotels in town and the more moderate properties to stay. However, on our recent one night stay here, on the morning of Friday, September 7th, we were rudely awakened by the lengthy blaring of the fire alarm at 6:45 in the morning. Calls to the front desk went unanswered, likely due to everyone calling, but I eventually got through to learn there was a small trash fire in the underground parking garage. I was told we could gather in the lobby but would probably have no worries remaining in our room. A few minutes later the alarm blasted off again as we settled back to sleep. The blaring alarm would sound off 4 further times over the course
Manager Response: none

Summary: The street side rooms are not as nice as the ocean side, make sure to ask for the ocean side  even if it means paying extra. great restaurants nearby, don't try and drive in the city during the summer.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I’d give ten stars if I could!  Stayed here for a solo vacation (with my pup.). Items to highlight: clean/spacious rooms, AMAZING LOCATION right on the beach and walkable to everything nearby and downtown. However, what really stood out was the SERVICE from staff. They are amazing!  From the front desk staff, to the happy hour servers, housekeeping, and pool service. Everyone went above and beyond to answer questions, provide special request items, and create a positive and welcoming environment.  As someone who has worked in the tourism industry over 20 years, I have seen all levels of service, and this is one of the best teams I’ve met. Even if someone didn’t know the answer to a questions (such as “is the trolley pet friendly?”) they would graciously insist on finding out and
Manager Response: Dear julesinaz123,  Thank you so much for sharing your thoughtful and kind review.   I am so glad to hear that your time with us at The Inn at Laguna Beach was so wonderful. I agree that our location and rooms are superb. It is truly rewarding to read your praise for the service you experienced throughout your stay. Our entire staff always strives to provide an environment just as you described. I am so happy that we were able to meet that goal during your time here.   We hope to welcome you and your pup back for another wonderful experience very soon.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: This is hands down the most beautiful and most convenient location in Laguna Beach. The hotel has stunning ocean views, friendly staff, a beach theme and all the amenities. Walk to all the shops and restaurants. The ocean is clear and beautiful! Great hotel experience!
Manager Response: Dear Eluye,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I am so pleased that your recent stay with is was such a perfect experience. I am so glad that you were able to experience the most beautiful views and convenient location that our hotel provides.   We truly look forward to welcoming you back to The Inn at Laguna Beach in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: The Inn at Laguna Beach is magical. The staff is amazing, the rooms are nice, the location is great and the views are spectacular. Any time I am in this part of the country I find an excuse to stay here and I'm never disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear MBK12345,  Thank you so much for your kind review.  I am so glad to learn that your recent say with us was fantastic. It is wonderful to hear that your experiences continue to draw you back to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We look forward to welcoming you back for many more fantastic experiences in the future.  Kind Regards,  Peter A

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 2 nights August 20th and 21st.  We upgraded to a room facing the beach.  While the price was a bit more than the "Village" rooms it was so worth it!  At night we sat out on our balcony had a little coffee and dessert while listening to the ocean with the stars and the moon shining above.  The room was really pretty and spacious. It came with a little coffee maker so if you want a late night coffee without heading out just look in the closet. There is also a Starbucks across the street just a short jog from the hotel.  The staff at the hotel was also very nice and knowledgeable about local dining and things to do.  They were very friendly and ready to assist with any of our questions.  We parked our car after arriving and did not take it back out until
Manager Response: Dear ELD430,  Thank you so much for your kind review.  It is wonderful to learn that your recent stay with us was fantastic. I am so pleased that you enjoyed your time on your beautiful balcony and walking from the hotel to all of the beautiful places in Laguna Beach.   I look forward to welcoming you back to The Inn at Laguna Beach in the future.  Kind Regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: Third stay and returning next week.
Summary: My daughter and I stayed here for our third year. Beautiful …perfect. We come to go to the Pageant of the Masters. It is walking distance. Once we arrive , we park the car and we walk everywhere. Lovely...wonderful staff...I was not thrilled with the room assigned. The staff did all they could to improve the situation. We were moved and it saved our trip. Thank you.
Manager Response: Dear Donnademar,  Thank you so much for your review.  I am so happy to hear that your recent stay with us was wonderful.   It is truly a luxury to be able to walk to all of the wonderful places that you described including the Pageant of the Masters. Our staff always works to provide the highest level of service and I am so glad that those efforts stood out during your time with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back many times in the future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: A solid 5 stars.  The staff go above and beyond in friendliness.  Little luxuries like tea delivered to your room in the afternoon.  Rooms extremely clean.  Housekeeping is excellent.  Central to walking everywhere. Worth every cent to stay here.
Manager Response: Dear Charles D. S,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review.  I am so pleased to learn that your recent stay with us was so wonderful. I am so grateful to be able to pass along your praise to our housekeeping department, they work tirelessly to make sure every room is prepared to the highest standard daily.   We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: The Inn has a welcoming and wonderful staff, perfect location above the beach and amazing views, very comfortable and nicely appointed rooms, and within close walking distance to numerous restaurants, art and galleries, parks and the ocean.
Manager Response: Dear Richard M,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review.  I am so glad to learn that you enjoyed all of these wonderful elements of The Inn at Laguna Beach during your recent stay. Our rooms are all gorgeous along with the views from the hotel. We always strive to provide the highest level of service and I am so pleased that were able to achieve that standard throughout your experience.   We hope to welcome you back to this incredible location in Laguna Beach in the very near future.   Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: Amazing hotel, our room was fantastic room 507 the view was breathtaking, hotel was right on the beach, couldn’t have asked for a better location, restaurants right on the doorstep, staff extremely helpful, myself husband and 3 children loved every single minute, visited San Clemente lovely little village half an hour away, and also went to Disneyland also half an hour away, the hotel provided a driver Kareem who was so friendly and lovely and took us wherever we wanted to go! Highly recommend this hotel x
Manager Response: Dear Seking123,  Thank you for sharing your kind review.   I am so pleased to learn that you thoroughly enjoyed your recent stay. I agree that our location is remarkable. It is wonderful to learn that our staff met your expectations as ours are always set at the highest mark.   We hope to welcome you and your family back to The Inn at Laguna Beach in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: Staff is friendly and the location is good but this is the only positive to say about the Inn At Laguna Beach! The WIFI is terribly bad, it is not working at all or extremely slow. The airo is very loud. The carpets in the elevators and at the front desk are dirty. When asked to have the sofa bed of our daughter to be prepared for the night we were told to do it ourselves (first night) or it would be done but did not happen (second night). When paying USD 600 per night this should be done without hesitation. There are many better hotels in Laguna Beach,  this hotel is definitively not worth the prices they are asking unfortunately....
Manager Response: Dear DantehetGooi,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  It saddens me to learn that we seem to have failed to meet your expectations during your recent stay, and for that I offer my apologies. We are always appreciative of any feedback because it offers us an opportunity to improve. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed our location and friendly staff.  We hope that you will afford us an opportunity to welcome you back in the future and show you that your experience is certainly not one representative of our standard.   Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: Highly recommend this hotel for its location, view and service! Awesome reception and their friendly and always helpful service, especially we are thankful to Ekaterina for her very professional advice during our week stay at Inn!  Thank you, the Inn. It’s been great.
Manager Response: Dear Valeriya P,  Thank you for sharing your kind review.  I am so pleased to learn that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. Ekaterina is a wonderful member of our team and I will be sure to pass along your kind words to her. I agree that the luxury of our location, views and the level of service that we always strive to provide all of our guests is what makes The Inn at Laguna Beach such a phenomenal hotel.   We hope to welcome you back in the near future.   Kind Regards,  Peter a

Summary: This is my first review on tripadvisor but I felt like I'm obligated to do it to help other future guests looking at checking in this hotel. Please don't waste your money on this hotel. The service is bad. The hotel is regular. Not a lot of amenities. AC is loud. Sheets are dirty and stained. Hotel staff act like it's not a big deal. The hotel is overlooking the beach but if u wanna go to the beach you'll have a difficult time since it's always extremely crowded. No privacy. Overall not worth even $100 per night. Save your money and go a little bit towards the more private, more high end hotel and you'll enjoy your money's worth. Please don't waste your money here.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Views were terrific, room very comfortable. Priced fair and the food was good. Front desk service good. The pools are a bit shabby but with the ocean right there it didn't matter. The restaurant could use some updating and diversification on the menu.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Amazing! Probably my favorite hotel stay ever! Loved Laguna Beach and this hotel made things even more amazing! Free wine  every evening, cookies after that for the kids (and us). Heated pool after a great beach day, where we got to use complimentary beach chairs, umbrellas, towels, boogie boards and toys on beach. They even have someone available to carry your things out to the beach for you!  Front desk helped us change our reservations to stay another night and made Changing over to a new room a breeze (they moved all our bad for us!!)  Cannot wait to come back here again one day!! Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear Millerdes,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review.  I am so pleased to learn that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that our hotel made your time in such a beautiful place like Laguna Beach even more enjoyable.   We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Laguna Beach.  Kind Regards,  Peter Anderson

Summary: My daughter and I stayed here for 3 nights. It is so centrally located that we were able to park our car and never moved it until we left for the airport. We walked to everything. Very convenient. The hotel was clean and staff was friendly and attentive. My only negative was there really was no on-sight restaurant for snacks or dining. But a very minor concern as there are so many great places nearby. We would certainly stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear 266andreat,   Thank you so much for sharing your review. It is wonderful to learn that you and your daughter had such a wonderful time here at The Inn at Laguna Beach. I also believe that the luxury of being able to walk to the most beautiful beaches, best restaurants and vibrant center of town is a phenomenal aspect of our hotel.   We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,   Peter A

Summary: We had a great time in Laguna beach.  We went to the Pageant of Masters and stayed at the Inn.  The inn is right on the beach.  It has beautiful views out over the ocean.   There was complementary "happy hour" on the rooftop deck.  Nice!   The area is also very walkable.  Many interesting sites and restaurants all around.  It was easy to walk to the Pageant.
Manager Response: Dear DBCB50,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review.  I am so pleased to learn that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. It is wonderful that you were able to experience the view and atmosphere of our wine hour along with all of the other amazing sites within walking distance.   We hope to welcome you back for another spectacular time in Laguna Beach.  Kind Regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: Great place for exploring the West Coast for a few days
Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights as a family get together. The Hotel is very clean and a super location right in the middle of Laguna Beach. Lots of very different types and levels of restaurants within easy walking distance of the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Jackscuba60,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I am so glad to learn that you enjoyed your recent stay with us.   I also believe that The Inn at Laguna Beach is a perfect place to explore some of the most beautiful parts of the West Coast. Our location is paramount among hotels in Laguna Beach and our close proximity to Los Angeles and San Diego make our hotel ideal for a family adventure in Laguna Beach and Southern California.   We hope to welcome you and your family back on your next visit to the West Coast.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: I was born and raised in Manhattan and the first time I saw Laguna Beach in the 1990s, with the mountains and palm tress coming almost to the water, I fell in love with the view where the road from the freeway, Laguna Canyon Road (Broadway) hits Pacific Coast Highway (US 1). That's the view you'll see from The Inn at Laguna. Finally in 2007 I moved to nearby Dana Point, and this view is still one of my favorites in California.  Everything is expensive in Laguna, especially hotels, but The Inn is where I host out of town guests because, for Laguna, it's mid-range, yet right on the water, with a hilltop view of the entire town that rivals the view of Diamond Head from Waikiki, in my opinion. And much less built up than Waikiki.   The Inn's rooms are beautiful, especially in an
Manager Response: Dear HappyKatya,  Thank you so much for your kind review.  I am so happy to learn that your recent stay with us was so wonderful. I agree that the view of the beach and coastline from The Inn at Laguna Beach is unrivaled. Being able to enjoy this view from our terrace or the privacy of one of our ocean view rooms is a spectacular experience.   We look forward to welcoming you back to enjoy this gorgeous view and all of the fantastic restaurants and galleries steps from The Inn at Laguna Beach in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter Anderson

Summary: I gave the Inn at Laguna Beach four stars but it was a five star experience, let me explain.   Rating anything is a subjective task and to do so you generally compare your experience with something else.  At the price point we paid to stay at the Inn I must compare it to the other "resorts" in the area.  I will compare the Inn with the Montage, the Ritz Carlton, and the Avaria where we have also stayed.  On paper its an unfair comparison with the Inn bringing a knife to a gun fight.  The Inn is not a resort and lacks much of what the other resorts offer.  There is no spa,  no "fancy" pool, no high end restaurant (in fact no restaurant at all), no concierge, no valet parking, no staff that bows and scrapes before you, no new and modern buildings, no pretense of ultra luxury....
Manager Response: Dear UncleMeat,  Thank you so much for your thoughtful review.   I am so pleased to learn that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. I also truly appreciate your thorough comparison of our property to the many other top tier hotels and resorts around Laguna Beach. I share your view that the luxury we provide is derived from each magical experience that we provide our guests. Coupled with our impeccable location our staff works tirelessly to make this a luxurious experience in the most personalized way possible. I am so glad that we were able to meet this standard throughout your recent stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: Beautiful place, comfortable rooms.  We will come back for sure. We came with our 3 & 6 year old.  Magical place with great memories for kids and adults alike. I suggest it for all my fellow moms... whether it be a staycation or home base from out of town.
Manager Response: Dear Karen L,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review.  I am so pleased to learn that you and your family enjoyed your recent stay with us. I agree that The Inn At Laguna Beach is a beautiful place. Our location and surroundings are sure to provide an experience in paradise for everyone, including local travelers.   We hope to welcome you back in the very near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: My husband and I had a very pleasant stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  It is in a great location right next to Main Beach: walked to restaurants, the Museum, shops. Forgot something important in the safety deposit box, and the general manager, Casey Graves, saw that it was returned to me, making me feel like a valued guest. No restaurant in the hotel, but you can order breakfast as room service. Hotel also offered a complimentary wine on the terrace and snacks everyday from 5-6 pm and coffee and cookies in the lobby during certain hours.
Manager Response: Dear Florence S,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review.  I am so pleased to learn that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. It it’s truly a luxury to be located directly on Main Beach and within walking distance to all of the best galleries, shops and restaurants in Laguna Beach.   Casey is tremendously grateful for your thoughtful words. I am so glad that the personalized degree of hospitality we always seek to provide our guests allowed you to feel as valued as you are to us.  We hope to welcome you back to The Inn At Laguna Beach in the very near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: This hotel is as close to perfect as you could hope for. Staff constantly seek to give great service. Kudos to Peter for his service. Dedicated staff make all the difference. Ocean view well worth the extra cost. The ocean lulls you to sleep. Rooms are spacious and up to date
Manager Response: Dear Hubert M,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I am happy to learn that your recent stay with us was fantastic.I am so pleased that the sound of the ocean and our wonderfully tasteful rooms added to your positive experience.  We all aim to make each guests experience a remarkable one and It is humbling to learn that we accomplished this throughout your recent stay with us. I am so thankful for your kind words and must admit that the service we deliver is a result of all of the wonderful people and their efforts at The Inn At Laguna Beach.   We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: This property is amazing. Direct beach front.  The little touches make all of the difference. Flavored drinking water in common areas, coffee in the lobby in the morning, complimentary wine happy hour on the roof, complimentary Milk and cookies, cloth hand towels in the public restroom etc.. Most importantly The staff is A+ - so accomodating but never too pushy. We are definitely coming back. :-)
Manager Response: Dear 366keith,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I am so glad to learn that your recent stay with us was a wonderful experience.  I agree that our location is paramount, and that the little touches you describe, like infused water and the nightly wine hour on our terrace are all fantastic amenities that make the atmosphere of our property sand above the rest. We always strive to provide the highest level of service and it is truly rewarding to hear that we achieved this goal throughout your stay.  We all look forward to welcoming you to The Inn At Laguna Beach.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: Cute hotel in the most beautiful place in California
Summary: Location: Situated off Main Beach off PCH. You would think the traffic would resonate into the rooms, but that was not the case.  This is our (my girlfriend and I) 2nd visit at the Inn at Laguna and it always impresses me awesome this boutique hotel is. We paid for an ocean front room and waking up to the sound of the waves is unreal. The pool side rooms are good as well, but can be loud when its in use.   The Staff: They are very welcoming, friendly and giddy- which is always nice. At check-in they explain take the time to clearly explain all the hotel amenities which makes your stay more enjoyable: coffee in the morning, cookies & milk in the afternoon, free wine on the roof deck, and beach towels, chairs etc. Its
Manager Response: Dear Brian R,  Thank you so much for your Kind review.  I am so pleased to hear that your recent stay with us was an incredible one.  I am also so glad to learn that the hospitality our staff always seeks to provide our guests was as noteworthy as our spectacular location. We are all grateful that you chose to return to The Inn At Laguna Beach and we are so happy that your most recent experience was as impressive as the last.    We truly look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: You can not beat this location for Laguna Beach. The rooms are slightly dated however it goes with the beach theme a little bit. My room was clean and roomy enough. be warned, I was charged a daily parking rate and an additional resort fee
Manager Response: Dear mcdever,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I am so pleased to learn that you enjoyed your recent stay with us.  I agree that our location is unbeatable in comparison to any other hotel in Laguna Beach and we sincerely hope to welcome you back to The Inn At Laguna Beach in the very near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: My best friend and I celebrated our 50th birthdays with a girls trip to Laguna Beach.  The Inn at Laguna Beach was amazing!  We had a room overlooking the beach and pool with a balcony. We kept the door open almost all of the time to listen to the crashing waves.  Knowing we were celebrating there was a bottle of champagne waiting for us in the room when we arrived.  The room was beautiful and the beds were super comfy.  Every night there was also hot tea tray waiting for us in our room when we returned from dinner.   We really enjoyed the free happy hour on the patio every evening.  Wendy always made sure our wine glasses were filled and was very sweet.  Everyone on the staff was friendly and extremely helpful.  The hotel is in a great central location so we walked everywhere.
Manager Response: Dear Cathy O,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review.  I am so pleased to learn that your recent stay was a fantastic one. It is wonderful to hear that you thoroughly enjoyed our spectacular location, turn down service and nightly wine hour. We all strive to provide exceptional service to our guests and I will be sure to share your kind words with Wendi and our team. We are truly grateful that you chose to celebrate such a special occasion at The Inn At Laguna Beach and we hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: Plaza Services employees loved this place
Summary: This was a very cozy hotel.  The location was awesome and my group enjoyed the pool as well as the beach.  I hope the next time Plaza Services LLC holds another training program that it is back in Laguna Beach so we can stay here again.  It was a delightful stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I went for the day. I met some friends there. What a lovely time. The hotel is very coastal cozy and very clean.  Great location in Laguna. All the staff were great, especially Shayan, who went out of her way to explain everything the hotel has to offer. I will be making plans to stay here. I live in So. Cal and with that being said this is a perfect retreat for locals.
Manager Response: Dear kimcal50,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I am so pleased to hear that your recent stay with us was such a wonderful experience. It is true that being at The Inn At Laguna Beach can provide the feeling of being worlds away without traveling far in Southern California. Shayan is a fantastic part of our team and I will be sure to pass along your kind words to her. We always strive to provide the highest level of hospitality and I am so pleased that we met that expectation during your time with us.  We truly look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Laguna Beach.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: Great location for a great price
Summary: I researched many places and I'm so happy we settled onThe Inn at Laguna Beach.  It was a perfect location - walking distance to the shops/dining/beach.  We loved the complimentary happy hour and watching the sunset from the balcony.  The staff was friendly and knowledgeable.  We'll stay here again for sure.
Manager Response: Dear llward5,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review.  I am so pleased to learn that you thoroughly enjoyed all of these wonderful elements of The Inn At Laguna Beach. I agree that our location is perfect and it is truly rewarding to hear that your great experience was enhanced by the level of hospitality that our staff always seeks to provide.    We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: My daughter's and i were  we're staying in an oceanfront room enjoying the sunset one  evening having our dinner and were appalled and shocked to witness a transient man casually jump the glass wall into the hotel pool area and who then proceeded to undress to only his underwear and bathe in the hotel jacuzzi spa. He spent several minutes cleaning his fingernails, ears and hair as well dunking  his sandals into the spa to clean them.  We immediately telephoned the front desk to report this and we're asked to give a description of man. Within a couple of minutes an Inn At Laguna employee went to the pool area but to our surprise he said nothing to the man but simply collected pool towels and left the area.  The transient man casually dried himself off with a hotel towel, got
Manager Response: Dear lovelaguna123,  We were shocked and disappointed to read about your experience to say the least. This was truly an out of the ordinary event and it sounds like we did not handle any aspect of this to a satisfactory level. I am so sorry that we dropped the ball, and can assure you this is not at all the standard we usually operate at. If you could please give us the opportunity to rectify the issue and show you that we are far better than this experience, please contact me at panderson@theinnatlagunabeach.com.  Kind Regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: My New Favorite Southern California Location
Summary: We left a very expensive hotel in La Jolla early to get to Laguna. So happy that we made that choice. Loved every minute at The Inn at Laguna Beach. We upgraded to a larger room with a balcony over the beach but above the local walkway. Mostly just walked the entire week. Walked along the beach. Walked to restaurants! Walked everywhere.
Manager Response: Dear Concord119,  Thank you so much for your kind review.  I am so pleased to hear that your recent stay with us was superb. I am so happy that you enjoyed the luxury of walking to all of the amazing restaurants, beaches and other world-class cultural offerings in Laguna Beach that our location provides.  To learn that The Inn At Laguna Beach is your new favorite Southern California hotel is outstanding. We work diligently to leave all of our guests with the impression that you have expressed and I am thrilled that we were able accomplish this throughout your stay.   We hope to welcome you back in the very near future.  Kind Regards,  Peter A

Summary: Not only is this inn on the premier spot right on the beach in besutiful Laguna Beach, but the customer service is 5 star. We arrived and found out our travel agent hadn’t gotten our reservations done. While panicing, the front desk snd mamager were calm and totally helpful in orocuring us a room. Every one if them during our5 day stay were so friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear tolson445,  Thank you so much for your kind words.  The service and experience that you described are what we strive to achieve for all of our guests. I am so pleased to learn that we were able to achieve this level of hospitality throughout your stay. We are just steps from the best restaurants, galleries and beaches in Laguna Beach and I agree that our location is premier.   We hope to welcome you back to for another wonderful experience in the near future.  Kind Regards,  Peter A

Summary: We had walked past this hotel on previous trips and decided to stay for three days on this latest visit. What a wonderful property this is. We had a king room with an ocean view. We left the window open to hear the waves crashing ......a great way to fall asleep and to awake in the morning.  Loved the complimentary wine on the deck each evening as well as the cookies!  The staff are really friendly and accommodating; the property is amazingly well located on the water and also close to great restaurants and shopping. We will definitely be back to this very special place!
Manager Response: Dear Steve A,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review.  I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time spent with us. Our ocean view king rooms are wonderful and I am so happy that you were able to enjoy the sound of the waves each night. We strive to provide the highest level of service to our guests and I am so glad that we achieved this goal throughout your stay.   We truly look forward to welcoming you back to The Inn At Laguna Beach in the near future.  Kind Regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: Village Room - Windows Opening Directly into Passage - No Privacy - Nightmare Airconditioner
Summary: I joined my husband for a 2 night business trip and we reserved a Village room as there were no other rooms available at the time of booking.  Upon arrival we were told we would have ocean views.  What we did not know that our room was in fact a closet!  Imagine your bed being 2ft away from the only pair of windows that opened directly onto the passage!  The only privacy in the teeny room were white louvre shutters on the inside of the room. If you moved the shutters either up or down, folks passing in the passage to get to their rooms, could see right into your room!  The "sea views" were across the passage at an angle outside another two rooms that had a glass balcony.  It would have been better to have a room that faced the street and the village! At least we would have been
Manager Response: Dear DianeBWL,  Thank you for sharing your review.  I am saddened to learn that you were not fully satisfied with your recent experience. I regret that you encountered any disappointment with your room and the air conditioning system. We value all feedback as an opportunity for improvement and will seriously consider your review in our quest to provide each guest with a fantastic experience.  I hope that you will afford us the opportunity to welcome you back in the future.  Kind Regards,  Peter A

Summary: I come with my daughter each year so that we can enjoy Laguna Beach and the Pageant of the Masters. It is the perfect place to stay. It is within walking distance of all that we need including the Pageant of the Masters.
Manager Response: Dear donnademar,  Thank you for sharing your kind review.  I am so pleased to hear that returning to The Inn At Laguna Beach has become a tradition for you and your daughter. I agree that we are in the perfect location to enjoy the Pageant of the Masters and everything else that this beautiful area has to offer.   We truly look forward to welcoming you back this year for another spectacular experience in Laguna Beach.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: Amazing hotel, unbeatable location, perfect couples getaway!
Summary: We booked a quick couples getaway and wanted a place where we could be close to the beach and walk everywhere we needed.  We could not have been happier with our choice.  Sure, there are other high end resorts in Orange County and even some on the beach, but the only one that has the trifecta...on the beach, impeccable accommodations and walking distance to everything you need...The Inn at Laguna Beach!  The hotel is beautiful, decorated with beach motif...whites, sea blues and greens.  Not many places can you lay at the pool and listen to the waves crashing on the beach and then walk less than 5 minutes to amazing restaurants and shopping.    We didn’t have an agenda, so we took advantage of it all... relaxing by the pool, romantic dip in the spa, complimentary happy hour on
Manager Response: Dear Kelley3475,  Thank you so much for your kind review.  I am so pleased to learn that you could not be happier with your recent stay at our beautiful hotel.  The “trifecta” that you described is exactly the reason that I also feel The Inn At Laguna Beach is paramount to the many other high end luxury accommodations in Orange County.   I am so happy to hear that the pride that you witnessed in our staff reflected so wonderfully upon your time here. We strive to make each guest experience the best it can be and I am so happy to hear that we met that expectation throughout your time with us.  We truly look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: Best location at wonderful Laguna beach with beautiful views and a few steps down to the beach. Nice pool area with plenty of loungers. The design of the hotel is somewhat outdated and the rooms are a little small, but clean and comfortable. Loved the happy wine hour on the roof terrace with complimentary wine and the cookie selection in the lobby. Shame they don’t serve lunch on the beautiful terrace.
Manager Response: Dear sinderella3,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I am so pleased to learn that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. Our location is absolutely fantastic and I am so happy that you were able to relax in our beautiful pool area. The Pacific Terrace is a special place with unmatched views of the coastline and our wine hour hosted there is truly an unforgettable experience.   We hope to welcome you back to The Inn At Laguna Beach in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: We stayed at the Pacific Edge... We decided to eat at the Driftwood restaurant the food was excellent I had the sword fish sandwich which was probably the best fish sandwich I've ever had the lemon aioli was over the top... Swordfish was cooked to Perfection and the homemade fries were the perfect accent to a most delicious lunch... We decided to try it again the next day for breakfast and I had the egg white omelet which was healthy and fantastic... Our server was super nice and again the views were spectacular
Manager Response: none

Summary: From the little we saw if other hotels in Laguna, I'd think this is one if the best ones. Great location, relaxed vibe, friendly staff and great amenities.  We had a poolside room, with easy access to our own private patio and the pool. They had wine hour and cookie hour so everyone was happy. Rooms and hotel aren't the most updated or spacious,  but everything else makes up for it. Loved easy access to everything like the beach, pool, and restaurants in town
Manager Response: Dear Deanna P,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind review.  I am so pleased to learn that you truly enjoyed your recent stay with us. I love the abundant natural light and relaxed feel that our poolside rooms convey, and I am so glad that you enjoyed your room and private patio. I am also happy to hear that our phenomenal location enhanced your positive experience in Laguna Beach.   We hope to welcome you back in the very near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: Love this place.  Basically everything is at your finger tips.  Beach, restaurants, shopping and even beautiful sight seeing.  We don't live to far from this wonderful place but still always feel like we are on vacation.  Definitely a sweet spot!
Manager Response: Dear chacharohrbacker,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I am so pleased that your recent stay with us was as was a fantastic one. We are all so glad to learn that you “love this place.” This is a sentiment that we all share at The Inn At Laguna Beach and always hope to translate that into the highest level of service for our guests.   We hope to welcome you back to this home away from home in the near future.  Kind Regards,  Peter A

Summary: This hotel is worth the money for the location. Everything you need is within walking distance. The hotel has beautiful views and a great scenic walk way. The staff is laid back and friendly. The rooms are small for the price, but comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Kmiller3991,  Thank you for sharing your kind review.  I am so pleased to learn that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. I am so glad that the views and location that our hotel provide added to your positive experience. I agree that our rooms are comfortable and offer a beautiful place to rest just steps from all of the best that Laguna Beach has to offer.  We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: Go for the view ... not much else!
Summary: Location, location, location.  That's what comes to mind when I think about this little hotel.  It really is an amazing location, right on the beach with exceptional views and terrific access both to town and the beach itself.  Do get a room with a view if you stay here!  But that's about it.  Given the prices we were paying and the sort of service I've received in other places, I was taken aback by the lack of warmth from the staff -- no greetings or even acknowledgements as you come in and out of the lobby -- the cheapness of things like the hair dryer and coffee service in the room, and the ridiculous amenity fee for a place that doesn't even have a gym and has the temerity to charge for bottled water in the room.  And beware your neighbors: one of ours (whose porch was
Manager Response: Dear Kleic,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I am saddened to hear that your experience with us did not meet the standard that you expected. I would like to offer my apologies for any dissatisfaction you experienced during your recent stay. While we do offer a phenomenal location, we always strive to provide the highest level of hospitality and service to all of our guests. We appreciate you sharing your review as we are grateful for all feedback as an opportunity to improve.    Kind Regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: Quaint hotel but get an ocean view
Summary: This is a nice little hotel with top notch service, I stayed her on a business trip. A couple things to note: 1) get an ocean view. I had a view of the parking lot which was a total waste. One of the other members of my group had an ocean view with a balcony and absolutely loved it. 2) the hotel does not have a restaurant on site and does not offer breakfast. There is an amazing restaurant adjacent for dinner (La Brisa) but you will have to go farther for breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Victor H,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I truly regret that you were not fully satisfied with the view from your room. I am so glad to hear that you were able to enjoy our close proximity to Laguna Beach’s best restaurants. I am also so pleased to hear that our service met our “top notch” standard during your stay.  We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: I have traveled all over the world and stay in many hotels yearly.   Hands down The Inn At Laguna is one of the best.  They are truly focused on the customer experience and value their customers.   The Inn exceeded my expectations when they handled a reservation situation to ensure that my daughter and I had a wonderful and memorable experience on our trip.   This property is perfect.  We stayed in a 4th floor beach view room. The rooms are lovely, clean, and quiet.   The view, well it was absolutely heaven.  The service was impeccable.   The location is great. You are located at Main Beach walking distance to shopping and great restaurants.   There is a Starbucks directly across the street.  They also serve tea and coffee In the lobby.  They serve cookies in the lobby in the
Manager Response: Dear Shelly A,  Thank you so much for your kind review.  I am so pleased to hear that The Inn At Laguna Beach stands as one of the best hotels that you have experienced throughout your extensive travels. We strive to provide the exact kind of experience that you have described. Our location is unrivaled and we aim to provide the highest level of service to all of our guests.  It will be our pleasure to welcome you back whenever you return to Laguna Beach.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: A nice place right on the beach
Summary: The Inn at Laguna Beach is a great place to stay in a just-perfect location.  I loved my room on the 4th floor overlooking the pool and beach with a nice balcony.  The two things lacking are a bar and a gym, though both are available nearby.
Manager Response: Dear Graupel22,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.   I am so pleased to hear that you truly enjoyed your recent stay with us. Our location is fantastic and I feel unmatched among hotels in Laguna Beach. I am so glad that your room and experience met your expectations.   We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: The Inn at Laguna is a great little hotel.  The location couldn't be better, and the people are very nice.  However, upon checkout, there was a charge of $15/day fee added to the bill as an "Amenity Fee."  I hate these.  You are told that the wifi, morning coffee, and afternoon reception are "free," but then when I asked what the previously undisclosed and mandatory "Amenity Fee" covered, I was told that it covers those services.  So much for "free."  $15/day isn't a big deal.  Just include it in the price and don't nickel and dime me with new fees at checkout.  It leaves a bad taste on an otherwise great experience.
Manager Response: Dear Jason P,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time with us. I apologize for any lack of transparency that you encountered with your bill. I regret that this seems to have detracted from your otherwise enjoyable time, and we will certainly take your feedback into consideration as we always seek to provide superior service to all of our guests.  We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,  Peter A

Summary: Great location with stunning views, go for room with sea view.  No restaurant but superb restaurant Las Brisas next door which does fabulous breakfast.  Easy parking on site.  But best of all is wine o'clock on the 4th floor terrace in the late afternoon which for us was sunset time - amazing!
Manager Response: Dear Clivpemb,  Thank you so much for your kind review.  I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Our terrace offers a stunning view of Laguna Beach and our daily wine hour is a spectacular event. We truly hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: This is  is gem of a hotel in a fabulous location.  We stayed in a room with a balcony and partial sea view.  The room was very tastefully decorated in a beach theme with nice furniture on the balcony.  The bed was very comfy and the shower was powerful.  The room was spotless on arrival -not a huge room but plenty big enough for a sofa and coffee table as well.  The location is idea-virtually on the beach with great views and a very short walk to the shops and restaurants of Laguna.  The staff in the hotel were lovely-everything hotel staff should be.  Warm and welcoming and couldn't do enough for us.  Yes it is expensive to stay but we will be treating ourselves to a stay again when we return to Laguna .
Manager Response: Dear Jameson F,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.   I am so glad to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us. I believe that our location is truly unrivaled amongst hotels in Laguna Beach. We strive to provide the highest level of service and I am so glad that we were able to reach this standard throughout your stay.   We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kind Regards,  Peter A

Summary: My wife and I booked a 4 night babymoon getaway to a hotel near here and spent one awful night.   We stopped by here and were met with a warm welcome by Elisa at the front desk.  She was able to get us into a great ocean view room with a balcony.  Elisa went out of her way during our stay to make sure we were well cared for and having a relaxing stay.    The rooms are great, nicely appointed, newly renovated, clean, quiet, very comfortable and relaxing.     I would highly recommend staying here for a relaxing couples or small business getaway.  You can’t beat this location or views!
Manager Response: Dear Charlie H,  Thank you for sharing your kind review.  I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. We strive to make every stay as relaxing and memorable as your experience. Elisa is an outstanding part of our team and I will be sure that she is aware of your kind words. We hope that you will return to stay with us in the near future.  Kind Regards,  Peter A

Summary: If you are a light sleeper this place may not be for you. It’s very close to the main highway and traffic is heard all night. The window panes must be thin and the blinds don’t block out all the lights. Very noisy. The bed was very comfortable and the bed linens were very nice.
Manager Response: Dear Larry M,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I regret to hear that your recent stay did not fully meet your expectations. While all of our rooms have been engineered to minimize any noise, I offer my apologies for any disruptions during your recent stay.   Kind Regards,  Peter A

Summary: If you love to walk the beach and enjoy being in town for restaurants this the location. The rooms are lovely and the pool is pleasant.  I highly recommend an ocean view room to wach sunset.. Wine on the terrace every  evening is pleasant.
Manager Response: Dear Janodee,  Thank you for sharing your review.  I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. I also believe that our location in Laguna Beach is perfect. Our wine hour on the terrace is an unforgettable experience and best place to watch the sunset. We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,  Peter A

Summary: We were very pleasantly surprised. We were greeted by Sheyann at the front desk, who personally took my wife and I to an upgraded room with a balcony which was worth spending the difference in price. The ocean view and sound of the waves hitting the beach soothes you to sleep. The room was clean, minimalist, and more than adequate. The service outstanding. Views of the ocean fantastic. Out the front of the hotel is Laguna Beach, a Starbucks across the street. Art shops, restaurants, and peace. Great for walks and running. No regrets, and thank you Sheyann for your outstanding service and recommendation. We will be back from Michigan.
Manager Response: Dear Triplet027,  I am so pleased to hear of your wonderful stay with us. We strive to create experiences like the one that you have shared. We always works to provide the highest standard of service and I am so glad that we were able to achieve this throughout your stay.   We look forward to welcoming you back to The Inn At Laguna Beach in the near future.   Kind Regards,  Peter A

Summary: Incredibly friendly, helpful, professional staff. Hotel was very welcoming, pretty, clean and comfortable with many niceties that helped make our stay wonderful. The location is ideal for beach, sunrises, sunsets, running or walking, shopping, dining, coffee houses, gelato shop nearby, gas stations w/ mini marts. Everything you need is nearby. Pacific Coast Highway 1 is right out the parking lot. I’ve been to Laguna many times, my husbands 1st visit. He was awestruck and can’t wait to come back to both Laguna AND The Inn at Laguna Beach. High end service with a boutique hotel atmosphere.
Manager Response: Dear Torry W,  Thank you for sharing your review.  I am so pleased to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us. I agree that The Inn At Laguna Beach is situated in a perfect location. Our close proximity to main beach and the village are ideal for exploring everything this beautiful city has to offer.   We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,  Peter A

Summary: This is a good facility for all ocean and beach lovers heading for Laguna Beach. The place itself is picturesque. Rooms are well maintained. No in house restaurant, but there are many around. And catering available too.
Manager Response: Dear Avinash Kumar T,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.   I am delighted to learn that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. I agree that we are situated in an unparalleled location for enjoying the exquisite beaches and restaurants in Laguna Beach.   We hope to welcome you back to our picturesque hotel in the near future.  Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: One of my favourite hotels in the world
Summary: One of my favourite hotels in the world.  We found this hotel on trip advisor and thought that we would give it a try. We have been to Laguna beach before and had stayed elsewhere. This hotel is seriously a gem.  The location is perfect and you can even walk to restaurants from the hotel and it is located right on the beach .  The rooms are beautiful and comfortable and we will definitely come back the staff was also very friendly and kind.
Manager Response: Dear nallin47,  Thank you for sharing your review.  I am so pleased to hear of your wonderful stay with us. Our location on the beach is spectacular and just steps from the vibrant village center. We constantly strive to provide our guests the highest level of hospitality. I am delighted to learn that we were able to live up to that standard.   We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary Heading: What out for “ocean view” rooms without the view
Summary: I spent the extra money to get the room with an ocean view however you had to walk outside on the balcony and look past buttress and many people publicly walking to see the ocean. Should have gotten a better view for the price of the room.
Manager Response: Dear michaelbZ8156WY,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your review.   I am saddened to hear that your room did not meet your expectations. We are renowned for our gorgeous views of the coastline; however, I would like to extend my apologies for any disappointment with your room.   Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: We just returned from "The Inn at Laguna Beach" after spending a week relaxing. This was our first time at The Inn, where we were very impressed with the accommodations, staff, and location. Specifically, we were so impressed with the professionalism and pleasantness of the staff that we made a point of remembering the names of the staff that we interacted with. That said, we want to thank Ekaterina (Kat), Elise, Sheyenne (sp), John, Matthew, Corey, Felipe (sp), Maria, Judy, Michael, Dave, Edgard, Olga, and Lucero. Additionally, we liked The Inn so much that we have already said that we will return again during the 2018 holiday break.
Manager Response: Dear William H,  Thank you for sharing you kind review.  I am truly pleased to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. While I sincerely believe our location is unrivaled, it is true that the same can be said of our professional and thoughtful staff. We all strive to provide the highest caliber of hospitality to all of our guests and I will be sure to share your gratitude with all of those you mentioned.   I look forward to welcoming you back during your 2018 holiday break for another fantastic experience in Laguna Beach.  Best wishes,  Peter A

Summary Heading: OK HOTEL, NOTHING TO GET EXCITED ABOUT
Summary: I was on a business trip and booked this through Hotels.com.    It looked great, wide angle views, which I don't usually trust.    When I got there I was a bit surprised that the lobby looked great and the room was just okay.  I won't stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear John M,  Thank you for taking the time to share your review.   I am pleased to learn that you enjoyed our beautiful lobby. We value all feedback as an opportunity to improve; however, I am saddened to learn that the room did not fully meet your expectations.   In the future, I hope that you might grant us the opportunity to show you how wonderful our hotel truly is and consider reaching out to us directly. We are always happy to assist you in booking the room best suited to your desires.   Warm regards,  Peter A

Summary: We were here for three nights, each one more magical than the next. Granted, we were on a romantic get away, but the place just lends itself to paradise. We loved the views, beach proximity, walking distance to the village, and complementary nightly wine. This is the perfect place to spark the romance!
Manager Response: Dear Lisabinnyc,  Thank you for sharing your kind review.   I am so pleased to learn that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. I also believe that our location is unsurpassed among hotels in Laguna Beach. We do your utmost to make every stay a marvelous one, and I am thankful that we were able to live up to that expectation during your romantic getaway in paradise.   We hope to welcome you back in the near future.   Best wishes,  Peter A

Summary: I cannot express enough gratitude to the Inn at Laguna Beach. The hotel is at a perfect location, right on a beach and in the middle of Laguna downtown, walking distance to many restaurants, shops etc. The hotel staff has gone above and beyond  for me from a complimentary room upgrade to a birthday card written in my native language. I was so touched by their thoughtfulness. Complimentary Starbucks coffee and a wine happy hour every night were a nice touch too. The rooms are lovely, equipped with comfortable bedding, luxury robes and a served hot tea every night. I’d recommend a room with a balcony because the sound and the view of the ocean is a dream. I’m not sure how much more you’d want from an accommodation at a beach town. A four-night stay was just perfection. Thank you.
Manager Response: Dear Marina P,  Thank you for taking the time to share your kind review.  I am so glad that we were able to help make your birthday and travel experience a wonderfully memorable one. Our hotel is certainly lovely, from the views to the rooms. We strive for a level of service to make the kind of “above and beyond” connections like the one we were able to share with you.  I am so pleased to hear that you plan to return to stay with us.  Best Wishes,  Peter A

Summary: We live in Temecula CA and we're looking for a day at the beach.  We booked an ocean view here and had an incredible experience.  The hotel is right on the beach walking distance to everything in Laguna.  The rooms are clean and comfortable.  If you are looking for four seasons luxury and over the top wait on you hand and foot service, this is not your place, but that was perfect for me.  The place is small, cozy and the staff was very friendly and helpful.  There is a happy hour on the deck at sunset with views and great people.   The pool was small but a great place to relax after the beach.  But the selling feature is the beach and town right outside the hotel.   We stayed one night but wished we could have stayed a week.
Manager Response: Dear Johnlovesfood17,  Thank you for sharing your kind review.   We are delighted to hear that your time with us was an experience that you are able to call “incredible”!   I agree that our location along the beach and just steps to the heart of town is matchless. We strive to provide supreme service and create an environment that allows all of our guests to truly relax and connect with Laguna Beach just as though it were home.  We all hope to welcome you back soon.   Best,  Peter A

Summary: it was romantic get away from city life.. had a water front room though was not able to enjoy romantic sunset in peace as much due to having a noisy pool right in front though we were in higher floor.
Manager Response: Dear SusanM,  Thank you for sharing your review.  We are located in a beautiful and romantic setting, and our top floor ocean view rooms offer gorgeous views of the coastline. I am disappointed to hear that you did not enjoy the sunsets fully. In the future I believe you may prefer one of our ocean view rooms with full balconies that provide some added seclusion.   Best,  Peter A

Summary Heading: We love The Inn at Laguna
Summary: Stayed for 2 nights as we do almost every October.   The village king rooms are lovely - quiet and really nice inside.   The hotel staff are really lovely and so helpful. We love using the beach chairs and towels so that we can go and have beach days and the sunset drinks on the top of the hotel are a brilliant idea.   We will always return to The Inn at Laguna; location, staff and lovely rooms keep us coming back.   ❤️
Manager Response: Dear Ruth H,  Thank you so much for sharing this review.  We are all delighted to hear that our hospitality made a positive impact on your travels. I am so pleased that we lived up to your expectations throughout your most recent stay with us, and I agree that our village rooms are lovely.    We truly look forward to welcoming you back to stay with us.   Best,  Peter A

Summary Heading: A Beautiful Southern California Beach Getaway
Summary: We had such a lovely time at the Inn at Laguna Beach. We chose the hotel because it was a good half-way stop between San Diego and Los Angeles, without knowing much about it. But, it was perfect and a beautiful location and was as nice as any beach vacation we would ordinarily fly somewhere for. When we arrived, we were served wine on the outdoor patio, a nice welcoming touch. Our room had a balcony over the ocean so we  left the windows open to hear the waves on the sand. The customer service was excellent. There was no restaurant in the hotel, but right next door was the excellent "Las Brisas" restaurant which served meals all day and was delicious. The Inn is also right near the center of town, with plenty of restaurants and shops within walking distance. I am looking forward
Manager Response: Dear SusieLA,  Thank you so much for sharing your review.  I agree that Laguna Beach is one of the most beautiful places. Not just in Southern California, but anywhere. I am so glad to hear that our staff lived up to our standards of excellence throughout your stay.   We look forward to welcoming you back to enjoy wine on our terrace and the sound of the waves at night.   Peter A

Summary: The Inn at Laguna Beach is a sister hotel to the Laguna Beach House which we've stayed at as well.  I much prefer the location of the Inn at Laguna Beach because it is oceanfront (whereas the Beach House is a block away from the water).  The Inn is a very close walking distance to all the shops and restaurants in and around Ocean Ave and the waterfront views and sunsets are breathtaking.   I also love that there is a nightly complimentary wine service on the terrace. You actually get charged a $15 "amenity fee" which is mandatory and I'm sure goes toward the wine service but nonetheless it was a really enjoyable perk and the wine was quite nice.  The server tops off your glasses to practically overflowing and I'm assuming it's more or less bottomless, although we just had one or
Manager Response: Dear GPC2,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience.  Our location is second to none and equally matched by the view from our property. In a busy world it can be difficult to find a place of relaxation and I am so pleased that our staff and hotel were able to provide that experience.   We hope to see you return to The Inn At Laguna Beach soon.  Peter A

Summary Heading: Be wary of fees and noise
Summary: Pros: nice room, great views, awesome location  Cons:  - add on CA taxes and resort fees. There’s no surprise how long we are staying or what we are doing, why charge me again when I leave?  - $30 for self parking - very noisy, woken up by staff rolling around equipment and chairs before 7am on a Saturday; no sound proofing in door or walls. Very noisy AC unit and traffic.  - all in all, not worth the price.   Will not return, so many other nice hotels at this price range. Avoid if you can.
Manager Response: Dear Harlan E,   I greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your review.   We take all feedback as an opportunity to grow and improve. However, it saddens me to learn that you were not fully satisfied with your stay.Please reach out to us directly if you plan to return to Laguna Beach so that we may have the opportunity to show you how truly wonderful our hotel is.   Peter A

Summary Heading: Perfect location for a small wedding reception
Summary: What a phenomenal hotel - we held our wedding reception in the Pacific Room adjacent to the rooftop terrace. Beautiful venue, with an unbeatable view. The front desk staff bent over backwards to make everything special and were incredibly friendly. We stayed in an oceanview room with a balcony that was clean, comfortable, and really representative of the photos on the website. The hotel is in a fantastic location, right on Main Beach in easy walking distance of several great restaurants and shops. We already plan to stay here again for our anniversary. What a special place!
Manager Response: Dear Whitney R,  Thank you for sharing your review. I can’t imagine a more beautiful place to hold a wedding than on our terrace. I am so pleased to hear that our front desk was able to provide the level of hospitality that we strive for.
