We all look forward to welcoming you back to The Inn at Laguna Beach for your anniversary.  Peter A

Summary Heading: The greatest staff you will encounter
Summary: The hotel from start to finish is amazing - the views are breathtaking - but if you are looking for the greatest staff members whom work at hotels, look no further!!!!! The ENTIRE staff from front desk to housekeeping are amazing and they make you feel like family - I have stayed at hotels up and down the entire coast and stayed at 5 star hotels who don't come close to the staff at the Inn at Laguna - you wont regret staying here!!!!
Manager Response: Dear STAENTGRP,  The views and location of The Inn at Laguna Beach are truly as breathtaking as you described. Our goal is to go beyond these features and make all of our guests feel at home in this beautiful place. We are so happy that we were able to accomplish that on your stay.  Thank you so much for sharing this review and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Peter A

Summary Heading: Met with friends on the rooftop deck!
Summary: Our business colleagues and friends were staying here, so we met with them a couple of nights on the rooftop deck.  In a word:  Stunning!  The heaters helped, and the staff were attentive in arranging them for us.  Completely relaxing, beautiful views, and clean.  We would stay at the Inn for SURE on our return just for that deck alone!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I just got back from a trip up the coast line from San Diego to Seattle.  A big part of planning this trip was the hotel research.  I only selected those with positive reviews and this hotel met those expectations.  I only stayed one night.  It felt like a hidden gem.  When I first approached the property is was after dark and I was a little nervous, but once you get past the front desk you walk into a beautiful pool area and the rooms were quaint, clean, very relaxing, etc.,.  I was traveling alone and never felt nervous.  Would highly recommend!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at At the Inn Laguna Beach from 21/10/2017 for seven nights.  This is a wonderful hotel. The staff team are fantastic and literally aim to make your stay the most memorable and pleasurable experience.  We have stayed many hotels of a similar star rating....and this, in our opinion , far exceeds the others (learn a lesson others!).    It may not have the breakfast and dinning options of others; but the staff team, the complimentary wine on the terrace, complimentary milk and cookies in the evening, complimentary flask of night time herbal tea waiting in your room in the evening, the standard of accomodation, the upkeep of the hotel and its  location more than make up for this.  We would go as far as to say that this is the best hotel we have stayed in....this is
Manager Response: Dear Michaelorraine F,  Thank you for taking the time to share this thoughtful review.   I am so pleased to learn that we exceeded your expectations.   To hear that this is “the best hotel we have stayed in,” is truly rewarding to all of us and reaffirms what we work towards every day for our guests. Our entire staff and all of the employees that you highlighted individually were delighted to hear how they provided such a wonderful experience. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Laguna Beach.   Peter A Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: Absolutely fantastic location. A lovely room overlooking the ocean and coastal path. The room was so comfortable. They had thought of everything. Breakfast in the room was so much better than finding the way round a buffet. Excellent service, welcoming staff. The superior room was worth it.
Manager Response: Dear SpeckledHen2,  Thank you for sharing your thoughtful review. We are so honored that you chose to stay with us.   I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We truly are situated in a fantastic location with picturesque views of the coastline. We strive to provide outstanding service, and it means so much to all of us that we met your expectations.    We hope that you will return to stay with us again soon.   Warm Regards,  Peter A

Summary: We had a ocean view room that overlooked the beach. It was wonderful to hear the waves coming ashore as we fell asleep. The hotel has a wine hour on the roof that was very nice. We enjoyed the snacks and the wine. They also had coffee and tea in the mornings as well as cookies in the afternoon. The staff was very helpful with suggestions for places to eat in town etc. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My wife and I were visiting Laguna Beach to celebrated our wedding anniversary.   We were originally booked into another Laguna Beach 'beachfront' property which we found to be inappropriate for an anniversary celebration for a mature couple.   One look at the Inn at Laguna Beach's spectacular view and property and I knew I had to treat my wife to your exceptional view and services.      Judi at the front desk listened to a 'walk-in' customer, searched for a way to accommodate us for the next 3 nights, and recommended a reasonable solution – even though it meant a room change for our last night.     The view, accommodations, and service were outstanding.    I look forward to our next opportunity to enjoy the Inn.   Please don’t hesitate to add this letter to the many
Manager Response: none

Summary: What an amazing view from the rooftop area. they had a wine evening and the view from the rooftop was amazing. Oh and the wine was pretty good to. The room was lovely the mini-bar was well stocked though we didn't take anything from it. The staff were very helpful and took the time to give you recommend place's that you might like to go for a meal or just a drink.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We liked this hotel. - There is one spot in Laguna Beach where, I would think, all photographers would want to stand to get a view of the beautiful beach. This hotel is positioned right at that spot. The views (particularly from the rooms with an ocean view) are therefore quite exceptional. Rooms are reasonably proportioned & are stylish enough. The location could hardly be bettered, & the pool (albeit next to the path from Heisler Park to the main beach), is both comfortable & surprisingly secluded. This is not a 5 star hotel, but I think that most visitors would be satisfied.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel, location and the best hotel staff ever!
Summary: Our family of 4 seriously had the perfect stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach. We were in a 2 queen room with a balcony view of the ocean and I would just live in that room if possible. The view is amazing and the staff is beyond accommodating. Everyone was so friendly and professional! Are the rooms completely remodeled with huge bathtubs and marble tile everywhere? No. But, you are right on the beach, the hotel staff are amazing and the hotel really seems to care about water and plastic conservation.  These are the things that matter more to me. They have recycling bins throughout the hotel. They have stainless steel bottles in the room, and the in-room water is in refillable glass bottles. Either/both can be taken as souvenirs if you would like. They ask that you leave a special
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Laguna Beach Inn is perfectly located, right on PCH with view of beach but with greenery creating privacy for the guests.  Loved the balcony, and the screened door where we could hear the waves rolling as we sleep.  Easy to walk all over town from this location.  And maybe the best thing of all:  the staff are all gracious and helpful.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Underwhelming - only disappointing hotel on our Californian road trip.
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for one night, on a recent west coast road trip. We stayed at some beautiful, luxury top end hotels on the trip, all of which we were delighted with, with the exception of this one. Now I realise that this hotel is only a three star, but it is charging 5 star prices.We had an ocean view king room on the 4th floor The room was shabby, dull and tired, as were the communal hallways and the two lifts - threadbare carpets etc.The toilet and shower were in a tiny separate room which was tiled, but unusually, the wash basin/vanity unit etc was in the bedroom itself, which was carpeted, and it felt grubby having a carpeted wash area.The pool area is tiny and enclosed, with no sea view. There is no valet car parking. The hotel itself is directly adjacent to a
Manager Response: none

Summary: We spent one night at the Inn at Laguna Beach, and only wish it could have been a longer visit. We had an ocean view room and had the windows and blinds open the entire time in order to best enjoy the view, and the sound, of the ocean. This little hotel was clean and quiet. A wine hour is offered in the evening, followed by freshly made cookies. Starbucks coffee is provided in the morning. The location is excellent, right on the coastal trail and within walking distance of downtown Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I came here for a few days or R&R. We had stayed in Laguna last year, but at a different location. We saw this and thought we would try it. It is within walking distance to shopping and restaurants. We did not even have a car. From the moment we checked in, it was just wonderful. The woman at the front desk was very friendly and we were given a bottle of wine, as we were both celebrating belated birthdays. Our air conditioner was a little noisy and seemed to make a sound in the drains every time it was on. We did not need it at night, as we had the windows open to hear the open. We were on the 4th floor and it was very quiet. Reading other reviews people suggested to upgrade to an ocean view room. We did, but neglected to get one with a balcony. Get a balcony to
Manager Response: none

Summary: Excellent stay during our week vacation. No complaints at all. The views were spectacular. Great restaurant recommendation-230 Forest Ave. We would book here again and look forward to visiting in the future. Thank you.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Always room for improvement...excellent is unrealistic
Summary: staff were beyond accommodating .....both our rooms were lovely, clean   The homeless invasion was a bit off-putting when paying the kind of in season  price for accommodations   ...breakfast/coffee might be served on the veranda on 4th floor if weather permits...lobby eating is not appealing where Inn business is being negotiated
Manager Response: none

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at this little seaside boutique hotel. It is very clean and comfortable, and, although it doesn't have a restaurant, you won't miss it because there are so many restaurants within walking distance from which to choose. Breakfast delivered to your room every morning is offered, as well as coffee, water, and cookies at various times of day, in the lobby. Also a Keurig coffee maker in the room. Complimentary wine and snack is offered at 5 pm daily, weather permitting. Staff was very friendly and helpful. With shops and beaches right outside your door, what's not to love about this location!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This Inn is well-appointed, clean and comfortable.  Walking distance to shops and restaurants. Suggest Uber of Lyft to go to restaurants in South Laguna.  Right on the beach and start of paved walking trails that run along the ocean. Perfect location.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent place to stay especially if you like the beach!!!
Summary: We stayed here for one night while visiting California.  I wish we could of stayed longer.  Hotel is right on the beach and has free chairs, boogie boards for kids and many beach toys. Free morning coffee and many many services.  Staff was super friendly to all requests and always wanted to help.  Seems like a family run great place to stay. We really enjoyed our stay and will be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Lovely Views and Close to Downtown Laguna Beach
Summary: My wife and I have been eyeing this beach front hotel for years.  We normally would stay with her parents in nearby Laguna Nigel.  But we finally had the opportunity to stay and it was very enjoyable.    There is ample underground parking and elevators to take you to the higher levels.  The reception staff was always very helpful and, around 6 PM, there are warm cookies in the lobby to enjoy.  The room was spotless and well appointed.  Sliding glass doors open to a small porch with two chairs and a table.  Here you can view the ocean and beach-goers.    A major advantage of this hotel is it's proximity to the downtown area.  You are basically two blocks from the heart of the action -- tons of stores and restaurants to enjoy.  And if you want to swim, you are 120 seconds away
Manager Response: Dear Harry W,   You hit it right on the nail. Our hotel does indeed have the best location in town as we're just minutes walk to so many restaurants, shops and of course BEACHES! One little nice fact about Laguna Beach: Laguna Beach actually has several different beaches along the coast. Each street that intersects with Pacific Coast Highway leads down to it's own unique beach named for the street name :).   I'm so happy you and your wife had finally gotten a chance to stay at our hotel. I hope it's the first visit of many. If you choose to come visit our hotel again when you find yourself back here in Laguna Beach, please give us a call and book direct so we can help you every step of the way. We look forward to seeing you again soon.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: I brought my mother for her 70th birthday. The hotel staff was so kind. When we entered the room there was a bottle of wine and a card wishing her a Happy Birthday! I've stayed at this property several times and I continue to be impressed with the accommodations amd customer service.
Manager Response: Dear Stensliem,   I'm so happy to hear that we continue to impress you every visit! It's our honor to have you and your mom stay with us for her birthday. We know that these occasions are extra special and we do everything we can to acknowledge that and to help enrich your experience. Thank you for taking the time to leave us this review. We look forward to seeing you again soon!   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: This hotel is my favorite place to stay in Laguna. Had a lovely and very comfortable ocean view room. Walking distance to downtown. The staff was very friendly and helpful. My 81 year old mother enjoyed sitting on the balcony and the king bed was comfortable for her. We both loved light and airy room with easy access in and out of the hotel. We will definitely be back for the holidays!!
Manager Response: Dear janandchuck2014,  Thank you for making us your favorite place to stay in Laguna Beach and thank you for this amazing review! We appreciate you coming back to stay with us every time your in Laguna Beach and we're so happy your mother had a wonderful time this past stay. We look forward to seeing you again soon before the year is over. Until next time...  Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: We found the Inn through some research without knowing all that much about Laguna Beach, and were pleasantly surprised not only by the location, which is walking distance to the Ocean, but also by the quick access to shops and Restaurants right in the downtown area.  But where the Inn really shines is the service.  From our first interaction at the Front Desk, to every interaction with all staff thereafter, everyone greeted us with a smile and asked us how we were doing.  Its truly a great experience and very welcoming to be surrounded by that level of service.  They also have a great social happy hour on the Terrace that we took advantage of both nights we were there.  The management did a great job of understanding and quickly identifying that this was an anniversary trip for
Manager Response: Dear Patrickjohn30,  Thank you for taking the time out of your day to leave us this great review! I appreciate your kind words about our hotel and our services. We strive to deliver the best of service to stay competitive with the other amazing hotels in this beautiful city. Thank you for taking notice of all our efforts and hard work. We're always excited for our guests that stay for special occasions like birthdays and anniversaries and we love to go above and beyond to make your visits extraordinary. I'm glad we were able to create a memorable experience for you at our hotel and hope that we can continue to create memories with you in the future. If you plan to visit us again for your next anniversary trip, please feel welcome to reach out to us.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: Wow! Laguna Beach is the best beach in southern California. Nestled between mountains, the views are spectacular. Pacific Coast Highway is a gem that's rides beside this Diamond of a beach. The Inn overlooks this fabulous beach with steps to take you down to the beach. The sunset was magnificent watching it fall into the horizon. Stay here! Cross over PCH, and you'll find shops and restaurants. You won't be disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear scoop35311,  That's a bold claim but not far-fetched! I remember years ago when I first visited Laguna Beach, I instantly fell in love with the sheer beauty of this city and now here I am, blessed to be able to soak in the splendor as you've described it. So I agree with you, this is the best beach in southern California - clean, quaint and utterly magnificent. I appreciate you giving us a 5 star rating and hope that the next time you come to visit you'll be searching for that elusive 6th star when rating our hotel again. Thank you for choosing to stay at our hotel and for recommending our place to future travelers. We look forward to your next stay!  Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary Heading: Great location but dissapointing room and overpriced.
Summary: This hotel is in a beautiful spot. Right by the beach with stunning views out on the ocean. You can also walk within 5-10 minutes to a number of very nice restaurants.   The staff are very friendly and helpful and the hotel did provide chairs for us to borrow to take down the beach one evening which was nice. There is also coffee available in reception in the mornings.    The hotel doesn't have many central areas and no bar or restaurant but it does have a nice terrace, again with a lovely view where they serve free wine and snacks at 5pm.   The room, whilst it had a lovey view was quite small and basic and we were very disappointed. Based on what we paid for the room, we were expecting something much nicer. We had a ocean view balcony room and it cost us around 600 dollars per
Manager Response: Dear ClaireOsm,  Thank you for choosing to stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach! I appreciate you taking the time to leave us this detailed review on your experience at our hotel. I understand your points about our hotel currently lacking in some areas such as having a bar. We've now received a few comments about this and I'm happy to announce that we now have a bar at our hotel! Our bar is perfectly located on the pacific terrace lounge where one can view a beautiful panoramic spread of the vast pacific ocean and Laguna Beach coastline. As for breakfast offerings, we've made some additions to our menu that now include breakfast sandwiches that are crafted right here on property. I'm sorry that these amenities weren't available to you during your recent stay with us but if you choose to stay with us again, I'm sure you'll be pleasantly surprised at the small changes we've made so far. If you find yourself travelling back out to this area again, I hope you give us another chance and if you do decide to do that, please feel welcome to reach out to us directly so that we can help make your reservation. In fact, when you call you can ask for me directly. Once again, thank you for choosing The Inn at Laguna Beach. I really do hope we get another chance to be your place to stay while in this beautiful beach town.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: We have been going there every year for our anniversary and this year was our 10th.  Great room and great view.  It is within walking distance to food and shopped. The beach is kept clean too.  See you next year !
Manager Response: Dear cmc722,   Wow! Seriously thank you for choosing our hotel as your place to stay in Laguna Beach for your anniversary every year! I'm so happy that you've been having such great experiences throughout the years that encourage you to keep on coming back. One of the greatest things about this place is that the team here, for the most part, have been a part of The Inn at Laguna Beach for years so when guests such as yourselves come to visit often, you will always see a familiar, friendly face. Thank you again for choosing our hotel as your anniversary destination and for taking the time to leave us this review. We can't wait for your next visit to The Inn. We're going to continue to earn your loyalty and surprise you with more offerings as the years go by. See you next time.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: We stayed for 2 nights in September and had a wonderful time.  The room was ample and comfortable.(Though you could not take a bath in the tub because there was no stopper).  We had a fantastic view of Main Beach and were steps away from the center of town.  We will definitely stay here again.   The service could not have been more friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear 404cecilian,   Thank you for choosing to stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach! I appreciate you taking the time to tell us a bit about your stay. It's nice to hear that you found the service here to be friendly and helpful - we strive to ensure that we're always on top of our game when it comes to service. I'm glad that you'll be staying with us again in the future and we all hope you enjoy your next stay with us even more than you did the last time. We look forward to seeing you again.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: We stayed there for our anniversary and it was wonderful, great location, great staff. everything can be walked too that you would want to see and do in Laguna Beach. great restaurants and bars nearby.
Manager Response: Dear lee4az,   Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review! I'm happy to hear that your anniversary stay was wonderful and that you have a great time. I see you really took advantage of our convenient proximity to the dozens of shops and restaurants in town. Thank you for staying with us. We hope to see you again next year for your anniversary again.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: We love the Inn at Laguna! The rooms are so pretty and beachy! On the beach and walking distance to the town! Love the pool and beach! The sunsets are incredible...They provide chairs and umbrellas too, so nice! We will definitely return!
Manager Response: Dear Christinamarie723,  Thank you for this amazing review. I can tell from this review that you really loved the beach! I'm happy that we were able to make your experience here extraordinary. When you're back in town and are ready to stay with us again, please feel welcome to reach out to us directly so we can help specialize your stay - our favorite part of our job :). We look forward to seeing you again.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: we have been staying at the Inn at least two times a year for the past 10 year. great view, great location, but my wife and I decided what really makes our stays so enjoyable is the amazing staff. Ekaterina, Tricia, Judy and John Hall answered all of questions and met all of our requests with a smile.  cant wait for our next visit.
Manager Response: Dear sam d,   Thank you so much for being a loyal guest to The Inn at Laguna Beach for 10 years! I'm happy that it's the team here that keep you guys coming back. I can tell you that we all love seeing guests like you continue to visit our hotel. I've shared your kind words with the team and they all appreciate you taking the time to leave this notable mention. We look forward to seeing you again! I know we will continue to shine and deliver the service you've come to know us for. Until next time...  Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: My wife and I recently stayed at the Inn at Laguna Beach for a long weekend. The hotel's location was ideal, right on Main Beach, at the start of Hiesler Park and walk to town. The hotel itself was a little underwhelming. Our room was very small, basically the bed and a 2 foot path around it. The pool felt very closed in and was small. In the pictures it looks like you can sit at the pool and see the ocean, you can't. It felt more like a motel pool. Also, while the rooftop terrace is vey nice with an amazing view, their is no bar. That would be a great addition. Overall the hotel was ok, and really underwhelming for the price.
Manager Response: Dear d0ugr507,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I'm glad you loved the convenient location of our hotel, it's one of the major highlights of our property. As for our terrace lounge, we are actually in the works of opening a bar on the terrace as a wonderful addition to this already beautiful hotel. I am sorry that we didn't have this ready during your stay with us but should you come to visit Laguna Beach again we're sure you'll be pleasantly surprised by our new terrace bar. We look forward to the opportunity to see you again.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary Heading: Clean room, but very small, and not very quiet
Summary: Our room 319 was on a hall that lead to the swimming pool.  For the price I thought we would at least have some view other than the wall and a corner of the pool.  The air conditioner clicked on and off all night making it impossible to sleep well.  We could also hear the toilet flushing and shower running in the room above ours.  I would not stay here again, although the hotel was clean and the staff friendly.
Manager Response: Dear sclt342,  Thank you for taking the time to leave this review. It appears that we failed to ensure your stay was 100% enjoyable and for that I'm sorry. If we have the availability, we typically will try our best to show you room options to make sure you're in a room that you're comfortable with. Our team here is dedicated to achieving this goal with every one of our guests. If you choose to give us another try in the future, we would be happy to help with everything right from the start of your booking. Please give us a call at the hotel directly if you find yourself thinking of our hotel again on your next visit to Laguna Beach. We would love the opportunity to turn your opinion around and really go above and beyond your expectations.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: My wife and I just returned from a week in California celebrating our 30th anniversary.  We stayed at the Inn of Laguna Beach for part of the time. What a great little hotel right on the beach. The building and grounds are breathtaking and the location cannot be beat. We love the "family feel" of this place. And to top it off it's next door to Las Brisas, one if the area's best restaurants. I would definitely recommend the Inn of Laguna as the place to be.
Manager Response: Dear Bob H,   Thank you for the wonderful 5 star review. I'm delighted to hear that you and your wife had an amazing time celebrating your 30th anniversary. The "family feel" of our place is one of the less known aspects that sets us apart from the other hotels in our area and I'm so glad you recognized the atmosphere we create. We feel as though every guest of ours is a long time friend or family coming to share in the beautiful Laguna Beach scenery that keeps us all coming back. Thank you again for taking the time to leave this amazing review. We look forward to your next stay with us.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: While California has its share of 5 star "resorts" and many with beach access, there are very few hotels in the world with balcony ocean views AND walking access to a village with 40 restaurants, bars, shops and galleries...it is truly a delightful experience.  The staff is welcoming and accommodating and there are more affordable townside rooms.  It IS much more expensive than our first trip there over 20 years ago, but we are hooked and after all what isn't more expensive than it was 20 years ago?
Manager Response: Dear stephenwT8757AQ,  I can't believe it's been 20 years since your first trip to The Inn at Laguna Beach! Thank you for being a loyal guest for so long! Being a small boutique hotel part of a small hotel group, we aren't able to reward our guests the same as larger hotel chains might but we certainly like to show our appreciation in ways that are unique to the individual. I hope that you contact us directly when you decide to book your next stay with us so that we can do something extra nice for you since you've been staying with us for years! We love welcoming you back and can't wait to see you again. Thank you and see you next time.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel in beautiful location
Summary: Beautiful location with great views, just above the beach, within walking distance from restaurants and nightlife. For the price, one would expect some more offering in the morning, not just coffee. Wine on the awesome terrace late afternoon is nice, but again one would expect a few tidbits beyond just nuts.
Manager Response: Dear raytakesitallin2017,  Thank you for your feedback regarding the offerings we have in the morning and evening. We want to make sure that our guests are getting great value while they stay here at The Inn so we will definitely look into providing more during the morning coffee service and the wine hour. I appreciate you sharing your suggestions! Hopefully on your next visit to our beautiful little beach property you'll notice some changes in these areas. Once again, thank you!  Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: It's Always Refreshing To Stay At The Inn. Our Yearly Family Vacation is Always A Delight Here At The Inn. The Inn Has Such A Welcoming Staff and Are Very Accommodating, To Whatever Your Needs Are. The Housekeeping Staff Should Be Commended On Their Courteous Customer Sevice. Thank You Juan Luis and Rita Our House Keeper. Our Rooms Were Always Had A Clean Room, With Plenty of Clean Towels.  We Love It Here.   Thank You!
Manager Response: Dear lrcolunga,   Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this review and for mentioning our amazing maintenance man and our fantastic housekeeping team. I'm sad to say that we do not have a Rita here but we will try to find out who serviced your room and make sure they get the recognition they deserve along with Juan Luis. Maintenance and Housekeeping personnel are the unsung heroes of this industry and is often a thankless job so your kind words go a long way. I appreciate you acknowledging their hard work. Again, thank you so much! We all look forward to your next annual family vacation at The Inn!  Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: From the always friendly & helpful staff to the welcoming room & perfect beachside location .... the Inn at Laguna Beach is a place you'll thoroughly enjoy.   Just steps to the lovely shops, art galleries & eateries, as well.   You won't regret booking this place ... I promise ;-)
Manager Response: Dear PJayCA,   Thank you for choosing to stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach. We appreciate your kind words and are happy to know that you had a great stay with us. Thank you for the endorsement as well! We look forward to your next visit.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: My wife and I chose this hotel in Laguna Beach as a place to stay for three nights during our recent trip to celebrate our second wedding anniversary.  We researched the area and were excited about the Inn's location on the beach in the center of town.  Full disclosure, I used a third-party booking service to reserve our room, and I did not have the option to choose our room location.  As I look back I realize this is a key mistake when booking a stay at this property.  We arrived to check in and found the Inn as advertised in a beautiful, scenic location.  The staff at the front desk was welcoming and was happy to fill us in on the amenities at the Inn.  The lobby and hallways could use an update, but were well maintained.  Disappointment began to set in when we found our room.
Manager Response: Dear jeffcoble,   Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review on your stay with us here at The Inn. I am grateful and pleased to know that you enjoyed the hotel and had a great experience with the team here, however, I am also very sad that you decided to shorten your stay with us due to the quality of the room you had booked. I totally understand your decision and hope that you and your wife found another wonderful place to stay for your 2 year anniversary. Above all else, we certainly want to make sure you are taken well care of and are able to spend your anniversary creating fond memories. I do hope that you consider our hotel again for future stays but please book directly with us so that we can work with you to get exactly what you want. If you would like to further discuss your experience at our hotel, I'm open to speaking with you and am only a phone call away. Again, thank you for taking the time to write this review and thank you for giving us a chance to be your hotel of choice.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: We stayed at the Inn at LB for several days for my son's wedding. It was a wonderful stay and a great choice of hotel. Everybody working there was helpful and friendly. Had several rooms and all clean and attractive. My ocean view Juliette suite was incredible. Hated to leave. Loved rooftop patio. Close to everything . Can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: Dear Sheena D,   Thank you so much for this great 5 star review! We enjoyed having you and your family stay with us just as much as you enjoyed staying here. You all were such a lovely bunch of people and we're all absolutely thrilled that you had a great time while here for the wedding. I know it's so hard to leave our hotel especially when the weather is so epic so I feel your pain about having to check out and get back to the grind of life. We hope you get a chance to escape and enjoy more R & R with us again in the near future. When you're ready to come back, please give us a call so we can help set you up with everything you need for your next stay. Until next time...  Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: While this is not a 4 seasons experience, the location, accommodations, and service were excellent.  We had a 4th floor king with an awesome beach view.  Pool is on the 3rd floor and we overlooked that.  I would definitely buy the ocean view...the opposite side was nothing spectacular.  Overall, the place is just slightly dated, not unexpected given it's prime location on a bluff overlooking all of the beach and town.  Prime real estate.  Our room, however, was modern, large and quite comfortable, and the bed was great!  Great saltwater poll that gets plenty of sun!  We will definitely go back.
Manager Response: Dear Steve S,  Thank you for the wonderful review and for saying great things about the service and accommodations. We certainly strive to deliver on our guest service as we know that we lack some of the amenities you find at some of the larger hotel chains. Our property is in the process of making some aesthetic changes to some public areas so hopefully on your next visit you'll be pleasantly surprised. We look forward to seeing you again soon.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: Loved seeing and hearing the ocean. A lovely hotel to rest and replenish the soul. Central to many activities: tidal pool, restaurants and outside activities. Went to La Salsa and Las Brisas for nice food and entertaining friends.
Manager Response: Dear P5405MSdianas,  Thank you for taking the time to write this review. I'm pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable stay and went out to enjoy some of the lovely restaurants in and around town. I love how you said this hotel "replenish(es) the soul." I hope you don't mind me using that line in the future ;). Again, thank you for taking the time to write this very kind review. We look forward to your next stay with us.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary Heading: Worst anniversary gift to my husband
Summary: This hotel could use a makeover. Beautiful view of the beach but not outweighed by the fact that all I can hear in my room is a toilet flushing. The walls are paper thin. I could hear everything from my above neighbors. Happy anniversary?
Manager Response: none

Summary: ............A very decent place with caring staff , close distance to everything , price is definitely good , access to pool  We enjoyed our time there. Highly recommend  Sure I will return to this place next year....,.,.,
Manager Response: Dear Laila A,   Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review on your recent stay with us. I'm so happy that you enjoyed your time here and plan to return next year. Our kind and caring team will be happy to see you again when you come back to visit. Again, thank you for the review and for choosing to stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach. See you next time.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: ....though we showed up during a hot spell in Laguna, we were received with enthusiasm and care by the Staff at the Inn. Everyone was so nice and wanted us to be comfortable in every way. The Staff made every effort to insure our satisfaction before we even got to our room! The location is ideal for beach access, as well as strolling around town. Our room...305....had a great view down the length of the beach, with an ample balcony to enjoy evenings and mornings. There was sufficient sound proofing so that the traffic noise behind the hotel was a non-issue. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and appreciated the tireless efforts of everyone at the Inn!! We're looking forward to our planned return!!
Manager Response: Dear mrflyer,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at The Inn at Laguna Beach. I appreciate you giving a shout out to the amazing staff here - we have immense pride in the kind and professional service we provide every day. I'm happy you had an amazing stay and hope that you have an equally amazing stay your next time around. As for all of our guests, we would love to hear from you if you book with us again so that we can help make your stay extraordinary. Again, thank you.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: I can't say enough about how wonderful our stay was at this beautiful property. We booked through at third party website and upon our  arrival, we were upgraded to a balcony oceanfront room. The views was incredible and sleeping with the balcony doors open to the sound of the ocean waves was bliss.The staff was excellent, friendly and helped us choose local restaurants as there are many. They were on point with every recommendation. The location of this hotel is perfect. It is on a beautiful beach yet also walking distance to all galleries, shops and restaurants in Laguna. The hotel offered some wonderful special touches...coffee in the morning, complimentary wine on the deck in the evening and warm cookies and milk at night. We were made to feel welcome and at home with
Manager Response: Dear iluvsophia,   You're so kind to praise us for our services, thank you! We aim to please every step of the way through your stay here at The Inn. You've touched on all the great things that make our hotel great. We're all very appreciative for this wonderful review and are so happy we personalized your stay and made you feel special - that's our ultimate goal. We all look forward to seeing you again and hope you decide to take a trip back out here soon. When you book your next reservation, please feel welcome to contact us so that we can assist you again with anything you may need. Thank you for choosing to stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: The location of the Inn is ideal for walking to restaurants and shopping. The beach is beautiful, wide and clean. The staff was always professional and very accommodating. From the  evening wine tasting on the terrace, cookies and milk in the comfortable lobby to a pot of herbal tea delivered to our room every night....just perfection! Can't wait to return!
Manager Response: Dear Susan W,   Thank you for this amazing 5 star review. I appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. I'm absolutely delighted to hear that you took advantage of all of our amenities and truly had a wonderful stay in Laguna Beach. We look forward to your next stay with us. Thank you again for the review and for choosing to stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: Great hotel! Very nice staff. Location is perfect. Beach access is wonderful. View was great. We didn't need a car....restaurants were all within easy walking distance. Would highly recommend this establishment.
Manager Response: Dear hmelan_808310,  Thank you for this amazing 5 star review. I appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. I'm happy that you had an enjoyable vacation at The Inn. We look forward to seeing you here again in the near future with some friends! Until next time...  Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: Nice hotel right on the beach. But the service was terrible. Front counter staff couldn't be less helpful or rude if they tried. Plenty of other hotel options in Laguna Beach. My suggestion - Stay someplace else.
Manager Response: Len N,   Thank you for taking the time to leave some feedback on your recent stay. I'm glad that you liked our hotel but I'm disappointed that you found the team here to be unhelpful. I can assure you that our team constantly strives to deliver the best of service but still we will take this as an opportunity to get better. Thank you again for the review.   Regards,   Ernest E

Summary: We've stayed at the Inn a couple of times and our experience has been great ! Clean rooms, comfortable bed, 2 minute walk to the beach, friendly staff and right in the city center !  5 min walk to whole foods and many restaurants.  5 stars !!!
Manager Response: Dear whosane9,   Thank you for this amazing 5 star review. I appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. Should you find your way back out to Laguna Beach, we would love to have you stay with us again. We look forward to that next visit.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: Perfect location (downtown,beach, and Heisler Park are all adjacent), nicely appointed and big room,modern, clean, friendly and helpful service.  Wine on the terrace was a plus (although, get there early if you want a table and chairs.)  With that said - - I would not go back for what we paid (yes, I know we were there during the "in season.")  For the price we paid (over $600/night) I would have expected a room with a better view (we were on the "first" floor and could see the main beach and water) and not be charged for parking.
Manager Response: Dear AlanandDonna,   Thank you for your review! I'm glad to see that you had enjoyed our hotel and the convenient location of our property. I am, however, saddened that you weren't totally satisfied with the view from your room. With the way our property is situated on a cliff, our ocean view rooms can often seem as partial views but I assure you the views from each room are equally stunning. If you do choose to stay with us again in the future, please reach out to us at the hotel directly so that we can do our best to accommodate your requests and ensure you have a room that you can fully enjoy. Again, thank you for the lovely review and thank you for staying at The Inn at Laguna Beach. We look forward to hearing from you.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: During a recent trip to Laguna Beach for a business trip, I had a wonderful stay at this hotel.  My room overlooked the beach and I was able to enjoy the view while having breakfast on the room's private balcony.  Overall, great location, which is a short walk to local shops and restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear Jo Ann R,   Thank you for taking the time to leave this great review. I'm happy you enjoyed your time at our lovely little property and this beautiful little town. We hope that next time you're in Laguna Beach it's for a vacation rather than a business trip so you can really unwind and explore the town. We look forward to your next stay.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: This was my first time in Laguna Beach. On our first night, we were driving and spotted The Inn in a very popular part of Laguna Beach. We went online and immediately made a reservation. It was the weekend, so they didnt have anything ocean view rooms left. Our room was great –modern, comfortable bed, well kept, very clean with a great bathroom where the sink was outside of the toilet and shower. The best part about The Inn was the location right off the beach. The hotel offers towels, chairs and an umbrella to all guests. I would absolutely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear TeamWERQ,  Thank you for taking the time to write this lovely review about your recent stay here at our beautiful boutique hotel. I'm glad you found us and enjoyed your stay despite not having one of our highly sought after ocean view rooms. Our location is certainly the best in town and that topped with our impeccable service makes this hotel the premier place to be when vacationing in Laguna Beach. Thank you again for the review. We hope to see you again soon in the near future.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: This was our first time trying out the end at Laguna Beach,  and we were not disappointed as we had a very nice room and a wonderful view of the ocean as well as the beach.   They have a very nice cocktail hour from 5 to 6 more wine is serve free to guess at the hotel as well as the regular bar in the evenings overlooking the ocean.   I will grant you this is not necessarily a cheap hotel however next to staying at the exclusive and ritzy other hotels on the southern end of town this location is absolutely fantastic.   Besides being able to walk pretty much everywhere within the village that being the stores shops and art galleries in  Laguna Beach there is a shuttle that will  take you most anywhere every 20 minutes.   The desk staff as well as everyone that we bumped into R
Manager Response: Dear Avus32,  I am blown away by your kind words when comparing us to some of the larger, grander hotels on the South part of Laguna Beach. Indeed our location is a big part of what makes our hotel stand out amongst the larger properties, but I also believe it's the 5 star service that all our team members give day in and day out as you've also noticed. Thank you for taking the time to leave this review. I hope you have a wonderful rest of your year and to see you again in the near future.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: my daughter and i were in laguna for pageant of the masters.  the inn is the perfect location for everything we wanted to do/see! the second night (1:15 a.m.!),some jerk pulled the fire alarm and every room evacuated out onto the patio!!  the manager Felipe handled the situation with professionalism & class! we will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear joann y,  I'm beyond pleased to know that you and your daughter enjoyed your stay at The Inn and that the fire alarm didn't seem to dampen your stay much. Our manager, Felipe, is certainly a professional and did handle this unfortunate situation with class. He's a great mentor to all of us and an example of how we should all carry ourselves during difficult times. I appreciate you noticing our hard work. Thank you for taking the time to write this review. We look forward to your next stay with us here at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: My boyfriend and I loved our stay at Laguna Beach House! The king bed room was comfortable and large, and the sink was so adorable. We also loved the pool and fire pit. The hotel is also very close to the beautiful Heisler Park and a short walk to Main Beach. Overall, staying at this hotel was a wonderful experience and I would definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Dear Chrissy B,  Thank you so much for this review! I'm glad you and your boyfriend had a wonderful stay. It appears that you're describing our sister property The Laguna Beach House which is actually just a couple of blocks north of our property. It's a gorgeous little property that shares a lot of the décor that we have at our hotel and the service provided between our two hotels are very similar. We hope that you choose to stay at our property the next time you come to visit Laguna Beach but we won't hold it against you if you choose to stay at The Beach House instead. Both of our Laguna Beach properties are amazing. Again, thank you!  Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary Heading: Almost great - but worth the money (for a short stay)
Summary: Absolutely fabulous desk staff - knowledgable,thoughtful, helpful.  Upgrade for an ocean view room.  While the location is terrific, it's the view and the roar of the crashing waves you are paying for.  Decor is ok, but dated - with hallway carpeting from the 80's.  Room decor is better, but probably close to a face-lift.  Nice free wine at five, but get there early because seating is limited.  The key advantage here is proximity to the beach, downtown, and the art festivals.
Manager Response: Dear kbsNewYork,  Thank you so much for acknowledging the desk staff here at The Inn at Laguna Beach. Our team here works hard day after day to stay equipped with the latest happenings around town to ensure our guests have an amazing experience while out exploring. You are absolutely right in your assessment that the key advantage to staying at our hotel is our proximity to all the great things in Laguna Beach - Main Beach, Restaurants, Galleries, Boutique shops, and Art Festivals. Again, thank you for your kind words about the staff and also for choosing to stay at our hotel. We hope you have an amazing rest of this year. Until next time...  Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: This hotel is walking distance to all the best places in Laguna: the Pageant of the Masters, the shops and restaurants of downtown and the beach is at your doorstep! If it's not walking distance, the free trolley shuttle can take you there. The hotel is clean and quiet and the staff is friendly. They even surprised us with a free bottle of champagne for our anniversary! We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Anne S,   I'm so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. Also, I'm thrilled that you were surprised by our gift to you and your husband for your anniversary. We know how special these occasions are and we strive to ensure you feel special and are treated well as we do with all of our guests. May your next stay with us be just as great if not better. We look forward to seeing you again.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary Heading: Great location, overall nice hotel but overly priced.
Summary: The hotel has a great location.   The staff is friendly and the access to the beach is easy.    The cost is high given the quality of the room.    The beds, linens and showers are upgraded and nice.   The room we purchased was a balcony view and our view was somewhat obstructed.   Also, the road noise in our room was disappointing.    When paying over $800 per night, I would expect no road noise.    Staff is friendly but some are not very versed on the area.   Also, night staff seems to be limited to one person.     Since the hotel is on a public walkway, there are a lot of random people that seem to walk onto the property.   It doesn't feel overly secure.
Manager Response: Dear 188celestej,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your recent stay with us here at The Inn at Laguna Beach. I appreciate your kindness. I understand how disappointing the road noise can be and I apologize that there isn't much we can do about the traffic along Pacific Coast Highway. Typically road noise quiets down considerably through the evening so at least getting a good nights rest is seldom an issue.  I realize it is a security concern to only have one person on during the evening and we usually do have more than one but in this instance we unfortunately were shorthanded and for that I sincerely apologize for was well. I would like to speak with you directly regarding this particular night if you have the time.  Again, thank you for taking the time to write this review. I hope you choose to stay with us again on your next visit to Laguna Beach. Please do not hesitate to contact us at any time to help with your booking or requests.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary Heading: Annual Pageant of the Masters Retreat
Summary: We always enjoy our stay at The Inn at Laguna.  We love room 306 because of its 2 views- 1 down the beach & 1 out at the ocean!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  We love the food delivered from Las Brisas Restaurant. All your furnishings are clean & attractive.  Thanks for the constant clean towels & wash rags!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Thanks for your friendly service!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! One problem- the toilet needs 2 flushings to make it clean!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear lldsteadman,  Your excitement for our hotel is contagious. I share the same excitement whenever I come into work and know I'm blessed to come to this beautiful picturesque town. I appreciate all your kind words. I hope that all of your future stays are better than the last and that you continue to find excitement when you return to Laguna Beach. We look forward to your next stay!  Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: Staff, room and hotel service was above excellent.  We have stayed at the Inn several times to celebrate our wedding anniversary. This time it was our 20th.  We plan to be back again next year. However, if we can we would like to come back in October.for my wife's birthday.
Manager Response: Dear vmastrangelo_1,  Thank you for leaving this 5 star review! I'm happy to know that you have been coming to stay at our hotel for the past several years and continue to stay with us for your wedding anniversaries. We look forward to your stay every year and hope that you can also make it out for your wife's birthday coming soon. If we don't see you again this year, I wish you a very happy holidays and a wonderful new year. Until we see you again...  Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: WE stayed 4 days and 3 nights.  A Staff members political agenda and views, plus her less than professional behavior,   nearly ruined our trip.  We stayed away from this  employee's area for two nights after her first outrage...The Inn was advised of the situation upon our return.  Promoting panic amongst guests during a protest nearby was  inexcusable.  Most of the things expressed by this employee were totally false.   WE understand that employees views and agendas should not be part of the establishment.  However, when it directly affects the guests, and their experience...it  becomes  management responsibility.
Manager Response: Dear donnabprescott,   Thank you for taking the time to write this review and tell us of the issue you encountered during your stay. I can tell you that as an establishment of hospitality, it is definitely inappropriate for any member of our team to express their political views and to especially promote panic during such a delicate time in our country. As unfortunate as the events are that are unfolding around the world, it's important for us to remain neutral and hospitable to all people including those who may share wholly different views from our own. The goal here, in essence, is not to promote panic or stoke the flames of fear but to promote peace and love for all. We understand that our guests come to stay with us in large part to escape the stresses and worries of their lives and the world. So with that said, I am sincerely sorry for this experience dampening your stay here at The Inn. It's disappointing to me that you were thus unable to enjoy the area in which said employee was stationed. If there's anything that I can do for you please don't hesitate to give me a call directly at the hotel. I truly hope to hear from you and also hope that you choose to stay at our hotel again on your next visit to Laguna Beach.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: We loved the location of the hotel and even though the hotel was fully booked the small pool was pretty empty which was nice. Loved the free wine at happy hour on the rooftop deck. My only reason for not giving this 5 stars is that we paid for a pool view room however we could not see the pool from our room but could walk directly out to the pool from our back deck. Convenient but also a little weird considering the door out to the pool from our deck had no secure lock so essentially anyone could've had access to our deck. Room #308.
Manager Response: Dear jennarationbuckley,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review on your recent stay with us here at The Inn. I can completely understand your concern about your rooms easy access to the pool area and vice versa but I can assure you that we have great overnight security and have not had any incidents. Despite this, I'm glad you had a wonderful stay and were able to enjoy the pool to yourselves since it was empty while you were here. If you choose to stay with us again in the near future we would be happy to hear out any requests you may have for your next visit. Please don't hesitate to call us when you're ready to return.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: We loved this boutique hotel right on the water in Laguna.  The room was lovely and our balcony overlooked the beach and the ocean.  Once we parked our car we walked everywhere.  It was quiet - a perfect getaway.
Manager Response: Dear Stacey G,   Thank you for taking the time to leave us this great review. I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed a prefect and quiet getaway at our beautiful boutique hotel. Our location is absolutely the best and I think is the second best feature of our hotel with our fantastic team of course reigning in as the number one thing about our hotel that make us so great. I'm pleased that you didn't need to use your car during your visit to Laguna Beach because driving around Laguna Beach and finding parking can at times be stressful and a stress free vacation for all our guests is what we aim for. We hope that you choose to stay with us again on a future visit to Laguna Beach and we look forward to that day.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary Heading: Adorable Boutique Hotel, with a PERFECT Location
Summary: We LOVED this quaint little hotel! Not only does it overlook Laguna's Main Beach, it is steps away from the main part of the town - we were able to walk to everything: shops, restaurants, even a Whole Foods. The staff at the Inn were friendly and willing to assist. Even though this is not a large, chain hotel with room service, etc. (which I do usually enjoy!), I really loved our stay here - it was quiet and relaxing. While the room was small (we had probably the base room option), they really use the space quite efficiently.   The pool is nice - you can hear the ocean from it (although you can't see it from the pool - you need to be up on the next level, which has an amazing outdoor terrace!) and there are plenty of lounge chairs. Every night, they have a complimentary wine
Manager Response: Dear Megan S,   I'm so excited and happy to hear that you Loved out hotel. I'm absolutely delighted to know that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay with us and that you made the most of your visit to Laguna Beach. Our proximity to the local restaurants, shops, galleries and of course the beach puts us among the top places to stay in Laguna Beach. Also, our staffs attentiveness to guest needs is unparalleled to any place else you'll find in Laguna Beach and it brings me great pride to boast about. We hope you choose to stay with us again during your next visit to Laguna Beach. Until next time...  Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: We had a great weekend at the Inn AT Laguna Beach.  Excellent location, great ocean view, close to galleries including Wyland's gallery, shopping and great places to eat.  The staff was very friendly and interactive.  I received 2 email's and a call before I arrived to see if there was anything special about the trip or if I needed anything.
Manager Response: Dear Greg M,   Thank you for your kind review! I'm so happy that you recognize our teams efforts to make sure your entire stay is absolutely fabulous by ensuring we get in touch with you to hear about any inquiries before you arrive. As you saw when you were here, our location is hands down the best in Laguna Beach which puts us up there with some of the larger hotels. Not only is our location spectacular, our customer/guest service is said to be comparable to some of the 5 star hotels in our area. We look forward to your next stay at The Inn and hope you have another wonderful time on during your next visit.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: The Inn at Laguna Beach is about as good as you can get.  The location is perfect--right on the main beach above the promenade--close to shops and restaurants.  Our room looked out on the beach and the steps--a constant parade of people to watch.  The room was large, well appointed,  and the balcony accommodated a table and two chairs with room to spare.  The staff was friendly and helpful--making reservations and giving us advice.  Parking was easy.  We'll be back.
Manager Response: Dear janO1717YE,   I'm so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us here at The Inn. I agree that our location is the absolute best - walking distance to shops, galleries, restaurants. Everyone here is pretty well-informed of the area so we can make the best recommendations for you. Thank you for taking the time to write this review. We look forward to seeing you again soon.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: I want to Thank everyone  on the Staff for all you have done to make our short stay the Best. We had to leave early do to my Wife's health issues, and the Staff really make that difficult time, quite easy.
Manager Response: Dear casalqcc,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your recent stay. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your time. I believe that when people stay at hotels (especially when on vacation) that things should be easy so I'm glad we made your stay hassle-free. I'm sorry that you had to cut your stay short but hopefully when you return you folks can stay for a longer period of time. We look forward to your next visit.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: We came to the Inn at Laguna for a special anniversary. One night on the beach - literally.  The staff was fantastic and so welcoming, warm and helpful.  Areas are well marked for finding the the delicious free coffee in the a.m. and the directions to the "Hawaii like" grounds to walk and explore. We parked the car and it never left  the the garage.  The free summer shuttles and closeness of everything was truly a treat.  No airlines, luggage woes, long lines or travel problems - our vacation started the minute we turned off the car engine.  Thank you all for the "extra" care sending us a bottle of wine and delicious caramels to acknowledge our special anniversary. Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Teri S,   I'm so happy to hear that you thoroughly enjoyed your anniversary staycation! It sounds like you were really able to disconnect for the day and focus on your time at the beach. Thank you for taking time to write such nice things about our hotel and services. I appreciate you and hope to see you again soon or at least for your next anniversary in 2018! I look forward to your next stay.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: We fell in love with this hotel the moment we arrived. Every inch of this hotel is beautiful from the spacious lobby to the vegetation surrounding the hotel. The ocean is easily accessible with just a quick few second walk. The entire staff was very nice and smiled and greeted us every time we walked by. The rooms were perfect for a couple looking to get away for a few days. I highly recommend this hotel if you are looking for easy access to the beach and want a five star experience.
Manager Response: Dear MtnHkr89,  I'm delighted to hear that you loved hotel and all the little things that make our place so beautiful. I appreciate your recommending our hotel to future visitors and hope that they too enjoy our aesthetically pleasing property. I thank you so much for taking the time to leave this review. We all look forward to your next stay!   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: This was truly an experience in luxury and pampering. At age 6, I used to look up from the beach and wonder what it was like to stay in such a lovely and perfectly located hotel. At age 60, I decided to book a week in  this intimate and historic hotel. The gracious and attentive staff could not do enough for me. The room and common areas were beautiful and spotless. The location, a few steps to the beach and a short walk to town was everything you want in a vacation. I will book all my beach vacations at The Inn at Laguna Beach. The only tip I can offer is - book a room and enjoy!
Manager Response: Dear grey1604,  Thank you so much for this lovely review :). I'm so glad you decided to stay with us and live out your dream! You touched on some of the things that make our hotel great - location and the fantastic staff. I'll be sure to share your kind words with everyone here. When you're ready to book your next stay here at The Inn, please don't hesitate to give us a call so that we can help with any requests you may have before you come to visit. We look forward to your next stay.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: Although this hotel is in a great location on the main beach, it is not the place to go if you want some rest and relaxation. It is also pricey when you consider there is no onsite restaurant, refrigerator in the room, spa, or fitness center.  I have stayed here three times and I'd say it's best for families with kids or pets that want to be close to the main beach and local reaturants. Parking is also $30/day.
Manager Response: Dear ella729,   Thank you so much for writing a review on your experience at our hotel. I agree that our hotel is a popular spot for families travelling on vacation during the Summer time but our hotel is also very diverse in the type of guests we cater to. For example, we often get couples travelling on their honeymoon, anniversaries and sometimes to celebrate an intimate birthday. We do our best to address all of our guests needs no matter the occasion that brings them to our beautiful boutique hotel. Our goal is to ensure our guests have a comfortable and relaxing stay void of any issues. That being said, I'm disappointed to hear that you didn't feel relaxed during your stay with us and I wish we could have done something to change that while you were here. I hope that when you come to visit Laguna Beach again that you give us another chance. Please never hesitate to call us directly to help with booking and to reach out to us anytime you're here whenever there's something impeding on your time for relaxation. I truly hope to see you again in the near future.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: Laguna beach is a beautiful place and the location of the Inn is second to none. I would give 5 stars for the location but that's really all positive I have to say. The  hotel reminds me more of a street side motel  from the 50s with one big exception, the prices are more like top notch NY 5star hotel. I paid in excess of USD 500 per room and for this I had to drag my own suitcase to the room, there was no complimentary water in the room and worst of all, there was an ancient coffee machine but the water was also extra - pure rip off in my humble opinion.  The rooms, premises and pool area really need a drastic renovation. Guess the owner sees this as a profit machine and will milk the cow as long as it stands.   If renovated, this could really be a jewel
Manager Response: Dear TravellerLion,   Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review on our hotel and thank you for your honesty as well. We appreciate all feedback regardless of the criticisms as it helps us improve our products and services. Indeed our hotel is ideally located in the heart of Laguna Beach and that makes our hotel stick out as one of the top places to stay while in town. We recognize the need to update some of our furnishings and offerings so I can tell you we are definitely at work in making some improvements to enhance stays. We use these types of reviews to help guide us in the right direction. Again, thank you so much for leaving a review, I hope you enjoyed your time in Laguna Beach and choose to stay with us again in the future to see the improvements we implement. We look forward to another opportunity to blow you away. Until next time...  Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: We arrived at the inn at laguna beach as the last stop on our honeymoon California trip and we only had one night at this lovely hotel... we wished we stayed for 2 weeks!!! Laguna beach itself is a lovely lovely place and the hotel added to its charm. The staff were so friendly, happy and welcoming at even left a lovely little treat in our room as we were honeymooners and some cookies and milk for our daughter!! Our room was lovely and had a fab view of the ocean, the location is amazing (right on the beach) and they have chairs, umbrellas, boogie boards and even buckets and spades for guests to use on the beach!!! They have a wine hour from 5-6 and 6-6.30 they served cookies and milk in the lobby! This hotel was a real pleasure to stay at and we wished we were there for 2
Manager Response: Dear vicregan,   Thank you so much for your fab review! I'm excited to hear that we helped make your last stop on your honeymoon special. It fills my heart with pride and joy to know that we really made you folks feel comfortable and welcomed here and that your daughter came along to enjoy this trip with you. One night is certainly not enough to explore and discover all that Laguna Beach has to offer so you definitely need to return for another visit! When you plan your next trip out to Laguna Beach, please feel welcome to reach out to us directly so that we can personally assist you with your reservation if you would like. We look forward to having you with us again in the near future.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: Reasonable $$ we booked through Amoma online travel. We were worried however  it worked out well. Easy access to the beach and a short walk to the shops and restaurants of Laguna village. We had some good meals and there was so much to do. There was a craft festival at this time of year and shows as well as art exhibitions. It was areal vibe. We could have stayed longer. The rooftop at the hotel was fantastic the host Jane is cool There is free wine at 5-7pm on the rooftop and the views are amazing. We will be back.
Manager Response: Dear DazzaWR,   Thank you for leaving a review on your recent stay. I'm glad you had a great stay with us and enjoyed our nightly wine hour. I must mention a small correction to that which is our wine hour is only hosted from 5 - 6pm but we do have a floating cocktail bar before and beyond those hours Wed-Sun. If you plan another visit to Laguna Beach and you decide to stay with us again, please feel welcome to call and book with us directly so that we can help make your stay extra special. We look forward to that next visit.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary Heading: An Inn with some posh thrown in.
Summary: Spent two weeks here visiting a friend and soaking up the atmosphere.  First off, it's pricey, but you're paying for the location right on the beach and within close proximity to many art attractions, restaurants and shops.  Secondly, it's a small inn nestled on a cliff that seems locally owned and managed, not a huge resort.  That being said, I was thoroughly satisfied with all the facilities and the service.  My room was large and had an ocean view, which costs more.  The balconies looked wonderful, but were a little beyond my means.  Besides, I noticed that the balcony takes up some of the room size in terms of total square footage.  My room had a sleeper couch and comfy chair in addition to the obligatory desk chair.  My room looked recently rehabbed, The furniture and bed
Manager Response: Dear louisjam,   Thank you so much for really going all out on your review on your recent stay. There's so much to thank you for with all your kind words about our property. I appreciate you saying so much about the hotel and your stay - you were definitely thorough. Also, I would like to thank you for your patience regarding the short wait time to get your beach amenities. Your review has been shared with the whole team and our maintenance team in particular enjoyed your observation of their hard work at keeping our facilities in good shape. I can't say this enough but thank you again for your kind review. We truly look forward to your next stay and hope you have an even more wonderful time on the next visit here.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Inn. We had an ocean view room with a balcony, and loved every second. It was well worth the money and I would stay here again. The pool was clean and the perfect temperature--same with the jacuzzi. The staff handing out towels, umbrellas and beach chairs at the beach was fabulous. And the complimentary happy hour from 4-5 on the rooftop terrace was so fun!
Manager Response: Dear Anne C,   I'm pleased to hear that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay here at The Inn. Our Summer beach valet is an amazing and convenient amenity that we offer as it really helps take the worry and hassle out of having to bring your own items for the beach. We're proud and happy to be able to provide these amenities. Our pool is the perfect place to relax if you're looking for a more private and less crowded area to soak in the sun and hear the crashing of the waves. Thank you for taking the time out of your day to leave us a review on your recent stay. We appreciate you and look forward to having you here again for another visit in the near future.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: We found The Inn At Laguna to be a First Class Hotel in every way! Our room was so beautiful and all of the details like Champagne delivered, and an evening pot of tea to have before bed made this a truly beautiful stay! The views were stunning as well, and we were within walking distance to everything! A getaway to remember!!!
Manager Response: Dear gretas493,   I'm thrilled to see that your anniversary stay was special while here at The Inn at Laguna Beach. We certainly do our best to make sure our guests are having a most wonderful time here at our hotel. Believe me, nothing pleases us more than to see our guests enjoying themselves and creating memories that will stick with them for years to come. We look forward to seeing you next year for your next anniversary or sooner ;).   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for 5 nights.All of the people at reception were friendly and helpful.I stayed in room 425.It had everything i needed,large tv,safe,armchair and comfortable bed..The location is great.You can walk to town and is connected to main beach and beautiful heisler park.A good vietnamese rest is another kind of cafe at 793 laguna canyon road.Also moulin french bakery makes a great breakfast and has great pastries.The inn at laguna beach is a wonderful choice when in laguna beach.
Manager Response: Dear Jeffrey B,   Thank you for taking the time to leave a wonderful review on your recent stay. I'm pleased to hear that you enjoyed your accommodations. Those restaurants you mentioned are quite new in town so I'm glad you've given some input on your experience there so we can also recommend these places. As you've said, this hotel is located in the best part of town since you can literally walk to most of the attractions. Again, thank you for your kind words. We look forward to your next visit to our lovely little hotel.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: We were very disappointed at the Inn at Laguna Beach. The facilities are in dire needs of maintenance and upgrading. Real let-down, as the location is unbeatable. The Inn is priced as a 1st class hotel; thus, one only expects the best! In addition, we found service attitude to be very inconsistent. As for Wi-fi: In our room we did not even have coverage! As for the balcony in the room: Hardly place for one person standing at a time! Not recommendable!
Manager Response: Dear wilhilmm-norway,   Thank you for taking the time to share some feedback on your recent stay with us. I'm sorry to hear that we failed to meet your expectations and I promise that we constantly strive to exceed all our guests expectations. This is a huge disappointment for us as I wish there was something we could have done to brighten your stay. If you would like to further discuss your recent visit, I would be more than happy to speak with you.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: Stay right on Main Beach and walk a half block into town for shops and restaurants. Very pleasant and accommodating staff. Rooms well appointed - spring for an Ocean View Balcony if you can. Coffee in mornings - limited in room brkfast can be ordered. Wine at 5:00 on 4th floor terrace. Underground parking ($30/night). Free beach umbrellas, chairs, towels, bogey boards etc. If stay over July 4 can see fireworks from ocean view rooms,
Manager Response: Dear Pincpinot,  We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay and glad you viewed the beautiful fireworks display we had here in Laguna. It's a pleasure to know you made use of all our amenities and had a great time on Main Beach. Please come stay with us again and if you found a favorite spot to dine we will be more than happy to make you a reservation. We hope to see you again in the future.   Best Wishes,  Ernest

Summary: I always stay at this hotel while in Laguna.  Beautiful hotel, it's on the beach, great views, great location to everything I'll be doing while in Laguna.  The staff is great. Later in the afternoon, you can go to the terrace for a glass of wine.
Manager Response: Dear Cindy L,   Thank you for leaving a review on your recent stay here at our lovely little property. Also, thank you for being such a loyal guest! I'm pleased to hear that this is the perfect place for you when you come to visit Laguna Beach. We all look forward to many more visits from you.   Warm regards,   Ernest E

Summary: This hotel was clean and comfortable. The staff went above and beyond to make sure we got everything we needed. They provided beach chairs, umbrellas and beach toys for the kids to use. The best part is just steps down to the beach. They have a complimentary wine hour everyday, in which we enjoyed. I will definitely be staying at this cute, little piece of heaven again.
Manager Response: Dear 984carriea,   Thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your families' experience here at The Inn.
