Summary: Nice hotel, but expensive for the rooms. Some staff very pleasant and some a bit shirty. Good location but rooms standard. Nice touch - they have a wine hour on the roof top bar each night,  Parking $35 per night. Small pool.
Manager Response: Dear Jane N,  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on a few of our greatest assets: our location, our team and our complimentary wine hour each evening.  We do pride ourselves on a great group of individuals who care about each guest encounter and apologize that not all of our staff lived up to this.  We appreciate all feedback, as it helps us to improve our product and service.    We are pleased that you enjoyed our wine hour on the Pacific Terrace each evening and hope that our on-site parking allowed you to enjoy the short walk to the shops, dining and galleries in the heart of Laguna Beach.  We hope future travels bring you back to Laguna Beach and that you will visit The Inn again, allowing us to offer a warm welcome.  Emily

Summary Heading: Excellent Service. Nice rooms. Perfect Ocean View. Great Staff
Summary: This is a very nice hotel in the heart of Laguna Beach. Under building parking [30.00 a night which is expensive]. The rooms are clean, beds comfortable. Excellent views of the ocean, with easy access to the beach and stores.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: What a view and excellent location
Summary: One of 5 hotels in our two week trip down the coast, this was our favorite. The location can't be beat, right on the beach (which was perfect with our 15 month old), plenty of restaurants within walking distance and a view from the balcony that made us want to stay longer. Our room was not huge but spacious enough and our balcony was a decent size. Wi-fi only worked in one small corner of the balcony which was a little annoying. We slept with the door open every night to hear the waves crashing. Complimentary wine on the terrace is a nice touch, and tea and coffee in the lobby each morning. They also put cookies out each night and turndown includes a tea service, but we did not partake - would love to see them include a small fruit and yogurt breakfast instead, but they do offer
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is mediocre for what you pay. Nothing special, except good views from terrace with free wine. Most rooms have no view. Service is mediocre. Rooms mediocre. Nice location on the beach if that is your main interest but again no view from room. Also the view is blocked in he pool and hot tub which detracts from the location.
Manager Response: Dear Anne W,  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach. We appreciate all comments, both positive and negative, as they will only help us improve our product and service. Like most ocean-front properties, the hotel is situated between Pacific Coast Highway and the Pacific Ocean.  While our pool level rooms are on the ocean side of the hotel, they do not have ocean views.  However, our upper-floor rooms offer spectacular views of both Main Beach and the Pacific Ocean.   You touched on our location, which is certainly one of our greatest assets.  Just steps to Main Beach, we are also walking distance to the best restaurants, shops and art galleries Laguna Beach has to offer.  We pride ourselves on a team made up of individuals who care about each guest encounter and we apologize that you did not experience this level of service during your stay.  We thank you again for your comments and hope you will consider The Inn on a future visit and allow us to give you a warm welcome back.  Emily

Summary: Seems like much a do about nothing!  The place is not conveniently located in my opinion (unless your sole purpose is to hang out on the beach), parking is a nightmare over the w/ends, the rooms are adequate, the service is adequate, the room service is AWFUL (takes 45 minutes to an hour minimum), there is no place to sit with friends and its way overpriced.   The best feature with mediocre service is the roof top bar.
Manager Response: Dear KiraMexico,  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach. We take all comments seriously as they help to improve our products and service.  Located just steps to Main Beach, we are also only a short walk from all of the shops, restaurants and art galleries in the heart of Laguna.  Our hope is that by parking with us, guests may avoid the difficulties of finding parking in town while they are here.  We apologize for the delay you experienced with room service and will definitely share your comments with our team.  We do have a great group of individuals who care about each guest encounter and appreciate the opportunity to improve.  Should your future travels bring you back to Laguna Beach, we hope you will consider The Inn and offer us the opportunity to WOW you.  Emily

Summary: Perfect location to stay in Laguna Beach. Nice hotel with great service. Rooms are clean and have what you need. Park your car at hotel and don't move it until you leave. Walk to Village and shops for food and drinks. Free happy hour on deck overlooking beach.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were a family of 3, a couple with a older teen daughter.  We truly enjoyed our 3 night stay in August 2015.  We ended up with a room that faced Highway 1 because we booked last minute.  We were afraid the room would be noisy.  In fact, it was not.  We had total quiet and did not hear any street traffic.  We took full advantage of the balcony over looking the ocean on the 4th floor.  We had our breakfast pastries and coffee up there, and relaxed for hours in the evening watching the sunset.  On our last night, we had some very noisy neighbors.  Hotel management handled our calls to report the incidents with professionalism, and assured us that they would not tolerate the noisy neighbor behavior.  The staff everywhere was so attentive, from the front desk, the doorman, the
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location for restaurants, galleries, and shopping!
Summary: The hotel is in a prime location right in the beach.  The view from our room was wonderful but the hotel is old and dated...it really needs some TLC.  There was a "happy hour", so to speak, on the 4th floor terrace where they served free white and red wine to the guests.  Coffee and water was also available in the morning in the lobby.  Our room was average and the mattress was in need of being replaced.  The bathroom is definitely small with a sink located outside of the toilet/shower area.  The rooms are old fashioned in their design and the front desk was on the unhelpful side.  We traveled with friends and when they complained about the noise level of the pool at 9PM and called the front desk, the front desk replied, "Why don't you ask your friends to switch rooms with you?"
Manager Response: Dear DayDreamer13,  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach and please accept my sincerest apologies as to how we handle the noise at the pool. This is not typical of our high standards and I am truly sorry.  I have reached out to you directly and I do hope you will reach out so we can discuss the situation further.  I do appreciate your comments please rest assured they will help us improve our product and service.  As we are constantly upgrading the property and improving our service based on guest feedback.  We certainly hope you will give The Inn at Laguna Beach another opportunity to serve you in the near future.  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: this is always our favorite week of the year
Summary: as soon as you walk in the hotel every member of the staff makes you feel like you are at home. the location is great. all the restaurants and shopping you could want are in walking distance. the hotel is on the beach, and the ocean view rooms are truly ocean view rooms.
Manager Response: Dear Sam D  Thank you for making The Inn at Laguna Beach your home away from home!!!  We appreciate your patronage and we are honored you choose to spend your week with us.  You touched on our greatest assets our staff and our location, we believe they are second to none.  We look forward to your next visit, hopefully we will see you prior to next Summer.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary Heading: Amazing hotel with fantastic service and awesome views.
Summary: We absolutely loved this hotel. We wanted to stay someplace special for our 30th wedding anniversary and this place did not disappoint! The staff were all so friendly and accommodating and we had such a nice room with a beautiful view of the beach and ocean that we enjoyed while sitting on our balcony.  The hotel is located conveniently near downtown. Walking distance to a lot of places. And underground garage parking was nice to have while staying there. Not to mention being steps away from the main beach with easy access. We will definitely be back. Highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Ruthartz,  Thank you so much for celebrating such a Special occasion with The Inn at Laguna Beach we are truly honored. I would also like to thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay.  You touched on two of our greatest assets our staff and our location.  I am blessed to work with a great group of individuals who truly care about each guest interaction, so I am so happy we did not disappoint.  As for our location we believe it is second to none.  Once you park your car you will not need it as we are steps to Main Beach and within walking distance to the Village of Laguna Beach.   We look forward to welcoming you back to The Inn at Laguna Beach!!!  Peggy

Summary: Spent 4 days here in lovely Laguna.  Perfect location ON the beach.  Beautiful views with a short walk to restaurants, shops, and the festival of arts.  We had a room with an ocean view. Comfortable room and extras like pool, terrace, and coffee in the lobby.
Manager Response: Dear fortfive,  Thank you for your comments regarding your visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We are very happy you enjoyed your 4 days at the Beach and we could not agree with you more regarding the "location perfection".  As you stated we are within walking distance to the Village which has over 40 restaurants, galleries and retail to choose from and we are within walking distance to the festivals.  Also, if you choose not to walk we are on the free trolley line which operates 7 days a week in the Summer and Friday, Saturday, and Sundays during the off-season.  Thank you again for your comments we certainly hope to welcome you back to The Inn very soon!!  Peggy

Summary Heading: Great boutique hotel in fantastic location with relaxed vibe.
Summary: Spent 5 days at the end of a tour of California. Perfect location right on the beach, recommend the sea view rooms which look out over the ocean. The drinks served at 5pm is a nice touch - we met lovely people and views from terrace are great. We ate out, but hotel can provide room service with food from nearby restaurant. Coffee service in the morning was nice and there is a Starbucks right across the street. We found the staff very helpful and pleasant throughout.
Manager Response: Dear McKelvey2015  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We are thankful that we were your last stop of your California Adventure as you were able to have a good mix of relaxation and adventure.  You touched on many of our amenities including our greatest asset our staff.  I work with a great team who want to create positive memories for our guest.  We certainly hope you will return to California's Gold Coast and in particular The Inn at Laguna Beach and when you do please look me up so I can give you a warm welcome back!!  Thank you Peggy

Summary: The room was fantastic - corner room on 4th floor! Views of the whole beach and centrally located. The staff was friendly, but a bit slow and error prone, though nothing serious, just less than you'd expect for the price (brought coffee instead of tea - twice, sleeper sofa had no linens and it took 30 minutes and 2 phone calls to get). Wine hour was nice. Pool was quite (maybe too) warm.
Manager Response: Dear Carlsport,  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We take all comments seriously as it helps to improve our products and service.  Based on your comments we certainly have many areas to improve and please rest assured we will.  We certainly hope you will return to Laguna Beach and in particular The Inn at Laguna Beach, as I would love to give you a warm welcome back!!!  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Loved our stay here. Probably most comfortable hotel bed we have had in a long time. Great location. Walking distance to many wonderful restaurants and shops. Staff was awesome. We will definitely stay here the next time we are lucky enough to come to Laguna.
Manager Response: Dear Sharon S  We hope you are going to get lucky and return to Laguna Beach soon as we would love to welcome you back!!!  Thank you for your comments you touched on a couple of our greatest assets our staff and our location.  I am truly blessed to work with such a great group of individuals who care about each guest encounter and our location is second to none.  We are within steps of Main Beach and a couple of blocks to the Festivals and the Village of Laguna.  Please look me up the next time you are visiting Laguna Beach as I would love to give you a warm welcome back!!  Peggy

Summary Heading: Endless Ocean Views at  Inn at Laguna Beach
Summary: When we unlocked room 313 it was dark. Floor to ceiling Plantation Shutters covered the glass sliding door. As we opened it, we noticed that room had a glass patio wall with two chairs and a table. At the corner was a swinging door that opened from the patio right out onto the pool deck and just steps from the 88 degree heated pool.  This location was perfect for our family. We swam at sunset, at night after dinner and before the 9 p.m. closing and then again at 9 a.m. after a morning walk along the beach.  Our room had two Queen size beds, a small flat screen television, a closet with two cotton robes and a personal safe. The shower tub combination offers a great shower head.  This is what I love about The Inn at Laguna Beach:  1. After a day at the beach, exploring tide pools
Manager Response: Dear wetcoastla,  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You were very thorough and touched on so many of our great amenities.  I am sorry about the first impression we will certainly work on a process so our rooms are more welcoming.  Thank you again for your comments as they will truly assist us in improving our products and service.  We look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Peggy

Summary: Great little hotel.  The staff was attentive to our needs.  Rooms were small but clean.  Wine on the terrace every night at five.  The hotel is on the trolley line, which is free during the summer hours.  The trolley goes to all of the beaches and the arts festival.  My wife and I will definitely go back when we visit the West Coast again
Manager Response: Dear AnoniaDon  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on a couple of our greatest assets our people and our location.  I m blessed to work with a great team, they truly care about each guest encounter and they want to make sure everyone leaves with a positive memory.  Our location we are steps to Maine Beach within walking distance to the Village of Laguna Beach and on the trolley route.  Not only do the free trolleys operate all Summer 7 days a week, but during the Off-Season they operate Friday, Saturday, and Sundays.  We look forward to welcoming you back to Laguna Beach on your next visit to Southern California, please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back!!  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: The best location in Laguna Beach, recently renovated rooms, and very friendly staff.
Summary: We stayed in a villiage room - and it was perfect for my husband, me and our 19 month old! The concierge set up a pack and play before we arrived, and the rest of our trip was perfect. We had a room with a shared balcony overlooking the beach and ocean, and our robes made for the perfect morning coffee experience before the baby woke up! Central LB is all with in walking distance from the Hotel, so no need for a car or even the complimentary shuttle. We loved the easy access to and from the beach, the salt water pool, the complimentary beach equipment and service! The complimentary happy hour was quite but fun! But our favorite thing was the walking trail that spanned in front of the hotel and continued on for miles. Just perfect. We will definitely bring our family and friends
Manager Response: Dear Danielle Y  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach.  Our location is one of our greatest assets as you stated steps to Main Beach and within a few blocks to the Village of Laguna Beach.  We look forward to seeing you and your family on your next visit.  Please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach Welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: The hotel itself is ideally situated and is a good size. Unfortunately we had 2 disturbed nights sleep and it wasn't particularly well handled by the management. The bar was only open one of the nights and they could make more of the beautiful roof area that they have. But all in all it is a lovely hotel and we would go back due to the location.
Manager Response: Dear Emma H  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We are sorry to read about your two nights as this is not the impression we wanted to leave you with.  We will certainly learn from your comments and this will help us improve our products and service.  Please accept my sincerest apologies and upon your next visit please reach out to me so we can make sure you have a wonderful visit.  Thank you and we look forward to seeing you soon at The Inn at Laguna Beach.  Peggy

Summary Heading: Nice rooms and view, hotel failed to provide uptodate information to its guests about hotel actvities and shuttle
Summary: Stayed at the Inn for one night as we had tickets for the Pageant of the Masters. Room was comfortable, clean, and well maintained. Rated the hotel average due to its poor customer service. Front desk clerks need to have more information about the  hotel activities and  the shuttles going to the Pageant and the general area. We were told the bus schedule had changed this year and we could get the information from an app, however they didn't have the information on how to get the app downloaded.  Disappointed at the wine hour. The front desk clerk had told us it was going to be held in upstairs balcony area with views of the ocean and scenic Laguna. When we arrived at the designated area, we were dismayed that there wasn't anyone there and  there was no posted sign that informed
Manager Response: Dear Twofortravel  Thank you for your review regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We certainly appreciate all comments as they only help us improve our products and service.  I am truly sorry the staff did not meet nor exceed your expectations as this is not typical of the high standards we strive to maintain.  I certainly hope you will return to Laguna Beach and give The Inn at Laguna Beach another opportunity to serve you.  If you choose to come back to the Cold Coast of California please reach out to me so I may oversee your reservation start to finish.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: We recently stayed at the Inn At Laguna Beach.  The experience was very good from most perspectives.  As an East Coaster, this hotel appears to be somewhat of a renovated motel in a small beach/artist colony.  The location is right in the middle of everything.  The accomodations themselves were not luxurious for the the price being paid.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  The view from the room(oceanview) was spectacular.  Only room service is available at this hotel.  If arriving by car leave the car parked at the hotel($35/day) and walk.  In season your"re looking at $700 a night for oceanview, no balcony, plus taxes and parking.
Manager Response: Dear efrmdc  Thank you for your review regarding The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on two of our greatest assets our staff and our location.  I am grateful each day to work with such a dedicated staff who truly cares about each guest interaction.  As for our location we cannot agree with you more "park your car" and don't move it better yet if you can leave your car at home!!  We certainly hope to see you again in the near future, please look me so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: This is the best hotel to stay at in Laguna Beach.  It has a great location; convenient for the nearby trolley if you happen to be there during the Sawdust Festival.  It's close to the many galleries and great restaurants.  The staff is wonderful, they are so accommodating, friendly. Having wine from 5-6 on the terrace is nice; having a glass of wine, while watching and listening to the ocean.   I can hardly wait to come back.
Manager Response: Dear Cindy L   Thank you for your kind comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on two of our greatest assets our people and our location.  I am truly blessed each day to work with a great group of people, the staff cares about every interaction as we want everyone to leave with positive memories.  As for our location we are steps to Main Beach or a few blocks to the Village of Laguna which has over 40 great restaurants, plenty of galleries and many unique shops.  With the trolleys operating 7 days during the Summer and on the weekends September through June a car is not really needed.  We do hope to welcome you back sooner rather than later.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: This is by far the best place to stay in Laguna Beach. I have been using this hotel for many years. The stuff and service is the best. You feel very welcome and appreciated. Their complimentary wine in the evenings on the terrace is wonderful, serving a top rated red and a white. There are complementary cookies and milk after that. And later in the evening they deliver tea to your room. There is complimentary coffee in the mornings. This hotel is within walking distance to great restaurants and the art festivals,  I get a room that is beach side with a balcony. Once you stay here you will not want to stay anywhere else.
Manager Response: Dear jjphansen  Thank you for your kind comments regarding your recent stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We are thankful for your patronage and we look forward to your next visit.  You certainly touched on one of our greatest assets, our staff.  I am grateful everyday to work with the team at The Inn at Laguna Beach, each staff member truly cares about creating positive memories as we want every guest to return.  Not only do we offer the complimentary wine and coffee, we also have beach chairs, umbrellas and towels along with Wifi through out the building.  Please look me up on your next visit so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: We stayed here for a wedding, and missed the wedding 'deal' by a day or two (our fault, not there's) and the price was RIDICULOUS.  I'm from NYC, I know expensive hotels.  This room was very pretty, but the size of a small box.  The staff was very nice about getting us checked in early (as we were there for a wedding) but the room had no view (I know the ocean was somewhere behind us, but I couldn't see it).  The pool was ok.  Obviously, the location is fantastic, and that's why you go there, but I wasn't that impressed with anything else.  The parking was so expensive and didn't even include valet (Thirty something dollars to simply use their parking lot).  All in all, a less "fancy" hotel might have been better for us, but we only stayed one night.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer M  Thank you for your review regarding your stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We certainly appreciate all comments as they help us improve our product and service.  I am lucky to work with a great group of people who truly care about each guest interaction and stay.  It seems they did not let you down on this visit.  Thank you again Peggy

Summary: We stayed here for our honeymoon. I saw this rated as a four-star hotel and can't say I agree. Location is good - beautiful views overlooking the beach, and a nice terrace with a sunset view. Quiet at night and easy to sleep.  Walking distance to some restaurants, although seemed like there were a lot more restaurants at the other end of town. The Hennessy Tavern nearby is excellent for breakfast.   Hotel provides beach chairs and umbrellas, but was out of umbrellas the day we asked for one. Actual beach is full of seaweed and sand flies- I don't think they clean up the seaweed at all. We spent a lot of time at the pool, which was nice. Lots of kids which I didn't expect.  Room was small and hotel casino-style carpet & slow elevators could use an update. Room/pool service from
Manager Response: Dear Jenni C  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on many of our great assets, our location and our staff.  We are steps to Main Beach which is a public beach and maintained by the City of Laguna, based on being a Marine Protected area the beaches are not raked everyday to remove the kelp.  There are certain times of the month depending on the tides as to when the City will do a Beach clean up.  With our year round trolley getting from one end of town to the other is easy as you will not have to look for parking in other parts of the City.  We are within walking distance to many great restaurants but as you point out there are some fabulous ones in South Laguna.  Thank you so much for your comments I certainly hope you choose to return to Laguna Beach and if you choose to give us a second chance please look me up directly so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Peggy

Summary: The view from the 4th floor was beautiful and is a great location. The staff was friendly! Our only complaint would be its overpriced for the actual Hotel. It's clean but needs to be updated for the price that they charge! Overall we had a great time and would definitely go back to Laguna Beach!! It's an awesome beach and everything is nice and close!
Manager Response: Dear lcampbell7  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We certainly appreciate all comments and we learn form both the positive and the negative ones.  The last renovation occurred in 2012 as since then we have continued to update some areas of the hotel and we have more updates scheduled for this year.  I am truly blessed to work with such a great group of people, the team really cares about each guest experience and wants to make sure everyone leaves with a  positive memory.  We certainly are happy that you will return to Laguna Beach, we hope you will give us another chance, if you do please reach out to me direct so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Peggy

Summary: Fabulous hotel!! Great views, great staff! The location is unbeatable and the fact that the hotel provides umbrellas, beach chairs and towel for you to use while on the beach is icing on the cake. Would stay here again for sure!!
Manager Response: Dear Squinn12345  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We could not agree with you more that we have an "unbeatable" location, just steps to Main Beach and a few blocks to the Village of Laguna.  Not only do we offer the complimentary beach chairs and umbrellas but we also offer an array of complimentary services.  We certainly look forward to your next visit, please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Peggy

Summary: Great quick getaway at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  This was our third night stay here. We previously stayed here last September 2014 and we had issues in our room. Previously we stayed on the third floor with a view of PCH. I do not recommend the Village view. The bathroom sink was giving off a horrible odor and was making loud noises and the air conditioning was loud and it was either too cold or warm.  They moved us to a pool level view the second night. It was a larger room with two queen beds. It was a much better room.  We could hear the waves from here at night.  There's no ocean view though.  This time around, we stayed in room 105 ocean view with balcony. What an amazing room. It had a king bed with sofa sleeper.  When we arrived, we had a complimentary welcome platter of
Manager Response: Dear Cheyenne P  Thank you for your review regarding your stay in June, we certainly appreciate all comments as we learn how to improve our products and service.  You touched on a few of our offerings not only do we have the ones you mentioned wine hour, cookies and milk, beach chairs, umbrellas, and toys, but we also have morning coffee and tea, and Wifi throughout the Hotel.  Typically our Front Desk staff have many great restaurant recommendations sorry we failed this visit.  We certainly hope to see you and your family again for your next visit to Laguna Beach, please look me up the next time you are visiting The Inn as I would like to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Lovely room with beautiful views. Perfect for a quiet weekend or night with the one you love. Walking distance to everything you need...bars, restaurants, ice cream, coffee. Charming shutters open to small balcony for sitting and watching the sun go down.
Manager Response: Dear Mammaplanner  Thank you for your comments regarding your visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach in June.  You touched on one of our greatest assets our location, as we are within steps of Main Beach and the iconic Las Brisas restaurant we are also just a few blocks to the Village of Laguna Beach.  Thank you again for your comments, on your next visit please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Peggy

Summary Heading: Pretty hotel, nice staff, stunning views, & great location!
Summary: Nice hotel with great views and exceptionally nice staff!!! Room was very nice! Had some nice special touches like binoculars and hot tea with honey and fresh lavendar when we got back to our room after dinner. They had a daily complemintary wine & I think beer hour on their terrace with some bread, cheese, and fruit. Also, they had quality fresh tea and coffee in am, water infused with fruit throuhgout, and cookies and milk at night in the lobby! Ok pool but its right on main beach! They have towels, chairs, & umbrellas for you to bring to the beach which was great!! Itts walking distance to an abundance of amazing restaurants and shops!! Overall great hotel!!
Manager Response: Dear Victoria H  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on some of our greatest assets our people and our views.  I am truly blessed to work with such a great group of people they want to make sure every guest leaves with a positive memory as we want everyone to want to return to The Inn and to Laguna Beach.  As for our sweeping views of both Main Beach and the Pacific Ocean they are hard to beat.  Being a few blocks to the Village of Laguna is just a bonus as there is no need to get in your car after you arrive.  Thank you again for your kind comments, we look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Peggy

Summary: I only stayed one night as I was traveling for work but the staff upgraded me to give me a full ocean view. The hotel is nice not modern but more a 60's surfer vibe which goes very well with Laguna. I can not rate the facilities or breakfast experience as I was in and out but I had a good vibe from this hotel and the staff and will be coming back!
Manager Response: Dear Arnaud G  Thank you for your comments regarding your quick visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach, we look forward to welcoming you back!!!  We believe upon your return you will find the staff warm and friendly and our location one of the best.  Thank you again and we hope you return sooner rather than later.  Peggy

Summary: Lovely little hotel right on the beach with walking distance to the main strip of Laguna. Rooms are spacious and they have a lovely sun deck overlooking the beach.  I wish they had a fitness center (not everyone can run on the beach) and a bar. In fact, they don't have any restaurants or bars on site. You can get room service from a local restaurant, though. I had to walk to the nearby gas station each time I needed water or a snack. Not terribly inconvenient but it would have been nice.
Manager Response: Dear Mellissa Ross  Thank you for your comments regarding your visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We are pleased you enjoyed our hotel and the location.  I am sorry as it seems like you were not informed of our honor  bar located in the room which has both water and snacks, we are sorry you missed it.  We our partnered with Las Brisas the iconic restaurant situate a top the bluff next to the hotel, which is able to provide our room service or snacks by the pool.  We certainly hope the next time you are visiting California's Gold Coast you will choose to return to The Inn at Laguna Beach, when you do please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: We stayed there one night last weekend to celebrate an anniversary.  The property is a bit old, but we had a great time.  Our room had an ocean view (albeit only when standing next to the window), and the location is awesome because you can park your car and walk everywhere the rest of the trip.  The Surf and Sand is better, but the Inn at Laguna Beach may be a better hotel for the price, which was $300 less than the Surf and Sand.
Manager Response: Dear Jeff L  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach and more importantly thank you for choosing to celebrate your anniversary with us, we are truly honored.  We agree with you that our location is "awesome" we are within walking distance to just about everything and if you want to go to South Laguna it is a short trolley ride away.  Thank you again, please come back before your next anniversary as we would love the opportunity to serve you again in the near future.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: I went here with my boyfriend and fell in love with the place when we first walked in, always such a friendly staff greeting us. Love how close it is to the beach art galleries and food places. Got the "village room" cute and simple inside. Only thing I didn't like was the noise from the street, our view from our window was the parking lot and the busy street passing by. Cars speeding by, and the AC is a bit noisy but I feel those things are out of the hotels control. Only a mini fridge no cooking amenities but Over all amazing day and night❤️
Manager Response: Dear alyseeaneedsavaction  Thank you for your comments regarding your visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  The location of the hotel as us situated between Pacific Coast Highway and the Pacific Ocean, this is like most ocean front properties in Laguna Beach.  I am sorry about the noise on your next visit I recommend the Ocean View room as then you will have the sound of the waves.  Thank you for mentioning the staff, I work with a great group of people who truly care about creating positive memories.  It is our hope that every guest leaves wanting to return.  Thank you again, on your next visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Peggy

Summary Heading: Great Facility, Even greater Staff making our 35th Wedding Anniversary a Special Memory
Summary: There is always a risk when planning something special, but Chickie and I could not have selected any better a location than the Inn at Laguna Beach to celebrate our 35th Wedding Anniversary.    Welcomed in our room was a hand-written note of congratulations along with wine & cheese & antipasto. The room was clean, a/c, & a nice balcony overlooking an incredible view of the ocean, literally in our back yard.   Our experience validated our decision to select the Inn (not needing the expense of a resort-type hotel). Everything was in walking distance including the amazing Las Brisas Restauant, right next door, (of which the Inn partners i learned).    But the staff made our stay simply the best. Starting w Lindsy Walker, Annette, and Ekatharina at the desk;  Scott, William,
Manager Response: Dear ncirilli  Thank you for your kind comments regarding your stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We are honored you chose our hotel to celebrate your special occasion.  I am blessed everyday to work with not only the group of people you mentioned but also the ones that you did not mention as a whole they make a great team.  We certainly hope that you will return to The Inn sooner rather then later, the next time your are visiting California's Gold Coast please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back!!  Thank you  Peggy

Summary Heading: Not as advertised? But decent stay
Summary: Booked online.   Reviews all seemed pretty positive and because of the free breakfast and heated pool we selected this one. They have a parking garage but be careful. ..you'll bottom out your car. Check in went fine...however unadvertised is the $35/day parking fee.   Both hotels tonight & trip advisor list a free breakfast but this is not the case.  You can order room service but you'll pay for it. The pool is warm & wonderful.   Nice towels & nice area.  Hot tub is small but very warm.  Hotel overlooks  beach area and with windows open at night you can hear the waves if room is facing ocean. Free wine provided at 5.  Supposedly had cookies & milk at 6 but we had left for dinner after that. Rooms are nice with standard amenities but include a safe & nice robes.   Hotels tonight
Manager Response: Dear radelster  Thank you for your comments regarding your visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We take all comments seriously as we can learn from all which will help us improve our overall product and service.    I am truly sorry for the misunderstanding as it relates to complimentary breakfast, as stated we do not offer a complimentary breakfast; however, it is available through room service.  Our Complimentary offers are coffee and tea in the lobby served until 10:00am, Wine Hour from 5:00pm-6:00pm. Cookies and Milk at 6:00pm. Beach Chairs, Umbrellas, and Towels, and WiFi throughout the hotel.  We certainly hope you will give us another opportunity to serve you in the future.  If you do please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: A  little gem in the perfect location !
Summary: Excellent little hotel. Perfect location ! Walk to restaurants and shops. Right on the beach and they have a cool terrace overlooking the beach where they serve free wine at cocktail hour. By the way try Uber to come home from your restaurant.  Our cost was four dollars for four people during the week Great views. Very helpful and friendly staff. Only negative is the room was tiny room. And parking in their underground parking lot was very expensive. You may be able to park on the street for free. Altogether a great experience at this cool place!
Manager Response: Dear Paceslaker  Thank you for your kind comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on two of our greatest assets our people and our location.  We believe we have one of the best locations in town within walking distance to the festivals, many restaurants, art galleries and other retail and only 84 steps to Main Beach.  Our team truly cares about each guest stay and they make it their mission to make sure everyone leaves with a positive memory.  Between Uber an our year round trolley we recommend that our guest not bring a car if at all possible as it is not needed once you arrive.  Thank you again for your comments, please look me up on your next visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach as I would love to give you a warm welcome back!  Peggy

Summary Heading: Shame about the room and parking fees
Summary: The staff are super nice; the cookies and coffee were good; the room was very nice; and the location is excellent.  But it was a shame I was not offered a room with a view (do I have to ask for this?  I couldn't through the AMOMA website and no one from the hotel asked me either).  And the parking rate is ridiculous. It's cheaper to park on Rodeo Drive for the day.
Manager Response: Dear T6455WYdanielp  Thank you for your comments regarding your visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on two of our greatest assets our location and our staff.  I am truly grateful each day to work with such a great group of people, each staff member truly cares about creating a positive guest experience.  Our location is second to none we are steps to Main Beach and a couple of blocks to the Village of Laguna Beach.  Based on our location we recommend a ride from the airport rather then renting a car as we are within walking distance to most things and it will save the overnight parking charge.  Our reservations are made by room type and our rooms with views are very popular so we would have placed you in the room type reserved, I am sorry this did not meet your expectation.  The next time you are visiting California's Gold Coast please let me know as I would like to personally make sure to reserve the room type that you want.  I would also like to welcome you back to Laguna Beach.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: We were looking for a beachfront hotel in Laguna Beach where we could walk to restaurants, galleries, etcetera without getting in the car. So we chose this inn for our Christmas holiday. We were not disappointed. There were many outstanding features like the views of the cove but what stands out is the friendly staff. Granted, this hotel has limited services but the price also fit what they offered. We'd do it all over again.
Manager Response: Dear rslot  Thank you so much for your comments regarding your stay over the Christmas Holiday.  We are honored you choose to spend the holiday with us.  You touched on two of our greatest assets our people and our location.  Our goal is to create positive memories and our staff takes this seriously we want each guest to leave with a longing to return.  Our location is second to none steps to main beach and within walking distance to the Village of Laguna there truly is no need for a car.  Please do not wait until next Christmas to return we hope to see you sooner rather than later.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Really loved this place!  Very walkable and a nice staff.  Rooms are quiet and clean. Rooms on the third and fourth floor give you the best view.  Parking is a bit pricey. Overall a great stay on Memorial Day weekend.
Manager Response: Dear Buzz F  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on two of our greatest assets our staff and our location.  I am truly blessed to work with such a great team, each team member truly cares about creating positive memories for our guest. Our location is steps to Main Beach and a couple of blocks to the Village of Laguna, truly a car is not needed.   Please look me up the next time you return to The Inn at Laguna Beach so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Took the family for a 5 day vacation to Laguna Beach.  The hotel was clean and the staff friendly.  They offer boogie boards and beach chairs also, which is nice. The pool and hot tub were great for the kids.  Next time would book a room higher up than the 3rd floor.  View is stunning.  Would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear HeidiHo333  Thank you for your kind comments regarding your stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We are so happy you and your family enjoyed the vacation.  Not only do we have the beach amenities but we also have complimentary WiFi, Wine Hour, Milk and Cookies in the lobby and much more.  On you next visit to Laguna Beach please look me up so I can give you a warm welcome back to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: I was located in a "pool view" room.. Which while large and withba nice patio, was in fact not high enough to actually enjoy a real view. More troublesome was the noise due to imperfect sound proofing and a defective (inneficient) and extremely noisy ac unit. I ended up truning it off to be able to sleep. Setvice was discrete, neutral at best. Location is wonderful. You walk straight out to the beach through a beautiful path. There is no restaurantin the hotel but they have an agreement with next door las brisas restaurant which is ok. Overall at $300 a nigh, i found the place a bit overpriced for what you get. The decoration however is very nice, californian beachhouse feel.
Manager Response: Dear Nick of Paris,  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We appreciate all comments both positive and negative as it will only help us improve our product and service.  Like most Ocean front properties the hotel is situated between Pacific Coast Highway and the Pacific Ocean, not all of our rooms have views.  The pool level room is on the Ocean side of the hotel but does not have Ocean views.  We could not agree with you more as we believe our location is 2nd to none as you state steps to the Beach and it is only a few blocks to the Village of Laguna.  Thank you again for your comments if you return to California's Gold Coast I certainly hope you will choose to return, please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Peggy

Summary Heading: Great service when we really needed it!
Summary: We love this hotel, which is why we came back! The view, the service, the access to everything along PCH...we love it! But when we faced a family emergency in the middle of our weekend I found myself alone and not sure how to get around the area. The staff were SO helpful...especially the young man who was at the front desk at 3am (I think his name is Michael?). He helped me to get good directions to the hospital I was looking for (I got lost on my own!) and was very attentive. I hope we can return soon and have a proper honeymoon!
Manager Response: Dear Rebecca K,  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am sorry you encountered a family emergency while staying with us but I am grateful that Michael was able to assist.  We would like you to return and have a true honeymoon and not only enjoy The Inn but also enjoy Laguna Beach.  We would love to make recommendations so you have a truly great experience.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: I decided to stay here after reading so many great reviews on TA. I booked a room with the balcony to have the very nice view to the ocean and ejoy the nature waves. You can the the wave sound from your room and it makes you sleeper better. I love this too much after staying in so many hotels and most in the city center. But if you are the light sleeper choose the room at other side. The room is big and very clean. The bed is comfy to have the realy good sleep. The staff here are incredibly friendly and helpful. I will be back soon and will always stay here.
Manager Response: Dear KLA297,  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We are fortunate to sit atop a bluff overlooking the Pacific Ocean so you cannot only enjoy looking at the water but as you said hear it while sleeping.   Please let us know the next time you return to Laguna Beach so we can make some great recommendations on places to go.  We look forward to giving you a warm welcome back!  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Take your choice:1)relax on the balcony,enjoy the ocean breeze and sounds,delight in watching dolphins and whales gracefully migrate in view, 2) step out the front to enjoy the lively downtown scene,full of fabulous choices to wine,dine,shop, 3) step out to the ocean side and walk,jog,run along the lively picturesque walkways and boardwalk 4) simply sit on one of the many benches and enjoy reading a book or gazing at the view.    The location is perfection. All staff are friendly,efficient,professional and helpful.  Rooms feel welcoming,nicely accommodated and very comfortable.  My family and I are planning our return and there is only one place we want to be-Inn at Laguna Beach
Manager Response: Dear BeeGr8  Thank you for your kind comments regarding your recent stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on two of our greatest assets our people and our location.  I am truly grateful to work with such a wonderful group of people who truly care about each guest experience.  The bonus I have is working in a perfect location.  Thank you again, please look me up the next time you and your family visit so I can extend a warm welcome back to Laguna Beach.  Peggy

Summary: We went the first part of April, which is my Spring break from work. We had a room overlooking the ocean. As soon as we opened the door the view almost took my breath away. We had a room with a balcony and we enjoyed sitting out and relaxing. We also took my little dog which was welcomed from the start. The hotel is convenient to all the shops and restaurants. You are also right on the beach!! The bed was comfy and we fell asleep to the sound of waves. Hopefully we will be back one day!!
Manager Response: Dear four2travel  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay in April at The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on one of our best attributes our location.  We are steps to Main Beach and a couple of blocks to the Village of Laguna which has over 40 great restaurants, art galleries and various retail shops, there truly is no need for a car.  We hope your little dog enjoyed the visit as much as you did as we would love to welcome her back.  We hope to see you sooner rather than later, please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Peggy

Summary: This year I have stayed at the Inn at Laguna Beach three times already. It is becoming my new favorite hotel to stay at for business while I am visiting my clients in OC. Although it is a little removed from Irvine and Costa Mesa, it is well worth the detour. The room I stayed in most recently was a lovely ocean view room that I was upgraded to upon arrival. They had bottled water and chocolate waiting for me in my room when I checked in. One of my favorite things about this hotel is their wine happy hour from 5-6pm. It is the perfect way to enjoy one of Laguna's lovely sunsets and the cookies after are the cherry on top. Years ago, I used to stay at the Surf & Sand, and while it is a larger hotel, I much prefer the boutique feel at the Inn at Laguna Beach, as well as the
Manager Response: Dear JenHillJHCCS,  Thank you for your kind comments regarding your recent stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We love that we are becoming your new favorite hotel, we want to be your home away from home while you have business in Orange County.  Although it sounds like you do not get much free time we also offer beach chairs and umbrellas if you find the time to relax on the beach.  Thank you for staying at The Inn at Laguna Beach, we appreciate your business and we look forward to your next visit.  Peggy

Summary: Loved The Inn...best location...close to dining, shopping, on the beach.  Staff was very accommodating and our room had a balcony with a wonderful view of the beach and ocean. This will be my choice when returning to Laguna Beach.  And the evening cookies were a nice touch too.
Manager Response: Dear JuJuDoll  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach. We are very happy to be your hotel of choice while visiting Laguna Beach!!  We believe we have the best location in town just steps to Main Beach and a couple of blocks to the village which has over 40 great restaurants, art galleries, and retail shops.    Not only do we have the cookies in the evening we also have wine from 5:00 to 6:00pm, coffee and tea in the lobby until 10:00am, and beach chairs and umbrellas for your beach experience.  Thank you again, please look me up on your next visit so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back!!  Peggy

Summary Heading: Its not a 5 Star Property, but Location, Location, Location!
Summary: Been to Laguna many times so I was at least familiar with this property and its location, which attracted me, over the price.  Its a little pricey, but the view, location and staff friendliness and attentiveness make it hard to skip over.  Its views over the Pacific, along with a short walk to all you need to see in downtown Laguna, coupled with a nice cliff walk in the other direction just make this an ideal spot.  Fresh cucumber water in the lobby as well as Starbucks coffee and you get your day started right.  They have a few rooms facing the entry and surface parking, worth avoiding if you can.  Cheers!
Manager Response: Dear Tamaqua  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  Two of our greatest attributes are the staff and our location.  I am honored daily to work with a great group of people who care about each guest encounter and our location is second to none in Laguna Beach, just steps to Main Beach and a couple of blocks to the village of Laguna with over 40 restaurants, art galleries, and retail shops for your convenience.  Not only do we offer the water, coffee, and tea but we also offer complimentary wine reception, cookies and milk and beach chairs and umbrellas plus much more.  On your next visit to Laguna Beach please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back!!!  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Absolutely love this place! Room was wonderful with a view that couldn't be better! Have been here in the past and will be here again!! Celebrated our 25th anniversary with dinner next door at Las Brisas! Recommend any room on top floor with ocean view! You won't be disappointed!
Manager Response: Dear Codemom49,  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We are honored you choose to celebrate your 25th wedding anniversary with us!!!  We could not ask for a better partner and neighbor then the Iconic Las Brisas restaurant so I am happy to see you had a great dinner.  Thank you again for your comments please look me up on your next visit as I would love to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Found this hotel on TripAdvisor for a mid-week romantic get-a-way.  It was perfect!  The location is great - right next to Las Brisas Restaurant on the bluff above the ocean, right on the sidewalk path to the Main Beach in Laguna.  The room was lovely - we did splurge on the Oceanview Balcony King - well worth the view.  There were even a pair of binoculars in the room.  Loved falling asleep to the sound of the waves and having our coffee on the balcony.  The hotel staff was friendly, and helpful with suggestions of restaurants & nearby hiking. And a wonderful bonus is the evening wine reception on the rooftop bar, and cookies/milk in the lobby in the evening.  We hope to return again - both for a couples get away, as well as to bring the family back to stay sometime.  A lovely
Manager Response: Dear SD_Family 2012  Thank you for your kind comments regarding your visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on two of our greatest attributes our staff and our location.  The team at The Inn truly cares about each guest experience and they strive to have every guest leave with a positive memory of both The Inn and of Laguna Beach.  Our location is steps to Main Beach and a couple of blocks to the village of Laguna Beach, as you stated we sit on top of the bluff tucked between the Pacific Ocean and Pacific Coast Highway.  Not only do we wine reception each evening and the cookies and milk but we also have coffee and tea in the lobby in the mornings and we provide beach chairs and umbrellas for your beach enjoyment.  We look forward to your next visit whether it is a couples get-a-way or a family trip we want to take care of you and we want to be your home away from home.  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: 5 star location in a 3 star hotel
Summary: Best location in Laguna beach! Right on the beach and 2 mins walk to the main streets with all restaurants and cafes.  The hotel pool is small but heated and the rooms are surprisingly nice and would beat most standard American chain hotels (read Marriott, Hyatt, Hilton etc). Staff are friendly and professional. I would suspect this would easily be a 4 star hotel if they had a restaurant which they don't. You can order breakfast / dinner which will be delivered from a nearby place but why do that with all the great restaurants within 2 mins walk. I would easily stay here again which is, I guess, the ultimate rating.
Manager Response: Dear 1234CN  Thank you for your kind comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach, and thank you for he ultimate compliment of knowing you would return.  We could not agree with you more regarding our location, we think it is the best in town, steps to Main Beach and a couple of blocks to the Village of Laguna.  We are fortunate to have a partnership with Las Brisas the iconic restaurant next door for In Room dining but there are over 40 restaurants within walking distance if you choose to dine out.  Thank you again for your comments the next time you are visiting California's Gold Coast we will look forward to welcoming you back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: My husband and I spent a long weekend there (Friday - Monday). Our king room, balcony view room was fantastic! It's an older property but seems well-maintained. The view was really excellent, but there isn't much privacy since a public stairway goes right in front of the ocean view rooms.   The scenery is absolutely beautiful and the sound of the surf will lull you to the best sleep you've ever had.   The room had a pair of nice binoculars which came in handy when we saw a pod of whales on our first morning and wanted a closer look!  The in-room honor bar was well-stocked and reasonably priced.   Staff was really excellent and there are several nice perks: 4 p.m. wine reception on the view deck, 6 p.m. warm cookies and milk in the lobby, and morning coffee in the lobby.   The
Manager Response: Dear Anita R,  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on many of our great attributes two very important ones being our staff and our location.  I am truly blessed to work with such a great group of people, each member of the team truly cares about creating positive memories for our guests.  Our location is second to none, as you stated we are within steps of Main Beach and a couple of blocks to the Village of Laguna.   The next time you return to The Inn at Laguna Beach please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Arrived last Friday April 17th for my annual birthday/ our wedding anniversary extravaganza.  The hotel is adorable with great Pacific Ocean views.  The location can't be matched in all of Laguna.  On Pac. Hwy just steps from the main beach, basketball and volleyball courts. Close to shops, restaurants and bars. There's also a paved winding path on the bluff in front of the resort (pacific side) that meanders on the cliff through several rocky coves and parks with incredible views. We had an Ocean View King room.  They have Ocean View rooms with a balcony, but you have to sacrifice square footage in your room to make up for the recessed balcony.  All in all I recommend the no balcony option.  You can still hear the rhythm of the waves throughout the day and night. A bit pricey
Manager Response: Dear KleainSeattleWA,  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach and thank you for celebrating your special occasion with us.  You touched on one of our greatest attributes our location steps to Main Beach and a couple of blocks to the Village of Laguna Beach.  I am sorry to read about your parking issues but happy to see you were not blocked in for any length of time. We will certainly look for ways to remedy this situation.  Thank you again, please come back and visit soon.  On your next visit please look me up so I can give you a warm welcome back!!  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: Beware: Ocean Views / patio quality varies dramatically within same rate tier
Summary: My complaints about this hotel stem from the hotel's practice of booking some partial ocean view rooms as full ocean view rooms.  We booked an "Ocean View King Balcony" room on 4/18 for our 10th anniversary. When we were in Laguna Beach previously we saw balconies overlooking the ocean at this hotel from the beach - it looked amazing. We allowed lots of advance notice and paid $380 total for the room.  When we got there we wound up in Room 102. There was essentially no ocean view standing from within this room and not at ALL what I expected. You had to go out on the patio at a corner which allowed a view of a *long hallway* to the ocean. It was also very dark, being very low and below many trees. Room 101 would have the same or worse view, as would the two rooms above on the 2nd
Manager Response: Dear Tomjonesrocks,  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We appreciate all comments as they help us improve our products and service.  I am sorry you did not enjoy the view from your room and more so that we were unable to accommodate your room move, we do have limited inventory so we are not always able to accommodate room moves.  I am happy to see that  my Manager was able to make your stay a little better.  Once again I am extremely sorry, the next time you come to Laguna Beach, please allow me to assist you with booking your reservation as I would like to see the process through start to finish.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Business meeting. Never been here before. I could't use all the things hotel offers, but I spent there 3 nights. Everything is good. The room is clean. I couldn't don the light-switch for bathroom...yes...no way! Nothing impressed me as I thought before staying....finally...
Manager Response: Dear Marco C  Thank you for your comments regarding your visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am sorry you were not able to enjoy all of our amenities during your stay as it seems your meetings kept you busy.  We have many complimentary offerings that hopefully you can enjoy on your next visit.  Please be assured all of our rooms and bathrooms have light switches, I am not sure what happened in your room, but I will have my Maintenance Department check the switches in the guest rooms to make sure they are working properly.  Thank you very much for your comments, I do hope you return to The Inn at Laguna Beach in the near future, please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Peggy

Summary: I stayed here in September for my mothers wedding and was very pleased with the staff and the hotel. it was very clean and in a great location I will make it a point to come back here on my next trip to southern California.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Lovely little hotel located in the perfect spot!  Right on the beach and right near town - walk to everything from shops, cafes, galleries, restaurants, beach and trailheads.  Rooms are a bit tight but seriously when in SoCal how much time do you need to spend in your room?  You are definitely paying for the convenience of this hotel.  The "happy hour" wine on the roof is a pleasant surprise, and of course you can bring your own bottle and just chill out with spectacular views of the ocean.  The only negative is for the money paid for the rooms I think they could invest in better hair dryers and not the $10 drugstore mini things.
Manager Response: Dear Jih67  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach, we certainly appreciate your comments as it will help us improve our products and service.  We cannot agree with you more we think our location is one of our best attributes.  I am happy to read you enjoyed our wine hour one of our many complimentary services, we also offer WiFi throughout the property, coffee and tea in the lobby until 10:00am, cookies and milk starting at 6:00pm in the lobby, and Beach Chairs and Umbrellas.  I am working with my Back of the House Operations Manager to source a new in-room hair dryer, it is my hope that on your next stay we will have one that is the quality you would expect from out hotel.  Thank you again, please come back and visit and look me up so I can give you a warm  Laguna Beach welcome back.  Peggy

Summary: Beautiful hotel carved into the hillside directly on the beach. What else could you ask for. Very convenient to the OC Airport and easy to get to San Clemente (south) or Long Beach (north). A little pricey during season but if out of season it is a steal.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel from the outside and lobby are extremely nice and its location is great, but when you book a room based on the pictures it shows with the info on the room and you get there and it has no view of the ocean, the value is severely decreased. Paying almost 400 for a room with a view of PCH is not something I wish to ever do again. The room was extremely clean, but once again the pictures were well shot because the room was about half the size in person as it appeared in the photos. If you are going to book here make sure you get a confirmation that your room will have an ocean view before you give them money. I will not be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear David B,  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We certainly appreciate all comments as it helps us improve our services.  I am happy to see that your room was "extremely clean" and well maintained as our housekeeping department works hard to exceed our guest expectations.  Like most ocean front Hotels in Laguna Beach we are situated between the Pacific Ocean and the Pacific Coast highway.  We would certainly love to honor all guest requests for an ocean view room but the only way we can guarantee it is when the room type is reserved.    I understand you do not wish to give our hotel another chance but if you want to return to Laguna Beach we would love to have you back.  Please reach out to me directly so I can make your reservation and oversee your stay personally.  Thank you again for your comments! Peggy

Summary: The Inn at Laguna Beach is heaven on the sand!  I would recommend to anyone without hesitation.  The staff is top notch and cares a great deal about the guest.  Location can't be beat and the rooms are warm, inviting, clean and comfortable.   Falling asleep to the sound of waves in this wonderful hotel is all you dream it will be!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Such a wonderful hotel in so many different ways - location, staff, amenities and on and on... The rooms are so comfortable and well done and thoughtful. And falling asleep to the sound of the waves that literally surrounds you is so relaxing. Can't recommend highly enough, and I especially can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Terrible view with a loud air conditioner.
Summary: We booked a room through Hotels.com for the Inn at  Laguna beach, We booked a pool view since that was all that was left. When we got there we did indeed have a pool view, but the other window facing the beach had a window half covered with film and a generator in front. So we could not see the water without jumping up and down. When I complained to the front desk he said sometimes hotel web sites are not accurate. Also, when we checked in we said we wanted to get a glass of wine,,,they had a roof top wine hour which we only found out when  a man in the hallway informed us.Lastly, the air conditioner sounded like a train was coming through the room. Really disappointing stay. The only thing we liked about this place was the location. For over $300 an night I would have thought
Manager Response: Dear Beanosmom,  Thank you for taking the time to write about your stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach, we certainly appreciate all comments as we learn and hopefully improve our product and service based on both positive and negative feedback.  I am certainly sorry you did not enjoy the pool level room which you reserved, these rooms do not have an ocean view although they are on the ocean side of the property.    I will certainly work with our guest service staff regarding informing our guests of our services as we serve coffee and tea in the lobby until 10:00am, Wine Hour from 5:00 - 6:00pm either on The Terrace or in the Lobby, and then we have cookies and milk in the Lobby at 6:00pm. Not only are these complimentary offering but we also have others like WiFi throughout the property and Beach Chairs and Umbrellas.  I certainly hope you will return to Laguna Beach and The Inn at Laguna Beach giving us another opportunity to serve you.  If you choose to return to The Inn please reach out to me directly as I would love to make your reservation and oversee your entire stay.  Thank you again for your comments! Peggy

Summary Heading: Perfect location, good service, good value
Summary: My family and I stayed here over spring break. I researched Laguna beach hotels quite a bit before I chose this one. My family and I enjoyed our stay and would come again. We had a 2 queen bed room. The room was very small but it was clean, beds were comfortable and the shower had good pressure. The hotels location was perfect. The staff was very courteous and helpful with recommendations. The pool was very warm and clean. The wine reception was a fun way to begin the evening. We would come again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Gorgeous views of the ocean and beach
Summary: Spend the extra money to be ocean front , not view. No restaurant on site but plenty close by to choose from. Will be back as it was located near the best area for shopping as well.  Highly recommend over the options in Laguna Nigel or Newport Beach.
Manager Response: Dear CandaRockiesGirl,  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You certainly touched on one of our greatest attributes our location.  Not only are we 84 steps to Main Beach we are also a couple of blocks from the Village of Laguna Beach, with over 40 great restaurants to choose from and plenty of shopping.  Thank you again, we look forward to welcoming you back in the very near future.  Peggy

Summary: Reserved 2 rooms for five people, understanding 1 would sleep on a pull out couch.  Got 2 rooms with 1 bed each.  No couch.  No way to change, no cot available.  Said they would get us a bed for the floor.  Didn't do it.  Finally brought in a cushion from a patio chair, wet from the pool, to use as a bed.  No discount, or even an apology.  Views were amazing, for 2 people room would be nice.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were in town to celebrate my wife's birthday, as she had requested that we dine at Las Brisas. So we stayed one night at the Inn. It was our first stay and we enjoyed it very much. The staff sent us a complimentary drink, as well. We slept well with the sounds of the ocean and awoke refreshed in the morning. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Bartender at wine hour on roof
Summary: Kevin Johnson was so personable and made us feel so welcome! He was incredibly  friendly and attentive.  He made us feel so comfortable and his service really stood out and made our evening a most enjoyable one!  We look forward to coming back and also we recommend to anyone staying at the hotel to go and experience the wonderful view and outstanding service Kevin provides in a fun and effortless way.  Thank you Kevin! "The Sideways Girls" ☺️😉
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is fantastic. The rooms are done in elegant beach chic, and the views are amazing. It is the perfect getaway. My son and I explored the town which has great food and shopping, all within walking distance. The staff is highly experienced and will show you the way...
Manager Response: Dear Allyn S  Thank you for your kind comments regarding  your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We are happy you enjoyed your stay and we hope you will return soon.  We believe we have one of the best locations in town to not only enjoy the view of the Pacific Ocean but also to explore the village of Laguna Beach.  We will look forward to welcoming you back soon!!  Peggy

Summary: A great find right on the coastline, the hotel is a cute spot and located centrally in Laguna to shops, restaurants, and the beach!  We loved this place and would stay again, the service at the front desk was amazing, rooms were very nice and the pool area great.  We had a pool level room and could walk right out to it,very convenient.  On top of all of this they were dog friendly bonus for us! Only opportunity is more comfy beds and some little fixes in the rooms you may not even notice. We are staying here again for sure, highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear ltlchristine  Thank you for your kind comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach!!  We believe we have one of the best locations in town, just steps to Main Beach and a couple of blocks from the village of Laguna Beach.  We appreciate all comments both positive and negative as it helps us improve our product and service, we will certainly do  our best to get have our Maintenance Department do some preventative maintenance on our pool level rooms as it sounds like it may be time.  We look forward to your next visit, please look me up on your return so I can give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: I stayed there for 2 nights with my partner to celebrate our anniversary and let me tell you....THIS IS MY NEW FAVORITE HOTEL IN THE WORLD!!! I love EVERYTHING about it. The employees were for the most part very friendly bare the C/O lady which seemed overwhelmed with all the work she had to do. However, everything else was fantastic. The managers, the food, the location, the views, the decor, the rooms everything! It has it is own unique character. I can not wait to come back to this little gem!!! It is really charming. they are very accommodating and they take care and care for their guests. Being a professional in this industry as well, it was great to experience it first hand too. Job PHENOMENALLY done!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location, great hospitality, charming room.
Summary: My sister and I came to The Inn at Laguna Beach for a one-night beach-side getaway. We found this place on Trip Advisor & this was a great choice!!! The room was clean and charming with a private balcony overlooking the ocean. The staff people we dealt with (Brendan, Annette & Ekaterina) were all friendly, helpful and attentive. The location is perfect with the beach right behind the hotel. The price was mid-range, not the cheapest option we looked at, but definitely not the most expensive either. We will definitely come back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I came to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  It was only for one night, but it was lovely - we had a room with a balcony over looking the water. I had upgraded from a standard room, and although I did not see the other rooms, I definitely  think it was worth it. We checked in late, they had hot mint tea waiting in our room with a handwritten note from the staff. The bed was insanely comfortable, the amenities were very nice, the staff was so kind & helpful, we feel asleep to the sounds of the waves crashing - I have nothing bad to say about the inn, we will definitely be coming back! William and his team are extremely accommodating, thank you again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I've taken two separate stays at the Inn at Laguna Beach and rate this hotel outstanding. Service, hospitality, location are all ideal. The location puts you right on the beach, and falling asleep or waking up to the sound of the Pacific breakers rolling in is a can't miss experience. The rooms are well appointed with very high quality mattresses and linens. The bakes goods brought to our room in the morning with coffee were addictive. The hotel is pricey (ask for a return visitor discount!) and parking anywhere in Laguna Beach is problematic. However, these are mere quibbles; you get what you pay for, and there are many more expensive rooms of lower quality to be had in this area.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location, good service, really small and noisy room
Summary: I have stayed only for one night and was in the area for business. Location is great, staff very polite and professional but I got a room on the street side on a lower level. Very tiny and noisy. I had a very bad night sleep.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I spent 8 days here in January with our dog. This was our first stay in Laguna Beach, and we were not disappointed. The Inn at Laguna Beach was top notch. Our room was well appointed, comfortable, and very clean.  Staff were always professional, friendly and helpful.  We loved the beach, the city, and the amazing sunsets each evening. On our last night, we were sitting out on the balcony and spotted a whale with the binoculars provided by the Inn. A perfect way to cap off a relaxing, wonderful vacation!  We look forward to our next stay at the Inn!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I visited Inn at Laguna Beach last week for a one-night getaway from work and the kids.  The Inn is in a great location near restaurants etc... and the view of the beach and ocean at this property is fantastic, however the accommodations are average (Holiday Inn) and customer service is poor.  Upon checking in after an hour and a half wait, the desk attendant sent us to a room which was still dirty (bed unmade, and empty beer bottles/trash throughout the room.)  Although briefly apologetic, the staff person was almost dismissive about the mistake and told us he'd get us a "better room" next to the previous room he'd checked us into.  The only other guest services staff that spoke to us while we were there was the valet/bellman who WAS very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: none

Summary: A couple of friends & I were in Cali and decided to head for the Coast for a couple days.  A friend googled hotels on or near the beach.  Well, did she make a good choice!  This beachfront hotel is clean, has a friendly staff and is located directly on the beautiful beach.  There are lots of great restaurants within walking distance and nice little shops for purses, shoes, trinkets, art....almost anything you'd want.  I liked it here so much that I just booked another night with my daughter.  Oh, and bring your bathing suit...they have a beautiful rooftop pool/bar!  Need I say more???
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel has it all!
