Summary: We spent only one night here coming from Los Angeles to San Diego. Unfortunately the weather was terrible (rain) and we could not appreciate the beautiful view. In any case I guess the hotel is perfect during the summer season due to the location directly on the beach and the amazing panorama.  The hotel is a little bit old and something should has to be renovated.
Manager Response: Dear Fraechri  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach, I am sorry the weather did not cooperate, but even with the rain the Pacific Ocean is beautiful.  You touched on one of our greatest attributes our location as we are steps to Main Beach and a couple of blocks to the Village of Laguna Beach.  The Hotel was recently renovated we completed the major renovation in 2012 and we have been making upgrades ever since, most recently we just replaced the carpet in the Hallways.    Thank you again for your comments we do hope the next time you visit Laguna Beach you will be able to experience one of our sunny days so you can watch the sun set over Catalina Island.  Peggy

Summary Heading: One of my favorite hotels, but stay away from the "City View"
Summary: I have stayed at this hotel numerous times throughout the years and have always loved it. The sunsets are breathtaking, they do a great happy hour and the staff is wonderful. For the first time ever, I booked myself in a "city view" room because I was just going in and out really quickly on business. The only down side is that the "city view" room faces PCH and there is a lot of street noise. That said, I cannot recommend their ocean view rooms enough, but I would definitely stay clear of the "city view" room if you can avoid it.
Manager Response: Dear JenHillJHCCS,  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We certainly appreciate your business throughout the year and we are thankful you enjoy our Ocean View rooms.    We appreciate your comments regarding our staff as they truly do care about each guest experience they would like everyone to leave with a positive memory in hopes they will visit again soon.  We certainly look forward to your next visit, please look me up the next time you are in the Hotel as I would love to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: My boyfriend and I have stayed at some marvelous places, but this was our first time with an ocean view and listening to the waves from our room as we fell asleep.  We parked at the lower level when we checked in and had to walk up the sidewalk with our luggage, but then saw there better parking options if we had gone up the hill a little bit.  They have complimentary wine for an hour or so in the evening, sunset viewing from their deck and are an easy walk to some great shops and restaurants.  We had a little trouble with the room service completing our orders correctly, but management handled it above and beyond our expectations.   A great place!
Manager Response: Dear SDNativeLynn  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am sorry we had trouble with your Room Service order but happy to see we corrected.  All comments are a learning experience for us and we will certainly learn from your experience.  Now that you know about all of our parking lots so your return visit should be much smoother, we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: I stayed at the Inn at Laguna Beach for a couple of nights recently while in town for some business meetings.    The location is phenomenal.  Of all the hotels that I've ever stayed at it easily has one of the best locations that I have ever seen.  It is situated next to the expansive public beach at Laguna Beach.  The view from the hotel looks out upon Catalina Island, which also happens to be where the sun was setting while I was there.  The sunsets were picture perfect.  And of course, the town of Laguna Beach is very charming and pretty.  I had a room on the 4th floor with a terrific view of the water and beach.  There was a nice outdoor patio to lounge on and listen to the waves crash.  The room was of a nice size.  The bed was very comfortable and the room was clean.  The
Manager Response: Dear elguapo2011  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We agree with you that we have "phenomenal" location, steps to Main Beach and a few blocks to the Village of Laguna.  Year round our Sunsets are pretty but they seem to be the most spectacular in January, so we are happy you were able to watch them.  Although we do not have a restaurant on property we have a wonderful partnership with the iconic Las Brisas located next to the hotel, so our guest can order room service provided by Las Brisas and delivered to your room.  Maybe the next time you are visiting you will try this amenity.  Thank you again, we hope to welcome you and your group back in the near future.  Peggy

Summary: Our room with a balcony had an incredible view. Very comfy bed, beautiful little room. Perfect for two people. Time we spent in the room was mostly on the balcony with it's comfortable chairs and picture perfect view. The location is ideal. We could walk to most things we wanted to. In a few steps we could be on the beach, or in the center of downtown. The staff was very attentive. They got us a menu from Las Brisas (which is right next door-awesome) when we asked about eating there. No doubt we are going back.
Manager Response: Dear Rebecca K  Thank you for your kind comments after your recent visit to the Hotel, we are happy to hear you will return and we look forward to your next visit.  You touched on two of our greatest attributes our staff and our location.  I am grateful everyday to work with this team as they truly care about each guest experience and creating positive memories.  We believe we have one of the best locations in town as you said steps to the beach and we are within walking distance to over 40 wonderful restaurants.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: A great location but take care to choose a room with a view and a balcony , in advance.  This hotel has been refurbished but the room sizes seem small and the bathroom dated with noisy plumbing, noisy fridge and noise from the slamming doors is all disappointing. The room pictures show the best rooms only.  Arrived for 5 day stay, after being moved from sister hotel where there is building work, was excited until we were shown our room overlooking the busy road it is called a pool level room. Front desk offered us a free upgrade to poolside view, a dark corner room, with a view of the banging entrance door and a partial view of the corner of the pool. They were charming but were unable to offer any other options even if we paid extra. Fair enough they have given us free parking.
Manager Response: Dear Martin Brophy  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  We certainly appreciate all comments as it will help us improve our product and service.  We would have loved to have been able to accommodate you in an Ocean View room; however, since an Ocean view room was not reserved we were not able to offer an upgrade.  The group you were traveling with had a large block of rooms and we did our best to accommodate all guests, placing guest in the ocean view rooms that reserved this room type.  We do have a bar on the Terrace and we have partnered with Las Brisas the iconic restaurant next door to offer Room Service, hopefully you had a chance to enjoy.   The honor bars in the room offer a variety of snacks and drinks, we try to have a little something for everyone.  I am sorry about the WiFi, cox communications is our provider and unfortunately it was going down in the area, we were working with them to try to avoid guest interruption but at times it was out of our control.  Not only do we offer, complimentary wine hour, milk and cookies, and coffee in the lobby, we also have beach chairs and umbrellas, and the WiFI is also complimentary.  Mr. Brophy we certainly enjoyed having your group visit Laguna Beach, we hope you will be back.  Thank you again Peggy

Summary Heading: All the best and cookies too!
Summary: Incredible service and an outstanding facility/location made our four day stay seem all too short.  Additionally they welcomed our chocolate labrador with a cozy bed, bowl [with treat], at no extra charge!
Manager Response: LasFloresStout  Thank you for your kind comments regarding your recent stay - we agree with you about our location we think it is one of the best in Laguna Beach.  I am blessed daily to work with such a great team they truly care about each guest stay.  We want our four legged friends to feel as comfortable as their parents, good to know you all had a nice trip.  Please visit us soon and look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: The great news is, this hotel is in THE BEST location. It is just two blocks outside of the main hub, and right on the water. We had three girlfriends in one room with a king bed and a sofa bed, which worked out very well. The room was nice and clean, nothing out of the ordinary, but comfortable beds, nice shower and comfortable. They have a lovely heated pool and hot tub which we loved. The view from the roof is beautiful and I love that you can literally step out to the door on the boardwalk. I did not think the front desk staff was especially helpful or welcoming. They did what they needed to do, but nothing more. They didn’t ask if we needed any recommendations, or make us feel really welcome in the hotel. The door men were the only staff that greeted us with a smile and
Manager Response: Dear Meg 043  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We take all comments seriously as we want to continue to improve our product and service, please know your comments were a teaching lesson for our staff.  I am delighted you liked the location and the room but obviously concerned about the service as we certainly strive to exceed expectations and clearly we fell short.  The next time you are travelling please reach out to me directly as I would love to make your reservation and ensure you receive the service that I know the staff can provide.  I hope to hear from you in the near future as I look forward to giving you a warm welcome back to Laguna Beach.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: We stayed at the Inn at Laguna Beach for a wedding and it was perfect. The rooms are well appointed, the location is great and the staff was very nice. We liked the breakfast delivery each morning and thought that the overall experience was delightful.
Manager Response: Dear Jetsetclaire  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We are very happy you enjoyed your weekend and we are looking forward to your next visit.  You touched on two of our greatest attributes our staff and our location.  I am blessed daily to work with such a fantastic team and I believe our location is second to none.. We are just steps to Main Beach and a couple of blocks to the Village of Laguna Beach.  We hope you return to our fair city sooner rather than later as we look forward to welcoming you back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: We stayed here one night on our way to La Jolla. We enjoyed it so much that we cut our stay in La Jolla short and returned to Laguna Beach and the Inn for three nights. Brendan at the reception set us up with the perfect room - with a spectaular view of the ocean and Laguna. Brendan made us feel right at home here and provided the best service and hospitality one could wish for! We look forward to returning next year!
Manager Response: Dear Annicka  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach and thank you for cutting your stay in La Jolla short so you could enjoy more of our fair city.  I am lucky everyday to work with Brendan and the rest of the team at The Inn at Laguna Beach.  They truly do care about each guest experience and creating positive memories.  We look forward to your next visit as we cannot wait to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back!  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: Fabulously located relaxing hotel with spectacular views.
Summary: We stayed in the Inn at Laguna for three nights and we would happily have stayed for longer had we not had other plans for Christmas. The hotel is perfectly located within a 5 minute walk of beautiful downtown Laguna Beach and seconds from the beach itself. We had a car but it was unnecessary as we could walk everywhere. We loved everything about this hotel, service was excellent, complimentary wine reception lovely, coffee and cookies very welcome and the location on the side of the cliff is beyond compare. The room was perfect with every possible need catered for.
Manager Response: Dear Morsiemike  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We could not agree with you more that we have the perfect location.  We are steps to Main Beach and a couple of blocks to the Village of Laguna Beach which has over 40 restaurants, shops and art galleries.  In the Summer time we are within walking distance of all of the festivals.  Not only do we have the wine reception, cookies, and coffee, but we also provide complimentary WiFi and beach chairs and umbrellas.  We look forward to your return, please look me up on your next visit so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back!!  Thank you  Peggy

Summary Heading: great location for the town and the beach
Summary: spent just one afternoon/night on our drive from Las Vegas to LA for our flight back home to Europe but immediately fell in love with this little town; the hotel has a(n) (almost) perfect location for a quick dash to the beach - and watching a perfect sunset right afterwards; and it´s only a short walk from the "city center" with plenty of art-galleries, shops and restaurants; the staff is very friendly and helpful; as we were staying for only one night we had rooms facing the street which were small but cozy, perfect for a good nights rest;(the only thing I did not like was a fully stacked "minibar" - instead of an empty refrigerator...); I will certainly come back to Laguna Beach and will definitely consider staying at the "Inn" again; but then probably choose one of the rooms
Manager Response: Dear lupusalpha  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on two of our best attributes our staff and our location.  Our staff truly cares about each guest experience and they do everything possible to create positive memories.  We believe we have the best location in town steps from Main Beach and a couple of blocks to the Village of Laguna.  We look forward to your return, please look me up the next time you are visiting The Inn at Laguna Beach as I would love to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: Thank you Brandon!  Great Customer Service
Summary: I made a reservation on Xmas day for 1 night thru United.com, by mistake the reservation has been cancelled so I called united.com right away and asked for help to correct the mistake. I spent almost two hours on the phone but guess what? united.com DO NOT care... At the last minutes I tried to reach the hotel myself. Brandon was so nice and help me to reinstate my reservation after listening my explatnation, not mention he even gave me the only room left, in just 5 minutes my problem solved...to me that means people here cares the customers and don't make money by screwing the cusotmers like united.
Manager Response: Dear Jasmine L  Thank you for your kind review regarding The Inn at Laguna Beach.  I could not agree with you more that Brendan provides excellent service, I am honored to work not only with him but an entire team of people that car about the guest experience.    Thank you again Peggy

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for his birthday weekend. It was a surprise trip so I asked the hotel if they could do anything special to make it memorable. Normally when I request little things like that I don't expect anything, but Inn at Laguna Beach did such an amazing job at making our weekend excellent! They left cupcakes and a handwritten card in our room, and gave us the room with the best view! I was so impressed and thankful! The staff was very polite and easy to work with. The room was perfect. The only bad thing about this room is that it's at the last floor, and there is a small terrace above the room so you can hear when people move the furniture. Maybe it would help to put the small felt stickers on the bottoms of the furniture? Anyways, the view is phenomenal,
Manager Response: Dear Jessica P  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am honored you choose to spend a special occasion with us, we hope you will not wait for another such occasion as we would like to see you sooner rather than later.  I enjoy arriving at work every day as my team enjoys creating special memories and I love to watch them exceed expectations.    We look forward to your next visit  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: Great Location on Beach to Downtown Laguna
Summary: We have stayed there more than once.  This place has a great location for great views and a short walk to the downtown art galleries and restaurants.  The ocean side boardwalk runs right next to the hotel.  You will hear the surf while you sleep.  When we stayed there, they also had a nice 5pm free wine hour on an upper patio with beautiful views.   We enjoyed chatting with the other guests during  the happy hour. The upper patio has fire pits and patio heaters for cooler weather too.
Manager Response: Dear JohnMencl  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach and welcome back!!!  We certainly appreciate all comments as they help us improve our product and service.  We are happy that you enjoyed our complimentary Wine Hour hopefully you were able to experience our cookies and milk as well.  Thank you again, we hope to see you again in the near future.  Please look me up on your next visit so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Peggy

Summary: Stayed for 3 nights while touring .Excellent hotel ,friendly staff ideal location steps away from the beautiful beach,Heisler park and the many shops and restaurants .Great views from roof top bar especially at night seeing the sun setting over the Pacific .Pool  was small with not many sun loungers, but it  wasn't busy when we were there so it was fine. Bedroom was  small but very comfortable.Complimentary wine in the roof top bar in the evening as well as milk and cookies in the lobby was a nice treat.Would definitely stay here again if  we were  to return to Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Dear Seabird31  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on some of our best attributes our location and our roof top terrace.  We do believe we have one of the best locations in town just steps from Main Beach and a couple of blocks to the Village of Laguna.  Our Terrace has one of the best views in town.  I know coming back to Laguna is quite a trip but please let us know the next time you are in the area so we can extend to you a warm welcome back.  Thank you again Peggy

Summary Heading: Excellent location... but with a few caveats
Summary: I'm not going to gush to the extent of other reviewers but this is a very nice property with an excellent location just steps away from Main Beach, Heisler Park, and the downtown shops and eateries.  The premium price is for the views and location... the rooms are clean, nicely appointed, but not fabulous.  We stayed for 8 days and I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again simply because it was such a great location... but expect to pay a pretty hefty price.  Our balcony room had a lovely location and views but the bathroom pocket door was pretty hard to close (and badly marred) and the shower head suffered a bit of corrosion... nothing horrible but just an indication that some maintenance had been deferred for too long.  Plenty of pillows on the bed and extras in the closet --
Manager Response: Dear NomDePlume00  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We certainly appreciate all comments as they will help us improve our products and service.  I am sorry to see that your wife did not like our pillows and that the Ocean was a bit loud, depending on the high and low tide and the winds and current will depend if the Ocean is louder then one might expect.  This time of year we do not have the Kelp smell as the City is able to keep the beaches clean, the kelp tends to be an issue when it is Grunion season and the City is not able to maintain the beaches.  You touched on one of our best attributes our location, as we are steps away from Main Beach and a couple of blocks from the Village of Laguna with over 40 restaurants and many shops and art galleries.    We do hope you will return to Laguna Beach soon, please look me up as I would like to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: Look no further, the best ever!
Summary: This hotel was the perfect place for all our East Coast relatives who flew in for my son's wedding weekend. It was not just the location on the beach with the beautiful views & the easy walk to the great restaurants, shops & museums of the village, it was also all the amenities (over 20!) that are too numerous to mention in this review but are listed on their website. To name a few, our guests commented on the unique perks provided by the hotel- binoculars, bathrobes, make-up removal wipes, beach towels, evening complimentary wine, cookies & milk, & more, that made them all feel pampered. Several of our guests have never been to California & with the location of the hotel on the beach, the heated pool, the fantastic views, eating breakfast on their balcony overlooking the ocean
Manager Response: Dear Regina S  Thank you so much for your kind review regarding your stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We were honored you choose our hotel for your sons wedding room block, celebrating a wedding with friends and family is delightful but can be stressful so we were happy to help out.  You touched on many of our great attributes but you highlighted the staff, I am truly grateful each day to work with such a fine group of individuals.  They care about every guest encounter and they want to make sure our guest leave with positive memories.  We hope the next time you are in need of a staycation you will return to The Inn, please do not wait to celebrate another special occasion.  I would love to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Peggy

Summary Heading: Will always stay here when visiting Laguna
Summary: Everything about my stay was beyond my expectations. The views are beautiful and who wouldn't love to eat breakfast overlooking the Pacific ocean. I always took my breakfast late, so often I would have the balcony all to myself. What a pleasant start to my day. :) The entire staff was very kind, friendly and accommodating. Will definitely be back and in fact cant wait! A short walk to the heart of Laguna and amazing views to be found cliff side. Just down the hotel walkway towards the far right is a viewing gazebo and the view is breathtaking to say the least. Cant say enough! Loved my stay!
Manager Response: Dear Waterfaire  Thank you so much for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We are so happy you are planning your return as we look forward to welcoming you back.  You touched on a couple of our greatest assets our staff and our location, I am excited each day to come to work and interact with the team.  They truly care about guest service and wanting to create positive memories.  Thank you again, please look me up on your next visit so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Peggy

Summary: Our little family (husband and two fur-children) did Thanksgiving at the Beach for the first time.  Inn at Laguna Beach is a wonderful hotel. Brilliant location - walk to everything. In fact, if you are flying in and don't plan on lots of sightseeing, you don't need to rent a car. Rooms were clean, well appointed. Housekeeping was a little bit of a problem, but we got it sorted without drama. With only one exception (a very unhappy lady) all the staff were welcoming, happy and helpful. Nice little touches like happy hour wine, and cookies and milk daily. The images depicted on their website are accurate. The views are indeed that good:) Thoroughly recommended. We will definitely return
Manager Response: Dear Kate M  Thank you for your comment regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We take all comments seriously as they only help us improve our product and service.  I was happy to read that we were able to "sort out" your housekeeping situation and sorry to read that one of our staff was "unhappy".  Thank you for pointing our nice amenities like wine, milk and cookies, and coffee, we also have beach umbrellas and beach chairs when the weather is right.  We look forward to seeing your family the next time you are visiting Laguna Beach.  Please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: Running Away From Home with Lynda
Summary: My sister in law had a room reservation with a coupon deal.  We arrived a bit early and wanted to see if we could park our car there while we waited until check in time.  The receptionist was great.  She looked to see if a room was ready and ended up upgrading us to a room overlooking the ocean.  What a treat.  The Inn was absolutely wonderful.  Milk and cookies in the evening.  Gorgeous view and close to the boardwalk.  All of the staff were so helpful and welcoming.  We were thrilled with our visit to Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Dear Benthien  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am so thankful we were able to exceed your expectations.  We certainly hope that the next time you run away from home you choose to return to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  I work with a great team that truly cares about each guest experience and clearly they left an impression with you.  We hope to see you soon, please look me up the next time you visit The Inn at Laguna Beach so I can give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: The most amazing place in Laguna!
Summary: I have been staying here for over 15 years and it just keeps getting better all the time! The staff is friendly, helpful and always knows your name. The customer is service is second to none and when you add you are at the prettiest spot in Laguna, there is no better place to stay. Having Las Brisas, handle the room service is also wonderful or just a skip away if you want to sit and have their famous margarita's sunset and oceanside. The Inn at Laguna is a no miss and i can tell you if you go once you will always go back!
Manager Response: Dear Angie B  Thank you so much for your kind comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We are so happy you notice the little changes we make to improve our product and service.  This month we will be installing new hallway carpet giving the public spaces a little refresh.  Thank you again, we look forward to your next visit and giving you a big Laguna Beach welcome back.  Peggy

Summary: Glad I finally stayed here.  Growing up in OC, I never stayed but upon our return decided to spend one night at the beach for R&R.  The staff are very helpful and friendly and the location at the beach is perfect.  Falling asleep to the sound of the ocean can't be beat. We will definitely book again the next time we visit family in OC.
Manager Response: Dear Robert D  Thank you very much for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach, we would love to make this your OC home.  I am honored to work with a great group of individuals who truly care about guest service, they want to make sure each guest experience is memorable.  We certainly cannot take credit for the beautiful Pacific Ocean but we do reap the benefits of being steps from the beach.  Thank you again, we hope to welcome you back the next time you are visiting the OC.  Peggy

Summary: This is a very nice hotel, the staff was great. We had a getaway night here from San Diego, and it was right on the beach. Our room was near the exit door to the pool so it was a little noisy, but we got it for half price with a coupon so that's cool. Great views, and a coast walk right outside the pool. It was also next to Las Brisas resraurant and the Museum.
Manager Response: Dear John G  Thank you for your kind comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We certainly appreciate your comments and you choosing our hotel for a quick get-a-way.  You touched on two of our greatest assets our people, and our location.  I am truly excited each to come to work and be surrounded by the team.  Thank you so much, hopefully the next time you choose to leave San Diego for the night you will return to The Inn at Laguna Beach, please look me up as I would love to give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: It's a Walk on the Beach
Summary: Literally….you can walk outside your room in bare feet to walk on the beach. Doesn't get any better than this. You are also walking distance from the art galleries and downtown shopping and restaurants.  The Art Museum is a block away with an amazing restaurant overlooking the ocean. Definitely ask for an oceanfront room. It is only three floors so you get the small feel in a gorgeous location.  And dog friendly!!!
Manager Response: Dear Skatz21  Thank you for your kind review regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on one of our greatest assets our location, as you said "steps to the beach" and just  a couple of blocks to the Village of Laguna Beach.  Thank you again for your kind comments we hope to see you soon visiting the West Coast and particularly Laguna Beach.  Peggy

Summary: Loved staying here. It's nearby downtown shopping and eating area of Laguna Beach and Main Beach so it's walking distance to everything. Friendly staff, clean room, and comfortable bed! Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear Diana F  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We are happy you enjoyed your stay and we appreciate your comments regarding our friendly staff.  I truly am blessed everyday to work with such a great team of people, they really do care about each guest experience.  Thank you again and we hope to see you soon!!!!!  Peggy

Summary: You can't be more on the beach than this location. Definitely worth the extra $$ for an oceanfront room. Very convenient location as well, short and easy walk to the central "downtown" via the beach promenade that runs along the ocean side of he hotel. Very restful, peaceful experience, dozing off to the soft sound of waves on the beach below.  Also right next door to Las Brisas, one of the best restaurants in Laguna, the Laguna Art Museum, and lovely Heisler Park, which snakes along the bluffs above the Pacific. This hotel has been refurbished and upgraded from it's former self, and they did a very nice job. Tastefully decorated, clean, and comfortable. Laguna is very hectic in the peak summer months. Go there any other time of the year and it can be just as beautiful and much
Manager Response: Dear Meg G  Thank you for your kind comments regarding your recent stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on one of our greatest assets our location.  As you stated we are steps to the Beach and within a couple blocks of the Village in Laguna. We believe once you are here there is no need to get back in a car.  Thank you again, please look me up the next time you visit The Inn as we would love to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Peggy

Summary: We stayed here one night in October.  Family and friends also stayed. Enjoyed the pool, the view, the room and the location. The staff was friendly and very helpful. We would recommend staying here to my friends.
Manager Response: Dear Leeard  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  The next time you visit please stay longer than one night as you will be able to experience more of the great things our City has to offer.  Thank you for recommending our hotel to your friends and family we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the very near future.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: My new husband and I are so grateful to have worked with the Inn at Laguna Beach to make our wedding weekend magical! With all the moving parts and people, we know we couldn't have pulled off a flawless weekend without the help of the wonderful Inn team.  We're so grateful for the Inn's help welcoming our guests to California, complete with gorgeous accommodations, a wonderful staff, and "the best wedding brunch ever" according to our guest list. The Inn team also helped coordinate wedding transportation to our venue nearby, as well as after party details at a local bar.  On top of all that, the hotel is gorgeous, the views are unbeatable (especially from the Sunset suite!), and there's a wine reception each evening on the rooftop patio. And, don't forget to grab some free milk
Manager Response: Dear rarudwall  Congratulations on your wedding and thank you for your kind comments regarding the Inn at Laguna Beach.  We are honored you choose our hotel to host such a special weekend for you and your guests.  I am blessed everyday to work with such a great team of people who truly care about each guest experience.    Being a short drive form LA, we hope to see you prior to your anniversary but if you must wait we will make it special.  Once again Congratulations and we look forward to your return.  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in the heart of Laguna
Summary: My daughter and I had a great stay at the Inn this past weekend.  The service was top notch.  The view from the Terrace was fabulous.  Laguna Beach is a great little town.  I have nothing to positive things to say. Our room did not overlook the water but that seem to matter as the roof terrace was right around the corner from  our room.  The area of the beach where it is located is has breathtaking views.  I loved the small Inn feel of the place.   The weather that weekend was spectacular!
Manager Response: Dear Anne 06824  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach. I am happy to read you and your daughter had a great stay.  Those of us who work and/or live in Laguna Beach are very lucky, we call this part of the world our weather bubble.  It is hard for us to imagine a bad weather day.  We hope you and your daughter return to The Inn soon as we would love to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back!!  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Laguna Beach is a charming town.  The Inn at Laguna Beach is located adjacent to Main Beach, so a nice, short walk to shops and restaurants.  I had the pleasure of an ocean view room and the view was beautiful!  My room was cozy, but not cramped.  Unfortunately, my room was very noisy from street traffic.  I had to turn the fan on the A/C to "on" overnight to mask the noise.  Staff was friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Biltmore Girl  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We agree with you that we have a "great beach location" as you said steps to Main Beach and a short walk to the Village.  We are sorry that the noise from Pacific Coast Highway was disturbing, like so many ocean front Hotels we are situated between Pacific Coast Highway and the Pacific Ocean.  We certainly hope this does not prevent you from returning to The Inn at Laguna Beach as we would love to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back!!  Thank you again Peggy

Summary: Hotel is perfectly located in Laguna.  In walking distance to shopping and restaurants.   Nicely appointed rooms, comfortable, clean and QUIET!  Love the daily cocktail reception on the terrace. The staff is friendly and very helpful.  And most importantly, what a great beach location.  Try an ocean view room, gorgeous!  You will definitely want to come back again whether on business or pleasure.  You get what you pay for and more!
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer S  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on many of our greatest assets from the staff to the location.  I am truly blessed everyday to work with such a great group of people and it certainly does not hurt that everyday I see stunning views of the Pacific Ocean.  We look forward to your next visit to The Inn!!!  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Location, location, location. The Inn was perfectly located on a bluff above one of the most picturesque beach towns I have visited in California. I loved being able to walk steps to the beach, grab an espresso at Starbucks across the street and only 2 blocks from incredible breakfast sandwiches at Whole Foods. Rooms and lobby were clean, everyone was friendly and I really enjoyed the outdoor lounge upstairs with it's awesome views.
Manager Response: Dear Michel M  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We agree with you that we have a perfect location, steps to Main Beach and a couple of blocks to the Village of Laguna.   We certainly hope you will return soon to California's Gold Coast and The Inn at Laguna Beach!!  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Great Hotel!!! Rooms are very nice and comfortable. Nice happy hour on the rooftop. Wonderful salt water pool and easy beach access. Can not wait to go back!!!!! Thank you for a wonderful experience. Walking distance to great shops and dining!
Manager Response: Dear Dawn G  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on many of our great amenities, some others we have our complimentary WiFi, cookies and milk in the evening, and Beach Chairs and Umbrellas.  We are excited you are looking forward to your next trip, please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: This review is an update from my previous reviews which was all prior to staying at the hotel for our wedding.   We didn't have any issues during our stay, except being the HOTTEST weekend in laguna beach.  I had the wedding coordinator make nail salon reservations for us down the street, which was nice, but they didnt have AC.  The coordinator was very nice to have 2 bottles of champagne for us when we arrived (6 girls).  On Friday, when we got back from a day hanging around town, there was another bottle of champagne left in our room.  We really like our room but of course it was the most expensive one.  Other rooms were okay - depending on what floor you were on.  I give 4 stars due to the wedding coordinator and the staff onsite,but 3 stars as the overall experience.  the
Manager Response: Dear Jessica W  Thank you for your updated review.  You touched on one of our greatest assets our staff, I am so happy that they made your wedding weekend one to remember.  We hope your next visit to Laguna is just as memorable and the weather will not be unseasonably warm.  Thank you again for your update Peggy

Summary: Just LOVE this place….it was a welcome retreat for my adult daughter and myself.  Great staff, wine reception nightly, a salt water WARM pool ….steps away from the beach..tidal pools, too!  AND dog friendly…little guy could go to any part of the hotel, except, in the pool…It was the most realizing 3 days I have had in YEARS….
Manager Response: Dear Carol K  Thank you for your kind comments regarding your recent visit with your daughter and your dog.  You touched on so many of our great attributes starting with our staff as they truly care about each guest stay.  They strive to create positive memories so I am happy to read in your case it was a success.  Along with our complimentary wine hour we also offer, cookies and milk in the evening, coffee and tea in the morning, as well as beach chairs, umbrellas and WiFi.  We look forward to seeing you again, please look me up so I can extend a warm Laguna Beach welcome back!!!  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: The Best Beach Hotel on the Beach in Laguna
Summary: We stayed 2 nights at a very attractive promotion price, which meant we had a street/highway side room location, and not an ocean view. So the $35 per night parking fee was "OK". But on a happy note, the 5 to 6 PM complimentary wine "happy hour" on the spectacular ocean view patio was very nice, and surprisingly good quality wines were served. The beach promenade to the north has lovely gardens, while the beach walk to the south is just great beach. We had dinner at "Las Brisas" next door, and we were "underwhelmed". Lunch at "the Dock on the Beach" was casual oceanfront drinks and appies at its best. Laguna Beach stores ans shops are closeby, and there are all kinds of shopping and dining options. We most cerainly will visit and stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear 8Peter  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on many of our great attributes our location; as well as, our complimentary offerings like Wine Hour.  Based on our location we recommend not renting a car as you can avoid the overnight parking fee and as you stated many places are within walking distance.  We look forward to seeing you again, please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back!!  Thank you Peggy

Summary: We love this hotel from all aspects of view except the Continental breakfast which really still (we have been staying here 2 Times before) could be improved by just taking some real bread instead of sweet muffins. Maybe next time when we come??
Manager Response: Dear Lady Red Orlando  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We appreciate all comments both positive and negative as we constantly strive to meet guests needs.  We believe are baked goods are some of the best in town but if they are not for you please let us know and we will do everything within our power to accommodate your needs.  Thank you again, we hope to see you soon!! Peggy

Summary: My husband and I recently spent two wonderful nights at the Inn at Laguna Beach. I have to admit, when we first walked into our standard king room that we had reserved we were disappointed in the location and small size of the room. It was located adjacent to the parking lot and facing the main street.  As there were no other rooms available, we settled in. In the end, we were very pleased with the room - it was tastefully decorated and spotless. In fact, it appeared as if everything in it was brand new. The bed was very comfortable, and the bathroom area more than adequate. We were never bothered by any noise from the road or the rooms next to us. And although there was no view we did not seem to miss it. The common areas also seemed to be freshly decorated and were very well
Manager Response: Dear Nan1210  Thank you for your kind remarks regarding your recent visit to the hotel.  We could not agree with you more about our location as we believe it is one of the best in town.  As you stated we are steps to Main Beach, Heisler runs behind the hotel and we are a couple of blocks to the Village.  Once you arrive there is no need to get back in your car.  We are pleased you enjoyed your accommodations as we renovated the entire property in 2012 giving it a more residential feel.  This year we will add new carpet in the public areas as we continuously strive for improvement.  We hope you and your husband return to Laguna Beach and The Inn as we would love to give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: What a wonderful hotel at the Main Beach in Laguna Beach. Easy walk to restaurants like Nick's and Las Brisas and downtown shopping. Beautiful views. Our room had a view of the Main Beach, the coastline and the ocean. What more can you ask for. The hotel staff is nice and accomodating. The hotel has two underground parking facilities with elevator access to the reception and room areas. All rooms are non-smoking. The hotel also has an outdoor pool. Guest rooms come with beach chairs and umbrellas , free WiFi and cofee making equipment. Right out back is a public walkway to Heisler Park and more beach access sites. Prices are on the higher side but for the location and ambience what the heck.
Manager Response: Dear Hans W  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on a couple of our greatest assets our location and the staff.  We are steps to Main Beach and a couple of blocks to the Village of Laguna which has over 40 great restaurants and many specialty shops and galleries.  We look forward to your next visit to Laguna Beach!!!  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: Great location, most rooms nice, staff great
Summary: This hotel is all about location and has some great rooms and services. It is advertised as a luxury boutique hotel however a couple of the 'pool side' rooms we initially reserved felt like a motel room remodeled with new carpet and linens. But the room was small and the walls were thin. We could hear the neighbors in the next room talking. We were traveling with a baby and did not want to disturb our neighbors nor be disturbed ourselves. We addressed our concerns with  Annette at the front desk and she switched rooms for us. We upgraded to a fantastic ocean view (off peak time so room was available) on the 4th floor. The hotel had a lovely wine mixer on the view terrace. For the money it's all about location right on the beach and right downtown. The view rooms are wonderful.
Manager Response: Dear Lbiniasz  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am so happy that Annette was able to assist you with your room needs as she and the rest of the team truly care about each guest experience.  Between our staff and our location you touched on two of our greatest assets.  We hope to see you back at The Inn soon as we would love to give you a warm welcome back!!!  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: Rooms in need of an upgrade
Summary: A magnificent location and friendly, attentive staff can't make up for asking $600/night for a room with uneven floors, worn carpet, noisy air conditioning, a very ordinary bathroom, and a tiny pool. At that price there are other options down the coast.
Manager Response: Dear Mark L  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am happy to see you liked the location and very happy that the staff was attentive as they truly care about each guest experience.    I am sorry you did not like the rooms, we completed a multi-million dollar renovation in 2012 where we gutted the bathrooms and started from scratch.  Sorry they were not up to your standard.  As for our AC's we replace about 10 per year as each room has its own unit.  We are fortunate that we have both AC units and ceiling fans as many hotels in Laguna do not.  Thank you again for your comments, we hope you visit Laguna again, and if you choose to stay with us please let me know as I would love to welcome you back to Laguna Beach.  Peggy

Summary: Small Hotel on the beach, perfect for a few days, mostly ocean views and balcony. Balcony not private all glass enclosed... just in case you like to be on terrace in pjs... or less for that matter. Nice staff and very accommodating. We stayed in the area for several days and would go back and would recommend.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Wouldnt stay anywhere else in this area
Summary: Couldnt ask for any better hotel. Location perfect with the beach outside the back door.  Incredible ocean views.  Clean, updated rooms.  Free coffee in the morning, free cookies in the evening. Fantastic
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Loved The Inn at Laguna Beach!
Summary: Stayed 2 nights at the Inn at Laguna 10/8-10/10 with my husband while in the OC to visit friends and check out Orange County. Can't say a bad thing about  the hotel (or Orange County for that matter).  Our room (#107) was so nice and relaxing with beautiful direct ocean views and a large oversized private patio. You could hear the relaxing sounds of the waves crashing even with the glass doors closed. In fact, the first night we did not go out to dinner at all because we wanted to enjoy the room and the ocean views, which is pretty unlike us.  The bed was super comfortable with good pillows and seemed like it was recently remodeled.  The hotel is walking distance to much of Laguna Beach town, Main Beach, Hiesler Park and there is a Starbucks right across the street.   Went out
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at the Inn for 2 nights in September based on several recommendations and it did not disappoint! Gorgeous views, immaculate room, & within walking distance of tons of shops and restaurants. We were upgraded upon check-in to a room with a view which was a wonderful treat, and we utilized the free chairs and spent an entire day staring at the beautiful scenery. One of my most favorite places we visited - I cannot say enough good things about Laguna Beach or this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear NCMich711  Thank you for your positive comments regarding your September visit.  You touched on many of our best attributes highlighting our location on our staff.  We are a couple of blocks from the Village of Laguna and steps to Main Beach, whether you are her to relax by the beach and/or pool, or do a little shopping it can all be achieved.  Thank you again for your kind comments we are looking forward to your return.  Peggy

Summary: I've stayed at the Inn at Laguna Beach a few times, but my recent stay was the best. Annette was friendly and amazingly accommodating. Our room had an amazing ocean view with a spacious balcony. As luck would have it there was a lunar eclipse and this was quite a sight.  I highly recommend the Inn at Laguna Beach, it's clean, well-maintained and the staff is wonderful. Other perks: it's close to the village, but quiet. The waves will put you to sleep, and check out the lobby for coffee, tea, and afternoon cookies.
Manager Response: Dear Amy R  Thank you for your positive comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  I could not agree with you more that Annette is amazing we are truly blessed she is part of our team.  We believe we have one of the best locations in town, once you are here there is no need to get in a car, as you can walk to the Village and we are just steps to Main Beach.  The lunar eclipse was spectacular it is not often that our Marine Layer does not interfere with such a sight.  You were able to experience something that does not happen very often.  Thank you again, please look me up on your next visit as I would like to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel, amazing room and right on the beach!
Summary: This hotel was lovely. Everything from the location to the rooms to the service. On checking in, our room wasn't ready but the reception stored our luggage and gave us some great recommendations for lunch. We had a great lunch in Nicks on the main high street then came back to get some beach towels. The hotel offer complimentary chairs, towels and umbrellas and you are just steps from the gorgeous sandy beach. When we came back to the hotel our room was ready and our luggage had been put into our room! The room was huge with a great big bed, sofa, large bathroom and sink area plus tv. There is free wifi in the hotel and also a small pool and jacuzzi. The hotel offer complimentary wine and nibbles from 5-6pm on the roof for sunset which I thought was a lovely touch. Laguna was
Manager Response: Dear Charlotte H  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We are also sorry that you did not stay longer but we look forward to your return.  You touched on a few of our great assets, highlighting the service and the location.  We believe we have one of the best locations in Laguna Beach, between Main Beach and the iconic Las Brisas.  Our team truly cares about exceeding expectations as they want to make sure everyone leaves with a positive memory.  Thank you so much please return soon as we would love to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back!  Peggy

Summary: The most beautiful of hotel rooms with the most stunning room.  Demi catered to all our needs and more- total luxury and relaxation.  cannot recommend highly enough- go go go go!  P.S Request a room overlooking the beach!
Manager Response: Dear Libby K  Thank you for your comments regarding your September visit.  I am happy to read that Deme was able to take care of all of your needs. I am grateful everyday to work with Deme and the rest of the team at The Inn at Laguna Beach as they truly care about each guest experience.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Inn.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: We stayed at the inn for one night and I can honestly say it was fantastic . The staff are polite friendly and helpful. They treat you with great respect . They have wine tasting in the afternoon cookies early evening and tea and coffee in the morning all complimentary . They provide umbrellas chairs and beach towels for you . The rooms are spotless and comfortable also well thought out .  All restaurants are within walking distance also Whole Foods is 2 mins away and many great bars . Would recommend this to families and couples alike its a really nice place
Manager Response: none

Summary: We just returned from our small destination wedding in Laguna Beach. We had a total of 7 rooms blocked for our guest and everything was great. We stayed in one of their suites for a week, it was very private with a great balcony. Some of our guest stayed in ocean front balcony rooms, while others were in nonview village rooms....everyone was pleased with their room choices. The Inn is in the best location in Laguna Beach, an easy walk anywhere you want to go. Making wedding plans sight unseen can be a very frustrating thing. Hats off  to Gary Bolotin and Lindsy Walker for all their help. I feel like they were friends that were there to help make everything go smoothly. We can't wait to return and are already making plans for a birthday celebration in February.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The good, the bad & the ugly
Summary: The Inn is in a perfect beach location just as the cliffs rise at the northern end of the beach. It is sandwiched between the Pacific Coast Highway and the ocean, elevated by about 20 meters above the new lifeguard station. It is a perfect location because unlike most of the other hotels it is only a few minutes walk from the centre of town, so no car needed to get to Wholefoods or bars or the Cali-boho boutiques.  Because it’s an Inn rather than an hotel you immediately feel part of the family and they play really well to this role. This is our second week-long stay here and as soon as we arrived we remembered why we like it so much.  Last time we slept with the balcony doors open listening to the waves and so that my 5 yr old daughter could wake up in the morning and begin her
Manager Response: Dear ChrisRadford-J  Thank you for your comments regarding your visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  I was particularly happy to read that there was no "ugly" for your stay.  I am also happy to see that Deme was able to take care of you so you and your family had a nice time.  I am very fortunate to work with a great group of people who truly care about each guest experience.  I could not agree with you more that Zinc is a great place, we are also looking forward to the arrival of Urth Café which will be located one block from the hotel.  I would also like to inform you that we have been replacing AC units about 10 a year for the last few years and next week we will be replacing another 10, we hope tis will reduce the noise.  Thank you so much for staying with us, we look forward to your next visit.  Peggy

Summary: This  hotel has the best location in Laguna Beach. My wife and I had a reservation at a hotel in a different area of Laguna Beach. My wife was very disappointed. It was on a very  noisy city street. It had a very small view and you have to walk across this street to go to the beach. The room was small and old. So we found this hotel the Inn at Laguna Beach. It was also on the same city street. We decided to check and see the rooms. We looked at a room on the street to check to see if it was noisy. With the window closed it was alright. We told the person at the front desk that we would rent the room. I mentioned to the front desk person that it was my wifes birthday. That person upgraded us to a ocean view with the same rate without me asking for a ocean view.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This boutique upscale hotel is located in the heart of Laguna Beach, on a hill above the tide pools. They lend beach chairs, umbrella's and boogie boards to use at the beach. Although hotel is older it's been nicely updated and the rooms that open up to the pool are wonderful and ocean view rooms are amazing.  Bedding is nice, flat screen TV's and bathrobes in the room. Room service from the adjacent restaurant is great.  On the pricey side but if you want to hear the ocean waves when you sleep it's worth it.
Manager Response: Dear Patti E  Thank you for your kind comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You certainly touched on one of our greatest attributes our location.  Steps from Main Beach and a couple of blocks from the Village of Laguna.  We are pleased you and your family had a nice stay and we certainly hope to see you in the near future.  Please look me up on your return so I can give you warm welcome.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: AMAZING experience all around. Gorgeous ocean and bluff views from the rooms and lobby!  I've stayed at this hotel twice now for the Laguna Art Walk. The rooms are very clean and contemporary and the beach location is unparalleled.  The service and staff is incredible. Jon helped me with every detail of my stay.  Please check out the rooftop patio for an incredible view and relaxing experience!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Best place to stay in Laguna!
Summary: I couldn't recommend this hotel more, we had such a great time and were blown away by the quality and location. The location was simply jaw dropping... You feel so close to the ocean and surf its as if you've just opened the doors to a private beach from your balcony. The rooms are roomy, charming and spotless. The beds were incredible and the staff very friendly. We visited the terrace and found a sunset Art Walk event with a great two piece country band playing for the guests. We'll be headed back here as soon as we can!
Manager Response: none

Summary: You can't beat the location overlooking the main Laguna Beach. Just go down the stairs, make a left and you are in the bustle of the beach, go right and you have a quiet stretch of beach. The pool here is good for families, but has no drink service. Best thing is the 5pm happy hour on the roof deck with free wine. Can't be beat. Rooms are spacious and clean too.
Manager Response: Dear SF_Scott  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You certainly touched on one of our best attributes are location, as you stated we are steps to Main Beach, we are also just a couple of blocks from the Village of Laguna which has over 40 great restaurants and plenty of retail.  Thank you again for your comments we hope to see you again in the near future.  Peggy

Summary: A little piece of heaven overlooking the incredibly beautiful ocean and beaches. Perched up on the coastal bluff there are lovely manicured garden walkways where you can watch the waves roll in or just steps away from the beach where you can set up your chair and umbrella and go into a blissful vacation trance. The hotel is intimate, charming, sparkling clean, and perfectly designed and decorated in relaxed in classy understated light earth tones, textures, and furnishings. Comfortable as could be, great beds, and walk-in showers. Free Wi-Fi is awesome so I could stay connected yet detached in this Pacific paradise. Walk down the steps and along the boardwalk and you are in the heart of Laguna Beach with a bunch of great restaurants. The staff is wonderful and always cheery and
Manager Response: none

Summary: We recently stayed at this beautiful hotel while holidaying in LA from England. A special thank you and mention to Peggy who went that extra mile to make our stay fantastic, she was lovely and a real credit to the hotel.  We have 5 children age range from 7 to 18, they all had a superb time, as did we.  The kids loved the cookies and milk in the lobby in the evening, we loved the wine tasting on the roof top! The rooms were very comfortable, clean and very well equipped.  The pool was great and well maintained, we particularly loved the pool shower, what a lovely idea!  The staff were all attentive and very helpful.  We couldn't fault them at all.  The views are magnificent and we loved listening to the ocean and going for walks on the lovely footpath alongside the coast. The
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: This California Native's Favorite Stay on the Beach
Summary: I've stayed at many Laguna Beach ocean front hotels, and the Inn at Laguna remains my favorite.  Soft thick down pillows, crisp linens, refrigerator, in room safe, coffee maker, robes, updated rooms, beach towels and chairs, breakfast room service,  welcome wine reception, complimentary newspaper and complimentary Wi-Fi and a/c (a lot of beach hotels do not have a/c, so this is a major plus). There's an awesome roof top lounge area with fantastic views.  There is a $27.00 a day parking fee, but no other hidden fees. It's a boutique hotel with a lot of charm and it's on the water. The hotel is located right at the Main beach, so you are close walking to the shops and restaurants.There are other hotels in town that are cheaper and nice, but if you want to be on the water, than
Manager Response: Dear Janie C  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am happy to see that we are your favorite place to stay.  Thank you for pointing out many of our positive attributes, I am fortunate to work with a great team in wonderful surroundings.  Thank you again, the next time you are here to celebrate please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back!  Peggy

Summary: Drove up the driveway, and it was blocked by a service van.  The bellman at the front door told us it would just be easier if we backed out and parked ourselves.  Well, he didn't mention parking is 3 levels down, and we would be schlepping our luggage and ourselves to the front desk.  Arrived on a Monday...and were told there is no on site restaurant til the weekend.  Booked a nice suite, but the lack of services was disappointing.  Yes, you are close to other restaurants but it's not a quick easy walk.  For $700 a night, I expect on site full service, sorry!  Yes, they are on the beach, but the beach is full of sea weed and no service available for food and drink on the beach.  For the money, there are better choices. Also, we had a nice view, but people walk by your room and
Manager Response: Dear Wrdloyne  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am terribly sorry to read that our Bellman were not helpful as this is not typical of the high standards we strive to maintain at The Inn.  We agree that if you are looking for the full resort experience we may not be the property for you.  We have partnered with Las Brisas, the iconic restaurant next door to provide room service as we do not have a kitchen on property.  We are within walking distance to over 40 restaurants and Laguna has some great places to eat.  I am sorry about your stay I certainly hope it will not deter you from returning to Laguna Beach as our town has many great things to offer to travelers.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Hotel in a great location within walking distance to restaurants.Front desk staff were also very helpful. We had 2 rooms which were both well appointed....ours was a balcony sea view which had a stunning view and the kids had village room which view was completely the opposite...the car park.Also the door to the room was external to the hotel which is not ideal for kids.We enjoyed our stay here but with both rooms in total over $1200 per night I wouldn't say it was great value.Also at  that price band I would expect there to be some sort of drinks service around the pool which there wasn't.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good location in Laguna Beach, California
Summary: The hotel is located in a perfect location near the beach, and walking distance to shops and restaurants.  There are several types of rooms, but recommend ocean view, which is not cheap but worth the cost.  The rooms are small but comfortable, and wifi is free (and fast) , and coffee (Starbuck) is free.  There is no onsite restaurant, but you can walk anywhere.  Free coffee in AM, and wine in the evening with fresh cookies add a nice touch. Free paper each morning.  No gym, but you run or walk on the nice path near the hotel or beach.  Tea is provided in our room each night.  The pool is small but heated and comfortable.  Parking charge is additional, but you won't need to use your car because you can walk easily to most locations.  Overall, have stayed at Ritz and other
Manager Response: Dear gsahagun  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We cannot agree with you more that our location is perfect, as you said steps from the beach and within waling distance to the Village of Laguna which has over 40 great restaurants and shops,  As you said there is no need to get in your car.  Although we do not have a restaurant we have partnered with Las Brisas so we are able to provide in-room dining.  Thank you for pointing out some of our amenities complimentary WiFi, Wine Hour, and Cookies and Milk.  Thank you again for your comments and thank you for staying with us, we certainly hope you return to The Inn on your next visit to Laguna Beach.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: It's our first time at this hotel and we were happy to be able to make last minute reservations specially on a holiday weekend. We are here for the Labor Day weekend and It's also a getaway to celebrate my husband's upcoming birthday.  We love the location on the beach and walking distance to restaurants and shops. Our room is clean, and the staff is friendly and helped us when we needed restaurant recommendations.  I love the view of the ocean from the rooftop. Our room has the view of PCH. They have complimentary wine at 5:00pm and milk and cookies later in the evening.  The only negative so far is that there is an awful odor coming from the sink near the bathroom. We informed front desk and they had someone come and fix it. However, we can still smell that foul odor. We have
Manager Response: Dear Cheyenne P  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We take all comments both positive and negative seriously as we learn from them both.  With your comments we can improve our products and service.  You touched on a couple of our greatest assets our people and our location.  Being Steps from Main Beach and within walking distance to over 40 restaurants and galleries there is no need to get in a car.  The staff truly wants to make sure every guest has a positive experience, I am fortunate to work with a great team. Summary Heading: Best Anniversary Ever Looking forward to another trip
Summary: Our family has visited Laguna for many, many, years but this was our first stay at the Inn At Laguna Beach. It is a wonderful hotel with an incredible staff. Really and truly! When we arrived William, the front desk manager, had a bottle of champagne on ice waiting in our room. Before we walked to our restaurant we joined the other guests at the top floor patio for complementary wine and cheese and a breathtaking sun set. It was a little after 11:00 p.m. and our daughter's car was parked several blocks away, our bell men walked her to her car and back. We didn't ask him. He just did it. Wonderful hotel, incredible staff, really and truly. Can't beat the view either. Joseph M
Manager Response: Dear Joseph M  Happy belated Anniversary and thank you for sharing such a momentous occasion with us, we truly appreciate it.  We know you have many choices while traveling so when you choose to stay with us on a special date we are truly honored.  You touched on one of our greatest assets our people.  Along with William the entire team wants to make sure they create positive memories, I am blessed daily to work with a great team.  We do hope to see you again soon hopefully it will be before your next anniversary, please look me up the next time you are in town so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary: We had a family reunion and this was the perfect place to stay.  The staff was excellent, the rooms were very clean and comfortable and the grounds were well taken care of.  The concierge was a huge help with the events we had planned.  I would definitely come back again.
Manager Response: Dear NorCalGirl14  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We are very happy you enjoyed your family reunion and I am happy to see we were able to help with recommendations.  You touched on one of our greatest assets our staff, I love coming to work everyday and be surrounded by a great group of people.  The team truly cares about each guest experience and they want to make sure everyone leaves with positive memories.    We hope you will not wait until your next family reunion to visit, hopefully we will see you again soon.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: This Inn is located right on the beach with a picture perfect view of the Pacific Ocean.  Walk out the back of the lobby and you find yourself on the publick walkway/boardwalk along the beach.  The Inn has a small lobby with a small seating area where is is convenient to meet other people in your party.  The Inn has rooms that are both interior access through corridors and a few rooms that are exterior access.   The rooms themselves were very nicely decorated and comfortable.  The staff was very helpful in making suggestions for dining in the area with a large group.  There is garage self parking underground.  Everything was in walking distance for us and there are free trolleys that run through the area.  While this is not directly a comment on the hotel itself, it is something
Manager Response: Dear Vickier1  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach, we take all comments positive and negative seriously as it helps us improve our products and service.  I am sorry to read that guest were smoking on the walkway as we are 100% non-smoking and there is a $250 cleaning fee for smoking unfortunately this does not deter everyone.  Please accept my sincerest apologies.   We could not agree with you more that our location is perfect a few blocks to the Village of Laguna with over 40 restaurants, shops and art galleries as well as steps to Main Beach.  We hope you return soon and we can accommodate your request for the balcony, I would also love to personally welcome you back to the hotel.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: We arrived here late after a long drive from Santa Barbra. We were greeted by Brendan at reception who was aware that we were on honeymoon. The treatment and attention we received from Brendan was superb. It was a great start to our stay, thank you Brendan. We stayed in a room overlooking the beach. The room itself was modern, bright, spacious and contained all the mod cons. We had a balcony with fantastic views, great for breakfast and lunch. You are right on the beach so didn't spend any time at the pool. Any staff we dealt with were courteous and professional.
Manager Response: Dear SROON  Congratulations on your recent nuptials,  we sincerely appreciate you spending part of your Honeymoon with us, it is quite an honor.  I am blessed daily to work with Brendan and the rest of the team as they truly care about every guest experience.  Besides our staff you touched on another of our great attributes our location, we sit atop of a bluff overlooking the Pacific Ocean and Main Beach.  Please do not wait for the next momentous occasion to visit please come back sooner and look me up so I can give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you and Congratulations Peggy

Summary Heading: Inn at Laguna Beach Consistently Excels
Summary: We have been coming to the Inn for years and always find our time there wonderful! The staff have achieved a unique balance of friendly warmth and amazing professionalism without ever seeming stuffy. Annette and the front desk staff go out of their way to accommodate every need. The rooms are cottage chic, the views unsurpassed and the location is amazing. This is a Laguna Gem.
Manager Response: Dear Geriweinberger  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  Everyday I enjoy working with Annette and the rest of the team they truly care about every guest experience.  We strive to continue to get better so I am happy that with each stay you are noticing the improvements.  Thank you so much for your comments please look me up on your next visit so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary: We just spent a week at the Inn At Laguna Beach. We booked 3 Ocean front rooms. When i first called to make our reservations i spoke to Jonathan Go. He was more than helpful. We were taking  my 87 year old mother with us, so travel can sometimes be difficult. BEFORE we got here, Lindsey called me to ask if I needed help planning and booking restaurants, activities, etc. When we arrived the customer service just continued to be excellent. Drew met us in the lobby, helped us with our many bags (3 daughters in their 20's, so you can imagine how many bags) and was just so pleasant. He continued to take care of us for the rest of the vacation. I have to say everyone who works there aims to please. The view of the beach was just gorgeous. The location is excellent. it is within
Manager Response: Dear Harry A  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  Jonathan, Lindsy, and Drew are just a few of the superstars I work with daily.  I am truly lucky to work with a group of people that care about every guest stay and I am so happy that you experienced the level of service that we all expect at The Inn.  You also touched on our location, we do consider it one of the best in town, as you stated we are within walking distance to the Village of Laguna and steps to the beach.  I am truly thankful we were able to make your travel and stay a success with your mom.  We hope to see you the next time you are visiting California's Gold Coast.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary: This hotel had some of the most helpful and friendly staff we came across. The room was clean, large and comfortable. Tea and coffee was available in the room and lots of clean towels. There were only two down sides to this hotel, the first that does not do breakfast and the second is the daily parking rate of 29 Dollars which is very expensive. There was free wine and nibbles from 5 till 6 each day. However you may have you view and peace spoilt by corporate events which we did. I would recommend this hotel and resort if you can cope with the manic traffic that you have to put up with to get there. I would not go there again because of this.
Manager Response: Dear Jstuy  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on one of our greatest assets, the staff.  I am blessed everyday to work with such a caring group of individuals, they truly want to make every stay a positive one and have everyone leave with positive memories.  We do offer breakfast through In Room dining for a small fee, when you return please look for our bed and breakfast package which includes continental breakfast each morning.  As you pointed out the traffic and the parking fee may I recommend the next time you are in the area to take a cab from the Airport this way you do not have to worry about driving in the traffic nor pay the overnight parking charges.  We are within walking distance to the Festivals, restaurants, many retail shops and art galleries, not to mention steps to the beach.  Please do not forget during the Summer months Laguna Beach has a complimentary Trolley that can move you about town.  I do hope you return to The Inn at Laguna Beach, please look me up so I can give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary Heading: One of the better hotels on the beach
Summary: Definitely better than the Hotel Laguna.  I stayed at the Inn at Laguna over 30 years ago, as a teen with my grandparents.  It was wonderful then, and still very nice. Recently renovated, the rooms are well appointed, but our bed was one of the least comfortable I've ever had.  It was way too hard. Better than sagging, I suppose.  We had the first floor, next to the air-conditioning units for the hotel. That room was horribly loud.  If the air units weren't cycling on and off, the garbage trucks were reversing through around 6am.  But it still looked nice on the inside, and the balcony was fantastic.  The staff was very nice and accommodating.  I requested a stylist to do my hair last minute, and they had someone from a nearby salon at my room within the hour.  Very reasonably
Manager Response: Dear Decemberjuliet  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to the hotel.  We appreciate all comments positive and negative as they will only help us improve our products and service.  It certainly sounds like you have fond childhood memories of The Inn hopefully we were able to assist you in creating new memories and we certainly do not want to wait another 30 years for you to return.    The room you stayed in certainly has pros and cons but it is one of my favorite based on the proximity to the Main Beach.  As it is literally steps away.  We certainly hope to see you in the near future, please look me up the next time you are in town as I would love to give you a warm welcome back to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: I recently spent a few days at the inn at Laguna beach, I went with my 2 children and we had the most amazing time.   The inn's manager Peggy made our stay so incredible and was so helpful in anything we needed.   Our room was so clean, quiet and very relaxing with an amazing view looking over the beach at Laguna.
