We went to sleep to the sound of the ocean.  I loved the aromatherapy bath products and the sleepy time tea that was delivered to our room every night.  The attention to detail is overwhelming.  I would highly recommend a stay there and I can't wait to go back there again.  Thank you to everyone at the inn at Laguna!  Your amazing.   Rachel
Manager Response: Dear MacnAlex  Thank you for your kind comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on a few of our best attributes, our lovely views and our staff.  We are happy to see you like some of our touches; for example, our aromatherapy bath products are from LATHER, which is a Southern California based company.    I consider myself fortunate to work with a great group of individuals who truly care about each guest experience, we are all looking forward to your return.  Thank you again, hope to see you and your family soon!!  Peggy

Summary: My husband and I had such a wonderful stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach last summer and another couple joined us for a repeat visit. They were wowed too! The beautiful room with balcony overlooking the beach, the attentive staff, the fabulous location; I could go on and on. Even the subtle fresh aroma in the room. The morning coffee bar, the afternoon rooftop wine and munchies, binoculars in the room, the free beach chairs, umbrellas, and towels- every detail made it lovely. We walked or rode the trolley to fabulous shopping, dining, Festival of the Arts and Pageant of the Masters, the Laguna Playhouse. We rented bicycles from Laguna Cyclery and rode along the beach at Crystal Cove State Park. Perhaps the highlight was lunch at the Beachcomber. Grilled artichokes, roasted sweet
Manager Response: Dear 6nana  Thank you so much for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  From the sounds of it you experienced all that Laguna ahs to offer, from our arts to our beaches.  Thank you so much for noticing our touches each year we try to add more services that our guest will enjoy so I am happy that you noticed the changes.  We hope to see you again next year, thank you so much for choosing The Inn at Laguna Beach.  Peggy

Summary: We just returned from several days in LA followed by several days in Laguna. We always enjoy escaping the Texas heat and humidity in California. We have been to LA several times, but this was our first stay in Orange County. We loved most everything about Laguna and the Inn at Laguna Beach.   One thing I found surprising was how much shopping there was! From what I had read, I expected art galleries and restaurants, but I didn't realize how many boutiques there were! We live in Houston, so when we go on vacation I love to shop at boutiques that we don't have back home. There were tons of cute shops and unique great restaurants.   The Inn at Laguna was a great choice for us. The location is awesome, right on the beach and within very easy walking distance of the shops, Starbucks
Manager Response: Dear CKTM  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We learn from all comments positive and negative as we are continuously trying to improve our products and service.  It sounds like you were really able to enjoy Laguna Beach, we do think we have a great location as you can walk to so many shops, restaurants, art galleries, and beaches.  If you can not walk we also have the Free Trolley which can get you from Laguna Beach to Dana Point.  As I said we are always looking at improving and this year we are doing a lot of research in regards to a restaurant and bar.  This may be something in the future or we may decide that we cannot make it work, but comments like your certainly help.  As far as the Seaweed (kelp) 7 1/2 miles of Laguna's coastline is Marine Protected which means we also protect the kelp and the Grunion.  I know you can find some beaches without kelp and this is because the locals homes or businesses to choose to ignore the restrictions or the way the tides work they do not have as many kelp beds off there beach.  We do work with the City and when it is allowed the City will clean the beach and remove the kelp.  I am really sorry it bothered you this stay.  We do hope to see you next year when you want to get our of the Houston heat and humidity.  Please look me up so I can give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: The Inn at Laguna Beach has amazing views.  The hotel is great and the service is even better.  Gary B went out of his way to accommodate us.  We couldn't ask for any more.... Highly recommend this as a romantic getaway or for a business conference.
Manager Response: Dear Vikram M  Thank you so much for your comments regarding The Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am fortunate everyday to work with Gary, he is such a professional.    We look forward to your next visit, thank you for your business  Peggy

Summary: We'd stayed here a number of years ago and had a good experience, so were really looking forward to returning this trip.  Unfortunately for us, we ended up in the worst accommodations on the property - small room, facing the parking lot on the parking lot level, and noisy/drafty air conditioning system in the room.  We paid for the accommodations via American Express points, and based on our past experiences, this practice can be "catch as catch can" but when I booked these accommodations - about 45 days out via American Express Membership Rewards - I was not told of this category of room.  It was my understanding that there are three categories of room:  premium ocean view, mid-level ocean view and "standard" rooms.  I booked the reservation knowing that we were going to be in
Manager Response: Dear SusanDMcleod  Thank you for your comments and even more so thank you for taking the time out of your vacation to talk to me, we certainly appreciate your comments as they will only help us improve our products and service.  As we discussed I was just as confused and a little more upset how our entry level room was being sold via an OTA (on line Travel Agent), since our conversation I have had my VP of revenue audit and make the appropriate changes.  Once again I am extremely sorry.  I would also like to apologize for your facebook post as we discussed as soon as I directed my Marketing Manager to unhide your post we did, I am truly sorry as we were not trying to hide or ignore anything.  I look forward to having you and your family back next year.  We want to make sure your Vacation gets off to the right start and you are able to enjoy start to finish.  Thank you again for your comments and for your business Peggy

Summary: We came to this hotel based on location & a great room rate. It was my birthday weekend, so we were looking for something close to the beach & city. I was very happy with everything the hotel offered, as well as the grounds and employees. Everything was clean & well kept. The roof top lounge area was a fantastic spot for photos and looking out at the beach & city. I highly recommend this hotel if you're visiting the Laguna area. You will not be disappointed! We will DEFINITLEY be back!   P. S. - While out in Laguna, we checked the location for the other more expensive hotels & knew we made the right choice when we realized that the Inn at Laguna Beach had the BEST location!
Manager Response: Dear CKBOW  Thank you for your kind comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on a couple of our greatest assets our people and our location.  We are honored you celebrated your Birthday with us as we know you have many choices and we appreciate you choose us.  We certainly look forward to your next visit we hope to see you before your next birthday otherwise we look forward to celebrating with you next year.  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: Third Year in a Row and Keeps Getting Better!
Summary: This is the 3rd consecutive summer our family has spent at the Inn and it was so nice to see the familiar faces of the terrific staff...several remembered us by name from previous visits. The property is meticulously maintained and the location overlooking the ocean, beach and community is ideal. Each year we discover new shops and restaurants (locally owned) within walking distance of the hotel. The Heiser Park walkway along the ocean provides spectacular views. We paddle boarded and snorkeled this year at the intimate beaches just minutes from the Inn. But what keeps us coming back is the service...we're treated like family. From Annette, Jon and Will at the front desk to the asst GM Demi, to Drew the bellman...we always feel so welcomed. The only thing we missed were the
Manager Response: Dear Steve M  Thank you for your comment and your continued patronage at The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We really appreciate that you and your family continue to return and we hope to see you and your family next Summer.  I am happy to see you were able to enjoy Paddle Boarding and Snorkeling, 7 1/2 miles of Laguna Beach Coastline are a Marine Protected Area which makes us a great place for an underwater playground.  Thank you again for staying with us, please look me up on your next visit as I would love to give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: This fabulous hotel is right above the beach with a beautiful view along the coast. Parking under the hotel is free, and very convenient via elevator to check in and rooms. Our room overlooked carpark but was quiet, well maintained and comfortable. Staff were pleasant and helpful. We didn't try the pool but it's delightful. We ate out, but liked how the hotel provided food and drinks with a view. This place is within walking distance to great restaurants and local attractions. Highly recommended - even for a cheaper road-side room!
Manager Response: Dear Frequent Frier  Thank you for your comments after your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  I agree with you about our location we do believe we are perfectly situated.  You truly can leave your car parked once you arrive  Thank you again, we hope to see you in the future Peggy

Summary: I'm a frequent visitor to Laguna and have stayed both high and low. (Montage to 24 west ).  Nothing beats the montage for luxury. This trip I was looking for location, and overall value. July rates are high anywhere in Laguna- but $329 for this room was ridiculous. It's a $149 at best.  Upon arrival the stench of sewer in the parking lot was overwhelming. It was stronger in the lobby. When I asked about he smell, the gal at front desk brushed it off and said " oh ya, it's bad. It's coming in from the ocean". However, I had spent the day at the ocean and all over town and never smelled anything. The stench was clearly coming from the hotel. The hallways and. Common area sub oth inside and out reek of sewer. Once inside my room with they. Odor closed and AC on I could not smell
Manager Response: Dear L O Girl  Thank you for your comments after your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach, we appreciate all comments both positive and negative as they will help us improve our products and service.  A couple of years ago all of our guest rooms were completely renovated, I am sorry that you do not like what we have done, we are constantly upgrading and changing things.  For example, this year we will be getting new hallway carpet and painting the outside of the building.  Laguna Beach is a Marine Protected area which makes our waters an underwater playground; however, it does limit the City from what they can do to remove the kelp.  The smell you are talking about comes from the rotten kelp at the bottom of the  cliff, it is the stretch of sand between our award winning Tide pools and Main Beach.  I work with the City on a continuous basis so to clear the area whenever they are allowed.  I can certainly understand why you would think the smell is coming from the hotel but it truly is not, and I am sorry for your experience.  I do hope you will give us another chance, please look me up the next time you come to Laguna as I would love to assist you with making a reservation and giving you a warm welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Beware of having Wedding Blocks at this hotel.  I currently have one and have horrible experiences with my guests making reservations.  8-9 times, my guests reported that the hotel said they didn't have my wedding block.  First incident started in March (I even spoke to the Director of Sales then).  Each time my guests tells me, I would then call the hotel myself to book the hotel for them.  Even when I called, some said they couldn't find the block.  Just this week, my officiant called to confirm her room.  They can't find her room nor mine!  I called the hotel, spoke to someone who was not able to pull up the confirmation, was transferred to the Reservation Supervisor, who found it (thinking to myself - Great.).  Two days later, a guest called the hotel and the hotel told her
Manager Response: Dear Jessica W  We are sorry about your experience with reservations, as you know, after speaking with our Reservations Manager, our Director of Sales and myself we did switch computer systems, but we know you and your party will be very well taken care of once everyone arrives.   I am sorry for your first impression but I know it will not be your last impression, we truly are looking forward to your arrival.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: A really lovely Inn, at the perfect spot in Laguna beach.  Parking conveniently available in the garage under the hotel.  If staying in Laguna, most everything is withing walking distance.  No need to drive.   If possible, go in July or August and spend an evening at the outdoor theatre on Laguna Canyon Road seeing the Pageant of the Masters.  It is a spectacular theatre production of living art.  Using a different theme each year, masters paintings are reproduced using live people.  What a show!!!  We have travelled on four different occasions from New York specifically to see this UNBELIEVABLE production.  Each time we stayed at the Inn at Laguna Beach, although only for 2 evenings considering their rates.  We have stayed at all their room levels including the small rooms
Manager Response: Dear Meisei2013  Thank you for your comments after your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We agree with you that based on our location there is no need to get into a car, you can walk every where or take the Trolley.  Whether it is the Pageant of the Masters or any of our other fine festivals there is much to do in the Summer.  Thank you so much for staying with us we truly appreciate your business, the next time you are in Laguna Beach please look me up so I can give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary: The Inn at Laguna Beach is just wonderful.  I had the pleasure of staying at the Inn on July 3rd, and the experience exceeded my expectations.  It's a boutique hotel perfectly located on the beach and within walking distance to shops and restaurants.  So park your car in the basement and leave it there -- you won't need it.  The staff is so friendly and accommodating, and the room I had was on the 4th floor with a balcony and an incredible view of the ocean.  Really, I couldn't ask for anything more.  If you are planning a stay in the Orange County area, look no further than this wonderful hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Sara HKNYC  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on one of our best attributes our location, with a 98 walk score we have one of the best locations in Laguna Beach.  We are steps from the Ocean and a couple of blocks to the Village of Laguna, we are also within walking distance to many of the summer festivals.  We hope you return soon and you plan to stay longer than overnight.  The next time you are visiting Laguna please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank  you Peggy

Summary: The rooms are small but manageable.  Our room had a very odd smell. Upon arrival I thought it was smoke, but it never went away so I think it was musty or mild. Our room was right outside the pool, so I'm not sure if that had anything to do with it. Not sure, but it was a big turn off. We asked for another room but, nothing was available. We would have left but it was July fourth weekend and most other places were sold out which is how we ended up at this hotel in the first place.  The pool is quite small and it didn't seem that clean, it had quite a bit of sand.in the bottom.  This place is dog friendly which is fine, we love dogs, but the two yappy dogs next door to us were a pain. They barked every time someone passed their door morning and night.  I wanted to like this
Manager Response: Dear P H  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach, we learn from all comments both positive and negative as it is our hope to continuously improve our products and service.  Please know if we would have had another room we would have moved you as we want to make sure everyone enjoys their stay.    I have reached out to you directly and I hope to hear from you.  It is my hope you will return to Laguna Beach and specifically The Inn at Laguna Beach giving us the opportunity to create positive memories.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary: The location made this vacation one of my favorites.  We didn't drive for two days as we could easily walk everywhere, even with three children.  Listening to the sounds of the  waves every night as we went to bed was priceless. The rooms could use a touch-up (chunks out of the wall), but the beds were cozy and the bathroom was clean and spacious (appreciated the large shower).
Manager Response: Dear SVMom3  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on one of our greatest attributes, our location!!  With our 98 walk score, one of the best for Laguna Beach hotels, we believe you can do so much without getting in your car.  We are steps to Main Beach and a couple of blocks to the Village.  We hope you and your family return and when you do please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary: Inn at Laguna Beach exceeds my expectations every time I visit. I return expecting the wonderful previous experience only to be delighted with new surprises.    By far the most noticeable of the improvements this year was the completion of the Heisler Park pathway and the new Life Guard Station at the lower edge of the hotel - WOW!  It truly captivates the essence of artistic beachfront Laguna in design and functionality.      The Inn location, service, special touches - like the new iconic surfboard shower by the pool and the complimentary afternoon wine tasting on the rooftop bluff at the breath of the ocean - are just a few surprises that delighted my senses on this visit.  This is my 10 year old son's favorite place.  We park the car and have direct access to the beach and
Manager Response: Dear pkyan  Thank you for your kind remarks regarding your last visit to The Inn.  We certainly appreciate all comments as it helps us to continuously improve our service.  i am so happy you liked the great work the City did on Heisler Path and the Lifeguard station, they truly were a great partner through the process of Construction.  It sounds like you were able to enjoy various water sports as well as Captain Dave's Dolphin Safari.  We are so happy you had a great trip as this is one of the attractions we recommend.    Thank you again for your comments we look forward to your next visit  Peggy

Summary: Last week my husband and I had the pleasure of staying at the Inn at Laguna Beach. If you are looking for somewhere with a fabulous location, beautiful, clean, comfortable and well-appointed rooms with air-conditioning and a ceiling fan and a most helpful and courteous staff, this is the place. The linens and bathrobes were quite lush and comfortable. Additional touches including afternoon wine and cookies, the morning newspaper with coffee and tea as well as a coffee maker in the room were quite enjoyable, and the terrace with the sight and sound of the ocean were a treat. All this allowed for a wonderful stay and I recommend this property without hesitation.
Manager Response: Dear 957JoyceW  Thank you for your kind remarks regarding your stay at The Inn.  We are happy to see you and your husband had a "GREAT STAY" as that is what we strive for.  You touched on many of our great attributes including our staff and our location.  I am truly blessed to work with such a great team, everyone here really cares about each guest interaction and ensuring positive memories.  Our location is one of the best in town, once you arrive there is no need to get back in a car as we are steps to Main Beach and a couple of blocks from the heart of the Village of Laguna.  We do hope you return soon, please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: This hotel is excellent. It is right at the central beach. The rooms are clean and the staff very accommodating. A continental breakfast is included, served in the room or on the rooftop bar. A bonus is the famous Las Brisas high end restaurant right next door. They will also deliver to your room or to the rooftop bar. The pool is delightful. They close it early so there are no late night disturbances. Any room is delightful, but those poolside are not as private as those on higher floors. The area has tons of high end shops, and a variety of delicious restaurants, some quite affordable. We are returning in the fall.
Manager Response: Dear Lagunaone  Thank you for your kind remarks regarding your recent visit to The Inn.  You touched on many of our  great amenities and we could not agree with you more regarding our location.  We believe we have one of the best in town as we are steps to Main Beach and a couple of blocks from the Village.  I am happy that you were able to enjoy our breakfast, however, it is not included in the price of the room, there is an additional charge, but well worth it.  Thank you again for your comments we look forward to seeing you in the Fall.  Peggy

Summary: Family vacation at Laguna Beach and The Inn was an absolutely perfect place to stay.  Scenery breath taking, walking distance to anything you need - restaurants, beach, hiking, shopping.  Rooms very clean and comfortable.  Staff so pleasant and accommodating.  Can't wait for my next trip to Laguna!
Manager Response: Dear Robinita56  Thank you for your kind comments after your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We truly appreciate all comments and you touched on a couple of our best assets.  Our staff and our location.  As you stated we are within walking distance to so many attractions, just steps to the beach and a couple of blocks into the Village of Laguna.  Our staff wants to ensure all of our guests leave with a positive memory, they care about each interaction and they are looking forward to your return.  Please look me up the next time you visit The Inn at Laguna Beach and I will give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Words can not tell you how pleased we were with Inn at Laguna Beach!!!! Having a 9 and almost 5 year old grandchild with us---we had no worries. The pool was so warm--temp was perfect  ----the pool service was done with a smile. The help went next door and brought us lunch!!! The rooms were good size especially the room 306--windows on 2 sides with a view that was more  than awesome---cookies in the afternoon for the children--wine in the early evening and forgot coffee in the lobby in the morning--we can't wait to return---would suggest for families as well as couples. Thanks for a fantastic week-end!!!
Manager Response: Dear Elinor66  Thank you for your comments after spending the weekend at The Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am happy to read that you and your family had a great stay.  Not only do we have the amenities you touched on coffee, cookies, and wine; but we also have a beach valet with beach chairs, umbrellas, and towels.    We can't wait for you to return, please look me up on your next visit so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: My husband and I planned an overnight getaway in early June and chose this hotel. We were SO happy we did! We got there before "check in" time and they were great! We asked for an upgrade and the totally accommodated us and were able to upgrade to an partial ocean view room with a balcony! We asked if we could leave our luggage (since we were early & had a spa appointment at a local spa). They not only stored it, they put into our room (once it was ready) all before we came back to officially check in! They also gave us our parking pass (underground parking!!) before we left. After returning from our spa appointments our room was ready and beautiful!!   Since the beach is literally down some stairs from the hotel we decided to get comfortable and take a walk on the boardwalk and
Manager Response: Dear Amber V  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We appreciate all comments as it only helps us improve our products and service.  You touched on a couple of our greatest assets our people and our location.  Every day on my way to work I realize how lucky i am to work with such a great group of people.  Every employee cares about creating positive memories and making sure guest want to return, so I am happy they did not disappoint.  As for our location steps to the beach and a couple of blocks to the Village of Laguna, with Heisler Park at our footsteps.  We are continuously reviewing or landscaping plan so the next time we meet with our Landscaping Team we will take your comments into consideration.  We do hope the next time you are looking for a staycation you return to Laguna Beach and The Inn.  Please look me up so I can give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: This is the perfect little hotel in Laguna, just like Laguna itself - beautiful, charming, and unique! Everyone is very friendly and helpful, and the location is perfect: right in town (tons of great restaurants and shops) and two steps from the beach. Our room was very nice and opened out to the ocean. There is a rooftop and a pool, but we never used it, as the beach is right there! Book ahead though, they always seem to be in demand!
Manager Response: Dear Amy W  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You certainly touched on two of our best assets our staff and our location.  Our staff truly cares about each guest stay and they want to make sure they are creating positive memories, I am truly blessed to work with such a passionate group of people.  As for our location we are steps to Main beach and a couple of blocks to the Village of Laguna, which is home to over 40 great restaurants, art galleries, and specialty stores.  I am very happy you enjoyed your visit, hopefully the next time you are visiting the West Coast you will return to California's Gold Coast and The Inn at Laguna Beach.  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: can't get closer to the beach with underground parking!!
Summary: we had a comfortable room 318- though not ocean view but who needs one when there's a rooftop patio with enough sitting for those unfortunately didn't get an ocean view rm , pricey hotel for families , we did see several families there, but may be their main summer vaca, so they splurged, small pool mainly for cooling off and sunbathing, room for maybe < 20, lounges and tables/chairs with umbrellas [ was never filled while we were there ] & a tiny sunken spa area. - alongside the main beach 'walkway along the coast', with access to hotel via room key,[ had lovely stroll , along the coast line , looking over cliffs and nearby park ] therefore it was easy to get to beach - and hotel provided beach chairs and umbrella/towel with you didn't bring them, with a 'beach boy' manning the
Manager Response: Dear Roxanne M  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach we appreciate all comments as it gives us the opportunity to improve our products and service.  We are happy to see you enjoyed the Pacific Terrace, we do believe it is one of the best views in Laguna Beach.  We enjoy hosting wine hour on the Terrace as it gives each guest a chance to sit enjoy the view and hopefully meet new people.  Thank you again for your comments we hope the next time you are looking for a Staycation you will return to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: My husband and I spent 2 nights at the Inn at Laguna Beach for our 5-year anniversary.  We could not have been more pleased with the hotel.  The staff was incredibly friendly and full of suggestions - from the front desk staff to the beach valet.  Our room (no beach view) was cozy, clean, extremely comfortable with so many nice touches.  The location on main beach is right on the beautifully landscaped pathway connecting all of the beaches.  We loved walking the pathways each morning and evening - right outside our door!  The restaurants and shops of downtown Laguna Beach are on the front side of the hotel - making dining and shopping equally easy and enjoyable.  The pool is small but lovely and the rooftop patio is the hotel's best feature!  We went to the roof 3 times during
Manager Response: Dear Atedmonds  Thank you for taking the time to write your comments on your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  Also thank you for spending your fifth anniversary with us we consider it quite an honor.  You touched on two of our greatest assets our staff and our location.  Our staff truly does care about each guest stay I am lucky to be surrounded by a great group of people and our location steps to Main Beach and a couple of blocks to the Village of Laguna.  We appreciate your comments but more importantly we appreciate your business and we hope then next time you return to California's gold coast you will chose to return to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Laguna is one of the great beach towns on the California coast. The Inn is a great family place to stay for a few days. Its not exceptional but it does the job.  The staff are friendly, they seem happy and so they should be, its a bit on the expensive side given what it delivers but getting a room is not always easy.   The rooms are well furnished but it's the ocean view that steals the show. My 4 year old woke up every morning and went out on the balcony to listen to the waves and watch the sun rise.   I don't remember there being a restaurant or room service, but I may be mistaken. I do remember that there wasn't room for anything in the fridge which is always a bit annoying.  There are steps from the hotel right down onto the beach and they are very helpful with folding
Manager Response: Dear Merlin Spitfire  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach and thank you for your future reservation, we truly appreciate your business.  As you stated our location to the Beach as well as to the Village of Laguna makes us the perfect fit for many guests.  I certainly hope we do not disappoint on your stay in August, please look me up so I can give you and your family a warm welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: We arrived having stayed at a very pleasing hotel in San Francisco and a five star hotel in Monterey and so our expectations may have been a little skewed. A previous writer labels the hotel 'boutique' and I thin he is spot on. You cannot fault the hotels location although different rooms will have different issues. The hotel is clean an attractively laid out. Pool size was not an issue for me as I was the only one in it the one time I used it. Where it is odd is in the room layout. The bathroom is essentially a partitioned area in the corner of the room with the wc and bath, The wash basin is in the main room with pride of place. It's pleasant accommodation but far off high end. There is no restaurant but that doesn't matter as fabulous restaurants are within a stones throw.
Manager Response: Dear The_G-R's  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We appreciate all comments as we learn from all of them.  You are correct we are a smaller "boutique" or lifestyle hotel and we do our best to focus on personalized service.  Thank you again for your comments we hope you will visit Laguna Beach on your next visit to Southern California.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: We just returned from a 3 night stay and inn atmosphere is relaxing! This inn is in a great location - you can walk to shops and restaurants easily, and it puts you directly on the main beach. Great for walking on the beach and visiting tide pools, but not that great for swimming - lots of seaweed in the water and on the beach. Our daughter still managed to enjoy the ocean though! Service at this hotel was great - everyone was very friendly and happy to help. Nice small pool and lounge area - pool was very clean. Rooms are small and walls are thin, but being able to open French doors and hear/see waves makes up for it. Just think of it as a boutique hotel and you shouldn't be disappointed. We got a great room deal - about $270/ night + taxes and that is fabulous for the
Manager Response: Dear Elvis Z  Thank you for your comments regarding your most recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on a couple of our best assets our staff and our location.  Our staff certainly cares about each guest and it is there goal to make sure every guest leaves with a positive memory.  I am truly blessed to work with such a great team of people.  As for our location we are steps to Main Beach and a couple of blocks to the Village of Laguna.  Once you park your car there is no need to move it.  Thank you again for your comments, please look me up the next time you and your family visit The Inn at Laguna Beach as I would love to give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Our family stayed here for a short break from LA.   (Negatives) I could not think of much except the following but they should be accepted as a "trade-off" with the best location in town. 1) a limited parking space  2) relatively small room 3) relatively small pool   (Positives) 1) Right "ON" the Laguna Beach. It is literally ON the beach. 2) Walkable to the local restaurants and the cafes.
Manager Response: Dear SK910  Thank you for your remarks regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You certainly touched on one of our best assets our location.  We truly believe that once you park your car there is no need to move it.  As you said we are step to the beach and within walking distance to over 40 restaurants.  Thanks again for your comments please come back and visit The Inn at Laguna Beach.  Peggy

Summary: The Inn at Laguna was very pleasant as soon as we arrived. My husband and I stayed here while attending a wedding at the Cliffs restaurant at the end of May. The front desk was very happy to see us and reminded us that the  complimentary wine hour on the rooftop began in ten minutes! We had a long day from traveling from San Francisco so we went right up to the room which was a oceanfront room without a balcony. I prefer the balcony but none were available. The room was a good size with a great, comfortable king bed. The bathroom vanity was big and outside the toilet & shower area which is nice so I can get ready while my husband is still showering. There was also a love seat and tables in the room. There was also a two huge picture windows that looked out over the ocean and
Manager Response: Dear Jessica S  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at The Inn at Laguna Beach.  It sounds like you had a great time in Laguna as you walked around our City and spent time at the beach. Sorry we were not able to place you in a room with a balcony the next time you visit please be sure to reserve the Ocean View with a Balcony so we can get you into the accommodation of your choice.  I think you will be happy to hear that the Construction that was occurring next to the Hotel is complete, our Lifeguard headquarters is open and park next door is beautiful.  Thank you again for your comments, please look me up on your next visit as I would love to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: Location location location - nice but not luxury
Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights on our honeymoon. We'd booked a village view room but the hotel offered us an upgrade to a sea view room at a good price which we took. Our room was on the corner of the hotel so the views were lovely. The room itself was perfectly nice but lacked the wow factor that we expected for the location. The bathroom was quite basic and the room a little on the small side for what we expected from 'the honeymoon suite' The pool area is quite small and the sun beds a little worse for wear. Again this is a small thing but nice sun beds make all the difference.  There is a wine hour which is a nice touch.  The location of the hotel is ideal for exploring the area, perfectly located for beach and restaurants etc. we walked everywhere. We didn't eat at the hotel
Manager Response: Dear Emmz123  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach  and thank you for celebrating your special occasion with us, we truly appreciate it.  We agree that we have a great location just steps from the Beach and a couple of blocks into the Village of Laguna.  I am sorry you do not like our guest room bathrooms, the Hotel completed a multi-million dollar renovation in 2012 and every bathroom was upgraded.  Consistently we upgrade various parts of the hotel so your input will help us drive future decisions.  Thank you again for your comments we really do appreciate the.  Peggy

Summary Heading: Unfortunate problems made our wedding trip unforgettable for all the wrong reasons
Summary: I have never written a review before, but this time I feel that I must.  I don’t' think my rating is of the property as much as our experience there.  My fiancé and I have been together for 25 years and decided to get married this year to celebrate.  We wanted to have our toes in the sand and decided on a So Cal wedding.  We visited Laguna Beach on one of our first vacations together and have always wanted to come back to stay.  So, it seemed like a perfect choice to stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  We had read rave reviews.  The pictures on line looked great. Our wedding was booked at Salt Creek Beach in Dana Pt and this was only a 15 minute drive away.  Seemed perfect.    We booked our entire family and wedding party for 6 rooms for 2-3 nights each, a total of 15 room nights.
Manager Response: Dear Judy T:  Please accept my sincerest apologies for the inconvenience we caused you and your family.  As we discussed, we strive to do everything possible to ensure our resolution is appropriate for the situation.  I was disappointed to read our resolution was not to your satisfaction after you shared that you were happy with the outcome.  The Inn at Laguna Beach prides ourselves in providing high level of service along with focus on value to our guests we are sorry in your case we fell short.  We sincerely hope you will return someday allowing us to demonstrate how important your business is to us.  Sincerely,  Peggy

Summary: My wife and I visited The Inn at Laguna Beach earlier this month for 3 nights.  We'd been to Laguna before, but were really impressed with the Inn.  The service was excellent, and the location fabulous.  Be sure to take advantage of the afternoon wine reception on the terrace.  Parking is available under the hotel and very convenient.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A true home away from home....
Summary: We've stayed at the Inn 3 times over the last year and it just keeps getting better.  The location is perfection, with easy access to the beach, a short walk into town and a beautiful spot to watch the sun rise and set every day.  My wife and I have visited both with and without our young daughter and the service and staff could not have been nicer. Everyone makes a real effort to ensure all your needs are met in a a very unaffected way.  We'll definitely be returning soon when we need a quick get-away weekend that feels as if you're in a small Hawaiian town.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Will definitely be back - with the dogs!!
Summary: I read all the amazing reviews of this quaint inn before we flew from Chicago to LB for our one-year anniversary, so I had high expectations of a fantastic time.  And we were NOT disappointed!!  The Inn itself could not be more ideally located in proximity to downtown LB.  I'm so glad it isn't directly downtown, but it's literally just a few hundred feet up PCH on a hill, perfectly situated overlooking the ocean.  I kept telling friends that if we were any closer to the water we'd be in a boat!    The interior of the Inn is nothing incredible, but it is clean and the view and location makes you not even care about not having marble countertops or 1,000 thread count sheets.  The BED was seriously the most comfortable bed I've ever slept in - slept like a baby every single night!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Inn at Laguna Beach is perfect for a quick getaway with restaurants and shopping all in walking distance. It was wonderful to hear the waves breaking on the beach 24 hours a day, and a nice boardwalk right behind the Inn that takes you up and down the shoreline.
Manager Response: Dear FrankFern  Thank you for your comments regarding your most recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  We could not agree with you more regarding our location steps to Main Beach and a couple of blocks from the Village.  We truly appreciate your comments and we hope to see you again in the near future.  Peggy

Summary Heading: A gem of a small hotel/inn
Summary: Recently stayed at The Inn at Laguana Beach.  Perfect location to town and  beach!  We had a lovely room with a fabulous view of the ocean! The staff was customer service oriented, particularly, Demetri, front desk,  and the two bell hop staff.  They even tried helping us when our Enterprise Car didn't start and we had been waiting 3 hours for Enterprise to respond to our request for another car!   A gem of a hotel!! Not to be missed!
Manager Response: Dear loi362  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on a couple of our best assets our staff and our location.  I truly enjoy working with the great team we have at The Inn at Laguna Beach as they care about each guest experience, and they want everyone to leave with a positive memory.  Also our location tucked between the Pacific Ocean and the Pacific Coast Highway and within walking distance to the Village we believe the location is second to none.  I am sorry to read about your trouble with Enterprise Rent a Car, I have forwarded your comments to the Regional Manager.  I know this will not help your past experience but hopefully it will make an impact in the future.  Thank you again, we do hope you visit our lovely City again soon, please look me up so I can give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: My wife and I had the opportunity to stay at Inn at Laguna Beach for a weekend and it was a fantastic experience. The rooms have awesome surf-inspired art, great amenities and super comfortable beds.  We had an ocean-front view – hands-down the best view I’ve ever had from a hotel room.  You couldn’t ask for a better location – walking distance to great restaurants, bars, galleries, etc. right in the middle of town. They have awesome coffee, the rooms are clean, and the staff is incredibly friendly, helpful and knowledgeable of the area. There’s an intimate and fun rooftop patio which also overlooks the ocean – great ambience with succulent arrangements and awesome patio lighting. If you have the chance to vacation or even stay-cation in Laguna, this is the place to do it!
Manager Response: Dear 381FS1979  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am happy to read you had the "Perfect" get away!!  We believe we have one of the best locations in town as we are steps from Main Beach and a short walk into the Village.  Our staff is here to make sure every guest has a memorable experience and I am happy to read we did not fall short.  Thank you again, I do hope you return to Laguna Beach for another Staycation  Peggy

Summary: What an incredible experience. Staying here was the perfect way to experience laguna. I love this place. Best pool ! Great service. Beautiful hotel. Loved the little touches- the coffee bar and water in the lobby. Amazing staff. Will be back for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Ann A  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach, I am happy to read you will return.  You touched on tow of our best qualities our staff and our location.  I am blessed everyday to come to work and be surrounded by a team of people that truly care about creating positive memories and ensuring every guest leaves happy.  As for our location we are steps to Main Beach and a couple of blocks to the Village, with over 40 restaurants, many shops and galleries.  Please look me up on your next visit so I can give you a warm welcome back  Thank you Peggy

Summary: I stayed over the weekend at the Inn At Laguna Beach with my wife and we had one of our best romantic getaways ever. The location right on the beach was perfect, though the pool was so nice it was hard to leave. The rooms were excellent and quiet, with a view overlooking the whole of Laguna. The staff was friendly, and there was even a coffee stand in the hotel lobby selling Australian coffee which made my morning! We've added this to the list of our favourite hotels, we can't wait to come back!!!
Manager Response: Dear Hendo333  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am so happy to read that you and your wife have found your get-a-way, we look forward to seeing you in the near future.  We recently added the Vittoria Coffee, thank you for noticing and I am happy it is such a hit.  Our pool sits atop the bluff overlooking the Pacific Ocean and heated year round, I am glad you were able to enjoy.  On your next visit please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: Very nice place, close to beautiful beaches
Summary: Loved this place...good service, nice hospitality (cocktail hour, coffee in the morning, etc.). Very nice rooms and beautiful ocean views near the heart of downtown Laguna Beach. We stayed for two nights of our honeymoon and enjoyed it thouroughly...they even delivered a small bottle of champagne and a hand-written note thanking us for staying. Nice touch!
Manager Response: Dear Bethann402  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn at Laguna Beach and congratulations on your wedding.  Thank you for sharing your Honeymoon with us it is quite and honor.  You touched on some of our greatest attributes our location and our staff.  I am blessed everyday to work with the great team of people who want to ensure every guest leaves with a positive memory.  Our location steps from Main Beach and a couple of blocks to the heart of the Village makes it very easy to get around.  Thank you so much for staying with us, we hope to see you again very soon.  Peggy

Summary: Our 40th Anny was spent at this lovely place...the hotel upgraded us to a Pacific side room, one of the best they have.  We were on the 4th floor above the pool and could leave our door open at night and hear the surf...fabulous.  The people that work here are top notch...so gracious.  And the Starbucks coffee in the morning, wine reception in the afternoon followed by home made cookies and milk, and the sleepy time hot tea delivered to our room each night...we felt very pampered.  I told my husband I wished I had brought binoculars...guess what?  they were in the room already.  We loved our stay here...the location is the best part and I mention it last.  Lovely!
Manager Response: Dear Dahlin2  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay to the Inn at Laguna Beach and thank you for spending such a special day with us.  Congratulations of 40 years of marriage and Happy belated Anniversary.  You touched on many of our great amenities, I am so happy you enjoyed them all.  Most importantly the staff made an impression on you and for that I am truly blessed.    Please do not wait 40 more years to visit we hope to see you again in the near future.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Great location walking distance to restaurants, shops and galleries plus overlooks the ocean.  The only problem was there was construction next door while I was staying there, which of course the Inn couldn't help it andthey did move my room, and discounted my stay.  I wished on the top floor they had furniture so you could have the better views plus a place to sit.  I would return, the people at the front desk were very accommodating, and did everything to make you feel comfortable.  The rooms were clean and no problems there.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Came to do a site visit for a wedding venue. I really liked this place and really wanted to have my wedding here. It was a bit too small for my party but a very lovely hotel.   Gary Bolotin, the sales director, is wonderful. He was so kind and made me feel very welcomed. He answered all of my hundreds of questions via email and phone (since a lot of the initial planning was done remote since I live in NYC). He provided us refreshing drinks when we arrived and gave us a complimentary room for a few hours to freshen up since we just flew in a few hours ago from the east coast.    The hotel is right on the beach with all rooms having wonderful views. The rooms themselves were clean and remodeled recently. We saw 3 different rooms and all very nice. I was a bit concerned about this
Manager Response: none

Summary: I recently stayed at the Inn at Laguna Beach and had the most wonderful, relaxing time.  This charming hotel is situated above Main Beach with spectacular ocean views.  The rooms are clean and spacious, and the hotel staff is extremely friendly and helpful.  Each morning there is a cart set up outside where you can grab a coffee before walking into town or a lemonade before heading to the beach.  It is also worth checking out the art shows on the rooftop during the Laguna Beach Art Walk.  I highly recommend staying here if you have the chance!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: AMAZING VIEWS, FRIENDLIEST STAFF ON THE PLANET
Summary: My girlfriend and I just spent a wonderful night at the Inn At Laguna Beach. The hotel is located minutes away from some great bars and restaurants. But the big attraction was the ocean, right out our window. I would definitely recommend the Inn At Laguna Beach to anyone who wanted a weekend retreat or even an overnight getaway. Awesome experience overall.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I stayed at this amazing boutique hotel this past weekend. We were there beginning Thursday night and were lucky enough to be there for the Laguna Beach Art Walk - the hotel hosted such a fun, intimate party for art walk.  They showcased surf art and provided drinks and music on the adorable patio which was complete with the cutest bistro lights, succulent arrangements, etc. all directly overlooking the beach.  The beds are comfortable, the decor is a great aesthetic fit for their beach-front vibe, they have the best complimentary products in the bathroom (what other hotel offers make-up removing towelettes? loved them!) and the staff is so friendly and helpful.  I highly recommend staying here if you have the opportunity!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Lovely hotel, and great art show!
Summary: We came to the Inn at Laguna Beach for a night away and to check out the art exhibit. What a perfect night! The views were just spectacular, and the room was really well appointed with everything we needed. It had a clean and cozy feel, and all of the staff were super friendly and helpful. I loved the eco-friendly products and the plants throughout the hotel. And of course the location can't be beat! We can't wait to come back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a bit of tough one.  The location of this place is unbeatable.  It's right above "Main Beach," which (unsurprisingly) is the main beach in LB.  It's a 5-minute walk to Forest Ave, the main drag in LB with lots of nice shops and restaurants.  It's right next door to the legendary Las Brisas, a Mexican place with a beautiful patio overlooking the ocean.  It's a short walk to Heisler Park, one of the nicest parks anywhere . . . a long, skinny park on the bluff overlooking some beautiful beaches, great for walking, jogging, and picnicking.  So once you park (they do have an underground lot), you really don't need your car at all.  The rooms are fine -- nothing spectacular, but very serviceable and comfortable.  Most have a balcony with a view of the beach and ocean, perfect
Manager Response: none

Summary: Absolutely the best location you can have in Laguna Beach. Right on the beach! Within walking distance to most everything. We walked 4 or 5 miles daily. Close to Newport Beach and not that far from San Diego. Had a problem with the air conditioning but the staff first tried to get it to quiet down and when that didn't work offered to move us. Had our dog, Rudy, with us and the staff treated him as well as they treated us. We were treated warmly and will return.
Manager Response: none

Summary: You can't get much closer to the beach than here. We walked right outside our room & down a 5 min walk & you're at the beach. Top notch location! It doesn't get much better than opening the window & listening to crashing waves to fall asleep. The room itself was nice but not mind blowing.  The hotel is very nice & I would stay again but location is what sells this place.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I really loved this hotel.  The staff were all so friendly and welcoming and the evening wine reception was a nice touch.  As for my room, it fels very clean and the the bed was comfortable.  I had a patio looking out to the ocean which was fantastic.  Location-wise you'd be hard pressed to find a more central location than Inn at Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Right on the beach, charming hotel within walking distance to everything.  Coffee in the AM, Wine in the PM outside on the roof!  Make sure to get an oceanfront room.  Great stay in a fabulous location.  Surf was just fine in April!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel has an excellent location right on Laguna beach with just a few flights of steps down to the beach. It was only a short walk to all the shops and restaurants, so everything you need is on your doorstep. The hotel had a nice relaxed feel and the staff were very friendly and helpful. There was free coffee and tea in Reception each morning. We were surprised to be charged $29 per night for car parking and we were charged $63 for dry cleaning a martial arts kimono which seemed excessive for what it was. The room was well equipped and had a Starbucks coffee filter machine. We stayed in a room right next to be pool which was very noisy in the evening with people in the pool and also people using the back gate as a short cut in and out of the hotel. The pool did close around
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Amazing View, Perfect Hotel - Exceeded expectations in every category
Summary: Our family stayed at the Inn during our week long vacation in southern California.  The hotel has incredible views and easy access to the beach.  The pool area was clean and nicely appointed with relaxing chaise lounges.  While the room was on the smaller side, there was ample space and we had access to a nice private patio area by the pool.   It's a great hotel, in a beautiful location but the personal touches and services by the hotel staff guarantee an enjoyable stay for all guests.  The wine tasting on the rooftop terrace was incredible.   The warm cookies...enjoyed by the kids and a fair share of adults..just perfect.  Even complimentary  coffee to start your day!  The hotel staff is extremely professional, friendly and knowledgeable about the area. We will be back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was our first visit to Laguna Beach. We normally do our beach vacations in Miami & Siesta Key so we were not sure what to expect in CA. We found The Inn At Laguna Beach on Trip Advisor & we booked a 3 nt. stay. After checking into our room we noted it was small but nicely appointed. We noticed that the carpet was wet the entire length of the bed side & smelled quite bad. After requesting to be moved we were informed that the hotel was sold out and they could move us the following day. We withstood the 1st nt & then moved to an upgraded ocean view suite the next day. They also comped our 1st nt stay. I say they more than met our expectations. Room was beautiful with a breathtaking view. The rooms/linens were very clean. The bath has a nice shower with an external large sink
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Inn at Laguna Beach is a great starting point if you want access to beautiful beaches and great shops and restaurants.   The hotel itself is clean and modern. Rooms are well appointed.  Staff is friendly and helpful.  There is coffee available in the morning and wine and appetizers in the evening. If you can afford it and like the sound of the ocean opt for an ocean view room.  Some have balcony's which is a nice touch and a lovely way to read the paper in the morning.  There is a pool and our room did overlook it, however at night we did not hear any noise. We picked the Inn because it is dog friendly.  Even better is the fact that they do not charge extra for having your dog with you.  We haven't found that to normally be the case.  Don't expect "pet extra's", although I
Manager Response: none

Summary: Just had a two day business meeting for 15 (and their plus ones) at I@LB.  There can't be a better location and the staff was great to work with throughout the entire several month planning process--I feel like Jonathan Go and Lindsy Walker are new (very helpful and patient) friends!    Everyone I encountered was friendly and in the event of any glitch, they were immediately responsive.  Of course, they could not solve the problem of all meeting participants wanting the ocean view seats around the conference table, but, oh well...  If I had my choice, I would never go into a big hotel ballroom/meeting room again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Laguna Beach is a breathtaking backdrop to this amazing hotel. Exceeded all our expectations. I could have sat on my deck overlooking the beach all day! Room 545 has the most amazing beach views, I think it's even used for their brochures!!!  Some added perks amazing Starbucks coffee, wine tasting happy hour, and few steps from beach!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Every time we go to Laguna Beach, we stay at a different location.  For this visit, since it was for a very short time frame, I wanted a place to relax and be on the beach.  You can't beat this hotel for the views and location and price.  We did not upgrade much in the room but we did overlook the pool and that was nice (versus the street).  Rooms were not fancy but they were cozy - our room was not spotless but I just wiped down a few things and we were good to go.  Beds were comfortable.  Loved that the hotel was right on the walking path and close to some tide pool areas.  We enjoyed the terrace and watched the boats on the horizon at night.  We did not have much interaction with staff but after our trip, I had an erroneous charge on my credit card and when I called, they
Manager Response: none

Summary: Last week my family and I had the pleasure of staying at the Inn At Laguna Beach for three nights. Our room gave us the perfect view to the ocean. It was absolutely stunning. As for the room, we were very pleased with the layout and had more than enough room for the four of us. We loved the location of the hotel as everything was in easy walking distance. We also loved that the hotel was a small one. It felt quaint and friendly. They also didn't nickel and dime us. Parking is free! I would stay a million times over at the Inn At Laguna Beach. I miss it already and can't wait to stay again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Excellent friendly & professional staff, room, view, cleanliness all exceeded expectations.  The Happy Hour on the patio is not to be missed. The host and hostess are so friendly, polite, helpful- really made us feel comfortable and it's just a gorgeous view.  Definately worth the extra for ocean view balcony room. Thank you! We will return!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at the Inn attending a wedding in town.  The Inn is well located just north of rte 133 and while it is near the town and activities, it was also quiet.  The beds are very comfortable, the amenities top-notch.  If you want a first class beach-front hotel, this is it.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel, newly renovated, great views close to beach
Summary: It's Pricey but worth it!  Walking distance to the beach, downtown, galleries and restaurants. Newly renovated, parking garage, breakfast delivered to your room. The pool overlooks the ocean, some of the rooms have balconies. Close to a very good restaurant Las Brisas!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We booked last minute and ended up in a room facing the village. I was worried about PCH noise, but it wasn't a problem at all.  What was annoying was trying to enjoy coffee on the breathtakingly beautiful terrace overlooking the ocean Saturday morning with the circular saws immediately below whining so loudly you couldn't hear the person next to you, forget the ocean.  Sad, but nothing they can do, it is for the new lifeguard tower next door.  Other than that, an absolutely charming and beautiful property, perfectly located on the north end of main beach. I'ld recommend it--after construction is done, or at least ask for a room on the far north end of the property.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed at the Inn at Laguna Beach over the weekend and found it to be a wonderful experience.  The hotel is very well maintained, very clean, very comfortable, the staff was extremely friendly and personable, and the ocean view was amazing.  The hotel is perfectly located within walking distance of many great restaurants and places to shop.  I would definitely stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I will definitely be back at the Inn.  It was central to LB downtown.  Across the street from Starbucks and just steps away from Main Beach.  I wish I stayed a bit longer.  Their's so much more to LB I'd like to see and whenver that next time is...I'll be sure to come back to Inn at Laguna beach.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A Short Stay but a Great Stay
Summary: We were only at this hotel for a night, but it was great.  Our room was very small (hence four instead of five stars), but they made very good use of the space available and it was very clean.    But the standout for me was the bed.  The combination of a very comfortable mattress and beautiful sheets added up the give me the best sleep I think I've ever had in a hotel.  And along with everyone else, the cookies and milk deserve a special mention!  Just a great experience all round.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Spring Break Trip down South from Santa Monica
Summary: Wow, what a great experience. Decided to take a quick trip down south to Laguna for some R and R. Knew I had picked correctly when I walked in the door and smelled warm cookies, and looked over to see a table with cookies and milk ready for the taking. Check in was a breeze and was so very pleased upon getting to room, actually decided to hang out and soak in the perfect views of the tide pools and bird rock from our balcony.  Took a short stroll into town and had a great sushi dinner. The hotel is very convenient to town, Next day we spent surfing in nearby Doheny Beach and then relaxing by the pool. Service was first class and the location is the best in Laguna. Will definitely return soon.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We've stayed nearby at other 4* and 5* hotels, but this one is the best we've experienced in OC beach towns.  The staff is great with very accommodating 'happy to help' responses.  We're hoping for one more request to be fulfilled ~ add one more night!!!  There's so much to do and frankly we're simply enjoying hanging at the property as it's so relaxing.  The wine service on The Terrace made our day yesterday with such great seating areas with sweeping views of the ocean and Main Beach. Don't hesitate on getting just the room you want - the value is well worth it.  Thanks to all!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The rooms have great views, are so clean, and the staff there is so nice and accommodating!
Summary: My dad and I came down to Laguna to go on a three day surf trip, we decided to stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach. The hotel has the most amazing view of the beach and is a close proximity to local shops and restaurants. Surf beaches are also a short drive away. The rooms are clean, spacious, and cozy perfect for a good nights rest. I wouldn't stay anywhere else in Laguna beach.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Spring break stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach
Summary: We stayed 3 nights and had our teenaged son and a friend of his with us. We all loved the hotel, it's a great place for couples or families. The two queen sized beds in the room were great. Our room had a beautiful view of the ocean and the hotel staff was very friendly and helpful. Free cookies and wine in the evenings! The kids loved being able to go straight from the beach to the pool and hot tub.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We travel very frequently and were fortunate to find this gem in Laguna. Best value for a beach hotel in the USA.   Besides a great location, the service of the staff is what makes this place wonderful. From the GM Peggy, Rachel the Asst GM and everyone on staff were most delightful and helpful.   The service is so much better than other branded resorts like the Ritz. Do yourself a favor and stay at this place.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for 9 days. It's a great place to stay when you want to explore LA and San Diego. Within walking distance of the center. The view of the balcony is amazing with a beautiful sunset! The swimming pool is nice, warm and clean and the service is great!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Wonderful place to stay on the beach
Summary: This beautiful property has many oceanview rooms; we were upgraded to an oceanfront room & received a bottle of sparkling wine because it was our anniversary. We have stayed here before and enjoyed this facility.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Wish we would have stayed longer
Summary: Husband and I stayed for just a night this weekend. Parking can be a bit tricky, as it is in most of Laguna Beach, but luckily we had no problem with on-site parking lot. (Well, a bit, but more on that later.)  We had originally booked a non-ocean view room, but they upgraded us for no charge without telling us, so we weren't sure when we got to our room whether they made a mistake or what! But a nice surprise! Room was nice but certainly nothing you would call luxurious (you're paying for location), very comfortable bed (with no bedspread which I like - ew germs). Products were very nice - soap, shampoo, etc were high quality. We were able to open the windows to get the full effect of the sounds of the ocean (maybe for me a little too full - I'm a light sleeper so had to shut
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a business meeting at the hotel and it was the best ever!.   The hotel was very clean and friendly.  The views are fabulous.  I would highly recommend this hotel for even a special occasion or meeting.  It was walking distance to everything.  The hotel was very clean and staff were very attentive.  Once of the best hotels stays I have had and would highly recommend it.  I hope to be back again for a personal visit.
Manager Response: Dear AS  Thank you for your comments regarding your last meeting at The Inn.  We hope you return not only for a personal visit but also for another company meeting.  With one of the only Ocean View meeting rooms in Laguna we believe it is a great place to get work done.  You touched on a couple of our best attributes our staff and our location.  I am fortunate to work with a great team that truly cares about providing quality guest service.  Thank you again, and we hope to see you soon Peggy

Summary: Had an EXTREMELY wonderful stay!  From the greeting by the bellman until I returned to retrieve things I had left in the safe (DOH!) - the service and whole experience could not have been better.  The bed was VERY comfortable and we enjoyed the binoculars in the room.  The location of this hotel is amazing!  Overlooks main beach.  Was sad to leave...
Manager Response: Dear BabyRN19  Thank you for the wonderful comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn.  I am very happy to read that your stay exceeded your expectations as that is what the team tries to do on a daily basis.  This is a great time of year to see the Gray Whales as they are migrating some times without the assistance of the binoculars Dolphins can be spotted from your room.  We really enjoy the marine life of the Pacific Ocean.    We hope to see you soon, please look me up the next time you are visiting The Inn. Peggy

Summary: We stayed at The Inn at Laguna for my Mother's 85th birthday and all i can say is WOW! They know how to do it. Once they knew it was a birthday celebration, the staff went out of their way to make our stay memorable. We felt like VIPs. The service was amazing, the location cant be beat and the hotel is beautiful. I am a Laguna local and have had family stay at several "other" hotels in Laguna and this takes the cake. By far the best experience out of all. For those that feel great service and quality is hard to find...look no further. This will renew your faith. This is hands down the best hotel on the beach in Laguna. I would not even consider staying elsewhere now that i have discovered this gem.
Manager Response: Dear Paul C  Wow!!!  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit.  We really appreciate that you choose our hotel to celebrate such a great occasion and to leave your home in Laguna to stay at our home.    You certainly touched on our best attribute our people.  I am blessed daily to work with the team at The Inn, they truly care about each guest experience and they want to make every stay memorable.  Hopefully the next time you are looking for a "staycation" you will look no further.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary: We always love to stay somewhere really special for our anniversary...this year we chose Laguna.  We love the little town and it's fun shops, the sound of the ocean, the people and people watching!  The Inn at Laguna Beach is perched right above the beach with amazing views and a perfect location for walking around town.  Our room was immaculate and the patio offered a lovely spot to watch the ocean waves crash.  Sadly, we were there on a VERY rainy weekend (the one Ellen talked about on the Oscars!), but it didn't diminish our wonderful stay.  The staff is so lovely and accommodating, they anticipate your needs!  They offer treats and beverages throughout the day in the lobby, with Starbucks coffee & tea in the morning.  We were treated to chocolate strawberries and bubbly for
Manager Response: Dear JanLeeYountville  Thank you so much for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn.  We hope you return for some of our Southern California Sun very soon than you can truly experience all that Laguna has to offer.  You certainly touched on two of our best attributes our location and our staff.  I am blessed everyday to work with a great group of people at a property that faces the Pacific Ocean.  We hope to see you soon Peggy

Summary: The location is absolutely beautiful! The hotel is ocean front and it has an easy access to the beach.  There are many restaurants, shops, and galleries within walking distance. Las Brisas Restaurant is located right next door and it serves as the in room-dining for this hotel. The hotel staff was not very friendly.  I had requested a king bed, and when we got there they gave us two queens.  When I said something about it, they told me it was because I booked through Hotels.com, and not the hotel.  I didn't understand that response.  On hotels.com I paid in advance the same price offered at the hotel website, and it stated I would get a king bed.   They were very rude about it, I did not appreciate it. Also, we got stuck with a room facing the street.  It was horrible, because
Manager Response: Dear moyanomaya  Thank you so much for your comments regarding your recent visit to The Inn.  We appreciate all comments as we know we can learn from both the positive and the negative.  I want to personally apologize for the response from my staff regarding your bed type, this is not our standard nor a response that I would accept.  We work with our partners to make sure we can meet all of our guest needs and in your case we fell short.  I recommend to my family and friends that anytime they make a reservation through a third party it is a good idea to contact the hotel prior to arrival.  Many properties including ours will reach out to the guest prior to their stay to confirm the reservation and to make helpful hints on what to do in the area but when the reservation is booked through a 3rd party we do not have the contact information so things will fall through the cracks.  The next time you are visiting California's Gold Coast please reach out to me directly so I can oversee your reservation process and give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you and I hope to see you in the near future Peggy

Summary: My better half and I stayed here for a special occasion. We were referred by a close friend to lodge here...and now it makes sense! For example, an employee named Lindsy was super friendly and made us feel right at home. She was very knowledgable about the area and knew exactly how to get us what we wanted. A+++
Manager Response: Dear lacop1  Thank you for your kind review regarding your recent visit to The Inn.  I am so happy to see that Lindsy assisted you, please know whether it is Lindsy or another team member you will receive the same level of service.  We hope you do not wait for the next special occasion to visit The Inn, hopefully we will see you sooner rather than later.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary: I really liked this spot.  This is not a Four Season's...but they don't pretend to be.  It's a very nice Inn with great views.  Loved sleeping to the sound of the surf.  It's right on a little bluff at the north end of Laguna Beach, and easy walk to the town.  One thing to keep in mind, they don't really have onsite food at all.  But they have all kinds of little workarounds, and can provide what you need.  I personally like getting out and exploring anyway.  Very nice and affordable spot from which to enjoy a great ocean town, Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Dear Khaneseur  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach, so happy to read you "Really Like This Place."  We think we have a pretty good location as you said on top of the bluff steps to the beach and within walking distance to over 40 restaurants.  We do not have a restaurant on property but we have good partners that work with us, one being Las Brisas who provides a menu for in room dining.  We hope you come back to Laguna to enjoy the Ocean and our restaurants and everything else Laguna Beach has to offer.  Please look me up on your next visit.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary: Stayed just one night before catching  a flight back to the UK. Fantastic room, fantastic view, fantastic place. Sitting watching the sun come up and go down and everything in between - it doesn't get much better than this. Rooms were really clean and welcoming, early drinks were a nice touch and staff very accommodating. Would definatly want to stay here again when in the area.
Manager Response: Dear magnafox  Thank you for you kind comments regarding your recent visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  Not only do we hope you return but we hope you stay a little longer on your next visit.  Thank you and please look me up the next time you are visiting so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Peggy

Summary Heading: best location in all of laguna
Summary: where do I begin...? this hotel is special. I am from laguna beach and have been broken hearted to return home to see all of my favorite hotels and restaurants turned into generic, soulless carbon copies. I was so relieved and hopeful to see the Inn at Laguna has been updated so beautifully while still keeping its Laguna charm. My hat is off to the manager Peggy Trott, for keeping the integrity of the Inn at Laguna alive! The service at the Inn at Laguna was five star yet without the 5 star price tag. The folks at the front desk were very friendly and incredibly attentive. Sleepytime tea delivered to our room just as the sun goes down every night really hit the spot. I never expect delicious croissants at a hotel however, these were somehow the best I have ever had! The sheets
Manager Response: Dear Miranda S  Thank you for your kind comments regarding your recent visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am blessed to be surrounded by a great group of people who truly care about each guest stay and as I always tell them they are the soul of our property.  We have great partners and I have to agree our croissants and pastries are pretty good, we work with a local baker who delivers fresh daily.  We believe we have one of the best locations in Laguna, I am happy you agree.  As we are steps from the Pacific Ocean and a couple of blocks to the Village of Laguna.  We hope to see you in the future so we can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: My husband and I have been coming to the Inn at least once a year for about 20 years. We always get a king/ full balcony/ ocean view room and rarely leave. It is the most relaxing and rejuvenating weekend we spend all year.  I have stayed at less impressive hotels in the area but this is the absolute perfect property.  On the north end of Main Beach, it over looks a well used walking path along the beach and through Heisler Park. If you like people and dog watching, this is the place. If you like to watch for dolphins and sea lions, this is the place! It is also close to restaurants, shops and art galleries in town.  We have been through many ownership changes over the years and this relatively new change has brought some different ideas to the Inn.  I am sad to see the
Manager Response: Dear Stacie4  Thank you for your comments after your recent stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  We truly appreciate your business and your loyalty.
