We believe everyone needs to ds-stress and relax a little so we are happy to accommodate your needs,  As you have seen many changes have been made over the years we are sorry you do not like all of them but hopefully you like most of them.  Thank you again for staying with us, on your next visit please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Peggy

Summary Heading: Awesome location with amazing views of ocean from room
Summary: To say that this hotel has awesome views is an understatement. You are literally right on top of the ocean.  We could see the waves crashing in from our bed.   It was beautiful.  Further, the hotel is conveniently located steps away from countless shops, restaurants and art galleries.  Truly the perfect location.  I was also impressed by their complimentary happy hour which occurred daily at 5:00pm, as well as the complimentary Starbucks coffee in the morning.  The room was very nice and the bed was very comfortable.  My only complaint would be the noise.  There is not very good sound-proofing so we frequently heard loud banging from people upstairs as well as other guests talking and laughing in the hallway.  This made my fiancé and I self-conscious about making too much noise
Manager Response: Dear Critical Brent  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  We take all comments seriously both positive and negative as we believe we will earn form all.  I was sorry to see that the noise bothered you and I wish I could assure you it will not be a factor in the future but I cannot, as we do not have plans for a building renovation.  When we renovated we did what we could to mitigate noise but we were unable to completely eliminate it. (sorry)  As for the positive, we think our location is second to none so I am so happy you agree.  Not only, do we offer wine and coffee, but we also have complimentary cookies in the evening, Beach Chairs and Umbrellas and WiFi.  Thank you so much for staying with us I do hope you return in the very near future.  Peggy

Summary Heading: Best Place to Stay In Laguna Beach
Summary: This was our second stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach. We stayed there for 18 days this year after staying there for just over a week in 2013. We loved our room with a king bed and balcony overlooking the beach and the ocean. The rooms are freshly remodeled, efficiently appointed, and technologically adept.  The staff is exceptional and go out of their way to ensure a wonderful stay. The location is outstanding as it is walking distance to Main Beach, the shops and restaurants in the downtown area and conveniently located on PCH for a quick drive up to Newport Beach or Balboa Island or south to Laguna Niguel. I can assure you, we will be back next year. And maybe the best attribute is how immaculate they keep the grounds and how accommodating housekeeping is to your needs.
Manager Response: Dear barryzoob2014  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  You commented on our best attributes our staff and our location.  Staying 18 days you really get to experience of being a local, we like that we are close to everything!!!  Thank you so much for your comments, we are looking forward to your return. Peggy

Summary: We had the most amazing time staying here.  We booked a last minute staycation in the area (we're locals) and it turned out to be a rainy, cold weekend.  Walking into the hotel lobby we were greeted with wine, smiles and a room upgrade.  While enjoying the rainy ocean view, we had a knock at our door to champagne provided to us from the staff. Warm chocolate cookies followed the evening wine. It was walking distance to downtown Laguna restaurants, shops, etc.  The staff was amazing, the views were great and we plan to most definitely return!
Manager Response: Dear smcdani91  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  We love that locals want to stay as we believe you can really get away without having to get away.  I am blessed every day to work with such a great group of people, they care about each guest experience and they want everyone to leave with a positive memory.  I am happy you will return, please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: I 110% recommend a stay at the Inn at Laguna. We had a gorgeous balcony ocean view room with a view of the city and the ocean. The hotel staff were amazing- SO friendly and outgoing & really made our occasion special. We had travelled out to CA for our "babymoon" and upon our arrival we were greeted with a tray of cookies, a personal card and even a baby gift! I couldn't believe how much the staff went out of their way to make our event special for us.  The hotel was within walking distance to downtown- VERY easy to get everywhere we wanted to go & just steps away from the sandy beach.  The staff had great recommendations on restaurants in the downtown area & my husband loved the wine reception each night we were there!  Get ready for gorgeous views & amazing service... I want
Manager Response: Dear Emily V  Thank you so much for your comments regarding your recent visit.  We are looking forward to meeting your baby, maybe you will want to celebrate a first birthday!!!  I am very fortunate to work with such a great staff they care about every guest experience and clearly this showed during your stay.  We hope to see you again soon Peggy

Summary: The location was easy to find, got there early and they let us check in. We stayed on the 'village' side, it was ok, didn't need the beach side. Very close to the beach, go out of the lobby down the stairs and it was right there. Loved that, the rooms were clean, not huge but who needs huge when you have the ocean outside the door. The room was modern, the staff was pleasant, they had a wine tasting in the evening, coffee/tea bar in the morning, close to shops and restaurants, It was a stress free trip. They even switched out the room due to a minor booking error.
Manager Response: Dear Tataone69  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach. We are happy to accommodate an early arrival whenever possible so I am very pleased that we were able to accommodate you.  You commented on a few of our greatest attributes our staff and our location.  Our staff truly does care about each guest experience so I am happy they made an impression for your one night stay, hopefully next time you can stay longer.  Not only do we offer, wine and coffee and tea, but we also offer milk and cookies, WiFi, and Beach chairs and towels.  Thank you again for your comments, please look me up on your next visit as I would love to give you  a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: so nice , great people , great hotel , great location
Summary: we had a tough start to our trip to Laguna Beach, found ourselves in a bad situation, the people at this hotel absolutely saved our trip and made a bad experience into one of the best vacations we have ever had,cannot say enough good things about the way we were treated and how everything worked out at this hotel. Our room had a spectacular view of the Pacific ocean and they even had free cookies and milk every night in the lobby,how nice is that
Manager Response: Dear Tim M  Thank you for your kind review regarding your recent visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  We are sorry for how your stay started, it was our goal and by reading your review we accomplished it, was to make sure you and your family knew that not all people or businesses in Laguna Beach were bad.  We were happy to turn your situation into a positive one and we hope you will come back and visit us soon.  Thank you again Peggy

Summary Heading: Clean hotel, with beautiful ocean views
Summary: We intended to stay at the hotel for one night, however, ended up staying 3 and would have stayed 4 if there was availability. The staff was extremely helpful. The daytime staff member (cannot remember her name--blonde hair) during the week (we stayed Wed-Fri) was very helpful and pleasant to work with. We appreciate her efforts to fully accommodate our needs.   The ocean view from our room was amazing, as well as, views from any where on the property.
Manager Response: Dear Jmlewis 12  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  We are happy you extended your stay and sorry that we were not able to accommodate you longer.  I am guessing it was Ekaterina who was able to assist you but I also know I am blessed everyday to work with a fantastic team so it might have been another individual as well.  We hope you return soon and next time plan in advance to stay longer as we want to make sure we can accommodate your stay.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary: I really enjoyed staying at this hotel for a business meeting.  The view from the conference room was beautiful, and made the meetings fly by.  The nearby nightlife was a great time as well.  This is an older hotel but I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Kristin I  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  You mentioned our location and as much as we would love to take credit for the view, credit goes to the Pacific Ocean and all of its glory.  We are happy that staring at the ocean made your meetings seem to go a little faster.  Being a couple of blocks from the Village of Laguna beach and steps from the Ocean it does make for a good break.  Thank you for your business we truly appreciate it and we do hope to see you here in the near future.  Peggy

Summary: This was a comfortable affordable beach front hotel centrally located to town.  The room was clean and the staff were very attentive.  The rooms don't have up-to-the minute design, but that was OK with us, because it was reasonably priced.  Good restaurant in the hotel for dinner and breakfast with ocean view!
Manager Response: Dear Sylvia C  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  I feel very fortunate everyday to work with such a great group of people so I am happy to see that they were able to exceed your expectations.  The team truly cares about every guest stay and it is there goal to make sure everyone leaves with a positive memory.  We are fortunate to have great partners in the community one of them being Las Brisas, the iconic restaurant next door as they provide room service for the hotel.  I am happy that you enjoyed the experience.  Thank you again for your comments, we appreciate your business and we hope to see you soon.  Peggy

Summary: My second visit and its great to be back. If you have any doubt on whether to stay here or not just wait until you are in your room, open the patio doors and see and smell the ocean.  As ever service at check in was smooth, friendly and efficient exactly as it should be. Ocean view room is well presented, with adequate supplies of coffee, snacks, and bathroom accessories.  The bed and sleep quality is great, perhaps something to do with coming off a long haul flight, and the location is perfect. Walking distance from everything from a coffee at Starbucks or a great meal at one of the many restaurants in the town.  Will enjoy the remainder of my stay and cant wait to come back.
Manager Response: Dear Exiles  Thank you for your comment regarding your recent visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on a couple of our greatest attributes our staff and our location.  I am lucky to work everyday with a team of people that truly care about each guest experience. We want every guest to leave with a positive memory and wanting to return soon.    Our location is second to none in Laguna as you mentioned we are within walking distance of over 40 great restaurants and we are steps from the beach.   We truly appreciate your business and we look forward to your return.  Please look me up on your next visit as I would love to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: Will definitely return to this little gem.
Summary: We had such a good experience here.  Upon arrival we received a room upgrade to an ocean view room! The Terrace has amazing views of the coastline and surrounding area.  The Inn is well maintained and in a fantastic location. You are steps from the beach and a short walk from the heart of town.  There are lots of options for some beautiful walks.  Rooms were sparkling clean and nicely appointed.  We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Seg1227,  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  We cannot agree with you more regarding our "fantastic" location, as you noted we are steps from the Beach and a few blocks from the Village.  I will share your review with our Housekeeping staff as they take great pride in keeping the Hotel clean and in making sure each guest has a great stay.  Thank you again and we look forward to your next visit Peggy

Summary: Beautiful beach front location! Very romantic view. Very good customer service. Love that they are pet friendly. We received great accommodations for the value! We look forward to returning again soon!
Manager Response: Dear Petcrazytravelers,  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on many of our great attributes as we believe our location is second to none.  I am lucky everyday to work with such a great group of people who care about everyone's guest experience.    We look forward to your next visit, please look me up so I can give you and your pets a warm welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Spent some days there on Holiday. Good location right next to the beach. Originally we had a Village Room, but managed to upgrade it to the Balcony Ocean View on arrival and it was worth every penny ($25 per night). Only con for our stay was the construction site next to the hotel, but it really didn't bother us, since noice was present only during day.
Manager Response: Dear AnttiPulkka  Thank you for your review regarding your last visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  We are happy that you were able to upgrade to a room with a Balcony on the Ocean side of the hotel, we believe there is no better way to experience the Pacific Ocean.  Sorry about the Construction, this is a project that the City of Laguna is working on, it is slated to finish within the next couple of months.  Once it is complete we will have a "state of the art" Lifeguard headquarters and a multi-million dollar park next door to the hotel.  We do hope you return to Laguna Beach so you can see the finished project.  Thank you again we truly appreciate your comments.  Peggy

Summary: I stay here once a year and love the service(especially Brandon).The view is perfect and at night you could hear the waves it is very therapeutic. My family an I love to eat dinner at Las Brisas and than relax on our hotel balcony while playing family board games.
Manager Response: Dear GigiNkids  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  It warms my heart to read that you "love the service", I am lucky to work with Brendan and the rest of the team, as they truly care about each guest experience.   We are fortunate to have a great partnership with the iconic Las Brisas restaurant and it sounds like you spent a perfect evening with your family dining and enjoying the surroundings.  Please look me up on your next visit, we would love to see you more than once a year!!!  Thank you  Peggy

Summary Heading: Beautiful Views, great location but noisy
Summary: The hotel is nice.  Not too fancy but well appointed, clean and the staff is friendly.  Located on the cliff over the beach, gorgeous views, sunrise was spectacular.  Nice locality to the downtown area, not too far, quick 2 minute walk.  The only complaint I had was that you could hear EVERY noise in the rooms around you.  Walls were paper thin and if you have neighbors that like to stay up late, you're in trouble.  Loved the place, just bring earplugs for sleeping.
Manager Response: Dear Joan C  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  I was sorry to read that you heard noise from other rooms, our goal is to make sure all guest have a pleasant, relaxing stay, please accept my sincere apologies.  Thank you for pointing out the friendliness of the staff, I am blessed to work with such a great team who truly cares about each guest visit.  You also touched on our location we agree that it is centrally located, steps from the beach and minutes to downtown.  Please look me up on your next visit, as I would like to ensure you have a pleasant, relaxing and quite stay.  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: Lo Key Relaxing right on the pacific
Summary: this is not a 4 star hotel - like the one down the street but do you really need one with the view of the Pacific?  the rooms are clean. although we had trouble with the cable tv. a very nice young man came to help us. the lobby serves wine at 5p and cookies thru bedtime: a nice touch. convenient location to everything - but not enough parking for guests - the hotel  did reimburse parking the day we couldn't fine parking in the hotel garage.  the pool and hot tub small but clean and perfect temp. A lovely paved walk right outside the ocean side of the hotel is glorious.
Manager Response: Dear Light_33  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am sorry to read that your TV was not working properly but I am happy that we were able to resolve the issue for you.  In our hectic world the best compliment you could pay is that this is a place to relax, we want our guest to be able to unwind and enjoy themselves.  Along with the wine hour and cookies we also have coffee and tea in the morning along with some other great amenities.  Thank you again for your comments, please visit again and the next time you are in Laguna please look me up so I can give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary: We hadn't been to Calif in years and asked one or two friends where to stay.  In the end, we went on line and decided on The Inn at Laguna Beach, in Laguna Beach, Calif.  We stayed for 16 days, right on the ocean, very nice size room with a terrace connecting to the pool, spa, area and not a sound from any of the other guests.  Weather was spectacular which added to our splendor of fabulous sunrises and sunsets, beautiful beaches right in front of our eyes, fabulous restaurants and many other towns to visit.  The hotel's amenities were coffee in the am, free wine at 5pm for all guests and chocolate chip cookies when you got back to the hotel at night.  The service people were fabulous with directions, restaurants, always accommodating and a smile on their faces.  Our room was
Manager Response: Dear Lois and Richard  Thank you so much for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  We are certainly happy you enjoyed everything, you certainly choose the right time to be away from the East Coast and the cold weather.  We hope it does not take you years to come back as we would love to see you sooner.  Thank you again, please look me up on your next visit  Peggy

Summary: This place is right on the beach. Beautiful scenery; nice rooms, clean and service is wonderful. Very friendly staff. They offer wine at around 5 pm and later in the evening, they have cookies available. Lots of shops around. Restaurant is next door; no restaurant in the premises.
Manager Response: Dear Stollyboy  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit.  You certainly touched on two of our best attributes our staff and our location.  I am fortunate to work with a great team who truly cares about each guest experience.  Being located steps from Main Beach and within walking distance of 40 restaurants, shops and galleries we think we have the perfect spot.  Please come visit again and do reach out as I would love to give you a warm welcome back to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary: We have stayed in Laguna several times and this is hands down the nicest place for the price. It's right on the beach and within walking distance of everything laguna fun. Drew was amazing, always helpful and when we lost our cell phone he was on top of finding it! Additionally he always greeted us with a smile, opened every door he could and was just overall wanting to please. Stay here on your next trip -- and bring your dog apparently they are pet friendly. An even bigger plus in my book especially considering how clean and tidy everything was!
Manager Response: Dear Jacqueline H  Thank you for your comments regarding your last visit.  I agree Drew is wonderful, I am blessed to work with him and the rest of the team on daily basis.  We think our location is pretty perfect so thank you for pointing that out and yeas we are dog friendly, after all they are part of the family.  We hope to see you again in the very near future. Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: Wonderful and right on the beach
Summary: It looks from the beach like this hotel has a private stairway to the beach.  That's not true/  It is right on the pedestrian walkway along the beach, a great stretch, which when we went there, had some interesting tide pools.  It's otherwise very well situated, being right at downtown.  It would be our choice again.
Manager Response: Dear Robert P  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touch on one of our best attributes our location.  We are just steps from the beach and a few blocks from the village of Laguna Beach.  Heisler path runs along the backside of the Hotel and it is filled with wonderful Public Art, from the path there are steps to Main Beach and to our award winning Tide Pools.  Thank you for making the Inn at Laguna Beach your hotel of choice while visiting our City, we truly appreciate your business.  On your next visit please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary Heading: WELL WORTH LAGUNA AND THE INN
Summary: The Inn at Laguna Beach is perfectly located. Truly, just right!  Oceanfront on a lovely beach with a superb outdoor pool and access to so many points of interest close by. The rooms are clean and well decorated. Nothing fancy. Functional and attractive.  The staff is truly top notch. They are concerned about your every moment there and will do anything to make your stay pleasant and enjoyable.  The location of the Inn at Laguna Beach is not only on the ocean, it is also within walking distance of just about everything of interest in the beachfront area.   If you can, make sure to get an oceanfront room. We were not that fortunate and ended up with a street-side view. Good reason to keep the shutters closed.    You will enjoy your stay here not only at The Inn but also in Laguna
Manager Response: Dear tpmedia  Thank you for your comments regarding your most recent visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach, I am sorry we could not accommodate your Ocean View room, hopefully next time you will reserve your room early enough so you can enjoy one of our Ocean View rooms with a balcony.  This way you can truly take in the sights and sounds of the Pacific Ocean.  You touched on two of our best attributes our location and our staff.  We believe our location is second to none, just steps from the beach and a couple of blocks into the Village of Laguna Beach.  Once you arrive your car can stay parked and you can enjoy all the restaurants, shops, and galleries in the Village of Laguna.    I am truly fortunate to work with a great team of people, each individual team member truly cares about each guest stay.  We want everyone to leave with positive memoires as it is our hope to see you again in the near future,  Thank you so much for staying with us, the next time you visit please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Peggy

Summary Heading: Happy Birthday Stay at the Beach with Puppies Too!
Summary: Spectacular, Oceanfront dog friendly Inn.  This is a world class Inn with unmatched personalized attention.  The entire staff showed exquisite customer service.  It was my husband’s birthday and we brought another couple and our two dogs to share his special stay.  The front desk staff upgraded our room and allowed us to have an early check in. We checked into a beautiful room right on the beach that boasted a porch with large seating area, beautiful views and the sound of crashing waves.  Our room was spacious, clean and accommodating.  Since part of our family is our pets we looked very hard to find a nice hotel that could allow for our two dogs.  When we arrived the staff came around the counter and pet our little guys and made us just feel like we were not at an Inn.  More
Manager Response: Dear Anne Marie M  Thank you so much for your comments regarding your recent visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am so happy your husband had a great birthday and we truly appreciate you celebrating the occasion with us.  Ekaterina is a gem and I am lucky everyday to work with a great team of people.  As I tell them it is the people that are the heart and soul of our business and I am so happy that you were able to experience what I experience every day.  We are happy that you brought your pets with you as they are your family and we would not want you to leave any family member at home.  Laguna Beach itself is very pet friendly, September through June pets are allowed on the beach all day and from June through September the beaches are pet friendly until 9:00am and after 6:00pm.  Many restaurants have outdoor seating that will accommodate pets, and many retail stores will have a bowl of water or a treat for your four legged friend.  We certainly hope to see you soon, please do not wait to celebrate another special occasion, as we can make any visit special.  Thank you again Peggy

Summary: Very nice hotel, perfect location, wonderful weekend. The place is great ... ok, not a Ritz, so expect a little more boutique and "homey", but everyone was so nice ... the location, views, are just perfect. The pool was right our door, the town was a few steps away, this was just the perfect getaway ... If you're thinking Ritz-like, think again, if you're thinking wonderful getaway with great folks, location, and lovely rooms and a location you can hear the waves, this is quite a find!!
Manager Response: Dear Frank M  Thank you for your kind comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach and thank you for staying with us.  We do agree with you that our location is "perfect" a couple of blocks from the Village and steps to the beach.  I work with a group of people that truly care about each guest experience so we all try to create positive memories.    We are very happy you found us and we look forward to your return.  Please look me up on your next visit so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: Outstanding location, best combination of classy comfortable cozy romantic - will definitely plan future getaways here!
Summary: We were celebrating our anniversary and LOVED our experience here! Can't beat the location - easy walking distance to everything fun, from gorgeous beaches in both directions, to fabulous restaurants, galleries and shops in the heart of town. Views are SPECTACULAR! Very clean property all the way around,  fresh beachy decor, very friendly and professional staff made our stay very comfortable.  Felt like we were in paradise, anywhere in the world. We've stayed at other properties with great service -- Casa Laguna Inn (B&B - beautiful property and amazing breakfast but small rooms too far from town) and Surf and Sand (classy, good rooms and great views but too big and far from town for our taste) -- and we like this much better for location, rooms, ambiance, and overall value.
Manager Response: Dear Melanie_Antoine  Thank you for celebrating your anniversary with us, we truly appreciate it.  I would also like to thank you for your kind comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  You certainly touched on a couple of our great attributes our location and our staff.  We agree we have the best location in town, easy access to the beach, and a couple of blocks into the Village of Laguna.  We also believe that it is our staff that brings heart and soul to our property.  I am blessed everyday to work with our team.  Each member truly cares about the guest experience and they want everyone to leave with positive memories.  We hope to see you again, hopefully before your next anniversary.  The next time you are here please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: There are no words to describe how amazing this hotel is. I had made last minute reservations and there was only one room left with King bed/village view.  I was traveling with both of my children so a king was a bit cramped.  Upon arrival, the front desk lady was able to upgrade us to room with two queens and opened up to the pool.  We were very impressed!  The room was very clean and cozy.  It had all the plenty of snacks and drinks, including Starbucks coffee.  The beds were very comfortable, as well.    The hotel offers wine tasting at 5pm, which I took advantage of.  The wine was delicious and the company was good.  They also served fresh Starbucks coffee every morning.  The location is perfect with amazing views.  The staff was very attentive and friendly.  The only
Manager Response: Dear Monica  We hope you and your boys return to our "little piece of Heaven", especially since you did not want to leave.  Thank you so much for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am grateful everyday to work with a team that truly cares about the guest experience, they really want to make sure every guest leaves with positive memories of there stay in Laguna Beach.  You touched on a couple of our amenities, coffee in the morning and wine hour in the evenings, we also offer cookies and milk, beach chairs, and much more.  I am happy you enjoyed the wine hour it is a good time for our guest to interact with each other and a member of the management team.  Thank you again, please return and the next time you do please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Peggy

Summary: I decided that my wife and I had to get away after Xmas, but were worried that nothing would be available with so little notice.  I found the Inn At Laguna Beach on Google and liked the location.  I called them and was surprised to find that they had a number of rooms for various prices.  The agent, a delightful young lady named Heather, helped me select a room that satisfied my requirements.  When I arrived, the staff was excellent.  The property was beautiful, right on the ocean.  Our room had an ocean view so we spent most of our time sitting on our balcony and walking on the beach.  I had one of the best night's sleep I've had in a while.  For breakfast, we took a short walk up the beach to C'est La Vie, one of our favorite restaurants in the area.  All in all, the stay was
Manager Response: Dear Steven K  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  I enjoy coming to work each and spending my time with a great team.  We could not agree more regarding Heather, she has done such a great job for us that we just promoted her and we believe she will help the Hotel continue to improve.  As it is our goal to consistently exceed the expectations of our guests.  The next time you and your wife need time to relax please come back and visit us, we are here to recommend restaurants in the area, in room massage, or give you the best coves to go explore.  Thank you again, we hope to see you soon. Peggy

Summary: One of the best locations in Laguna, easy walk to shops/stores for all ages..A little loud above the pool during the day, though the evening surf sound can't be beat. Outstanding restaurants, excellent California style mexican across the street at Carmelitas and if you like real local seafood, search out Zoolu (a bit of a hike). Best of all, the staff is nice and honest (we accidently left Rose Bowl tickets in the room which were turned in to the front desk and held for us, wow).
Manager Response: Dear 123jimBoston  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach, you touched on two of our best attributes our staff and our location.  I am fortunate every day to come to work and be surrounded by a great team.  Nothing makes our team happier then to return missing items to there rightful owner, I do hope you enjoyed the Rose Bowl, it was good game in a great environment.    As for our location, you are correct we are within walking distance of so many great restaurants, galleries, and shopping.  The restaurants you choose were a couple of my favorite.  Please come back and visit us again and when you do please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: Our week in heaven or Laguna Beach...
Summary: Location location location! Walk everywhere. Feet from the ocean, wonderful ocean views. The staff couldn't be any nicer. Hot tea delivered to the room nightly. Beautiful sunsets on the terrace. The room was a bit small but for more money you can get a bigger room. Perfect relaxing week at the beach! Love love love this place!
Manager Response: Dear Hollyh614  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on our best attribute our location, we like to say that once you are here there is no need to get back in a car.  Your heading is why we love to live here as we think it is a little slice of Heaven but we love to share.  We hope you will come back and visit us soon.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Love everything about this facility. The grounds, the beach, the generously sized rooms, the nightly hot tea delivered to the room, the cookies and milk in the lobby as well as fresh cucumber ice water, the newspapers, the complimentary beach chairs and towels, the sheets and comfortable beds, the front desk personnel, the door men, the bell desk service, the private parking, the binoculars in the rooms the sunset patio bar and the incredible view from our room and everything else.
Manager Response: Dear Judie M  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am happy to see that in every way we exceeded your expectation as this is what we strive for with every guest.  Please look me up the next time you are in Laguna Beach so I can give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you and Happy New Year Peggy

Summary: Do they simply not care or do they take their location for granted? Oceanfront hotel with views of main beach and Heisler Park! Perfect, right? Not so fast... Older hotel with a surface remodel missing some key points yet priced as a high end resort. Older screen doors. lower textured ceilings. Smelly room deodorizer. Uncomfortable bed with a super heavy comforter that made it impossible to even roll over. No restaurant (small limited menu available from Las Brisas next door) no bar, no movies on tv, poor wifi, no valet parking (yet high parking rates). Did they ask me how was my stay going? No. Did they know it wasn't a perfect stay? Well, yes, there were signs. Like the Engineer called up to our room to fix our tv.  He couldn't get wifi either even though there was a router
Manager Response: Dear Artladyla  I am so sorry to read your review regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  Although you do not feel like we care we truly do care, we learn from all comments both positive and negative, and we will do our best to improve.  Some improvements we made in 2013 included an upgrade to our WiFi system and our HD programming, Our WiFi provider was experiencing technical difficulty during part of your stay and for this I am truly sorry.  We did implement the Las Brisas menu this year as we do not have a restaurant but we are within walking distance of over 40 restaurants in town.    In 2014 we have plans to eliminate the heavy duvet, upgrade our linens, and replace our screen doors along with other mechanical upgrades.  I know this will not change your stay but hopefully our changes will impact future stays.    We truly do care about your stay and I am sorry that it was less then perfect, we appreciate your business and we hope you will give us another chance.  Please let me know the next time you plan on visiting Laguna Beach.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: My family and I recently stayed at the Inn at Laguna.  "Wow" is the best way to sum it up.  The Inn is in a perfect location to enjoy the beach and stroll downtown.  We stayed in "ocean view" rooms which were worth their weight in gold!  Why spend the money to stay in Laguna without a view of the ocean or the gorgeous sunsets!  So close to the beach that we fell asleep listening to the waves break the shoreline without even opening our balcony doors!  Impeccably clean rooms and all employees were extremely courteous and helpful.  Fresh free Starbucks coffee in the lobby every morning and cookies and milk in the lobby by night.  We will return to Laguna Beach again some day and there is no doubt, we will stay at the Inn at Laguna.
Manager Response: Dear Lori B  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  It was so nice of you to touch on our best two attributes our staff and our location.  I am very fortunate to work with a great group team of people who truly care about every guest experience.  We like our location because it is an easy stroll into the Village or great place to sit on your balcony and take in the sights and sounds of the Pacific Ocean.  On your next visit please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back!!!  Thank you Peggy

Summary: I recently stayed at the Inn at Laguna Beach @ 211 North Coast Hwy, Laguna Beach, CA 92651 We stayed for two beautiful days. The management was on point. The room was nice, bright, clean And the view was breath taking. People spend millions of dollars for a view like this hotel has and for  Those two days... It was our view. Everything was "first class". Two people that really stood out to make  Our stay complete... Jonathon Vargas who went way out of his was to make my stay the best and  Alfonso Rodriguez always greeted us with a smile and helped us with whatever we needed. We  Will DEFINITELY BE BACK!
Manager Response: Dear Rick G  Thank you so much for your comments regarding your recent visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  I was so happy to read that Alfonso and Jonathon exceeded your expectations, those two employees along with the rest of the team truly care about each guest stay.  I am pleased to share our view with you and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you and Happy New Year Peggy

Summary: We stayed here for 8 nights for our honeymoon. It was perfectly located. The staff were friendly and helpful.  There were nice extras such as a wine hour every eve and fresh lemonade / biscuits. Also coffee in the morning. The rooms were cosy and it was nice going sleep hearing the waves.
Manager Response: Dear Katie H  First let me congratulate you on your wedding, we are honored you choose to spend your Honeymoon with us!!!  Thank you for your kind comments and for pointing out some of the great amenities we offer.  We look forward to seeing you again, maybe for a first anniversary.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary: We got a great rate for a sea view king and managed to upgrade for $14 a night to the sea view with juliet balcony - it was well worth it! There are some rooms which dont get the full brunt of passer bys but there is a public walk way right in front of the hotel which is a small hinderance but given the view - it is still well worth it if you can get it at a good rate. The service was hit and miss - front desk were extremely helpful where as delivery people/bellboys were not very experienced, however, if you were like me, the good view and comfortable rooms (along with help from front desk) made this a truly enjoyable stay.  Definitely worth getting a room with a view of the beach/ocean.
Manager Response: Dear Wee Tsen  Thank you very much for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am happy see you enjoyed your room and the view from your room.   We certainly appreciate all comments both positive and negative as this will help us improve our service, based on your comments we will be re-training or bell/door staff in hopes to deliver the same high service you experienced from the Front Desk.  Thank you again, please come back and visit us soon Peggy

Summary: We stayed here in early/mid October for 3 days of our holidays.  The hotel location is excellent, being no more than 2 mins walk from the beach or 5mins to the centre of Laguna.  The hotel was fairly expensive being only marginally cheaper than Surf & Sand further south, so you can imagine my disappointment/annoyance when we got an email 2 days before arriving to say the pool was being serviced and the whole pool area was out if use for 5 days!!!  This was not made clear on booking (through their own website) only 7 days before we arrived.  Additionally the "Ocean View" room was at best partial ocean view. Two thirds were obscured by the hill/gardens and bushes.  If they try to give you an ocean view room on the 2nd floor south (above the car-park) then be wary, and ask to see
Manager Response: Dear Captain_JD  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  I do apologize for the work on the pool during your stay, we tried to minimize the guest impact but in your case we clearly failed and for this I am truly sorry.  I am happy that you found our location excellent as we are only steps to the Main Beach and a couple of blocks to the Village of Laguna which has over 40 great restaurants and many art galleries and retail outlets for shopping.  The next time you return to Laguna Beach please let me assist you with your reservation.  Contact me directly so we can accommodate all of your needs, we look forward to welcoming you back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: We were welcomed by Jonathon at the front desk and were checked in quickly. Our room reminded me of the Shutters in LA (but 1/3 the cost), spacious, open floor plan with terrace that overlooks ocean. The location is perfect minutes from restaurants, shopping and steps from the beach. I would highly recommend! A+ for friendly staff, beautiful room, unbelievable view and awesome price. Hidden Gem!
Manager Response: Dear Scolona  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  You certainly touched on all of the things I like to talk about starting with our staff.  I am fortunate everyday to work with such a great group of people, starting with Jonathan.  He really cares about every guest stay as he wants everyone to leave with a positive memory.    Now that you found the "Hidden Gem" we hope you return for another visit.  Please look me up the next time you visit as I would love to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Stayed here for 2 evenings.  It was sooo nice to open your sliding glass door and overlook the ocean.  It was short walking distance to all the local art galleries, shops, and restaurant.  Definitely made a 2 day getaway very enjoyable!!!
Manager Response: Dear Christine M  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  We do like to boast that we have one of the best locations in Laguna, so I am happy we did not let you down.  With over 40 great restaurants within walking distance and many great shops and galleries there is no need to get in your car.  I am so happy to see you were able to enjoy the sounds of Pacific Ocean, it truly makes for a peaceful stay.  Thank you so much, I hope you return soon as I would love to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back. Peggy

Summary: We have stayed at many other ocean front hotels in Laguna Beach. We have paid much more for getting much less. I feel I work very hard for my money. This is by far worth every penny. We shall return time and again. We spent thanksgiving here 2013. It was above and beyond our expectations.
Manager Response: Dear Bob S  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay in Laguna Beach, we are very happy to make this your second home and we look forward to your return visit.  You touched on a couple of our complimentary amenities the wine hour and the cookies and milk at night.  Our staff truly cares about each guest experience as they want every guest to leave with positive memories and I can see by your review they succeeded.  Thank you so much, we look forward to giving you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back. Peggy

Summary: We stayed here for only 2 nights but wished that we could have stayed for a week. A lovely hotel with an amazing view.  Just wish that they had a bar on the roof as well as the free wine tasting!  Everyone was very friendly and it had a lovely feel about it.  We hope to return again next year.
Manager Response: Dear Louweasle  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach, we hope next year you choose to stay longer.  We think our location is one of the best in Laguna and we certainly have great views of the Pacific Ocean.  We are happy that you were able to partake in our nightly wine hour just one of the complimentary amenities we offer.  Upon your return we will be offering cocktails from the bar and food from Las Brisas on our terrace, hopefully you will give it a try.  Please look me up on your next visit so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary: We stayed here recently for a beach wedding, and overall we were very pleased.  There were a few reservation issues, but the staff worked very hard to fix the problems.  The view was amazing, the rooms were very clean, and the overall feel of the hotel was very relaxing.  They do free wine tasting from 5-6 everynight, which everyone in our party enjoyed. We will return for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Jonathan W  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am sorry to read about your reservation issues but I am happy that everything worked out in the end.  Our staff truly cares about every guest stay and they work to ensure every one leaves with a positive memory.  I am very happy your guest were able to enjoy our wine hour that is one of the amenities we offer along with cookies and milk at night and coffee in the morning.  Thank you again for your comments, on your next visit please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back!!  Thank you Peggy

Summary: My wife and I had our wedding weekend at the Inn in October. The Inn is located right on one of the most scenic beaches you'll ever find. And the staff, especially Gary (head of sales) was incredible and made us and our guests feel right at home.   The facilities are top-notch and I definitely recommend relaxing on the roof, where we had our rehearsal party.  If you're planning a wedding weekend or even just a weekend away I would definitely recommend the Inn.
Manager Response: Dear r s  Thank you for your comments regarding your last stay and congratulations on your wedding, we are honored that you choose to spend such a memorable weekend with us.  I am blessed everyday to work with such a great staff, they care about every guest experience, and Gary is top notch leading by example.  We hope you return to the Inn at Laguna Beach soon, no need to wait for your anniversary.  On your next visit please look me up so I can give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Wonderful location, great staff, fantastic trip.  Very nice rooms with great views (big difference between beach side and not).  We didn't have a balcony room, but they are very nice looking.  The wine reception is very nice and the view from it is an amazing way to start off your evening.  Great location to Laguna Beach restaurants.  Staff is very accommodating and the Manager, Gary, was great.
Manager Response: Dear BlakeAnderson2013  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on some of our best attributes, starting with our staff.  You are correct Gary is great and I am lucky everyday to work with such a talented individual.  He leads his team and sets a great example for the rest of the staff.  Like many ocean front hotels in Laguna Beach we are between the Pacific Ocean and Pacific Coast Highway, more then half of our rooms face the Pacific Ocean.  if you are coming to hear the sounds of the waves when you go to sleep and when you wake up then I recommend an Ocean View Room.  Wine hour on our Terrace has become a hit as you point out it is a great way to start your evening.  We are within walking distance to more than 40 great restaurants, and our staff is quick to recommend their favorites.  Thank you again for your comments and more importantly thank you for staying we us we certainly appreciate your business and we hope you return soon.  Please look me up the next time you visit as I would love to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: Wish me could have stayed longer.
Summary: 2 couples traveling the CA coast, stopped for a one night stay.  From the moment we walked into the Inn it just had a nice vibe about the place.  Our room was perfect, overlooked the ocean with a patio, bed was so comfy, nice sitting area outside of the bathroom to get ready, and I can't even say enough about the walk that we took on the coastline in the morning, each turn we couldn't help but say, wow, wow.  It was like walking in a postcard.   I cannot wait to return to Laguna Beach and the Inn, we all really enjoyed our stay, oh and nice heated pool and hot tub too.
Manager Response: Dear Jillydonut1  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  We hope you return soon so we can share with you more wonders of Laguna Beach.  Our coastline is 7 1/2 miles and much of it is a marine protected area, each one of our coves offers something new to the visitor.  We renovated our rooms a little over a year ago so we are happy that you thought your room was perfect.  We want to make sure every guest has a great stay and leaves with positive memories.  When you return to the Inn please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back!!  Thank you  Peggy

Summary Heading: We had the best time there
Summary: We held our daughter's rehearsal dinner and wedding weekend with family and friends at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  The rooms are all tastefully furnished with balconies overlooking the Pacific Ocean and the views were stunning, especially at sunset.  The hotel  is situated right next to Main Beach and falling asleep to the sound of the ocean waves was a new experience.  Our evening event was on the Pacific Patio, which was spectacular at sunset.  We also used the Laguna Room for the daytime events. I would highly recommend the Inn at Laguna Beach for any event. The hotel is elegant, the service is excellent, the rates are reasonable and the location is fabulous!
Manager Response: Dear 880Cher2013  Thank you for having your daughters rehearsal dinner at the Inn at Laguna Beach and thank you for your comments regarding the event and your stay.  I could not agree with you more that we have our location is fabulous.  I also appreciate you pointing out the service as we do our best to make sure every guest departs with a positive memory.    We renovated the hotel about a year ago all of the guest rooms, the Pacific Terrace and the pool, so I am happy that you liked how we finished the rooms.  Thank you again for your kind comments we hope you return to the Inn soon for a little rest and relaxation.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary Heading: Wedding event at Inn at Lagun
Summary: This is the first time I have ever written an online review, but I had various meetings with the event coordinator Gary, and I was so impressed with him (his creative ideas, knowledge, flexibility, and professionalism) and his helpful staff who really went ABOVE AND BEYOND, that I was couldn't resist making a few comments online.   I live on the East Coast and I hosted my wedding rehearsal dinner at the Inn at Laguna. We had many of our guests staying at the hotel and our event went off without a hitch because the venue and staff were absolutely incredible. Gary was quick to respond, easy to get a hold off, and helped my family and friends (who can be quite demanding) figure out every detail. For example, when my fiance shipped his tux to the hotel, Gary made sure to track it
Manager Response: Dear Glenda B  Thank you for your comments and I am so happy that we have the honor of being your first on-line review.  We are very lucky to have Gary on our staff and I could not agree with your comments more.  Gary really wants to make sure that everyone who attends an event departs with a positive memory.  He enjoys seeing people happy and he works with the rest of the staff to deliver.  We hope that not only will your East Coast relatives return but we hope you will as well.  When you do please let us know so we can give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you and Congratulations Peggy

Summary Heading: Hands Down Best Location In Laguna Beach!
Summary: Every time I drive past this Inn I say "I'd love to own that place!" The Inn at Laguna Beach has to have the absolute best location in all of Laguna! Right on the sand and close enough to walk to all the great restaurants and shops! It's even within walking distance to the Pageant of the Masters!  I planned a 2 night getaway with my daughter right before her return to college.  Originally I'd planned to book a room in Newport, then I saw the Inn on Jetsetter and immediately booked here instead. We stayed on a Sunday and Monday and I had booked a village view room.  At check-in I was pleasantly surprised when the front desk moved us to an ocean view! Our room was very clean, recently renovated and had a lovely balcony with an amazing ocean view! Listening to the waves crashing
Manager Response: Dear Lisatini 1013  Thank you for your comments regarding your mother daughter stay.  I am so happy the two of you were able to spend the time together and enjoy Laguna Beach.  We could not agree with you more we think we have the best location in town because as you said we are steps from Main Beach and a couple of blocks from the Village of Laguna.  Thank you also for mentioning the staff, every day I feel fortunate to work with a great team.  They really want to make sure that each stay is memorable.  I am very happy you will return with your husband this Summer to attend the Pageant.  Please look me up on your next visit so I can give you a warm Inn at Laguna Beach welcome back.  We really appreciate your business.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary: I stayed at the Inn in mid October. What a wonderful place. I had a room on the fourth floor with a  small, but sufficient, balcony, overlooking the Laguna Beach. Unlike many of the other hotels, there is no noisy PCH between you and the beach, so one can spend, as I did, many a morning lazing in bed, with the doors (with plantation shutters) open, watching and listening to the surf. An wine reception each night only betters the overall experience. Great service, friendly and helpful staff. Parking, however, is $29 a night, but this is CA.
Manager Response: Dear Skinnspirit  Thank you so much for your comments regarding your visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  We certainly appreciate all comments as it helps us improve our product and service.  Thank you for pointing out the friendliness of our staff they certainly try to make sure all guest leave with positive memories.  I am so happy you were able to enjoy in our wine hour as well as take advantage of the lazy mornings listening to the surf.  Based on our location we like to say that guest do not need a car, as once they park it they do not have to move it.  We are 70 steps to the beach and within two blocks of the Village which has many great restaurants and galleries.  Thank you so much for your comments, we hope you return soon, please look me up so I can give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: Great location very clean comfortable rooms.
Summary: When we arrived at the inn we were pleasently surprised at the location and cleanliness of the hotel (very californian in style). As we had arrived quite late  in the evening the staff were very helfull. We had been put in room 417 wich overlooked the main road outside the hotel (village view) We request to be moved to a sea view but were told that they were full at the time , however a very nice young lady offered to move us to a pool/ sea view a couple of days later wich was very nice of them as we were celebrating our ten years of marrige. Overall the hotel was very clean the rooms were very well laid out inc bath robes coffee making facilitys and daily papers, there was also coffee in the hotel reception  every morning and wine tasting on the balcony between 5 and 6 pm every
Manager Response: Dear 142niceman  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach and your visit to our town.  I would like to congratulate you on 10 years of marriage, happy belated anniversary. I am very happy to see that the staff was able to accommodate your needs as it is our hope that everyone departs with positive memories.  You pointed out some of the features we have at the hotel, although we do not have a restaurant we have partnered with Las Brisas next door and they are able to offer Room Service, which is available for our guest for breakfast.  We renovated our rooms last year and added some of the touches like wine hour, upgraded robes, and coffee so I am glad you were able to enjoy.  Residents of Laguna Beach could not agree with you more regarding our location, we certainly think we are centrally located and we enjoy the Laguna Beach lifestyle so I am happy you were able to experience it.  Please do not stay away for 10 years we would like you to return sooner.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Stayed at the Inn for a week on our honeymoon after 3 days in West Hollywood.  Very disappointed with the room which was a standard room and overlooked the car park.  We did know that we wouldn't have a sea view but because of the walkway past our door and window we couldn't open the window and we had to keep the blinds closed all the time. The room itself was lovely albeit a little small.  Staff OK not overly welcoming.  Great to have complimentary wine in the evening on the roof though.  Would recommend for a one or two night stay but I think there are better places to stay for the money spent.
Manager Response: Dear Sunseeker290657  Congratulations on your wedding and happy belated honeymoon!!!  Like many of the ocean front hotels in Laguna Beach we are between Pacific Coast Highway and the Pacific Ocean.  I am sorry that you were not happy with your room as we try to do everything we can to make sure guest are comfortable. I am happy that you enjoyed our wine hour on the Terrace and the location of the hotel.  I do hope you return to Laguna Beach and in particular to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  If I can help you with a reservation in the future please let me know.  Thank you again for your comments Peggy

Summary Heading: Get an Ocean Front or Don't stay at Inn
Summary: If you can't afford or can't get an Ocean Front Room you could do better at another hotel. The non ocean front over look the parking lot and you can't open the windows due to highway noise. If you can get an Ocean front, this hotel is the best room and location in Laguna. Great pool, free wine party. Staff is friendly and work to make you feel at home. I will come back when I can get on the ocean.
Manager Response: Dear Bruce W  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach. Like most ocean front hotels in Laguna Beach we are situated between Pacific Coast Highway and the Pacific Ocean so unfortunately not all of our rooms are Ocean Front.  I am happy to see that you will return and stay in an Ocean view room.  You touched on a couple of our greatest attributes our staff and our locations.  I am blessed everyday to work with such a great team, they truly care about each guest experience and want every guest to leave with a positive memory.  Being steps from Main Beach and a couple of blocks from the Village of Laguna with over 40 restaurants and some great art galleries you truly cannot go wrong with our location.  I do hope to meet you on your next visit and give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary: We stayed here with our 10mth old boy to end our Californian adventure.  Probably the nicest room of the trip, very spacious (even with a cot/crib) in it stunning view out to see and a very comfortable and airy room.  Bathroom was modern, clean and in excellent condition.  Agree with what others said; great location, expensive car park but this is made up for by complementary drinks for an hour in the evening.  Only stayed for one night to break up the trip to LAX from San Diego so could not really comment on other feature of the hotel, did not use the pool etc.  Free Wi-Fi was good but I would like to have seen free bottled water but this does not see to be widely done in Californian hotels.  I would recommend this place and definitely stay again
Manager Response: Dear Markyb18  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  We hope next time you are able to sty a little longer so you can truly experience our town.  Thank you for pointing out our location we believe it is one of our best attributes besides our staff.  We like to stay that once you park your car you do not have to move it as we are steps form Main Beach and a couple of blocks from the Village of Laguna.  Thank you again for your comments please return to Laguna Beach and please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: Great price point & location with sweet touches
Summary: We booked to stay 1 night at this inn on the hoof after driving from Vegas to Laguna. It's a v sweet place with affable staff. Our lady who checked us in gave us complimentary parking, which was welcome as the charge otherwise is $25! She called a younger receptionist to give us tips on where to go out that night. There's some lovely touches too: Aromatic toiletries Recycling bins in the room Starbucks coffee Cookies at reception Towels and chairs to take onto the beach. Thoroughly enjoyed it and loved the laid back vibe of Laguna. Oh to live there and spy on for surfers from behind mirrored sunglasses!
Manager Response: Dear Victoriapowersjovi  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  You certainly pointed out some of the great offerings that we have at the Inn.  Our staff truly does care about each guest experience, I am so fortunate to work with a great team.  I am happy to see you love the "vibe" of Laguna Beach, as a local it is something we love to talk about.  We want each visitor to experience our town as we see it so I am happy you were able to enjoy it.  Please look me up the next time you are in Laguna Beach so I can give you a warm welcome back  Thank you  Peggy

Summary: To be a great hotel it's important to take care of the little things and show attention to detail. We knew before we booked about the lack of restaurant facilities and even about the stiff parking charge but for a couple nights we were happy to live with it for two reasons. Firstly the location which is great and the other facility namely the pool / sun deck.  Imagine my disappointment when we found that the pool was closed for three days to be drained, cleaned etc. I do not believe this to be un scheduled activity so advance notice by e-mail or at least on the website would have allowed us to consider our plans. Given it's the main amenity the hotel has I would have thought it warranted a mention.  For those of you who visit when there is no issue I am sure you will love it.
Manager Response: Dear Bobbie 50  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  We appreciate all comments both positive and negative as they truly help us improve our product and service.   I am sorry regarding our lack of communication regarding our pool closure, our intent was to not keep it from guest so clearly we fell short in our communication.  We want to be transparent with every transaction and give our guest all of the information they need in order to make an informed decision and we did not meet this promise, I am truly sorry.    Thank you for pointing out our location we think being steps from Main Beach and a couple of blocks from the Village of Laguna we are perfectly situated.    I know it is a long journey for you but I do hope you return to Laguna Beach and certainly give us another opportunity to serve you.  Thank you again for your comments Peggy

Summary Heading: No need to look anywhere else
Summary: My wife and I have stayed at a number if places in Southern California. Ritz, Surf and Sand, Marriott Newport Beach Condos. The Ritz. You can't go wrong at a Ritz and the one down by Dana Point certainly meets nearly every criteria. My only problem is you have to drive to shop and the beach is a hike down a steep winding sidewalk. Surf and Sand. Perfect location. But. No AC. They say it's not necessary because of the cool ocean breeze. But, sometimes the waves are just a bit too loud for all night and closing up and turning on the AC must be an option for us. The Inn at Laguna us what we want. Very, very nice rooms. Balconies. Ocean view. AC. Walk to numerous shops and restaurants. Now, all of these are expensive. Including some I didn't list. Montage, etc. But, if I'm spending
Manager Response: Dear GPTX Traveler  Thank you so much for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  You listed us in great company and I am so pleased that we were able to accommodate.  You certainly mentioned great things about the Inn I am truly happy you enjoyed your dining experience at Las Brisas, we are fortunate to have such a good partnership.  Our location to downtown makes it easy to shop or enjoy some 40 restaurants if you are not enjoying the one next door.  Whether it is using the AC or the ceiling fan in your room want to make sure our guest are comfortable while being able to enjoy the views of the Pacific Ocean.  Please look me up on your next visit as I would love to give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary Heading: More like 4.5 stars - but a very Excellent stay
Summary: The Inn at Laguna Beach was absolutely wonderful. It is very centrally located. The Inn sits on the beach and state park and is in close walking distance to shops, restaurants, supermarkets, gas stations etc   Everyday they have a happy hour from 5:00PM to 6:00PM. They serve free wine on the rooftop on the fourth floor. The views and atmosphere cannot be beat. I can't imagine a place in Laguna Beach having a better view.   The staff are very friendly and are willing to help. Maybe it is because I am from New York but it just seems everyone here is really nice.      I have not stayed anywhere else in LB but if I were to ever return to the area I probably wouldn't stay anywhere else.   The rooms are very cozy, clean and well furnished. The only thing with me is that the room is
Manager Response: Dear Brianchang 0510  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach, we certainly appreciate all comments.  You definitely touched on some of our best attributes our location and our staff.  Being just steps from Main Beach and a couple of blocks from the Village of Laguna there is no need to get in a car.  It is not just because you are from New York our staff truly does care about each and they want everyone to leave with positive memories of Laguna Beach.    We truly do hope you return to Laguna Beach and when you do I hope you will look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back!!  Thank you Peggy

Summary: The Inn is in a perfect location, right on the water, and you can walk to restaurants, shops, art galleries, etc. The bathrooms are dated with shower over tub, the bedrooms not equipped with enough outlets for all the modern gadgets people travel with, but everything is fresh, clean, and well-maintained.  And the rooms have all the amenities you would expect from a top hotel:  coffee makers with Starbucks coffees and tees, iron and ironing board, hair dryers, bathrobes, in-room safe, and excellent bath products by Fresh. But what really made our stay so enjoyable was the welcoming, accommodating, and friendly staff who went out of their way to ensure we had everything we needed. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear bdoctor  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach, we appreciate all comments both negative and positive as this is how we improve on our product and services.    You touched on two things that truly make our hotel stand out our location and our staff, I am so happy to read that the staff provided you with a warm welcome and they were able to accommodate your needs.  Our staff truly cares about each individual guest experience as we want everyone going home with a positive memory of Laguna Beach.  In 2012 we completed a major renovation, striping the rooms down to the concrete and starting all over again.  I am sorry that the updated bathrooms were not what you expected, we really try to give both the bathrooms and the guest rooms a residential feel.  I happy you enjoyed the bath amenities as we upgraded the this year to the LATHER aromatherapy line.  With our renovation we designed the furniture with electrical outlets in mind.  In each of the Bedside tables and on the desk we have multiple plug-ins, I truly am sorry this was not sufficient.  On your next visit please let us know you will need more plug-ins and we will provide.  We certainly hope to see you in the future as we want this to be your home away from home while visiting Laguna Beach.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: My husband and I stayed here at the last minute and found the setting relaxing, the staff friendly and the bed extremely comfortable. The location is terrific - just steps away from the beach. There's a little wood boardwalk that leads across the top of the beach into the main shopping and dining hub of Laguna Beach. The room service guacamole was the icing on the cake. We will always stay here when we visit Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Dear Desilina  Thank you for you comments regarding your last stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am very happy to read you enjoyed our bed, we did complete a renovation in June 2012 and we spent much time choosing a mattress.  We cannot agree with you more we think our location is one of the best in Laguna Beach, as there is no need to get into a car, from our hotel you can walk to over 40 restaurants and many art galleries and shops.  We are fortunate to partner with Las Brisas for our Room Service and although we may be biased we do believe they have the best guacamole in town, so we are happy you enjoyed it.  Please look me up the next time you are visiting Laguna Beach as I would love to give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 2 nights on passing through driving the California Coast. This hotel is just lovely the rooms, the staff, the views and the location. The hotel sits right on the beach but also only a short walk to all the restaurants shops and bars.  The rooms are spacious and very clean with free wi-fi.  The hotel also put on a wine hour from 5pm-6pm serving free wine on the roof top terrace with an amazing view of the ocean just before sun set. This is a lovely touch and is a great way to finish a nice day in laguna beach.  We will defiantly be coming back to laguna beach and will defiantly consider using this hotel again.  Only 1 gripe is the coast of the parking at the hotel £30 dollars a night which is quite high! But the alternative parking is laguna beach is
Manager Response: Dear Casey+Jenny  Thank you for your review after your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  We appreciate all comments as it helps us improve our products and service.  We cannot agree with you more regarding our location if guest choose to rent a car it will most likely stay parked through there stay as we are within walking distance to over 40 restaurants and many art galleries and shops.  I am happy to read you enjoyed our wine hour on the Terrace, We agree it is the perfect way to unwind after a day in Laguna Beach.  It is good to see that you will return to Laguna Beach as our City has so much to offer and typically it takes more than one trip to fit it all in.    I am happy you will consider our hotel for your return but what would make me happier would be to give you a personal welcome back.  Please let me know when you plan on returning to Laguna Beach.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary Heading: MEAN SPIRITED MANAGER, OVERPRICED WITH NO FACILITIES!
Summary: We booked this place for 210 US through third party TravelRepublic who are very reputable. However upon arrival in the hotel, we were put in room on the road with tiny window which is not what the picture on the website indicated.  We asked for better room. We did not expect full frontal sea view, but certainly not a busy highway!  The manager scoured the voucher I printed off trying to 'prove' that we had not booked a sea view.  The voucher actually said 'standard room', and from the picture on the web we assumed we would have something pleasant to look at.  The manager took ages 'looking' for another room - he asked us in a rude way 'did you touch anything in the room' and when we replied 'no' he said again 'are you sure you did not touch anything' as if we were a pair of
Manager Response: Dear Marsha123  Please accept my sincerest apologies for our actions we certainly did not mean to upset you as it is our goal for all of our guest to have an enjoyable stay.  Our property like many others in Laguna Beach is situated between the Pacific Coast highway and the Pacific Ocean so unfortunately not all of our rooms face the ocean.  In working with our third party vendors we have tried to have them state that a "standard room" does not have a view.  We have gone as far as to ask them to use the descriptor "no view" but we are not having much luck.  It is not our intent to try to deceive anyone in booking a room which does not meet expectations.  We have partnered with Las Brisas, the iconic restaurant next door, to provide room service as we do not have a kitchen on property.  We also offer complimentary in-room coffee, and coffee and tea in the lobby until 9:00am every morning.  I am sorry that these offerings were not enough for you.  Once again I am terribly sorry for your experience as this is not typical of the high standards we strive to maintain.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: This is the 4th time my husband and I have stayed here and it just feels like home! I absolutely love it from the ideal location, to the wonderful cleanliness, the friendly staff and all the comforts from home. There most definitely will be a 5th time! Thank you for making our stay the best!!!
Manager Response: Dear Darlene D  Thank you for your comments regarding your last stay and for your loyalty we very much appreciate it.  We understand Laguna Beach has many choices for a Hotel stay so we are honored to welcome you back each time you visit.  With our renovation in 2012 we really wanted to give the hotel a residential feel, we want to welcome guest into our home and then have them make it there home so I am happy to read that we succeeded in your case.  Please look me up on your fifth visit as I would truly love to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Was there for business and wifi went down every evening I was there. It is also a bit inconvenient that they have no restaurant. However if this is a holiday then the location, views and concenience to the town of Laguna is perfect. The people were very helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Kiwisteveandali  Thank you so much for your comments regarding your recent visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on one of our best features our location, steps from the beach and walking distance to over 40 restaurants, there is no need for a car.  I am sorry about the WiFi, a couple of months ago we upgraded our WiFi and although this does not help your last stay we hope it will impact future stays.  Our service provider has had outages that occur in the area not just at the hotel, they have been working on the equipment and we all hope to have the issue solved within the next week.  I really hope that this will not deter you from returning as I would like you to be able to experience the better WiFi service.  I hope to meet you the next time you return to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: We stayed here for our 25th anniversary.  Our check in was a bit delayed.  It was because they were getting us an upgraded room.  They also had a bottle of champagne delivered with a hand written note congratulating us.  What a wonderful gesture...they care about people...They certainly made our stay memorable.  We definitely will be back.  The staff was wonderful.  You are right on the beach, you can't get any better than that.  What a beautiful place.  The hotel is close to everything.  You can walk to wonderful restaurants.  Next time...we want to stay longer.  We fell in love with Laguna Beach. And the weather was perfect!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Opensky3  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to Inn at Laguna Beach.  We certainly appreciate you trusting us with your stay on such a special occasion and we were happy to celebrate with you.  Congratulations on 25 years!!!!  Everyday I consider myself a fortunate person to work with such a great group of people.  They truly care about each guest experience and want everyone to leave with positive memories.  We are looking forward to your return and we cannot wait to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: We were visiting for out 17 th anniversary weekend. The room was wonderful. Crashing ocean waves...best sleep ever.  We really recommend this property.  Clean...comfy bed ( king).  We have stayed at other properties, but will surly return to this hotel /Inn.  Wine reception on top deck each night... Cookies and milk end of the evening.  Steps to the sand.... Love love love this place.  Really liked Eckterina who checked us in.
Manager Response: Dear Toothfairy32  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  I would also like to thank you for spending your special occasion with us, Happy Belated Anniversary.  You touched on many of the great things that we have to offer but your comment regarding our staff and Ekaterina is particular makes me very happy.  I am lucky everyday to work with such a great team they truly care about each guest experience and want everyone to leave happy.
