We look forward to your return, Ekaterina will be will here with a big smile and I would love to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back, please look me up on your next visit.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Great room with balcony overlooking the pool and ocean,  could see the ocean from bed, sound was beautiful.  Walk to the beach and downtown was a great location.  Would like to do this again.  Kids had fun in heated pool, but they were the only kids in pool.  Very quiet place.  Starbucks coffee in the morning was great in the lobby.
Manager Response: Dear Liveinla  Thank you for your comments regarding your last stay, we could not agree with you more about our location.  Sixty four steps to the beach and a couple of blocks form the Village there is no need to get in a car.  I am happy your kids enjoyed our heated pool, we keep it heated year round, as we are a great year round destination.  I also hope your kids were able to enjoy our fresh baked cookies and milk which we place in the Lobby at 6:00pm daily.    We certainly hope you will return to the Inn at Laguna Beach and when you do please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back!!!  Thank you  Peggy

Summary Heading: Love it, and haven't even stayed here! (Yet)
Summary: Flew in from Kansas City for one day to tour 4 possible wedding venues for my daughter's small destination wedding next year. I was born and raised in Southern California and as my daughter is still recovering from a bad summer cold, I agreed to come in her place to offer my perspective. The Inn at Laguna was the only venue I did not have an appointment to tour, Garry kindly suggested I take a look at the Pacific Room and Terrace and email him at a later date with any questions. I almost passed on it altogether, but as I had a little time in between tours, I decided to take a quick peek and check it off my list.  Wow!! From the moment I was greeted by Brendan at the front desk, I was impressed. After a long day of travel, I'm sure I did not look my best, but Brendan is a
Manager Response: Dear Gilda F  Thank you so much for taking the time to tour the hotel and we look forward to your return.  I am truly blessed to work everyday with such a great team so I appreciate that you pointed out the service provided by Brenden and the warm welcome you received from Kevin.  The goal of the staff is to make sure everyone leaves with a positive memory as they care about each guest experience.    It was very nice of you to fill in for your daughter and I am sure it was a long day filled with a lot of information so that makes your impromptu visit more special for us.  We know a wedding day is a special event and we are always honored that guest choose our property for either the event or for rooms, please let us know if we can assist in any way.  Gary is available to answer all of your questions or assist you any way he can.  Please come back for your relaxing weekend and let us make your dining reservations at Nick's and Asada, both are very good choices, we are also happy to recommend other local favorites.  Thank you so much for your comments please look me up on your next visit as I would love to give you a warm Inn at Laguna welcome back.  Peggy

Summary: We stayed 5 nights at the Inn to end our roadtrip across California. We were very lucky to get an  room with a wonderfull ocean view,without balcony but very clean and comfortable.The location of the room can really make the difference because those one with city view or at the swimming pool level have in fact no pleasant view at all. Very good location for the beach,restaurants and shops(at a short walking distance). Noisy surroundings during the day due to works next to the hotel(scheduled until early 2014). Parking too expensive(29$/day!!) Please note that food is only available via room service.
Manager Response: Dear Stephane M  Thank you for your review after staying 5 nights at the Inn at Laguna Beach, we appreciate both your business and your comments. I love that you pointed out our location as we believe we have one of the better locations in Laguna Beach, steps from the Pacific Ocean and a couple of blocks from the Village of Laguna.  The City is building a new Lifeguard Headquarters and when it is all said and done we will not only have state of the art facility adjacent to the Hotel but we will also have a beautiful multi-million dollar park.  Day to day the work load changes just like it would on any construction site and some days if we did not see the site we certainly would not know the work was occurring but like you we are looking forward to the finish sometime in early 2014.  We are lucky enough to be partnered with Las Brisas the restaurant next door to the hotel which is why we are able to offer Room Service.  During operating hours of the Terrace bar, guests are also able to order food to be delivered to there table while enjoying the view of Main Beach and the Pacific Ocean.  Thank you so much for your comments, I certainly hope you will return to the Inn at Laguna Beach and you will look me up on your next visit.  Peggy

Summary: A charming inn on the Laguna Cliffs where local celebrities come to enjoy premier hospitality. Brendan greeted me as if I was dressed for a gala ( even though I had been traveling for 18 hours. He got me settled and called one of the Organic restaurants and requested his guest receive red carpet treatment. Signed up for a yoga class by their pool which sits on the cliff next to the beach with towering palm trees. Access from the lobby and pool to the Laguna Cliff walk which enlightens my soul. I come in to shower and Demi has supplied aromatherapy Mint/thyme shampoo, Lemongrass body wash. Their hospitality was so remarkable I decided to return and stay again. Anette offer me an upgrade without asking and Alfonso brought me an elegant glass of candy as a courtesy. I know their
Manager Response: Dear Michelle U  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am so pleased to read your comments regarding our staff, they truly care about each guest stay and it certainly showed in the care you received.  You also touched on our other key attribute which is our location, steps from the beach and a couple of blocks from the Village of Laguna Beach.  We truly appreciate you sharing your secret!!! The next time you visit please look me up as I would love to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: Beware of ongoing nearby construction which can easily ruin your stay!
Summary: We were really looking forward to our stay at the Inn, however, the on-going construction nearby made us leave earlier than we planned.   We had a room with ocean view. The sound of waves was so calming when we arrived late in the evening. But early in the morning we woke up from construction noise which lasted well into the evening. Unfortunately, this is a NO PLACE TO STAY until SPRING 2014 when they promise to complete it. Unfortunately, we received NO NOTICE from the staff of these construction works.   What we liked: nice room, Eco style. A balcony where you can listen to waives at night. Clean and comfortable bed. The beach is really nice by California standards.   What we didn't like: rooms are very small; service was not very quick or efficient (eg they didn't unfold the
Manager Response: Dear Oles  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach, we appreciate all comments both positive and negative as this helps us improve our product and service.  I am happy to see by California standards you enjoyed our beaches, Laguna is a Maine Protected Area and we take great pride in our beaches and tide pools.  The City is building a new Lifeguard Headquarters and when it is all said and done we will have a beautiful multi-million dollar park and state of the art Lifeguard Headquarters adjacent to the Hotel.  As it is a City project we do not know the daily schedule so we do not know the direct impact, there have been weeks when it was no impact to the hotel.  I am also sorry about your Playpen, this is not typical of the high standards we strive to maintain and clearly we fell short, please accept my apologies.  We do have a breakfast offering which can be ordered to  your room, the prices vary depending on the items ordered.  We have fresh baked pastries brought in daily and we have partnered with Las Brisas to provide hot breakfast burritos or wraps.  I am very sorry if this was not explained or you missed the information provided in the room.    Like most beachfront properties in Laguna Beach we are between the Pacific Ocean and Pacific Coast Highway.  On the Ocean side of the hotel we have Heisler Park which is the most walked attraction in Laguna Beach and we are only a few blocks from the Village of Laguna giving our hotel one of the top walking scores in Laguna, so I am sorry you felt like you could not walk around.  Please accept my sincerest apologies as it sounds like we fell short of your expectations, we strive to ensure every guest has a positive memory when leaving Laguna.  I am sorry Peggy

Summary Heading: Lovely hotel right on the beach
Summary: We stayed here in September 2013 to attend a wedding at Laguna Beach - it was ideally placed for this. The staff were friendly and helpful and they offered free coffee and cookies at certain times of the day. Pool and jacuzzi were clean and nice to relax by/in. The room (village side) was quite small and couldnt believe the high cost of parking a car in their car park - thankfully we only needed 2 nights parking ($58). It was next to a beautiful beach and Laguna Beach is a lovely location to visit.
Manager Response: Dear Hoodycat  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.   We appreciate all comments positive and negative as this will only help us improve our product and services. I am very happy that you pointed out the friendliness of our staff as they truly care about each guest experience and they want everyone to leave with positive memories.   I understand your frustration with the cost of parking and I am sure there is not much I can say that will change your thoughts.  I would recommend in the future not renting a car as our location is within walking distance of so many great restaurants and the Village of Laguna.  I do hope you will return to Laguna and the Inn at Laguna Beach, please do not let parking be a deterrent  Thank you for you comments Peggy.

Summary: It was my second stay at the Inn.  John Lee is wonderful...very helpful and professional.  The Inn is located perfectly for walking to restaurants.  Stayed in a Pacific Room facing the ocean.  Open the sliding glass doors at night and the sound of the ocean was so relaxing.  Beautiful view of the beach and ocean. $29 a day parking fee is a little much but there is ample parking in 3 separate areas and is it easy getting in and out of the garage. rooms are comfortable and clean.   The staff does everything to make your stay enjoyable.  Will be traveling to Laguna beach frequently in the future and plan to stay here.
Manager Response: Dear Cali2013_13  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  I could not agree with you more John Lee is wonderful, I am lucky to work with him on a daily basis.   You also mentioned our location which is another great attribute as we are within walking distance to the Village of Laguna and over 40 restaurants but also we are steps away from the beach.  Please look me up the next time you are visiting the Inn at Laguna Beach as I would love to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: This place is awesome, right in the middle of town. They have a pool and a jacuzzi on property. Your room price not only includes a very luxurious, comfy room but also a room service complimentary breakfast.  I would say their prices are a little high, but you are right on the beach and the rooms are kept very clean. Bedding is to die for comfortable. Pool level rooms can be a bit noisy. RECOMMENDATION to the Inn: Put a layout of the room numbers on a map so customers can see the location of their room on upper or lower levels.  This would be of great assistance to us when making a reservation to get the room that we want.
Manager Response: Dear Nancy T  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach, I am very happy that you enjoyed your stay.  We think we have one of the best locations in town so close to all of the restaurants and shops and just steps from Main Beach.    We do our best to accommodate all guest requests for various reasons we are unable to guarantee actual room numbers.  We want every guest to leave happy which is why we pay close attention to guest request.  We hope the next time you want to spend time at the Beach you return to Laguna.  We hope to see you soon Peggy

Summary Heading: excellent location, easy acess to everything, but the extra bed was terrible...
Summary: The location of the hotel is excellent, close to everything. We stayed in one of the pacific rooms, located in front of the beach and also had a terrace, just facing to the sea.  You an imagine enjoying the sightseeing, during the day or even at night. The reflection of the moon on the sea was simply unforgettable... You can walk to the main attractions of the city, easily, the view is fantastic, be sure to stay just in front of the beach. The negative point is, since we were 3 persons in the room (I share the room with my parents), the 3rd bed, that is sofa-bed, has a terrible mattress, not compatible with the price the hotel charged us (500 hundred dollars). It was a very negative point, for the hotel. They should know that one of the first things a hotel should care is the
Manager Response: Dear Tigerlin  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  You certainly touched on the positive aspect regarding our location as we are steps from Main Beach and only a few blocks from the Village of Laguna.   In 2012 we completed a multi-million dollar renovation as we do care about the comfort of our guest.  I am sorry that the pull out sofa bed was not to your liking all of the furniture and mattresses were replaced in the renovation as we tried to ensure guest comfort.  I am truly sorry that you felt like guest comfort was not a priority.  We can only improve our product and services with guest input so I certainly appreciate your comments.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary: this was my second stay at IALB, the first was a 'girls getaway' for a dear friends birthday and as soon as I got there I knew I wanted to come back and share this with my husband on our anniversary.  if you can swing an ocean front room, do so.  the views and sound of the water are breathtaking.  the IALB went out of their way to make sure we had a great stay, including sending a lovely bottle of prosecco to our room.  the staff is fantastic... extra shout out to john!!  and I am always impressed that peggy takes the time to follow up with their guests.   the have a nice restaurant adjacent to their location, but honestly, they are so centrally located that it is hard to NOT find somewhere great to eat.  try 230 forest... you will love it.
Manager Response: Dear Veebeewhy  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach and thank you for bringing your husband to our hotel.  We are honored you choose to celebrate a special occasion with us.  I love the extra shout out to John I am very fortunate to work with such a great guy, he truly cares about each guest experience.   230 Forest is a great restaurant the next time you are in town you will have to try there sister restaurant, which is still within walking distance of the hotel, Watermarc.  There Carb and Corn Chowder served with popcorn is delightful.  Please look me up the next time you are visiting Laguna Beach as I would love to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary: We stayed there for our Anniversary in August and had a wonderful time. The staff is great especially Annette.They have wine and cookies every evening as an added bonus.You can take the shuttle up and down PCH during the Sawdust Festival.There are great restaurants all walking distance.We will definitely be back next year.
Manager Response: Dear Marsha A  Thank you for celebrating your Anniversary with us we truly appreciate it.  I would also like to thank you for your kind comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  I cannot agree with you more Annette is fantastic and I am lucky to work with her and the rest of the team.  They truly care about each guest experience and they strive to make sure everyone is happy.  You are correct about our location we are within walking distance to much of the activites or the Summer Trolleys are a great option.  Starting in September 2014 our trolleys will also operate on the weekends which will be a nice service for our visitors.  We look forward to welcoming you back, the next time you are visiting please look me up as I would love to give you a warm Laguna Beach Welcome Back!!  Happy belated Anniversary Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: Nice oceanside room-clean--polite staff and nicely appointed
Summary: This was a pleasant and great stay,  The staff was great, the room nicely done and super clean.  The balcony was perfect for watching the action on the beach and the ocean.  Even saw a pod of whales from the room.  Would definitely stay here again and recommend to anyone!  The location is perfect for walking to retail, restaurants and Pageants of the Masters.
Manager Response: Dear Meaton  Thank you so much for your kind review and for your return visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach, we appreciate both your comments and your business.  It is so nice that you point out our staff as the team does a fantastic job and they truly want to make sure each guest has a positive experience.  I am lucky everyday to work with such a great group of people.  I am so happy you were able to see a Pod of Whales, the binoculars in the room are a new addition this year.  Currently it is Blue Whale Season but all year long you can also see Dolphins and other marine animals.  Thank you again, I hope to meet you the next time you visit the Inn at Laguna Beach.  Peggy

Summary: A big thank you to the wonderful staff at the Inn at Laguna Beach. My stay was utterly divine. I slept very peacefully to the beautiful sound of the ocean waves and woke up to a gorgeous view from my room. Everyone was so helpful and pleasant. I highly recommend a stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Joyce R  I am so happy to see you had a great stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  Thank you for commenting on our staff as I am really lucky to work with such a great team of people.  They truly care about each guest and making sure everyone leaves with posisitve memories and a yearning to return.    We do think our location is pretty spectacular 64 steps to Main Beach and a few blocks to the Village.  Being able to fall asleep to the sound of the ocean is very soothing so I am happy you were able to experience this.  Please look me up the next time you are in Laguna Beach as I would love to give you a warm welcome back,  Thank you Peggy

Summary: This was my first time staying at this fabulous hotel.  I was fortunate enough to stay in room 306, a corner room over looking the ocean from the large balcony in the back of the room, as well as through the window on the side. My balcony had enough room for two lounge chairs, as well as a table and two chairs.  With a straight shot overlooking the Pacific, the view was magnificent!  Absolutely stunning. Every staff member treated me like family.  The facility offered many places to lounge and enjoy the views.  If you are looking for a memorable place to stay at the beach, this is the place.  I can't wait to visit again.
Manager Response: Dear So_Cal_Sporty_Family  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  You were so kind to point out our staff as they truly do care abotu each guest experience.  I am very blessed to come to work each day and to be surrounded by a great team.  I am happy to see you enjoyed your accomodations and that you liked our various places to lounge and take in the Pacific Ocean.  The next time you are visiting please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: We loved the place. Clean, remodeled, beautiful ocean view rooms available, heated pool, jacuzzi and the staff was amazing.  Great place for some peace and quiet. Not commercialized at all.  The young man at the front desk Brandon  was obsolete a delight.
Manager Response: Dear Mary K  Thank you for your kind comments regarding your recent stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am truly lucky to work with Brenden and the rest of the team.  They absolutely care about each guest experience and making sure they create positive memories.  The next time you are ready for peace and quite we hope to see you back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: One of Laguna's Best Kept Secrets
Summary: We had been regulars at the Inn, for many years, but decided to go elsewhere 4 yrs ago as the hotel was in need of major remodel.  I am happy to say that this has been done and the remodel shows an attention to detail, down to recycling waste baskets.  The old broken-down mattresses have been replaced, new bedding, rooms recarpeted, painted, updated vanities installed in the bath area and the dated chests have been replaced with work station desks and flat screen tv.  What was most gratifying was that we had requested that the down and feathers items be removed from our room, due to allergies, and they were.  Having stayed in 6 hotels in the last month with The Inn being only one of the 2 that honored this request without  major arm twisting.   All in all, it's great to be back
Manager Response: Dear MoSwUSA  Thank you for your kind comments reagrding your most recent visit.  I am very happy that you gave us the opportunity to serve you again and that you tried our product post renovation.  We did spend about 2.5 million dollars on the renovation so I am very pleased to read that you are happy with the outcome.  Thank you also for acknowledging that we were able to meet your request.  I am fortunate every day to come to work with a great group of individuals who truly care about each guest experience.   I am very happy they made your experience a memorable one.  The next time you are in Laguna Beach please look me up as I would love to give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: Worth every penny! The ONLY place to stay in Laguna!
Summary: Just stayed at the amazing Inn at Laguna Beach last night. It legitimately took every ounce of will power to check out. The location is perfect so you can walk around and enjoy the best Laguna has to offer. The Oceanfront Balcony is worth every penny. Feel asleep and awoke to the sounds of waves crashing on the beach. The team is second to none - above & beyond the call of duty. If you are in Laguna, do yourself a favor and stay here. Also, I highly recommend ordering a festival picnic box from Broadway by Amar Santana and eating on your beautiful balcony. You can thank me later :) THANK YOU to the phenomenal Inn team!
Manager Response: Dear Melbalina  I am so happy to see that you did not want to check out next time stay longer!!!!!  You certainly highlighted two of our best features our staff and our location.  The team really wants to make sure every guest has a great stay and leaves with positive memories.  As far as our location we could not agree more next to Main Beach and within walking distance to the Village, there really is no need for a car  Thank you so much for your kind comments we hope to see you again very soon, please look me up the next time you are in Laguna so I can give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Location and facility are fantastic.  Steps to beach, a block to central town.  We paid for an oceanfront with balcony and it was worth it. The room is small but the bathroom space is tood.  Pool is very warm and clean, all common areas are clean.  Staff is courteous and friendly.  Only criticism is that the choice of channels on the tv is limited and there is no on-demand movie alternative - an issue for us as a way to calm the kids down at the end of the day. Lack of a real bar and restaurant may be an issue for you, too, but it's so close to so many alternatives in town it's not a detractor.
Manager Response: Dear Fred W  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  You certainly mentioned two of our greatest attributes our location and our staff.  I am inspired everyday by the team that I work with as they truly care about each guest and making sure every one leaves with positive memories.  I am sorry you do not like our TV programming, we just upgraded the service so we have over 86 HD channels, including the HBO package.  We have partnered with Las Brisas as they provide our Room Service as we do not have a restaurant on property.  If Las Brisas is not an option we have over 40 restaurants within walking distance of the Inn.  I appreicate all of your comments and as we are looking to improve our product and services we will certainly take your comments to heart.  I hope you return to the Inn at Laguna Beach, please look me up on your next visit.  Peggy

Summary: The location is perfect; we just park the car and walk all over town.  I love being on the beach and being able to listen to the ocean.  The staff is wonderful; very attentive.  Great location; just minutes from John Wayne airport, Fashion Island.
Manager Response: Dear Cindy L  Thank you for your review regarding your visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  We could not agree with you more that we love our location.  As you stated once you park the car there is no need to move it as we are within walking distance of the Village with over 40 restaurants, Art Galleries and Specialty shops, we are also 64 steps to Main Beach.  We look forward to your return, please look me up on your next visit Peggy

Summary: just back from a Californian road trip and spent the last few nights at this hotel. e had a ocean view room which was amazing. the sound of the ocean was always there. ervice quite good although they didn't seem to have prepared for the fact that we had five in our party and we needed to use the sofa bed. But as soon as they knew they were in every morning and night to take down and set up the bed. The highlight though was the complimentary wine and nibbles served every evening at 5:00pm on the terrace overlooking the ocean. a really nice touch which we enjoyed. oh yes and they supplied binoculars in the bedroom for dolphin and whale watching. Hotel pool was heated and the perfect temperature for a swim which was just as we'll as the sea was cold! A nice place to go for couples
Manager Response: Dear Ruth G  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  We could not agree more about our location, next door to the Art Museum and within walking distance of the Village.  Laguna was founded as an Arts Colony and we have tried to stay true to our roots, which is why we have so many galleries and all of the Public Art.  I am sorry we did not take care of your sofa bed the first time around but I am happy that we were able to learn and make the appropriate changes.  I am happy to see that our wine hour on the Terrace is memorable and you also enjoyed the use of our binoculars.  We are constantly looking for ways to improve our product and service.  We hope to see you at the Inn soon, please look me up on your next visit.  Thank you Peggy

Summary Heading: Hear the ocean all night long
Summary: My wife and I stayed in room 305 from Wednesday to Saturday in early August 2013.  I was at a conference in San Diego and we decided to extend our time in California and drive up to Laguna Beach.  The room is large and very clear, although the tub suffered from slow drainage during showers.  The balcony is lovely and you are directly on the Pacific, and you hear the ocean all night long, which is an unusual feature.  There is some construction going right next to the hotel, where a new Lifeguard HQ and rest rooms are being built, will be finished in the Spring of 2014.  Our room was not ready when we arrived, so we went up to the Terrace and a lovely young woman served us cold sodas while we waited – our room became available at 3:30 pm.  You can easily walk to Las Brisas
Manager Response: Dear PT8  Thank you for your comments regrading your last visit to Laguna Beach.  It sounds like you had a nice stay visiting California.  You certainly had two great cities San Deigo and Laguna Beach.    No one is looking forward to the end of the Consturction project more than we are; however, we are very fortunate that when it is complete we will have a mulit-million dollar park and Lifeguard facility next door to the hotel.  We work closely with the City to make sure that we limit the disruption to our guest as much as we possilby can.  The good news is that it is not visible from all places in the hotel, like our Terrace.  In California beaches are not private, they are all open to the Public, our Coastal Commission really works to ensure everyone has access to the beach.  If we could have our own are we certainly would, in the absence of having a private beach we do provide beach chairs and umbrellas along with towels for our guests.  We love our location as we are within walking distance of over 40 restaurants, it sounds like you got to experience a few of them.  I could not agree more with you regrading Nick's it is a locals favorite.  I do hope you will get out to California in the future and return to the Inn at Laguna Beach, the next time you do please look me up so I can give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: My husband I recently stayed at the Inn a few days after our wedding to have a brief getaway after the craziness of the wedding wore off in early August 2013.  Being business owners ourselves, we notice good customer service when we see it, and the staff at the Inn, particularly Rachel Tejada, the Assistant General Manager, exemplifies first class customer service and treatment. We really appreciated her warm welcome with a genuine smile when we arrived, for getting us tickets to I Do, I Do (a performance playing in town), for booking restaurant reservations for us, and making the best restaurant recommendations for us (We LOVED Nick's and Nirvana Grille!). We felt very at home staying at the Inn and will be sure to stay there again in the future!  In terms of the
Manager Response: Dear Carrie J  Thank you for your review regarding your recent visit to the inn at Laguna Beach.  I am fortunate everyday to work with Rachel, she is so talented and she does a great job leading her team.  She truly cares that each stay is memorable and her laughter is infectious.  It sounds like you were able to truly expereince Laguna Beach and you were able to enjoy the local hotspots.  We are lucky to have the Laguna Playhouse within walking distance, each year the performances get better and better.   The next time you and your husband need a place to go to unwind and relax we hope to see you back at the Inn.  Please look me up so I can give you a warm welcome back.  Congratulations on your Wedding Peggy

Summary: I had stayed this weekend for a friend's wedding in laguna and the expereince was exactly what I want from all my hotel stays, friendly people who value that I spent my dollar wtih them, efficient service, great location, knowledgeable staff, clean, and in a great location. You are also right next to a great restaurant, Las Brisas.
Manager Response: Dear Marisa5  Thank you for your kind review regarding your last stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on so many things that matter to us.  First and foremost we appreciate all of our guest as we know there are many choices to stay in Laguna Beach so we value your patronage.  Everyday I am lucky enough to come to work surrounded by a great group of people who put the guest experience first.  Thank you for pointing out the staff.  The next time you visit Laguna Beach please look me up so I can give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary Heading: Another Fabulous Stay At The Inn!
Summary: We have been staying at The Inn At Laguna Beach for the past 8 years.  Every year we look forward to our stay.  The staff takes excellent care of you and they REALLY care about their clients.  They take the extra step to ensure that your stay is the best it possibly can be.  We always stay in an ocean front room with balcony and it's so worth it.  The hotel has recently been completely renovated and it's better than ever!  We continue looking forward to our next years trip there.  Thank you all for the outstanding service and caring attitude.
Manager Response: Dear Sheree F  Thank you for continuing to stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach, we certainly appreciate your business as we know you have many choices.  I am so happy to read your comments regarding our staff as i feel blessed everyday to work with this team.  They truly do care about each guest and want to make sure every guest leaves with a wonderful memory of Laguna Beach.  Thank you again we look forward to your visit next year.  Please look me up so i can give you a warm welcome back  Peggy

Summary Heading: Wonderful intersection of luxury and reasonableness.
Summary: We had a long planned trip to Hawaii cancelled because of Tropical Storm Flossie.   At that point, we were half way across the country in LAX.   Rather than just fly home, we spent the night trying to find other things to do for our family of four (two almost adult teens and two almost teen adults).  We found the Inn, and just decided to go there for three days.   Three turned into five which turned into seven.   Which turned into a wonderful vacation.  The hotel is not over the top luxurious.  But it was right at the proper intersection of luxury and reasonableness.   We tend to stay in Preferred Hotels, and think that this hotel would fit in nicely with that brand.      Small hotel, with a bit of an unusual lay out.  Open air affair, with most rooms opening onto a hallway
Manager Response: Dear Glightbody  I am sorry that your trip to Hawaii had to be cancelled but I am happy to see that you made the most of it.  We could not agree with you more about our location we love that we are nestled next to Main Beach and within walking distance to the Village, Festivals, and the Tide Pools.  I am happy to see that our Guest Service Staff took very good care of you and I am sorry that our Front Desk staff did not do a better job.  We want everyone to leave with positive memories not only of Laguna but also the Inn.  We will take your comments to heart and make the necessary adjustments to ensure that every guest feels like we have taken care of them.  I do hope you and your family will return to the Inn so you can experience the cahnges we made based on your review.  Please look me up the next time you visit as I would love to give you and your family a warm welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Every summer, my friends and I stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach for our annual trip to the Pageant of the Masters.  The location of the Inn is the best~right on the beach.  The customer service is excellent~friendly, professional.  All areas of the  Inn are always perfectly maintained.  We spend a little extra for a pool-side room, and twice have been upgraded to an ocean view room.  The rates are higher in the summer, as all the hotels in Laguna, so, if you want to save money, go off season.  The rooms are not huge, but, plenty of space for three women, always clean, the sheets/pillows are soft (extra pillows on the beds), the mattresses have always been most comfortable.  The bathrooms are spacious, and we always have a tub.  I read "Gouged" review, who wrote that they didn't
Manager Response: Dear Viaggiante118  Thank you for your review regarding your visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  We like our location as not only are we atop the bluff at Main Beach but you can also walk to the Pageant of the Masters.  Our team works hard to make sure every guest leaves with a positive memory they really do care about your stay.    I am very happy that you and your friends choose to stay with us and that you have found the room types that best fit your needs.  Being a return guest you know that our room types do differ slightly but we do our best to accomodate each guest and I am so happy that we have found the right accomodations for you and your friends.  On your next visit to Laguna Beach please look me up as I would love to give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: We stayed at the Inn at Laguna Beach for a one night, during a rare opportunity to travel without our kids. We were looking for a relaxing, peaceful and luxurious stay. What we got was a basic, well-located 3 star hotel at an exorbitant, opportunistic price. This review is strongly colored by the price we paid: A total of $629 for a single night plus parking and taxes, totally approximately $730.  For that kind of money, we expect attentive service, an exquisite room and little touches that show we are valued as guests. For that kind of money, we should not be charged for parking. For that kind of money, there should be at least continental breakfast included. For that kind of money, there should be a bathtub in our room and someone should turn down the bed at night. There
Manager Response: Dear LaJollaJoe  Thank you for your review we appreciate all comments and we take them very seriously.  I have raeched out to you direct as I would like to continue the converstaion off-line.  Please know our number one goal is to make sure our guest feel valued and important and clearly in your case we fell short and for this I am very sorry.    Thank you again for your comments, I do hope to hear from you  Peggy

Summary: I contacted the Inn at Laguna Beach to reserve a room for my son as a gift for his anniversary.  I had requested a particular type of room (queen bed, ocean front with balcony on an upper floor on the North side of the hotel).  Rather than be unhappy with my specific requests for a room, instead I received multiple phone calls from Rachel, the manager, to ensure that I was happy with the room selection.  My son & his girlfriend had a fabulous time, and sent me photos of the panoramic ocean view from their balcony.  The management gave them a bottle of champagne to celebrate their anniversary, a wonderful surprise. They raved about their room, and I can attest to the highly considerate and personalized treatment we received from  the management at the Inn at Laguna Beach, the
Manager Response: Dear Louann28  Thank you for your kind review.  We are honored when a guest chooses to celebrate a special occassion with us and it is our goal to make it memorable.  You gave your son and his gilrfirend a very thoughful gift they are lucky to have you and we were here to make sure they enjoyed the gift as much as you enjoyed giving it.   I am blessed everyday to be surrounded by a great team who truly cares about each guest experience.  We hope to see your family return to the Inn at Laguna Beach, if so please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach Welcome.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: This is the most special place in all of California.  It is situated between a main public beach and secret coves.  So much to do in the town and outdoors.  This property is the best of everything.  I can't even begin to tell you how intimately comfortable, clean, fun and relaxing the experience was a couple of weeks ago. The staff is so friendly - sincerely.  I am a regular visitor and my expectations are exceeded every visit.  The park, beaches and the property are constantly improving.  My son looks forward to it every year. The amenities are so unique.  You don't want to leave and you long to go back.  You have to try paddle boarding too - it's way easier than you think.
Manager Response: Dear pkayn  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit.  We are waiting for you to return.  It sounds like you really made the most of your visit and took in all that Laguna Beach has to offer.  I am very lucky to work everyday with a great group of people.  The team at the Inn truly cares about your guest experience and it makes me very happy that we exceed your expectations each visit.  Please look me up the next time you are visiting the Inn at Laguna Beach as I would love to give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Our room was great! The patio was perfect! We were in a pool level 2 queen room with a large patio! The location is perfect just a walk down the stairs and your there. The staff was amazing and wine hour on the roof and free coffee in the morning! A great place!
Manager Response: Dear Chad44  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am happy to read you think the staff is AMAZING, I pinch myself everyday knowing I am working with such a great group of people.  Please give us advance notice of your return to the Inn at Laguna Beach as we would love to make reservaions for you at Nicks and Alyessa.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary: Laguna Beach is magical. The beauty of the greenery and the ocean is enchanting. Be warned however that Laguna Beach hotels and restaurants are quite expensive in season, which is now, (July/August). The Inn at Laguna Beah was recently renovated. The hotel is immaculate and very cozy. The staff were all helpful and anxious to please. Very friendly..Very accommodating. The room we had was oceanfront on the 4th floor. The room was very comfortable. The only reason I did not rate 5 stars was the absence of a restaurant in the hotel. However, restaurants of all sorts abound in town. You can either drive into the heart of town or take a delightful walk. everything is slose by. Laguna Beach is perfect..Enjoy !!
Manager Response: Dear Taciturn01  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach. I am pleased you enjoy thr renovated room and that you pointed out how accomodating the staff is.  I love working with such a dedicated staff, they truly care about each guest experience.    In absence of a restaurant we have partnered with Las Brisas, so we can provide Room Service for our guests and our guest have the ability to charge meals and drinks at Las Brisas to there rooms.    Laguna Beach is really a year round destination and although July and August are the busier months due to the Pageant and the Art Festivals the other 10 months of the year are great.  Please come back and visit and experience all that Laguna has to offer. On your next stay please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Peggy

Summary: My wife and I decided to get out of Los Angeles for a weekend and we are so glad we chose the Inn At Laguna Beach!  The location is perfect- great proximity to restaurants, the art fairs and located right on the beach.  The view is impeccable with and most of all, the staff were beyond friendly, helpful and courteous.  The afternoon wine tasting on the patio is a wonderful touch as well.  We will definitely be staying again!
Manager Response: Dear mblaydow  Thank you for yor kind review regarding your recent visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach.  You touched on all of the great things about our property, with our location, you can park your car and forget about it for the weekend.  I am fortunate everyday to be surrounded by such a great team they truly care about your experience and making your stay memorable.  The next time you and yor wife need a break from LA please come back and visit.  I would love to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Here's the deal:  I did not want to leave this hotel and I almost tied myself to the railing so that I didn't have to leave!!!  We were re-doing our honeymoon by driving up the coast for our 25th anniversary.  One mention of this to the front desk clerk and we were upgraded to an ocean view room and checked in early!  SO NICE OF THEM TO DO!!  It was incredible to sit on the beach all day and then listen to the sound of the waves all night long.  HEAVEN. Oh, the room was perfectly clean, very quiet, the bed was so comfortable, and did I mention the hotel is RIGHT ON THE BEACH?!  Not across PCH like most hotels by the beach in CA.  In the morning we walked the beach to the tide pools in one direction and sandy shores in the other.  The perfect location.  The staff was lovely and
Manager Response: Dear Lawsonma  Thank you so much for your kind review regarding your recent visit.  It is always great to read that a gust does not want to leave but better to read you will be coming back.  Laguna Beach has so much to offer year round and our tide pools are not going anywhere.  We apprecaite it when a guest wants to celebrate a special occasion with us and a 25 anniversary is something to celebrate.  CONGRATULATIONS!!!  We are looking forward to your return visit, please look me up the next time you stay as I would love to give you a warm Laguna Beach Welcome Back.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary Heading: Nice location, Great Staff, But facility need an update!
Summary: I stayed in this hotel for a few days in early July. Some thoughts to share with trip advisor!  This is a great location that facilitates your exploration of Laguna and other beaches, Newport, Huntgington, etc. The room was very clean, but very small—seemed like a shoebox. The pool was also a great draw, but was small  and had limited seating. The beach had massive amounts of seaweed which made laying at the beach difficult. The hotel did provide chairs, but they were small and not fit for adults to use for a day. I needed to rent a chair from a competitor hotel to spend time relaxed outside on the beach-- not cool.However, the highlight of my trip was the complementary wine that the hotel offered at 5PM daily.It drew a nice crowd and was hosted by very friendly staffs members.
Manager Response: Dear Sanjuan787  Thank you so much for your review regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  We appreciate all comments positive and negative as they will only help us improve our product and services.  I was sorry to read that you felt the hotel needed upgrading as last year we spent approximately 2.5 million dollars on a renovation.  The guest rooms, Pool, Pool Deck, Lobby and the Terrace were all completely renovated.  We will be replacing the coridor carpet later this year.  As you can imagine with a renovation we cannot please everyone but we certainly tried to make the rooms and the rest of the hotel comfortable.  We do apprecaite your comments regarding the beach chairs, I know this will not change your mind but prior to your comments we started to look into new beach chairs and umbrellas, we should have them early next year.  Thank you for pointing out the positives.  I am lucky everday to work with the team at the Inn at Laguna Beach, they care about the guest.  We do think we have one of the best locations in town as you can park your car and walk anywhere in the Village and Festivals or take the trolly to the South end of town.  Thank you for your comments, the next time you want to visit Laguna Beach, please reach out to me as I would love to help you find a hotel that will better suit your needs.  Of course I would like to welcome you back to the Inn but more than that I want you to be happy.  Please visit our Beach Town again real soon  Thanks Peggy

Summary: We just can't say enough about this terrific hotel with the best location in all of Laguna.  The whole staff is so friendly and the rooms are very clean.  The employees bend over backwards to make your stay pleasant.  You are within walking distance of all of Laguna and the views are amazing.  I think that the Terrace is the best kept secret in Laguna.  We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear Susie C  Thank you for your kind review regarding your most recent visit.  I was happy to read your comments regarding our staff as I am blessed everyday to come to work and be surrounded by a great team.  Thank you for sharing our secret as we believe our Terrace is a fantasitc place to enjoy a glass of wine, curl up with a good book, or just a great place for converstaion.  Thank you again and please look me up on your next visit so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back!!  Thank you Peggy

Summary: If you ever get to steal four days with your husband, come to the Inn at Laguna Beach. Magical!  You sleep with the surf rhythmically rocking away any troubles, hear the laughter of families on the beach, breathe fresh sea air. The manager thought of every comfort. Our room was pristine,  spacious, beautiful, and newly decorated.  The huge plantation shutters opened to the balcony where we spent a lot of time.  The location is near the best restaurants and  shops.  We rode the free summer trolley, rented bikes, and were enchanted by the Pageant of the Masters- get your tickets as early as possible. The hotel even provided binoculars. This is a place to truly unwind and feel pampered.
Manager Response: Dear 6nana  Thank you for your kind review regarding your last visit.  You touched on all of the positive things not only about our hotel but also about Laguna Beach.  I am blessed to have a wonderful team around me to make sure that we can meet and hopefully exceed the expectations of our guest, the credit for comfort should go to the staff not me, but thank you.  As you found out Laguna Beach is a place you can sit and relax or you can go and discover either is just as enjoyable.  Our location makes it easy to not get in a car as we are within walking distance to the Village and 64 steps to main beach.  Many guest who attend the Pageant find it enchanting and cannot wait to return.  We hope you return to the Inn at Laguna Beach, please look me up on your next visit as I would love to give you a Warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Easy walking-distance to shops, restaurants, etc. of Laguna Beach is top selling point to me for Inn at LB.  Plus, the oceanfront setting! Stay was so-so for me as WI-FI was out (had to go to Starbucks across street)  and "pool view" room.  They aren't kidding!  I could not open my shutters at all as room was literally 3-4' from pool side loungers! Could probably have applied suntan lotion if they had asked me!  Definitely go for the ocean front room! (None were available on my trip.)  Front desk never called us back, as promised, to say our room was ready, so we spent 4 hours cruising around downtown LB before I asked them.  In sum, Inn is probably very nice, just avoid the pool-side room on 3rd floor.  Kudos to bellmen, however. They were top-notch.
Manager Response: Dear Southerner12  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit.  We learn from all comments both positive and negative and we make adjustments when possible.  Unfortunately we are not able to chane the room layout, as we have limited real estate, so the pool level rooms are very close to the pool.  On the positive side we will be installing a new WiFi system as of July 17, 2013.  We will have access throughout the hotel as well as 24 hour support on the system, so there should not be a need to go across the street to Starbucks, unless you want a coffee.  Thank you for pointing out our location, Laguna Beach is a very walkable City and we beleive we are centrally located to not only the beach but also the Village of Laguna.  Great shopping and dining establishments are right here so there is no need to get in a car.  I am happy to read that our Bellman took such great care of you, I am fortunate everyday to work with the team.  I do hope you will return to Laguna Beach, on your next visit please look me up so I can give you a warm welcome back!!  Thank you again for your comments Peggy

Summary: My husband and I had a very pleasant one-night stay. The room was clean. Being able to see and hear the ocean while lying in bed was a treat!  We appreciated the Internet access.  The location, service, accommodations, views were all above average.  We loved the happy hour on the roof from 5 to 6. The pool was nice and warm also.   As others have stated, The staff was friendly and accommodating. We wouldn't hesitate to recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear SpyGirl55  Thank you so much for your kind comments, we learn from our guest feedback as we do not want to rest on our laurels.  We do believe we have one of the best locations in town as you can leave your car parked and walk or take the trolley anywhere you may want to go.  We pride ourselves on our service so I am especially happy to see you comment about our staff.  We look forward to your return, please look me up on your next visit as I would love to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary: The rooms and views are breath taking. The staff couldn't have done a better job in making sure our every need was fulfilled. The terrace is amazing. Parking is easy to get in and out. Perfect shops restaurants all with in walking distance.  Can't wait to come back again. Wife was almost in tears leaving.
Manager Response: Dear Jimmy Lujan  We do not want to see your wife in tears so one of the remedies would be to return to the Inn at Laguna Beach!!!  Thank you for your kind comments we pride ourselves on our service so I am grateful we did not let you down.  I feel lucky everyday to come to work and be surrounded by a great group of individuals.    Please bring your wife back and do look me up on your next visit.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Inn.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Really enjoyed the Inn at Laguna Beach, lovely hotel within walking distance of the main town. The beach is just down the steps and the pool has a lovely view too. The staff were really helpful too and the fresh cookies a bonus!
Manager Response: Dear tdb83  Thank you for your kind comments regarding the Inn at Laguna Beach!!  We agree with you that one of our greatest attributes is our location so I am happy you pointed it out.  We are just 64 steps to the beach and a few blocks from the Village.  I was happy to read that our staff was accomodating as we pride ourselves on personlaized service.  I am lucky every day to work with such a great group of people.  Thank you again for your kind comments Peggy

Summary: Writing my first review here because this place deserves a shoutout - we had such a wonderful time there but also felt the need to share the importance of getting the right staff to help you out at check-in, because for us it made a HUGE positive difference on our trip.   For my birthday, my boyfriend planned a surprise getaway to Laguna beach for the 2 of us. Driving into Inn at Laguna Beach we were excited seeing that it's right on the coast facing the ocean. We met 3 of their staff at check-in - Rachel, John and 1 more guy who we can't recall his name, but ironically was the guy who helped us with check in, and set the wrong precedent for our stay. He told us that he was placing us into "his favorite room," room 101, which we were curious to see why. Turns out room 101 is on
Manager Response: Dear Rachel M  Happy Belated Birthday!!!  I am very happy to read that you spent such a special day with us, and I am more excited to read how the staff treated you and your boyfriend.  I am lucky that I am able to come to work each day and work with great people like Rachel, John and the rest of the staff.  They truly care about every guest stay and they do there very best to make sure all of our guest are happy.   Next time instead of ordering pizza you should try our in room dining menu as we partner with Las Brisas.  You can have there great food in the comfort of your room, or on the balcony.  As you pointed out room 507 does have the large wrap around balcony with some of the best views in Laguna so I am happy you were able to enjoy it.    I hope you return to Laguna and the Inn at Laguna Beach and when you do please look me up as I would love to give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you for your comments we truly apprciate them  Peggy

Summary: In LA for our daughter's college graduation and added two nights at Laguna Beach. Wonderful experience at the Inn at Laguna Beach, which we had picked based on Tripadvisor reviews. Staff very friendly and accommodating throughout. We were upgraded to Room 514, which is to die for in terms of views of the ocean and coast -- well worth the extra cost. The Inn is on the cliffs, with a busy footpath connecting the main beach with a lovely park at the north end of town, but we never heard people noise at all. The sound of the waves constantly was very peaceful. I would go back in a minute.
Manager Response: Dear AnnieEC  Congratulations to your daughter on her accomplishments.  Thank you for your comments I am so happy you extended your stay in LA for a couple of days to come to Laguna to enjoy our beaches. We are fortunate to have Heilser Park and Main Beach at our footsteps as these are two top attractions in the City.    Thank you for commenting on our staff as they truly care that each guest has a great stay and they do there best to help create memories of Laguna Beach.  The next time are on this coast please look me up so I can give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Thak you Peggy

Summary: Loved everything about this hotel. Excellent location. Excellent Views. Excellent Service. Size of the room. Extremely comfortable bed. The robes were an awesome touch. It was our 25th Wedding Anniversary the hotel sent up a complimentary bottle of Champagne and a card.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at the Inn for just two nights on our west coast trip.  Everyone at the hotel was very pleasant from the front desk to the housekeepers.  They have a few complimentary things going on each day: coffee/tea in the morning, wine hour and lemonade/cookies in the evening. The hotel is one of the pricier ones in the area but worth it.  The location was great, the views were fantastic and the beds were very comfortable.  We will definitely stay there again when we are back out west.
Manager Response: Dear MMNielsen  Thank you for your recent comments regarding your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach.  I am happy to read your positive comments about the staff, I am truly blessed to come to work each day and be surrounded by a great group of people.  They honestly care about each guests experience and we all want our guests to leave with positive memories.  The next time you make it out west please come back and visit us.  When you do please look me up as I would love to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back!!!  Thank you  Peggy

Summary: I loved the setting and location of this inn. I know it is an older establishment, but that doesn't matter one bit! The location is perfect for a visit to Laguna. The staff - enthusiastic and helpful. We especially loved Clay at the front desk. His recommendations paid off and saved us time and effort searching for great meals and things to do. The beds were better than most. Soft, welcoming, cushy. I would return every year and enjoy the same experience. Simply wonderful!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Had a fantastic weekend at this perfectly situated unpretentious beachfront hotel. Wife and I live in LA and we're dying to "getaway" for a weekend. we know the region well, have done plenty of weekends away in Ojai, Palm Springs, Santa Barbara, Big Sur, Mammoth, Big Bear, you name it...this trip to Laguna ranks up there with the best. a huge part of it was the accomodations at Inn at Laguna Beach. Location was key- literally overlooking the heart of town as well as the main beach in town. but tucked away just enough to not be in the heart of it all. Great comfy rooms with nice beds and bathrooms and sliding door balconies with views, complimentary happy hour on the rooftop deck (i mean honestly?), a relaxing pool, also with stunning views and jacuzzi, and great service. if you
Manager Response: Dear Matt R  Thank you for your kind review.  You certainly touched on the items that we pride ourselves on which is our location and our friendly service.  So far this has been an amzing June weather wise so I hope it cooporated while you were here, as we have had more sunny days than typical.  I hope you and your wife come back for another get away as Laguna has more to offer.  The next time you visit the Hotel please look me up so I can give you a warm welcome back!!  Thanks again Peggy

Summary: We drove into Laguna last night and checked out several hotels. The Inn was by far the best value as we got a Sunday night "promo" rate of $199 for a full ocean view room with King bed and pullout sofa (for our daughter).  Beautiful, bright, clean, and remodeled bathroom.  Room 407. Big windows felt like we were on a cruise ship.  Sheets felt new.  Real treat is listening to the crashing waves.  Cookies and lemonade in the lobby were a nice bonus. Easy walk throughout Laguna from here.
Manager Response: Dear SmileyfromScottsdale  Thank you for your kind comments regarding the hotel.  It is good to read that you and your family enjoyed your stay.  We do think our location is pretty convenient to the beach, steps away and to the Village of Laguna.  When the heat of the desert gets to be too much please come back and visit.  Thanks again Peggy

Summary: This hotel occupies a prime location in Laguna Beach.  It is perched on a bluff within walking distance of Main Beach, the shops and restaurants on Forest Ave, and is next door to Las Brisas restaurant.   There is no restaurant on premises but they have room service available through a partnership with Las Brisas.    The front desk manager had 3 different rooms that were available for my room type and price (king/ocean view).  She actually asked if I'd like to see them and decide ? Who does that ?     What great service !!!      Finally deciding on the room that had 2 beds but the best view (508) was the obvious choice.  Unobstructed views of the Pacific and the sound of waves crashing was just what I was looking for.    This hotel doesn't have a fancy spa, overpriced
Manager Response: Dear In206  Thank yo for your kind comments regarding the Inn at Laguna Beach.  You certainly touched on a couple of our best attributes our people and our location.  I truly enjoy being at work each day and surrounded by the great group of people who are the heart and soul of our hotel.  We also think our location is the best as we boost a 98 walk score for Laguna Beach, being steps away from the sand and a stroll to the Village.  When the rain in Seattle gets to you please come back and visit us in Laguna Beach.  Please look me up so I can give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Spent a week here at the beginning of May on our month long trip travelling in California. I have to say I was more than impressed, this is a really nice Boutique property right on the beach with spectacular views. We had a high level Beach View room, that was absolutely fantastic. When booking please be aware of this as the other rooms overlook the highway. The Staff here are really great, especially Rachel who took great care of us and gave us lots of "local tips". My only quibble would be not having a restaurant on site although they are in partnership with Las Brisas its really handy to just pop down to a restaurant especially when travelling with Children. Overall we really loved the Hotel and Laguna Beach and would almost definately return. Thankyou.
Manager Response: Dear MylesLondonUK  Thank you for your comments regarding the Inn at Laguna Beach.  I could not agree more that Rachel is wonderful, not only can she direct you to the local hot spots but she is also able to tour you through the Tide Pools, as she is our local Tide Pool Docent.  I do apprecaite you pointing out we do not have a restaurant, we did do the next best thing which was partner with Las Brisas.  I am grateful that you will still return eventhough we lack the restaurant, we will still have great local recommedations for you and your family.  Thank you again, please look me up on your next visit Peggy

Summary: I stayed here for one night, using my mileage points for the room (which is a great way to get to know a hotel before spending money on it).  My stay was okay.  The room was small, tastefully decorated, and very clean.  There was no tub, only a shower.  The room faced Route 1, so there was a lot of traffic noise.  The staff was friendly.   When checking in, I ordered a salad and was told it would be delivered in no more than 30 minutes.  Nearly an hour later, I called and cancelled the order, as it was getting late and I was tired.  This might seem like a small thing, but after a long trip, it is the kind of small thing that matters.
Manager Response: Dear OjaiGal  I am sorry to read about your stay.  This is not typical of the standards we maintain and clearly we fell short.  I know this will not change your past stay but I do hope you will give us another opportunity to serve you in the future.  Like many of the hotels in Laguna Beach we are situated between the Pacific Ocean and Pacific Coast Highway so some of our rooms are on the Highway side.  Please come back and visit and experience the ocean side of the hotel, it is a wonderful sound hearing the waves crash at night.  Thank you for your comments I do hope you give us another chance, if so please look me up so I can give you a warm welcome back  Thanks Peggy

Summary Heading: Boutique Feel, Best Location in Laguna Beach
Summary: I stayed at the Inn with my husband for a romantic weekend getaway.  It was wonderful.  The staff was warm and welcoming and helpful with directions, extra towels, anything we needed.  The location is probably the best in all of Laguna Beach.  It is right in front of the ocean with spectacular views from the rooms.  We started our weekend by enjoying the complimentary wine hour on the roof deck.  It was cozy and the wine was a perfect pairing to the endless view of the coast line.  Our room was immaculate- the bed linens were clean and the bed was very comfortable and well located in the room to get the best views.  We left our sliding glass doors to the balcony open to let the fresh ocean breeze in while we slept- it was heavenly.  Our room also had a sofa/sitting area, a deck
Manager Response: none

Summary: I used Laguna Beach as a base for a recent work trip in California, and love this hotel.  The location was great, views spectacular and the service could not be faulted.  There is no restaurant onsite, and room service stops at 9pm (lucky I arrived at 8:30pm).  The beds were great, and free parking topped off the stay nicely.  Highly recommended!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: You don't get what you pay for
Summary: I made reservations well in advance for a King Room with an ocean view.  Upon arrival, we guaranteed that we had a room with a  "partial ocean view" and given a key to Room 417.  We then parked in the garage, collected our bags and went up to our room.  After getting in the room, we noticed that the view was of Hwy 1, with no views of the ocean.  I called down to the front desk and the gentleman that answered told me that while my husband and I were getting our bags, the last room with a view became unavailable and we were given a "comparable" room, however he gave us the key before we went to get our bags, so the story he told us was incorrect.  After a long day of travelling, all we wanted to do was put our feet up and gaze at the ocean.  Instead we got the "ambiance" of
Manager Response: Katie B  I am sorry to read about your stay at the Inn at Laguna Beach, I know we have reached out to you directly, we did so after recieving your response to our in house survey.  I am not sure what occured but all of our information we had showed your reservation for a Village Room which would be on the PCH side of the Hotel and if we could have upgraded you to a Ocean view we would of but unfortunely we did not have it available.  Our location like many in Laguna Beach are tucked between PCH and the Pacific Ocean so some of our rooms do not have a view.  I am working with the staff as clearly the explanation given does not make sense you already had the keys to a Village Room.   I am truly sorry for your experience and we look forward to hearing from you directly as we would like to make a positive impact on a future stay.  Thank you for your comments, I do hope you will give Laguna Beach a second chance Peggy

Summary Heading: Lovely Spot, Convenient Location, Pristine Accomodations
Summary: I enjoyed our stay here tremendously. Despite being accessible via the walkway along the coast and adjacent to the public beach, we had all the privacy and peace we could want. The room was  nicely appointed and immaculate. My only caveats are 1) that the beach fills up with local families (Inland Empire) on weekends, making it a bit overcrowded. The hotel pool is small, but a good alternative. 2) Limited room service is from the overpriced ( and mediocre) restaurant next door. Even so, this was a very good hotel. Happy hour wine was complimentary on their deck with nice beach views. Staff were friendly and professional. I will stay there again!
Manager Response: Jennaveev53  Thank you for your kind review we certainly appreciate all comments both positive and negatvie as they only help us improve our service.  You are correct about our "Day Trip" guest we can get upwards of 6000 extra visitors a day, the good news with Laguna is besides the famous Main Beach we have many beaches and coves that are less crowded and many within a few steps from the hotel.  I am so happy to learn you will stay with us again the next time you are viisting please let me know as I would like to not only welcome you back but also show you some other great beaches.  Thank you again for your comments Peggy

Summary: We were celebrating our 10 Year Anniversary on the weekend we stayed in Laguna Beach. We wanted a serene location to relax and Inn was ideal for that. I loved waking up to the sounds of the waves and the overall atmosphere was very calming. The location of the hotel was great with walking distance to restaurants, small shops, and art galleries. Customer service was great, staff was friendly and attentive. Our room was very clean, good size, and the bed afforded a good night's sleep. Our overall experience was excellent, loved Laguna Beach and will definitely be returning to the Inn.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is everything we hoped for and more! We were on the 5th floor (Ocean view - Queen beds) and what an amazing view!! First off, we stayed in around 5 different places during our trip in California and the staff here at Laguna were the best by far. From getting in touch before we arrived and making sure if we had any last minute requests, to checking out. Nothing was ever too much.  Perfect location for beach, pool, beach volleyball, basketball, restaurants (go to Sushi Laguna) and bars/pubs (for live music and playing pool/billiards go to Marine Rooms - opposite Sushi Laguna). I enjoyed every second of this trip and to top things off...I got engaged on Laguna Beach!
Manager Response: Stephanie G  CONGRATULATIONS!!!!  We are very happy about your engagement as Laguna Beach will always have a special place in your heart.  Thank you for your kind comments you touched on two things that alwys make me smile our staff and our location.  I enjoy coming to work each day as the team that I work with is the best, they truly care about every guest stay and they want to exceed expectations.  We hope you come back and visit maybe for an anniversary or honeymoon.  Either way please let me know the next time you make a reservation for the Inn at Laguna Beach as I would love to give you a warm Laguna Beach welcome back.  Congratulations and Thank you Peggy

Summary: We stayed at the Inn at LB for only one night but I wish we were there longer! we had an ocean front room with a spectacular view from our balcony- the room was comfortable and very clean- the wine hour on the terrace was such a nice touch- and Starbucks coffee in the morning was grately appreciated.  They really go above and beyond to make their guests feel welcomed and appreciated!  Love giving my business to establishments like this!  I will be back!!
Manager Response: Shan 72  Thank you for your kind comments and I am happy to read you will be back.  We think Laguna Beach is a magical place so it makes me happy you wish to spend more time here.  Thank you for pointing out some of our amenities we really try to make every guest feel welcomed as we truly do appreciate your business.  Please look me up the next time you visit as I would love to give you a warm welcome back,  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Ideal. This was the most pleasant find in Laguna Beach! The service was excellent, the rooms were quaint and charming, and location was ideal.  We were a short walk to restaurants/shops/beach and beautiful sights.  The happy hour on the upper deck was nicely done and it was a great spot to relax. You're greeted with cucumber water in the lobby and friendly  staff.  For the price, this cannot be beat. I will return and will recommend to anyone interested.  This was a wonderful vacation and a welcomed gem in Southern California.
Manager Response: Carlabella16  Thank you for your kind review, you certainly touched on some of the amenities that I believe make us special.  Thank you for pointing out the kindness of our staff, they really try to exceed expecatations so it is always nice when this is recognized.  Laguna Beach is a walkable City so it is nice to read that you enjoyed our location, we do boast a 98 walk score which is one of the tops in Laguna Beach.  Thank you again for your kind comments, please look me up the next time you make a reservation at the Inn at Laguna Beach as I would love to give you a warm welcome back!  Thank you Peggy

Summary: Our family stayed at at the Inn at Laguna beach over spring break, we had fantastic time, the staff was very friendly and accommodating.  The room was spotless, the view from our balcony incredible, my kids loved the warm pool.  We also very much enjoyed the wine reception and my children loved the cookies.  My only negative comment is to get rid of the mini bar.  We will definately come back and would recommend the hotel to our friends
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location, nice rooms and a wonderful staff.  Will bend over to  backwards to acomodate your needs.  The rooms have a wonderful view of the Pacific.  Many of the rooms have one king bed, so make sure you request a room with two queens if you need them.  The desk staff are more than willing to help with local information, restaurants, gyms and other points of interest.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We thought we needed a warmer-than-Northern California beach fix before the busy summer season and chose Laguna Beach, and The Inn at Laguna Beach, based on Trip Advisor reviews.  I don't see how we could have possibly made a better choice!  Our arrival was a little harried, so hopefully this will give other first-time travelers a 'heads up':  When you arrive from Hiway 133, the registration entrance will be the 3rd on the left (given the double yellow line we drove around the block).  There are several parking spots near the door and hopefully one will be open when you arrive (that wasn't the case for us and we had to juggle near the entrance with another car).  Check in, get help with your luggage, and be prepared to drive your car down to one of the two parking lots
Manager Response: none

Summary: Having visited the Inn at Laguna several times in the past we were not disappointed with our stay from 21 April - 1st May. From the moment we arrived at reception until the day we left, we could not find fault in our stay. Fresh tea and coffee is served at reception from 7.30 until 9.00 in the morning, wine tasting either on the balcony or reception from 5-6pm and fresh lemonade with cookies from 6-7pm. The views from the balcony are breathtaking. We walked along the cliff top every morning taking in the surfers and water walkers. Our room, this time, was on the village side. The room itself had a king sized bed with a sofa, coffee table and television. As it was our anniversary we were delighted to be sent a bottle of champagne to our room from the Inn. The staff cannot do
Manager Response: Phyllis K  Thank you for your kind comments we certainly appreciate them.  I would also like to thank you for spending your anniversary with us as you have many choices to spend such a special occassion and I am truly honored you chose the Inn at Laguna Beach.  Heisler Park is one of the top attractions in Laguna Beach so I am happy you were able to enjoy the walk each morning.  I am blessed every day to work with such a great group of people and please rest assured they recieved your "Thank you".  I hope on your next visit to the Inn at Laguna Beach I will have a chance to meet you as I would love to give you a warm welcome back.  Thank you  Peggy

Summary: The view from the hotel is fantastic.  They have wine happy hour on the terrace and an excellent location!  Cookies in the lobby in the afternoon with lemonade.  They also have food service from Las Brisas.  We really enjoyed our stay and would definitely return.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed on the 5th floor in an ocean view, double queen room. The inn is located between Main Beach and Heisler park which is a gorgeous rocky coast area in Laguna. Having those views to look at and wake up to is what makes this "inn" worthwhile. The staff is very nice and the queen rooms are a bit small but tastefully decorated and comfortable. If we would have had movies to watch at night when tired, real room service, and a bigger room, I would have given it 5 stars. Then again, it would have been more expensive.
Manager Response: Cindy H  Thank you for your comments we take all feedback seriously so we can try to continuously improve.  I am happy to read that you point out our location as we believe we have one of the best spots in town.  Heisler Park is one of the top attractions in Laguna Beach, with all of the Public Art and access it is a beautiful walk.  We are in the process of updating our TV offerings and our WiFi so movies will be able to be viewed in the room, as for our Room Service we are pretty limited as we do not have a Kitchen but we have partnered with the World Famous Las Brisas restaurant to offer in room dining.  Hopefully these little changes will be noticed on your next visit.  Please look me up the next time you are at the Inn at Laguna Beach as I would love to give you a warm welcome back.    Thank you again for your comments we truly do appreciate them  Peggy

Summary Heading: Wonderful stay- I highly recommend Inn at Laguna
Summary: The front desk staff were very friendly and made us feel welcome for our stay April 12-13, 2013. The view from the room was spectacular with a scenic picture of Main Beach.
